La primera vez que Mantienes el conjuro cada asalto, el radio del aura divina crece 10 pies [3 m] (3 m).

Magic Aura.name: Aura mágica
Magic Aura.description:
Alteras la apariencia del aura mágica de un objeto. Puedes elegir entre hacer que el aura aparezca como la de un objeto mágico común del doble del aura o inferior, o hacer que aparezca como estyo bajo el efecto de un conjuro de un nivel de aura a tu elección o inferior. Si el objetivo es mágico, en lugar de ello puedes elegir hacer que aparezca como enteramente no mágico. Un lanzador que utilice @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pozpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detectar magia} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Leer aura} de un conjuro de nivel igual o mayor podrá intentar descreer la ilusión de aura mágica. Este conjuro no enmascara el aura de los conjuros de 9º nivel o mayor o de los objetos de 19º nivel o mayor.

Potenciado (3º) Puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura en lugar de un objeto. Cuyo lo haces puedes, o bien ocultar las auras de todos los objetos mágicos que tiene, o bien hacer que el aura de dicha criatura aparezca como si estuviera bajo el efecto de un conjuro que conoces.

Aura of the Unremarkable.name: Aura of the Unremarkable
Aura of the Unremarkable.description:
You y allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing. For example, if you y your allies are loudly interrogating a local for information or aiming a crossbow at a noble from a balcony, creatures who can see you might not think this is unusual. Non-allied creatures in the emanation must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico The creature sees your actions as they really are y announces them as such. All other creatures in the area gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will saves to recognize your actions as they really are.

Éxito The creature sees your actions as they really are.

Fallo The creature believes your actions are normal y unworthy of concern.

Fallo crítico The creature believes you are performing other actions entirely, such as helping a local or waving to a noble, as determined by the GM. The creature doesn't have a chance of remembering events normally.

Any hostile actions by you or your allies against a creature or its allies break the effect of the spell for that creature. So, for example, if an interrogated local's friends or threatened noble's guards saw your actions, they would be no afectado by this spell. When the spell ends (or when afectado allies move outside the range of the emanation), observers see things normally but the altered perceptions from earlier events remain in mind. Each mention of the events as noteworthy, such as being questioned about them by an authority figure, grants the target another Will save to break the effect y remember things normally (unless the creature critically failed their save).

Avatar.name: Avatar
Avatar.description:
Te transformas en un avatar de tu dios, adoptyo una forma de batalla Enorme. Tienes que disponer de espacio para expyirte, o el conjuro se pierde. En esta forma de batalla puedes tener manos, y puedes llevar a cabo acciones de manipular. Puedes Disipar este conjuro. Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y aptitudes sea cual sea la forma de batalla del dios que adoptas:

  • CA = 25 + tu nivel. Ignora el penalizador a las pruebas de armadura y la reducción de la Velocidad.
  • 30 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
  • Visión en la oscuridad.
  • Uno o más @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ataques} específicos de la forma de batalla de tu dios, que son los únicos que puedes utilizar. Estás entrenado en ellos. Tu modificador al ataque es +33 y utilizas el daño indicado. Tus ataques Cuerpo a cuerpo están basados en la Fuerza (por ejemplo, a efectos del estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}, si no dispones del rasgo sutil, y todos tus ataques a distancia están basados en la Destreza. Los ataques que infligen daño por energía positiva o negativa no curan a las criaturas.
  • Modificador +35 al Atletismo, si el tuyo no es superior.

También obtienes las aptitudes específicas indicadas para tu dios a continuación:

  • Abadar
    • Velocidad 50 pies (15 m), excavar 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), inmune a ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immovilizado};
    • A distancia a ballesta (incremento de rango de distancia 120 pies (6 m) [36 m], Recarga 1), Daño 6d10+3 perforante.
  • Achaekek
    • Velocidad 70 pies, trepar 50 pies, ignore difficult terrain y greater difficult terrain;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a mantis claw (ágil, backswing, finesse, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m), versatile P), Daño 6d8+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a spine volley (range 60 pies (18 m)), Daño 6d6+3 perforante
  • Asmodeo
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a maza (alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m], Daño 6d10+6 contundente;
    • A distancia a fuego infernal (alcance 120 pies (6 m)), Daño 6d6+3 fuego.
  • Calistria
    • Velocidad 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), volar 70 pies (21 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a látigo (desarmar, sutil, no letal, alcance 20 pies (6 m) (6 m), Daño 6d4+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a aguijón placentero (alcance 60 pies (18 m)), Daño 6d6+3 veneno.
  • Cayden Cailean
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire, ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a espada ropera (letal, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m)), Daño 6d6+6 perforante;
    • A distancia a salpicadura de cerveza (alcance 120 pies (6 m)), Daño 6d6+3 veneno.
  • Desna
    • Velocidad 30 pies (9 m), volar 70 pies (21 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a cuchillo de estrella (ágil, letal, sutil, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m], plata, lanzado 60 pies (18 m) [18 m]), Daño 6d4+6 perforante;
    • A distancia a rayo de luna (alcance 120 pies (6 m), plata), Daño 6d6+3 fuego
  • Erastil
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire, ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • A distancia a arco largo (letal 1d8, incremento de rango de distancia 150 pies [45 m], Daño 6d8+3 perforante.
  • Gorum
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), inmune a ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado};
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a myoble (versátil P, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d12+6 cortante
  • Gozreh
    • sin Velocidad terrestre, volar 70 pies (21 m), nadar 70 pies (21 m); ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a olas (embestida, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m], desplazado 20 pies (6 m) [6 m]),Daño 6d8+6 contundente;
    • A distancia a viento (electricidad versátil, alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 contundente.
  • Iomedae
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire; escudo (Dureza 15, no puede ser dañado);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a espada larga (versátil P, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 cortante.
  • Irori
    • Velocidad 80 pies (24 m) (24 m), caminar por el aire;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a golpe imparable (ágil, versátil P o S, sutil, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 contundente;
    • A distancia a golpe de viento (alcance 60 pies (18 m) [18 m], Daño 6d4+6 contundente.
  • Lamashtu
    • Velocidad 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), volar 70 pies (21 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a alfanje (vigoroso, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 cortante; Daño 6d10+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a aguas de Lamashtu (alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 veneno.
  • Nethys
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire;
    • A distancia a magia pura (alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]; frío, electricidad o fuego versátil), Daño 6d6 fuerza.
  • Norgorber
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire, ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a espada corta (ágil, sutil, versátil S, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d6+6 perforante;
    • A distancia a lanzamiento de dedo negro (alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 veneno.
  • Farasma
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo adaga (ágil, sutil, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m], lanzada 40 pies (12 m) [12 m]), Daño 6d6+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a explosión espiral (alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m], sólo daña a los muertos vivientes), Daño 6d8+3 positivo.
  • Rovagug
    • Velocidad 50 pies (15 m), excavar 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), inmune a ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado};
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a myíbulas (alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d12+6 perforante;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a pierna (ágil, versátil P, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 contundente.
  • Sarenrae
    • Velocidad 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), volar 70 pies (21 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a cimitarra (vigorosa, no letal, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d6+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a llama eterna (no letal, alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 fuego.
  • Shelyn
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire, ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a guja (letal d8, no letal, alcance 20 pies (6 m) [6 m]), Daño 6d8+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a melodía de la belleza interior (no letal, alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 sónico.
  • Torag
    • Velocidad 50 pies (15 m), excavar 30 pies (9 m) (9 m), inmune a ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immovilizada}; escudo (Dureza 15, no puede ser dañado);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a martillo de guerra (embestida, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 contundente.
  • Urgathoa
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a guadaña (letal d10, derribo, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d10+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a plaga pálida (alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 negativo.
  • Zon-Kuthon
    • Velocidad 70 pies (21 m), caminar por el aire, ignora el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo a cadena armada (desarmar, derribo, alcance 15 pies (4,5 m) [4,5 m]), Daño 6d8+6 cortante;
    • A distancia a dolor de medianoche (mental, no letal, alcance 120 pies (6 m) [36 m]), Daño 6d6+3 mental.

Awaken Animal.name: Dotar de consciencia a un animal
Awaken Animal.description:
Concedes inteligencia al objetivo, transformándolo en una bestia. Si previamente era un compañero animal o un esbirro, ya no puede actuar de dicha forma.

Tabla 7-1: Rituales de creación de criaturas

Nivel de la criaturas Nivel del conjuro requerido Coste
-1 or 0 2 15 po
1 2 60 po
2 3 105 po
3 3 180 po
4 4 300 po
5 4 480 po
6 5 750 po
7 5 1,080 po
8 6 1,500 po
9 6 2,100 po
10 7 3,000 po
11 7 4,200 po
12 8 6,000 po
13 8 9,000 po
14 9 13,500 po
15 9 19,500 po
16 10 30,000 po
17 10 45,000 po

Éxito crítico Los modificadores por Inteligencia, Sabiduría y Carisma se incrementan a +2 cada uno si eran inferiores, y la criatura se vuelve solícita hacia ti en agradecimiento por dotarla de consciencia.

Éxito Los modificadores por Inteligencia, Sabiduría y Carisma se incrementan a +0 cada uno si eran peores, y la criatura se vuelve amistosa hacia ti en agradecimiento por dotarla de consciencia.

Fallo No consigues dotar de consciencia al objetivo.

Fallo crítico Dotas de consciencia accidentalmente al objetivo, con un odio puro y bestial dirigido hacia ti. Los bonificadores por Inteligencia, Sabiduría y Carisma se incrementan a -2 si eran peores. Se acrovuelve hostil para contigo, e intenta destruirte.

Awaken Entropy.name: Awaken Entropy
Awaken Entropy.description:
All things age, all things die, y at the end of días even the universe will grow quiet y still. You awaken the cosmic principle of entropy, accelerating time in an area-flesh falters, plants shrivel, y even stone begins to crumble. Any creature that enters or begins its turn in the area must succeed at a basic Fortaleza save or take [[/r 8d6[negative]]] damage, or [[/r 8d6[force]]] damage if the creature normally doesn't take negative damage, such as if La criatura queda a construct or undead. Even beings such as fiends with unlimited lifespans can be worn away by entropy. The first time you Sustain the Spell on each subsequent turn, the entropic zone grows stronger in addition to having its duration increased. The radius of the burst se incrementa en 10 feet (to a maximum of 40 pies (12 m)), y the size of the damage dice se incrementa en one step (from d6 to d8, then to d10, y finally to d12).

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Awaken Object.name: Awaken Object
Awaken Object.description:
You imbue a single Small or smaller object with rudimentary awareness y consciousness, y it gains mental ability modifiers depending on the results of the ritual. It gains the ability to see y hear, y the ability to understy (but not speak) a single language that you know. It's indifferent to you y all living creatures. In all other respects, it's an ordinary object of its type. An awakened object that gains the broken condition is rendered insensate until Repaired above its Broken Threshold.

Magical objects y constructs can't be awakened, nor can most spell or magic item abilities be added to an awakened object later (the process to do so is much more complicated than a ritual y essentially creates an intelligent magic item). However, an object that has already been awakened can have the animate object ritual cast on it by doubling the Coste of animate object.

Éxito crítico The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, y Charisma modifiers each increase to +2 if they were lower, y it becomes friendly to you for awakening it.

Éxito The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, y Charisma modifiers increase to +0.

Fallo El objetivo queda no afectado y the ritual fails.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda no afectado, y the primary caster's intellect is trapped in the object for 24 horas. During this time, their original body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} y inert y can't be awakened by any means.

Awaken Portal.name: Awaken Portal
Awaken Portal.description:
You attempt to reactivate a dormant gate, portal, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5ZW1w9f4gWlSIuWA]{Teleportation Circle} by infusing it with magical energies. This ritual must be successfully performed twice, once at each location the portal connects. While the teleportation circles y portals found in the Abomination Vaults require no additional Coste to awaken, other portals might require rare items or specific materials as a Coste for this ritual at the GM's discretion—some portals might even be so powerful that this ritual cannot awaken them at all.

The DC required to successfully awaken a portal varies based on the strength y distance between its end points. For the portals found in the Abomination Vaults Adventure Path, the DC varies according to the dungeon Nivel on which it is located. Use the DCs by Spell Nivel section of Table 10-5 to determine the DC for a portal, using the dungeon Nivel in place of spell Nivel. Thus, activating the portal on the first Nivel of the Abomination Vaults requires a successful DC 15 check, while activating the portal on the fourth Nivel requires a successful DC 23 check.

Éxito crítico You awaken the portal. If its other side is awakened, the portal can be used normally y won't deactivate naturally. If its other side is not awakened, this side remains awakened for 1 year, possibly allowing you enough time to find y awaken the connecting portal.

Éxito As critical success, but if the portal's other side is not awakened, this side remains awakened for only [[/r 1d6 #días]]{1d6 días} before it fades y falls dormant again.

Fallo You fail to activate the portal, y magical backlash leaves you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} for 24 horas.

Fallo crítico As failure, but in addition, a hostile creature is drawn through the portal y immediately attacks anyone present. The creature drawn through the portal varies, according to the portal's nature; in the Abomination Vaults, the creature conjured depends on the dungeon Nivel where the ritual was attempted, as listed below.

  • First Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.NQ6qRvpD9DIwVxt3]{Vampiric Mist}
  • Second Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Nkz8Z5TrEqRePGlk]{Scalathrax}
  • Third Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.dEAneTvoPuQXZoLR]{Gibbering Mouther}
  • Fourth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.wRQ7TZdd0n5UIIao]{Will-o'-Wisp}
  • Fifth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.SY8pvLPqc2Epo9Xj]{Soul Eater}
  • Sixth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.ceLvlSQsYNORH8oM]{Voidglutton}
  • Seventh Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.ZGEf08j9q4fIPDFd]{Dread Wraith}
  • Eighth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ToSwRvspZ0IB7SHQ]{Ghost Mage}
  • Ninth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.MUVc2ZjwGtlpcuX1]{Gosreg}
  • Tenth Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.t4JYGYJqT1CaqKvh]{Shining Child}

Bacchanalia.name: Bacchanalia
Bacchanalia.description:
You hold an elaborate feast y stoke the celebratory spirit, causing it to spread to other people nearby; you buoy them with hope y good cheer as they revel into the night. The ritual was first developed by the cult of the hero-god Kelksiomides in Iblydos y meant to be a benefit to the community during hard times, though other groups have used it for far different purposes, such as to spread chaos or to provide cover for a heist.

You y the secondary casters begin your feast in a public space where others can see you, exactly 8 horas before dusk. When dusk falls, you complete the ritual. The party spreads outward from your initial site until it slowly encompasses the settlement (for a town or smaller), or a district or division of up to approximately 1,000 people (for a larger settlement). Those partaking in the celebration are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinado} until the ritual comes to an end (or someone uses a hostile action toward them, as usual). The partying appears to spread naturally, as others see the revelers, they too slowly join until the celebration alcancees its peak size. The spell's effect ends sharply at midnight, but that doesn't mean people stop partying right away if they're enjoying themselves.

Éxito crítico The party is a huge hit! The effects work as above, except that in a larger settlement, the celebration can spread to an area with as many as 10,000 people. Furthermore, the celebration leaves strong memories in the hearts of those who participated, causing locals to commemorate it or possibly outlaw such celebrations (depending on their view of the event).

Éxito The party is successful. It spreads as described in the ritual's description.

Fallo The party never really catches on. You y the secondary casters get to celebrate, but the most other people do is give you odd looks.

Fallo crítico Instead of celebration, you inspire anger y resentment toward you y the secondary casters for disturbing the peace or possibly even deepening the despair of a people who are already troubled. People in the area have their attitudes toward you temporarily adjusted two steps worse than normal. Those who become hostile won't necessarily attack you, but they will mock you, break up your revelry, y potentially arrest you.

Baleful Polymorph.name: Polimorfar funesto
Baleful Polymorph.description:
Transformas la criatura objetivo en un animal inofensivo apropiado para el área, con efectos basados en su salvación de Fortaleza.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El cuerpo del objetivo obtiene rasgos menores del animal. Sus órganos internos se revuelven al transformarse parcialmente, haciendo que quede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}. Cuando se recupera del estado indispuesto, sus rasgos revierten a la normalidad.

Fallo El objetivo se transforma durante 1 minuto pero mantiene su mente. Si invierte todas sus acciones de su turno en concentrarse en su forma original, puede intentar una salvación de Voluntad para acabar inmediatamente con el efecto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo es transformado en el animal elegido, en cuerpo y en mente, para una duración ilimitada.

Bandit's Doom.name: Bandit's Doom
Bandit's Doom.description:
You ward the target item against those who would steal it. When a creature attempts to take the target into its possession, it takes 8d8 mental damage and is doomed, depending on the result of its Will save. The spell then ends. You can choose up to 10 creatures when you cast this spell; if you do, those creatures can take the target item without triggering the ward. You can only have one bandit's doom active at a time. If you cast the spell again, the newer casting supersedes the older.

Critical Success La criatura no resulta afectada.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 3}.

Potenciado (+2) El daño se incrementa en 2d8.

Bane.name: Perdición
Bane.description:
Llenas de dudas la mente de tus enemigos.

Los objetivos que fallan su salvación de Voluntad sufren un penalizador -1 por estatus a las tiradas de ataque mientras están en el área.

Una vez por turno, empezando en el posterior a aquél en el que lanzas perdición, puedes utilizar una acción, que tiene el rasgo concentrar, para incrementar en 5 pies (1,5 m) el radio de la emanación y obligar a los enemigos del área que no se han visto afectados todavía a intentar una nueva tirada de salvación.

Perdición puede contrarrestar a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bendecir}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.UTLp7omqsiC36bso]{Efecto de conjuro: Perdición}

Barkskin.name: Piel robliza
Barkskin.description:
La piel del objetivo queda recubierta de corteza. El objetivo obtiene resistencia 2 al daño contundente y perforante y debilidad 3 al fuego. Una vez el objetivo sufre daño por fuego, puede Disipar el conjuro como acción gratuita desencadenada por el sufrimiento del daño; hacerlo no reduce el daño por fuego sufrido.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.HoOujAdQWCN4E6sQ]{Efecto de conjuro: Piel robliza}

Potenciado (+2) Las resistencias se incrementan en 2 y las debilidades se incrementan en 3.

Blade Barrier.name: Barrera de cuchillas
Blade Barrier.description:
Unas cuchillas de fuerza forman una pared agitada. La pared es una línea recta de 20 pies (6 m) (6 m) de altura, 120 pies (6 m) (36 m) de longitud y 2 pulgadas (5 cm) de grosor, que proporciona cobertura. La pared inflige 7d8 daño por fuerza a cada criatura que se encuentra en el espacio de la pared cuyo es creada, intenta atravesarla o acaba su turno en su interior. Una salvación básica de Reflejos reduce el daño. Una criatura que tiene éxito en esta salvación cuyo la pared es creada resulta empujada hasta el espacio más próximo en un lado de su elección. Las criaturas que intentan atravesar la pared no consiguen hacerlo si fallan críticamente la salvación, y acaban su movimiento adyacentes a la misma.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d8.

Bathe in Blood.name: Bathe in Blood
Bathe in Blood.description:
This is an old ritual, illegal in nearly every corner of Golarion, but never quite exterminated. You bathe in the freshly spilled blood of your people, whose lives y years you steal in the process.

This ritual requires that you submerge yourself in a bath of alchemically treated blood, attended by silent servants. The blood must come from the same ancestry as your own, y must have been spilled within the last 6 horas; a spell such as gentle repose can extend this time, but using such preserved blood applies a -4 circumstance penalty to the primary y secondary checks. If you're Medium, you require 30 gallons of blood to immerse yourself, y a typical Medium creature holds about 1-1/2 gallons of blood in its body. This ritual doesn't strictly require that the blood donors be killed y drained dry, but the logistical challenges of gathering enough blood without murder are beyond all but the most well-resourced casters.

Each time you enact this ritual, regardless of its success or failure, you take a penalty to the primary check for all subsequent castings. This penalty starts at -1 y se incrementa en -1 during each casting (so if you were casting this ritual on yourself for the fifth time, you would take a -4 penalty on your Occultism check).

Éxito crítico You emerge rejuvenated y revived. You become up to 40 years younger, returning to the prime of youth y life. If you're already at your desired age, your aging instead stops for the next 40 years. While remaining recognizably yourself, you also become preternaturally attractive, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to Make an Impression. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.kMoOWWBqDYmPcYyS]{Efecto de conjuro: Bathe in Blood}

Éxito You become 20 years younger or pause your aging for 20 years.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico You die. Casters killed this way frequently return as undead, often as ghosts or vampires.

Battlefield Persistence.name: Battlefield Persistence
Battlefield Persistence.description:
Desencadenante You are about to attempt a saving throw, but you haven't rolled yet.

You're difficult to remove from battle. obtienes +2 status bonus to the triggering save, y if the triggering save is against an incapacitation effect, it treats you as if you were 2 Nivels higher.

Beastmaster Trance.name: Beastmaster Trance
Beastmaster Trance.description:
You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target companion. You attempt Perception checks using your own Perception, but you have any special senses the target has, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Visión en la penumbra} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Visión en la oscuridad}.

This spell grants no special method of communication with the chosen animal, so it follows any instructions you gave it before you entered the trance y, failing that, it does as it wishes.

For the duration of the trance, your own senses are muted, though you can still communicate. This lack of awareness makes you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido}. You can't take actions with the attack or move traits.

Potenciado (6º) Increase the range to 100 miles y the duration to sustained up to 10 minutos. The target can hear you through the spell, allowing you to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Commy the Animal} or use other actions that have the auditory trait.

Potenciado (8º) Increase the range to planetary y the duration to sustained up to 1 hora. You can communicate telepathically with the target for the duration of the trance.

Befitting Attire.name: Befitting Attire
Befitting Attire.description:
You cloak the targets in an illusion, shaping their clothing y worn items into ones suitable for a particular occasion. You visualize the occasion, y the spell creates illusory attire customized to each target. For instance, if you visualized a noble ball, armor would appear to be fine clothing. This doesn't change identifying details of the targets' appearances other than their clothes.

Any creature that touches the attire, uses the Seek action to examine it, or otherwise interacts with it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Potenciado (4º) You can target up to 20 creatures.

Potenciado (5º) You can target up to 100 creatures.

Befuddle.name: Befuddle
Befuddle.description:
You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions y thoughts to become clumsy.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1}.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 3}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido}.

Behold the Weave.name: Behold the Weave
Behold the Weave.description:
You behold the many timelines that weave around a creature, y in so doing, you make one more likely to occur. The target must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico You can make neither heads nor tails of the target's timeline, y El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target must commit to a single action that it will take at some point during its next turn: "Stride toward Valeros," "Cast shield," "Strike at Amiri with my mandíbulas." That action is now locked in, y the creature must attempt it, even if the situation has changed-if the creature stated that it would Strike at Amiri with its mandíbulas, it must try to do so. If La criatura queda entirely unable to fulfill the action it committed to-for instance, if it had only 1 action left y Amiri was out of the range of its mandíbulas Strike-it loses the last action of its turn as it reels in a temporal paradox. The creature can choose to lock in a 2- or 3-action activity if it prefers to do so, but if it does, it loses all the associated actions if it can't perform the activity on its turn. If the situation changes oddly (perhaps La criatura queda forcibly teleported away y has no idea which direction is "toward Valeros" any longer), the GM determines what happens.

Fallo As success, but the creature must commit at least two of its actions for the next turn-"I will Stride toward Valeros y then Strike with my claws." All of these actions are similarly locked in y can't be changed, but the creature can take them in any order.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the creature must commit all of its actions for the next turn.

Potenciado(7º) Instead of affecting a single target, the spell affects all enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

Bless.name: Bendecir
Bless.description:
Las bendiciones del más allá ayudan a tus compañeros a golpear con acierto. Tus aliados y tú en el área obtenéis un bonificador +1 por estatus a vuestras tiradas de ataque. Una vez por turno, empezyo en el turno posterior al que lanzas bendecir, puedes usar una acción, que tiene el rasgo concentrar, para incrementar en 5 pies (1,5 m) el radio de la emanación.

Bendecir puede contrarrestar a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Perdición}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Gqy7K6FnbLtwpoud]{Efecto de conjuro: Bendecir}

Bestial Curse.name: Bestial Curse
Bestial Curse.description:
You tap into the target's inner being y curse it to become a bestial version of itself. The effect is based on its Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target's body gains minor bestial features. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} durante 1 asalto. When it recovers from the Torpe condition, its features revert to normal y the spell ends.

Fallo The target transforms into a bestial form for 1 hora. El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} y gains weakness 1 to silver. It gains a claw, hoof, cuerno, or mandíbulas Strike(your choice) that uses the target's unarmed Strike statistics except that the damage type changes to contundente, perforante, or cortante, as appropriate. Whenever the target attempts to use any manipulate action, it must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the action is lost. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8wCVSzWYcURWewbd]{Efecto de conjuro: Bestial Curse (Failure)}

Fallo crítico As failure, but La duración es de unlimited. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.KtAJN4Qr2poTL6BB]{Efecto de conjuro: Bestial Curse (Critical Failure)}

Bilocation.name: Bilocation
Bilocation.description: You exist in two places at once. When you Cast the Spell, another copy of yourself appears in an adjacent square. During bilocation's duration, whenever you act, you can choose which of your selves does so, y whenever one of you uses a move action, you can both move. Your two selves share Hit Points, y any condition or effect on one affects both. If both of your selves are in the area of the same effect, or targeted by the same multitarget effect, you are only afectado once. Even if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points or killed, both selves remain until the duration expires. Your link continues at any distance, even across planar boundaries. You can Dismiss the Spell, y if you do so, you choose which of the selves vanishes y which becomes you, allowing you to extricate one of your selves from a dangerous situation.

Bind Soul.name: Ligadura del alma
Bind Soul.description: Arrancas el alma del objetivo antes de que pueda pasar a la otra vida y la aprisionas en un zafiro negro. Mientras el alma está en la gema al objetivo no se le puede devolver a la vida por ningún medio, ni siquiera magia poderosa como un deseo. Si la gema es destruida o la ligadura del alma es contrarrestada sobre la gema, el alma queda libre. La gema tiene CA 16 y Dureza 10. Una gema sólo puede contener un alma, y cualquier intento de incluir otra malgasta el conjuro.

Bit of Luck.name: Un poco de suerte
Bit of Luck.description:
Inclinas ligeramente la balanza de la suerte para proteger del desastre a una criatura. Cuando el objetivo tiene que hacer una tirada de salvación, puede tirar dos veces y utilizar el mejor de los resultados. Una vez lo hace, el conjuro se acaba.

Si lanzas de nuevo un poco de suerte, se acaba cualquier lanzamiento anterior aún en efecto. Una vez una criatura ha sido designada como objetivo de un poco de suerte, queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Biting Words.name: Biting Words
Biting Words.description:
You entwine magic with your voice, causing your taunts y jibes to physically harm your enemies. You can attack with your words once when you finish Casting the Spell, y can repeat the attack once on each of your subsequent turns by taking a single action, which has the attack, concentrate, y linguistic traits. After your third attack total, the spell ends.

When you attack with biting words, make a ranged spell attack roll against a creature within 30 pies (9 m), dealing 2d6 sonic damage if you hit (or double damage on a critical hit).

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Black Tentacles.name: Tentáculos negros
Black Tentacles.description:
Área Explosión de 20 pies (6 m) adyacente a una superficie plana

Unos tentáculos negros y poderosos se alzan e intentan Agarrar a todas las criaturas del área. Haz tiradas de ataque de conjuro contra la CD de Fortaleza de cada criatura. Las criaturas contra las que tengas éxito quedarán @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Agarrado} y sufrirán 3d6 daño contundente. Siempre que una criatura acaba su turno en el área, los tentáculos intentan agarrarla si no lo han hecho ya, e infligen 1d6 daño contundente a cualquier criatura ya agarrada [[/r 1d6[contundente]]].

La CD de Huir de los tentáculos es igual a tu CD de conjuros. Una criatura puede atacar a un tentáculo en un intento de liberarse de la presa. Su CA es igual a tu CD de conjuros y queda destruido si sufre 12 o más daño. Incluso si alguno es destruido, tentáculos adicionales continúan creciendo en el área hasta que se acaba la duración. Puedes Disipar el conjuro.

Blackfinger's Blades.name: Blackfinger's Blades
Blackfinger's Blades.description:
You pray for swift y painful death to your enemies y find your y your allies' weapons blessed to deliver just that.

The target weapons are coated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QGXNqpP5KvSldoZz]{Giant Scorpion Venom} with a DC equal to your spell DC.

The effects remain on a weapon durante 1 minuto or until the weapon deals damage, whichever comes first.

Blanket Of Stars.name: Blanket Of Stars
Blanket Of Stars.description:
A flowing cloak of utter darkness drapes over you, filled with pinpricks of light like distant stars. It imparts the stillness of the cosmos to you, granting you a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

While outside under a starry night sky, you're also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} as long as you remain still. When moving under a starry night sky, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} instead.

Gazing too closely into the stars is disorienting. Any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you must attempt a Will save; this is a mental, visual effect.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} until the end of its next turn.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido} y Dazzled until the end of its next turn.

Blazing Blade.name: Blazing Blade
Blazing Blade.description:
A scimitar-shaped beam of fiery light springs from your free hy. While the spell lasts, you can use a single action, which has the attack y concentrate traits, to burn your foes with the blazing blade. When you do, make a spell attack roll. On a success, the blazing blade deals 1d6 daño por fuego más 1d6 good damage más your spellcasting ability modifier. On a critical success, it deals double the usual damage.

Potenciado (4º) The blade's daño por fuego increases to 2d6. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 persistent good damage.

Potenciado (6º) The blade's daño por fuego increases to 3d6. On a critical success, the target takes 2d6 persistent good damage.

Potenciado (8º) The blade's daño por fuego increases to 4d6. On a critical success, the target takes 3d6 persistent good damage.

Blazing Dive.name: Blazing Dive
Blazing Dive.description:
Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 pies (18 m). When you ly, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 contundente damage y 3d6 daño por fuego (basic Reflejos save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4 contundente y 1d6 fire.

Blazing Fissure.name: Blazing Fissure
Blazing Fissure.description:
A thin crack rips through the earth, erupting with magma, then swiftly seals up. Each creature along the line y on solid ground takes 4d6 contundente damage y 6d6 daño por fuego with a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo, y it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño, y it falls prone.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6 contundente y 1d6 fire

Blessing of Defiance.name: Blessing of Defiance
Blessing of Defiance.description:
Channeling forth the power to persevere in the face of adversity, you grant the target the means to deny danger y avoid dire harm. Choose one saving throw: Fortaleza, Reflejos, or Will. The target gets a +4 status bonus to that saving throw durante 1 asalto. The potency y number of targets of this blessing depend on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.FD9Ce5pqcZYstcMI]{Efecto de conjuro: Blessing of Defiance}

1 (somático) The spell targets you or one willing ally within range.

2 (verbal) The spell targets you or one willing ally within range. If you choose Fortaleza, the target gains resistance 15 to veneno. If you choose Reflejos, the target gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speeds. If you choose Will, the target gains resistance 15 to mental damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.w9HpSwBLByNyRXvi]{Efecto de conjuro: Blessing of Defiance (2 Action)}

3 (verbal) The spell targets you y all willing allies within 30 pies (9 m).

Blight.name: Asolar
Blight.description:
Retuerces y atrofias las plantas del área, haciendo que se marchiten. Además de otros peligros de una vida vegetal debilitada, esto disminuye el rendimiento de las cosechas. Si lanzas este ritual en un área afectada por crecimiento vegetal, asolar intenta contrarrestarlo en lugar de tener su efecto habitual.

Éxito crítico Estropeas por completo las cosechas del área, o disminuyes el rendimiento a la mitad en un área de hasta una milla (1,6 km) de radio.

Éxito Disminuyes a la mitad el rendimiento de las cosechas del área.

Fallo El ritual no surte efecto.

Fallo crítico La flora del área cambia de forma inesperada, a determinar por el DJ, pero generalmente tan contradictoria como sea posible a tus auténticos deseos (por ejemplo, enriqueciendo las cosechas cuando tu intención era devastarlas).

Blightburn Blast.name: Blightburn Blast
Blightburn Blast.description:
You channel a blast of powerful blightburn radiation from your hys. You deal 4d6 veneno damage to creatures in the area. Creatures who fail their save are afflicted with stage 1 of blightburn sickness (con un fallo crítico, the creature moves immediately to stage 2). The Nivel of blightburn sickness caused by this spell is equal to twice the spell's Nivel, y the disease's save DC uses the caster's DC.

Blightburn Sickness (uncommon, disease) Nivel 15

The ceiling of the vault of the Black Desert is studded with deadly crystals that glimmer like stars above the dark sys. These crystals are radioactive y flood the vault with lethal energy. Creatures other than those native to the vault or who have survived there for a long time develop a disease called blightburn sickness.

Creatures native to the Black Desert are immune, as are creatures who are afectado by blightburn sickness but recover from it. The target can't recover from the disease's drained or sickened condition except by magic.

The surest way to avoid contracting blightburn sickness is by wearing a blightburn ward, a piece of protective jewelry often found among urdefhans' gear or for sale in Shraen.

Saving Throw DC 32 Fortaleza

Onset [[/r 1d4 #días]]{1d4 días}

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} (1 día)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1} (1 día)

Etapa 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2} (1 week)

Etapa 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 3} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 3} (1 month)

Etapa 5 Drained se incrementa en 1 (1 year)

Blind Ambition.name: Ambición ciega
Blind Ambition.description:
Refuerzas la ambición de un objetivo, incrementas su resentimiento contra sus aliados y haces que sus alianzas sean más susceptibles al cambio. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo sufre un penalizador -1 por estatus a sus tiradas de salvación y otras defensas contra los intentos de Coaccionarla, Pedirle algo o utilizar efectos mentales para convencerle de que haga algo (como por ejemplo, un conjuro de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Sugestión}). Este penalizador sólo se aplica si al objetivo se le está animando a promover sus propias ambiciones.

Fallo Igual que en éxito, pero el penalizador es -2.

Fallo crítico El objetivo se ve abrumado por la ambición, llevando a cabo cualesquiera acciones que promueven sus ambiciones por encima de las de todos los demás, incluso sin intento alguno de convencerle.

Blind Eye.name: Blind Eye
Blind Eye.description: You enchant a single object, preventing it from being used for magical observation. If you cast this spell on a non-magical item used to cast scrying spells, such as a spell component pouch or a spell focus, the item can't be used to cast the spell. If you cast blind eye on a magical item that can be activated to scry (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.RM3SR1omNZfppZGl]{Crystal Ball} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{Hag Eye}), the item can't be activated for scrying effects. Magical items that are twice blind eye's spell Nivel or more aren't blocked this way.

Blinding Beauty.name: Blinding Beauty
Blinding Beauty.description:
You channel the allure of your nymph bloodline into a terribly beautiful glance. Each enemy in the area must attempt a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} until the start of its next turn.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} until the start of its next turn.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda Cegado durante 1 minuto.

Blinding Fury.name: Blinding Fury
Blinding Fury.description:
Desencadenante A creature damages you.

You curse the target with your outrage at being attacked. The effect is determined by the target's Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observe} you until the end of its turn, y if you're currently Observed by it, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} to it.

Fallo As success, y durante 1 minuto, every time the target damages you, it can't Observe you until the end of its turn.

Fallo crítico As success, y con una duración ilimitada, the first time each round the target damages a creature, it can't Observe that creature until the end of its turn. If it damages several creatures at once, the creature it can't perceive is chosen ryomly among those creatures.

Blink.name: Intermitencia
Blink.description:
Te intercambias rápidamente entre el Plano Material y el Plano Etéreo. Obtienes resistencia 5 a todo tipo de daño (excepto fuerza). Puedes Mantener el conjuro para desvanecerte y reaparecer a 10 pies (3 m) de distancia en una dirección aleatoria determinada por el DJ; el movimiento no desencadena reacciones. Al final de tu turno, te desvaneces y reapareces como se indica más arriba.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{Efecto de conjuro: Intermitencia}

Potenciado (+2) La resistencia se incrementa en 3.

Blink Charge.name: Blink Charge
Blink Charge.description:
You propel yourself through the fabric of space to deal a blow carrying the momentum of your teleportation. You teleport to an empty space adjacent to a creature you can see within range, then make a Strike against the creature with a weapon you're wielding. The Strike deals damage, más an extra 2d8 force damage, depending on the result of your Strike.

Éxito crítico Double damage, más after the Strike, you can teleport the target into an empty space up to 5 feet away from its current position. The new space must be on the ground if it started on the ground, in the air if it was flying, y so on.

Éxito The Strike deals full damage.

Fallo The Strike deals no damage, but the target takes [[/r 1d8[force]]] damage.

Fallo crítico The Strike deals no damage, y you take 1d8 force damage.

Potenciado(+2) The spell's range se incrementa en 60 pies (18 m), y any force damage the spell deals is increased by [[/r 1d8[force]]].

Blister.name: Blister
Blister.description:
You point at a target in range, y its skin grows searing blisters filled with caustic fluid. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target grows one blister. You can spend a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to pop a blister. The target y each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the target takes [[/r 7d6[acid]]] damage (basic Fortaleza save). You choose the direction of the cone, which can't include the target. When no blisters are left, the spell ends.

Fallo As success, but the target grows two blisters.

Fallo crítico As success, but the target grows four blisters.

Potenciado (+1) The damage of a popped blister se incrementa en [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage.

Blistering Invective.name: Blistering Invective
Blistering Invective.description:
A heap of insults y invectives spew from your mouth-words so devastating your foes burn from the intensity of your diatribe. Your words deal [[/r 2d6[persistent,fire]]] damage, y the target must attempt a Will save. If the target doesn't understy the language or you're not speaking a language, it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half the persistent daño por fuego.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1} y takes the full persistent daño por fuego.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2} y takes double the persistent daño por fuego.

Potenciado(+2) You can target two additional creatures, y the persistent damage se incrementa en [[/r 2d6]].

Blood Duplicate.name: Blood Duplicate
Blood Duplicate.description: This spell deals you 1 perforante damage as you shape a magical duplicate of the target from your blood; you can't cast this spell if you don't have blood. This spell can't duplicate an item made of precious materials, or materials with a rarity of uncommon o mayor. If you're ever more than 5 feet from the duplicate, the spell's duration immediately ends. The Perception DC to recognize the duplicate as false using any sense except touch is equal to 10 + your spellcasting ability modifier + your Crafting proficiency bonus. The item feels wet y obviously fake to the touch. When the spell ends, the item collapses into a puddle of blood that quickly evaporates.

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
Your head splits vertically into an enormous maw, which feasts upon the target's blood, dealing 12d6 perforante damage, depending on your spell attack roll. After the spell, your head sews back together as if it had never split apart. You gain Puntos de Golpe temporales durante 1 minuto equal to half the perforante damage the target takes.

If you are a gug, increase the perforante damage by 2d6 y increase the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} you deal on a critical hit by 1d8. This spell doesn't alter a gug's appearance.

Éxito crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success].

Éxito El objetivo sufre daño completo.

Fallo You miss y the creature takes no damage.

Potenciado (+1) The perforante damage se incrementa en 2d6, y the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical se incrementa en 1.

Blood Vendetta.name: Blood Vendetta
Blood Vendetta.description:
Requirements You can bleed.

Desencadenante A creature deals perforante, cortante, or persistent bleed damage to you.

You curse the target, punishing it for having the audacity to spill your blood. The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] y must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half the persistent bleed damage.

Fallo The target takes the full persistent bleed damage. Until the bleeding stops, the target has weakness 1 to perforante y cortante damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.buXx8Azr4BYWPtFg]{Efecto de conjuro: Blood Vendetta (Failure)}

Fallo crítico As failure, but the target takes double the persistent bleed damage.

Potenciado(+2) The persistent bleed damage se incrementa en @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

Blood Ward.name: Blood Ward
Blood Ward.description:
You consolidate warding energies with a gesture, guarding a creature against attacks from a certain type of foe.

Designate one of the following creature traits: aberration, animal, beast, celestial, construct, dragon, elemental, fey, fiend, fungus, monitor, ooze, plant, or undead.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to its saving throws y AC against creatures with that trait. El objetivo queda queda temporalmente inmune durante 10 minutos.

Potenciado (5º) The status bonus increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.aDOL3OAEWf3ka9oT]{Efecto de conjuro: Blood Ward}

Bloodspray Curse.name: Bloodspray Curse
Bloodspray Curse.description:
You inflict a curse upon the target that causes any wound to gush blood. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito durante 1 minuto, the first time each round that the target takes at least 10 perforante or cortante damage from a single Strike, it takes [[/r 2d6]] additional damage of the same type.

Fallo As success, but when it takes the additional damage, it also takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

Potenciado(+2) The additional damage se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]] y the persistent bleed damage se incrementa en 1d6.

Blunt the Final Blade.name: Blunt the Final Blade
Blunt the Final Blade.description:
You anoint the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5Q5MfHX43Sjm8C6Z]{Final Blade} with powdered mithral y grave dirt while speaking softly y carefully to the souls trapped within it. You create a mystical pathway for the souls to escape through y urge them to draw out the magic of the final blade with them as they depart.

Éxito crítico As success, y the souls also grant a boon; the primary y secondary casters gain a +2 status bonus to saves against death y fear effects for the next year.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.eotqxEWIgaK7nMpD]{Efecto de conjuro: Blunt the Final Blade (Critical Success)}

Éxito The souls escape the final blade y peacefully pass on to their eternal rewards, as appropriate for each soul. The final blade is no longer magical; it can't store anymore souls y can be destroyed as a normal guillotine.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico The ritual goes horribly wrong. The souls within the final blade are released in a furious rush as a gray death that does its best to slay the ritual's casters y run amok among the living. The final blade retains it abilities y can continue to store souls.

Magic Mouth.name: Boca mágica
Magic Mouth.description: Especificas un desencadenante (descritos en la pág. 305) y un mensaje de hasta 25 palabras. Cuyo el desencadenante especificado se cumple a 30 pies (9 m) (9 m) o menos del objetivo, una boca ilusoria aparece en el objetivo y pronuncia el mensaje, con lo que el conjuro de boca mágica se acaba.

Boil Blood.name: Boil Blood
Boil Blood.description:
You heat a foe's blood y boil it within its veins. The target takes 10d10 daño por fuego, with a Fortaleza save. A nonliving creature with blood in its body (such as a vampire) can be afectado, but a creature with no blood is immune.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage.

Fallo The target takes full damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 3}.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d10.

Fireball.name: Bola de fuego
Fireball.description:
Una rugiente explosión de fuego aparece en un lugar designado por ti, infligiendo 6d6 daño por fuego.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Bone Spray.name: Bone Spray
Bone Spray.description:
You fire a torrent of jagged bone shards from your hys, dealing 2d10 perforante damage y [[/r 1[persistent,bleed]]] damage to all creatures in the area.

Potenciado (+1) The perforante damage se incrementa en 1d10 y the persistent bleed damage se incrementa en 1 ([[/r (@spell.Nivel-1)[persistent,bleed]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]).

Boneshaker.name: Boneshaker
Boneshaker.description:
You alcance out a hy y seize a creature's skeleton from afar, harming their body y potentially wrenching them by the bones to move them against their will. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the spell's effects. Regardless of the number of actions spent to Cast this Spell, the target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

2 (somático, verbal) You clench your fist, painfully compressing the target's bones y dealing 3d8 contundente damage.

3 (material, somático, verbal) As the 2-action version, más you pull the target's body by their bones, moving them around like an awkward marionette. This movement follows the rules for forced movement.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage. If you cast the 3-action version, you can move the target up to 5 pies; it can choose to fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} to avoid moving.

Fallo The target takes full damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1}. If you cast the 3-action version, you can move the target up to 15 pies (4,5 m); it can fall prone to avoid moving.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2}. If you cast the 3-action version, you can move the target up to 25 pies, then knock the target prone; if you attempt to move the target to a hazardous location, such as into a pool of acid or off a cliff, it can fall prone to avoid moving.

Potenciado(+2) El daño se incrementa en 3d8.

Boost Eidolon.name: Boost Eidolon
Boost Eidolon.description:
You focus deeply on the link between you y your eidolon y boost the power of your eidolon's attacks. Your eidolon gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with its unarmed attacks. If your eidolon's Strikes deal more than one weapon damage die, the status bonus increases to 2 per weapon damage die, to a maximum of +8 with four weapon damage dice.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.h0CKGrgjGNSg21BW]{Efecto de conjuro: Boost Eidolon}

Bottle the Storm.name: Bottle the Storm
Bottle the Storm.description:
Desencadenante You would take daño por electricidad.

When lightning is turned at you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right. You gain electricity resistance 10 against the triggering effect. If you successfully prevent damage in this way, at any time during the spell's duration, you can spend a single action, which has the attack trait, to expend the charge y make a melee spell attack at an adjacent target or a ranged spell attack at a target within 60 pies (18 m). This attack deals daño por electricidad equal to the damage prevented by bottle the storm. If you cast bottle the storm a second time before the original duration elapses, or if you do not make this attack, the stored charge dissipates harmlessly.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.GlggmEqkGVj1noOD]{Efecto de conjuro: Bottle the Storm}

Potenciado(7º) La resistencia se incrementa a 15, y you can immediately make the spell attack roll granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to cast the spell.

Potenciado (10º) La resistencia se incrementa a 20, y you can immediately make the spell attack roll granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to cast the spell.

Bottomless Stomach.name: Bottomless Stomach
Bottomless Stomach.description:
You create a shimmering extradimensional space accessible from the target's mouth. The space can hold objects y equipment, up to a total of 10 Bulk. This extradimensional storage doesn't hamper the target's ability to eat, drink, speak (if applicable), or otherwise act, as it only opens y closes when the target chooses.

The target can Interact to swallow an object of up to 1 Bulk, which doesn't harm the object or the target. If the extradimensional space is full, the target can't add any more objects until first removing one or more stored objects. Organic matter y living creatures can't be stored in this space. The extradimensional storage is obvious to any creature who looks into the target's mouth, as the entryway shimmers slightly, though this doesn't clearly reveal the contents inside.

The target can Interact to spit out a single object of its choice, causing the object to fall to the ground in the target's space. The target can Interact three times in a row to spit out the entire contents of its extradimensional storage; the target doesn't have to take these actions all in the same turn, but if it takes any other actions in between, it has to start over. The items eject into the target's space, possibly spilling out into adjacent spaces if there is too much to fit.

When the spell ends or the target falls unconscious, the contents of the extradimensional storage are disgorged in a riotous spew, lying in the nearest unoccupied space, a bit wet but otherwise unharmed.

Potenciado (5º) The duration increases to 8 horas

Bound in Death.name: Bound in Death
Bound in Death.description:
You tether another creature's spirit to your own, shunting part of the damage dealt to you onto one of your foes. You create a life link between yourself y the target. Each time an effect damages you, the target attempts a Will save, which can cause it to take part of the damage, as detailed below. The spell ends if El objetivo queda ever more than 120 feet away from you. If either you or El objetivo queda reduced to 0 Hit Points, any damage from this spell is resolved, y then the spell ends.

Each time you sustain this spell, you can choose to deal 6d8 damage to yourself, which can be reduced with bound in death as normal.

Éxito crítico The damage you take is no afectado, y the spell ends.

Éxito The damage you take is no afectado, y the target can't take damage from bound in death durante 1 asalto.

Fallo The target takes half the damage of the effect instead of you, then can't take damage from bound in death durante 1 asalto. Apply any immunity, resistances, or weaknesses you have to the damage before halving it, y the target still applies any immunity, resistances, weaknesses, y the like it has.

Fallo crítico The target takes half the damage of the effect.

Potenciado(+2) The damage you can choose to deal to yourself each time you sustain the spell se incrementa en 3d8.

Bracing Tendrils.name: Bracing Tendrils
Bracing Tendrils.description:
Visible tendrils of force anchor your body to the ground, preventing unwanted movement. Whenever you're on the ground y a creature or effect attempts to forcibly move you from your space, you can use your spell DC in place of your Fortaleza DC as the DC of the check to move you. If a creature wouldn't normally need a check to move you, it must succeed at an appropriate check (usually an Athletics check for physical movement) against your spell DC or you are unmoved; if an effect wouldn't normally need a check to move you, it must counteract bracing tendrils or you are unmoved. When a creature fails to move you in this way, you can choose to have the tendrils lash back y push them 5 feet away from you.

While the tendrils anchor you in place when you come to a stop, they uproot easily to cooperate with your own voluntary movement, so you can still move freely while under the effect of the spell.

Brain Drain.name: Brain Drain
Brain Drain.description:
You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge. This deals 1d8 mental damage with a basic Will save.

If the target fails the save, you sort through the stolen memories to attempt a single check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}. Choose a skill that has the Recall Knowledge action, y use the target's skill modifier for the check.

Potenciado (+1) The mental damage se incrementa en 1d8.

Bralani Referendum.name: Bralani Referendum
Bralani Referendum.description:
You enforce fair play with punishing zephyrs. When you Cast this Spell, choose one condition from among @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado}. When a creature in the area inflicts the chosen condition, they take 2d6 cortante damage with a basic Fortaleza save. A creature can't take this damage more than once per round. You can Dismiss the spell.

Potenciado(+2) Choose one more condition. The cortante damage when a creature inflicts any of the chosen conditions se incrementa en 2d6.

Brand the Impenitent.name: Brand the Impenitent
Brand the Impenitent.description:
You brand the target with an ethereal copy of your deity's religious symbol. This brand can't be hidden, but it is visible only to followers of your faith, who see it as clearly as a lit torch. Followers of your faith ignore the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} condition, if any, and the target gains a -1 status penalty to AC against attacks by followers of your faith. If the target is a follower of your deity in good standing, the spell fails.

Critical Success The target is no afectado.

Success The spell lasts for 1 round.

Failure The spell lasts for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The spell has an unlimited duration.

Breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
Breadcrumbs.description:
You protect your target from going astray in hostile territory by tracking where it's already been, helping it deduce where it still needs to go. The target leaves a glittering trail behind it that lasts for the spell's duration. This trail doesn't denote the direction or the order of its path-it merely indicates where the target has moved during the spell's duration.

Potenciado(2º) The duration increases to 8 horas.

Potenciado (3º) The duration increases to last until your next daily preparations.

Breath of Drought.name: Breath of Drought
Breath of Drought.description:
You fill the area with an oppressive, arid swelter that overwhelms creatures with heat exhaustion. Objects are no afectado. Each creature in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area afterward must attempt a Fortaleza save. Water creatures y plant creatures use the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as fire elementals) are immune to breath of drought.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2}.

Potenciado (4º) Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the center of the burst to a new location within range.

Potenciado(7º) As the 4º-Nivel version, except the range is 120 feet y the area is a 20-foot burst.

Buffeting Winds.name: Buffeting Winds
Buffeting Winds.description:
You release a quick burst of wind that batters your living opponents without causing them lasting harm, while also blowing undead away. The wind deals 2d4 contundente damage, which is nonlethal against living creatures. Against undead, the winds are more vicious, y the spell loses the nonlethal trait against such creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflejos save. On a failure, undead creatures are also knocked back 5 feet (or 10 feet con un fallo crítico).

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d4.

Bullhorn.name: Bullhorn
Bullhorn.description:
You amplify your voice, loud enough for you to be heard easily at a great distance. For the duration, your voice can be heard loudly y clearly by all listeners within 500 pies, even if other ambient noise would otherwise block the sound. Despite the volume, this doesn't make your voice jarring or distracting. This doesn't increase the range or area of other auditory or linguistic effects, y physical barriers such as walls y doors still block or muffle your voice as normal.

Your loud voice makes it easier to Coerce others, y the acoustics assist in Performing at a large venue. obtienes +1 status bonus to checks to Coerce y auditory Performance checks to Perform at a large venue. You can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.9yzlmYUdvdQshTDF]{Efecto de conjuro: Bullhorn}

Potenciado (5º) Your voice can be heard clearly up to 1,200 feet away.

Potenciado(7º) Your voice can be heard clearly up to 1 mile away.

Air Bubble.name: Burbuja de aire
Air Bubble.description: Una burbuja de aire puro aparece alrededor de la cabeza del objetivo, permitiéndole respirar con normalidad. El efecto acaba en cuanto el objetivo vuelve a un entorno en el que puede respirar normalmente.

Burning Blossoms.name: Burning Blossoms
Burning Blossoms.description:
Area 30-foot radius, 100-foot tall cylinder

An intangible hollow tree sprouts from the ground y grows to towering height, radiating a fiery passion y fascinating viewers. The base of the tree takes up a single square y grows 100 feet upwards, while its branches extend outwards 30 pies (9 m), forming the spell's cylindrical area. The tree then blossoms, growing delicate white flowers that burn with white-hot fire. As the tree's branches gently rustle in the wind, flower petals drift to the ground in a shower of flame. Any creature that ends its turn under the tree's branches takes 6d6 daño por fuego from the burning petals. Any enemy that can see the tree, even if the enemy is outside the spell's area, must attempt a will save. This is an emotion, mental, y visual effect. Creatures Fascinado with the tree must use at least one of their actions on each of their turns to move toward the tree.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada y is queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Éxito La criatura no resulta afectada, but it must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinado} with the tree until the end of its next turn. If it can still see the tree then, it must attempt a save again.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda Fascinado with the tree until the spell ends. The tree's daño por fuego doesn't end the fascination; other hostile actions end it, as normal. If the fascination ends, the creature must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6

Burning Hands.name: Manos ardientes
Burning Hands.description:
Pegotes de llamas surgen de tus manos. Infliges 2d6 daño por fuego a las criaturas en el área.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Buzzing Bites.name: Buzzing Bites
Buzzing Bites.description:
You evoke buzzing y crawling insects to climb onto a foe's body y bite, dealing 1d4 perforante damage y potentially sickening the foe, depending on its Fortaleza save. You deal the perforante damage initially y then again the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, starting on the round after you cast it y rolling the damage based on the target's saving throw result each time. However, the creature only attempts the Fortaleza save once, when you first Cast the Spell. Once this spell ends, El objetivo queda temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage.

Fallo The target takes full damage.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1} by the crawling insects. The sickened value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

Cackle.name: Cackle
Cackle.description: With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain a Spell} as a free action.

Talking Corpse.name: Cadáver parlante
Talking Corpse.description:
Concedes al cadáver objetivo una apariencia de vida, que utiliza para dar respuesta a tres preguntas que se le plantean. Este conjuro se basa más bien en las memorias latentes del cuerpo que en traer de vuelta el alma del fallecido, por lo que para que funcionara, el cuerpo habría de estar bastante intacto. Cuanto más daño ha sufrido el cuerpo, más inexactas o fragmentarias son sus respuestas, y para poder hablar tiene que tener boca y laringe. Si alguien ha lanzado antes este conjuro sobre el cadáver durante la semana anterior, falla automáticamente. El cadáver puede hacer una salvación de Voluntad para resistirse a contestar las preguntas utilizyo las estadísticas de la criatura original en el momento de su muerte, con los efectos siguientes.

Éxito crítico El objetivo puede mentir o negarse a contestar tus preguntas, y el espíritu de éste se te aparece durante 24 horas, molestándote y haciendo que seas incapaz de descansar durante ese tiempo.

Éxito El objetivo puede proporcionar información falsa o negarse a contestar tus preguntas.

Fallo El objetivo debe contestar fielmente, pero sus respuestas pueden ser breves, crípticas y repetitivas. Sigue pudiendo intentar engañarte o perder el tiempo para que la duración del conjuro se acabe antes de poder contestar a todas las preguntas.

Fallo crítico Como en fallo, pero las respuestas del objetivo son mas directas y menos repetitivas, aunque siguen siendo crípticas. Sufre un penalizador -2 a las pruebas de Engaño para engañarte o confundirte.

Chain Lightning.name: Cadena de relámpagos
Chain Lightning.description:
Descargas un poderoso rayo contra el objetivo, que inflige 8d12 daño por electricidad. El objetivo debe hacer una salvación básica de Reflejos. La electricidad salta a otra criatura a 30 pies (9 m) (9 m) o menos del primer objetivo, vuelve a saltar a otra a 30 pies (9 m) (9 m) o menos del segundo y así sucesivamente. Puedes acabar la cadena en cualquier punto. No puedes designar como objetivo a la misma criatura más de una vez, y tienes que tener línea de efecto a todos los objetivos. Tira el daño una sola vez y aplícalo a cada objetivo (reduciéndolo a la mitad o doblándolo según sea apropiado al resultado de su tirada de salvación). La cadena se acaba si cualquiera de los objetivos obtiene un éxito crítico en su salvación.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d12.

Drop Dead.name: Caerse muerto
Drop Dead.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura en el alcance es acertada por un ataque de un enemigo.

El objetivo parece caer muerto, aunque en realidad se hace @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Deja un cuerpo ilusorio donde ha caído, con todo y una herida fatal creíble. La ilusión tiene toda la apariencia y el tacto de un cuerpo muerto. Si la muerte del objetivo parece absurda (por ejemplo, un bárbaro a tope de vitalidad parece resultar muerto por daño 2) el PJ puede conceder al atacante una prueba de Percepción inmediata para descreer la ilusión. Si el objetivo lleva a cabo acciones hostiles, el conjuro se acaba. Esto acaba todo el conjuro, por lo que el cuerpo ilusorio también desaparece.

Potenciado (7º) El conjuro no acaba si el objetivo lleva a cabo acciones hostiles.

Feather Fall.name: Caída de pluma
Feather Fall.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura dentro del alcance está en caída libre.

Haces que el propio aire detenga una caída. La caída del objetivo se lentifica hasta 60 pies (18 m) (18 m) por asalto, y la distancia que cae mientras el hechizo está activo no cuenta para calcular el daño por caída. Si el objetivo llega al suelo mientras el conjuro está activo, no sufre daño alguno debido a la caída. El conjuro se acaba en cuanto el objetivo aterriza.

Phantasmal Calamity.name: Calamidad fantasmal
Phantasmal Calamity.description:
La visión de una destrucción apocalíptica llena la mente de todas las criaturas del área. La visión inflige 11d6 daño mental (salvación básica de Voluntad). Con un fallo crítico, la criatura debe tener también éxito en una salvación de Reflejos o creerse atrapada (atascada en una fisura, a la deriva en el mar o algún otro destino concordante con su visión). Si falla la segunda salvación, también queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido} durante 1 minuto. Puede hacer una nueva salvación de Voluntad al final de cada uno de sus turnos, y con un éxito consigue descreer la ilusión y recuperarse del estado aturdido.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6

Call of the Grave.name: Llamada de la sepultura
Call of the Grave.description:
Disparas un rayo de energía enfermiza. Haz una tirada de ataque de conjuros.

Éxito crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} mientras está indispuesto.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}.

Fallo El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Call Spirit.name: Llamar a un espíritu
Call Spirit.description:
Desgarras el velo que da a la otra vida y llamas a un espíritu desde su lugar de descanso final. Debes llamar al espíritu por su nombre y proporcionar una conexión con el mismo, como por ejemplo una posesión, un vestido o una parte de su cadáver. Un espíritu que no quiera acudir a su llamada deberá hacer una salvación de Voluntad para evitarlo; con un éxito crítico, un espíritu bromista imita al espíritu al que quieres llamar. La CD de la salvación de Voluntad es 2 menos si nunca te has encontrado con el espíritu en vida. De una o de otra forma, el espíritu aparece como una forma menguada de la criatura a la que llamas. Cada minuto de la duración puedes formularle una pregunta. Puede responder como le parezca o incluso negarse a responder. Si el espíritu no está en la otra vida (por ejemplo, si es un muerto viviente) todos los resultados diferentes a fallo crítico utilizan el efecto de fallo.

Éxito crítico El espíritu es particularmente cooperativo, incluso si tiene serias razones para engañarte, y sufre un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a sus pruebas de Engaño.

Éxito Llamas al espíritu.

Fallo No consigues llamar a un espíritu.

Fallo crítico Uno o más espíritus malignos aparecen y atacan.

Call The Blood.name: Call The Blood
Call The Blood.description:
With a word y gesture, you cause streams of blood to erupt from the target's mouth, nostrils, ears, or other facial openings y come rushing into your mouth. You deal [[/r 8d4[negative]]] damage to the target.

If the target takes damage, its blood flows into your mouth. If you're a living creature y don't have negative healing, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2}. If you're undead (or living but have negative healing), you can choose to either gain Puntos de Golpe temporales equal to half of the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistance y the like) y become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} durante 1 asalto, or forgo the Puntos de Golpe temporales y become quickened durante 1 minuto. You can use this extra action only to Step, Stride, or Strike. You lose any remaining Puntos de Golpe temporales after 1 minute.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en [[/r 2d4[negative]]].

Call to Arms.name: Call to Arms
Call to Arms.description:
