Cada vez que Mantienes el conjuro, debes elegir un nuevo objetivo para que se vea sujeto al mismo efecto; la misma criatura nunca puede ser designada como objetivo más de una vez con un solo lanzamiento de este conjuro. Tampoco puedes afectar a más de una criatura por turno con implosión. No puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura incorporal, gaseosa o líquida, o alguna que por lo demás carece de forma sólida.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 10.

Imprint Message.name: Imprint Message
Imprint Message.description:
You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5LYi9Efs6cko4GGL]{Object Reading} on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rsZ5c0AUyywe5yoK]{Retrocognición} spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions.

If the object is targeted with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Leer aura} of a higher spell Nivel than imprint message, the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast this Spell}, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of imprint message fade.

Imprisonment.name: Cautiverio
Imprisonment.description:
Llevas a cabo un ritual para aprisionar a una criatura mediante una de diversas formas. Si bien algunas versiones de este ritual ofrecen todas las formas, hay otras que incluyen tan sólo una sola forma o unas pocas. Sea cual sea la forma que utilices, el efecto no podrá ser contrarrestado, aunque podrá acabar mediante @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{Libertad}. Algunas formas de cautiveri pueden acabar de otras maneras. Como quiera que el ritual requiere que el objetivo permanezca a 10 pies (3 m) de ti en todo momento, requiere típicamente que primero sometas al objetivo.

  • Cadenas Atas a la criatura con cadenas, haciendo imposible que utilice cualquier otra acción que no sea hablar. Otras criaturas que intenten acercarse, dañar las cadenas o de alguna forma liberar a la criatura atrapada deberán tener éxito en una salvación de Voluntad o ser incapaces de hacerlo para siempre. Las cadenas tienen una Dureza igual a 5 x el nivel de conjuro del ritual de cautiverio, y el doble de esa cifra en Puntos de Golpe. Destruir las cadenas libera al objetivo.
  • Objeco (9º Nivel o superior) O bien encoges la criatura hasta una altura de una pulgada (2,54 cm) o bien la conviertes en una forma insustancial cuyo cuerpo existe en forma de volutas bajo su cabeza. De una o de otra forma, la atrapas en el interior de una gema, frasco, botella, lámpara o recipiente similar. Deja de envejecer y no requiere comida ni bebida. La criatura sigue siendo consciente de lo que la rodea y se puede mover y hablar en el interior del recipiente, pero no puede utilizar ninguna otra acción. Destruir el recipiente mata al objetivo en lugar de liberarlo. Esta forma de cautiverio es también magia de transmutación.
  • Celda subteránea (solo 10º Nivel) Sepultas al objetivo en un estado de animación suspendida a gran profundidad bajo la superficie de la tierra, sin sintonizar con la realidad, por lo que no se puede llegar hasta él de ninguna manera. También evitas que las adivinaciones revelen la ubicación en la que tuvo lugar el cautiverio. Magia poderosa como por ejemplo un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Deseo} puede revelar la ubicación del cautiverio, pero ni siquiera dicha magia puede liberar al objetivo de la celda subterránea; tan sólo un ritual de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{Libertad} de 10º nivel puede hacerlo.
  • Prisión Haces que la criatura sea completamente incapaz de abandonar un área confinada o una estructura en particular de tu elección, como por ejemplo una celda o una cueva sellada. La magia también evita que la criatura dañe su prisión, o bien directa o bien indirectamente, para liberarse. Si la prisión de la criatura resulta completamente destruida por una fuerza externa, ésta queda liberada, aunque para algunas prisiones grandes o naturales, esto podría ser poco factible.
  • Sopor (efecto de sueño) Sumes a la criatura en un sueño eterno. Deja de envejecer y no requiere comida ni bebida. Una manifestación física y sincera de afecto por aparte de una criatura que ama genuinamente al objetivo (ya sea románticamente, filialmente o de alguna otra forma) la libera del sopor. Esta forma de cautividad es también magia de encantamiento.
  • Estasis temporal Pones a la criatura en un estado de animación suspendida fuera del flujo del tiempo. La criatura no envejece y no puede ser afectada por ningún efecto de la corriente temporal normal. A lanzar este ritual, puedes fijar opcionalmente cualquier cantidad de tiempo para la estasis; una vez transcurrida dicha duración, la estasis se acaba. A diferencia de otras formas de cautiverio, la estasis temporal se puede contrarrestar mediante un conjuro de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Disipar magia} o de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Acelerar}. Esta forma de cautiverio es también magia de transmutación.

Éxito crítico Aprisionas al objetivo. Puedes utilizar, o bien una forma de cautiverio que suele requerir 1 nivel de conjuro adicional, o imponer a cualquier criatura que intente utilizar un ritual de libertad para rescatar al objetivo un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a las pruebas asociadas con dicho ritual.

Éxito Aprisionas al objetivo.

Fallo No consigues aprisionar al objetivo.

Fallo crítico Te aprisionas a ti mismo y a los lanzadores secundarios de la misma forma en que pretendías aprisionar al objetivo.

Potenciado (9º) Puedes utilizar la forma de objeto de cautiverio además de las otras opciones, y puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura de hasta 18º nivel. El Costee base se incrementa a 2.000 po.

Potenciado (10º) Puedes utilizar las formas de cautiverio objeto y celda subterránea además de las otras opciones, y puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura de hasta 20º nivel. El Costee base se incrementa a 6.000 po.

Incarnate Ancestry.name: Incarnate Ancestry
Incarnate Ancestry.description:
You attempt to alcance back through time to make brief contact with one of the many past lives of the willing creature, then transform their current body to incarnate elements of that past life's ancestry into the present. At the GM's option, a creature might not have any past lives to draw from, in which case this ritual fails. A PC should always be able to make full use of this ritual if it's cast on them should the GM chooses to allow this ritual into their game.

While incarnate ancestry can be cast anywhere, if cast in the vicinity of a site infused with energies conducive to reincarnation y contacting past lives (such as in area D7 of the Sanctum of the Cleansed), checks made to perform this ritual gain a +4 circumstance bonus.

Éxito crítico You infuse the creature with elements from a previous incarnation. The character can reselect all ancestry feats, or even select an entirely new ancestry (choosing from those allowed by the GM). The newly incarnated ancestry must still fully support other character build options; you can't choose feats or ancestries that would invalidate class choices. The character is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} for 10 minutos as they acclimate to their new body.

Éxito As critical success, but the transformation is disorienting to the creature, who must come to terms with their new body y the strange echoes of memories from the past life that fade in time. The creature becomes Torpe 1 y Anonadado 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Fallo The attempt to incarnate ancestry is unsuccessful.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the attempt to transform leaves the creature feeling as if their own body were unfamiliar. They become Torpe 1 y Anonadado 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Incendiary Ashes.name: Incendiary Ashes
Incendiary Ashes.description:
A cloud of magical ashes descends upon creatures in the area. The ashes scour flesh y linger in the wounds, igniting upon the slightest flicker of flame. Creatures in the area take 4d6 cortante damage y must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The creature takes half damage y has weakness to fire 3 until the start of its next turn.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y has weakness to fire 3 durante 1 minuto. If La criatura queda killed by fire during this time it’s reduced to ashes, though its gear remains.

Fallo crítico As failure, except La criatura sufre doble daño.

Potenciado (+1) The cortante damage se incrementa en 2d6 y
weakness to fire se incrementa en 1.

Incendiary Aura.name: Incendiary Aura
Incendiary Aura.description:
You surround yourself with a combustible aura. Each time a creature within the emanation takes daño por fuego, it catches on fire, taking [[/r 2d4[persistent,fire]]] damage.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the persistent damage by 1d4 y the radius of the emanation by 5 pies.

Incendiary Fog.name: Incendiary Fog
Incendiary Fog.description: You summon a cloud of flammable black dust. The cloud functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}. If any open flame or fire effect is within the spell's area when it's cast, or later enters or occurs within the area, the cloud ignites. Creatures in the cloud take [[/r 10d6[fire]]] damage (basic Reflejos save), y the spell ends.

Indestructibility.name: Indestructibility
Indestructibility.description: You can't be afectado by anything unless you choose to be. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by artifacts, deific power, y similarly powerful sources. You can still be afectado by anything you're willing to have affect you.

Inevitable Destination.name: Inevitable Destination
Inevitable Destination.description:
You twist the paths of the target, ensuring that each one leads to you. The target attempts a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico The spell has no effect.

Éxito Your pull hampers the target's footsteps. It takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Fallo The target can't move any farther from you than it was when you Cast the Spell, though it can move in such a way that it maintains an equal distance. If you move farther away from the target than the initial distance, the spell ends. The targeted foe can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar} against your spell DC. If it succeeds, the spell ends.

Fallo crítico As failure, más El objetivo queda pulled 10 feet closer to you y falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}, tripping in its haste to move toward you.

Inevitable Disaster.name: Inevitable Disaster
Inevitable Disaster.description:
You briefly glimpse cause y effect, putting into motion a chain of events that will visit doom on your enemy at some point in the future, though you're not quite sure when or how the doom will occur. Some kind of strange accident occurs [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} later, dealing 55 damage to the creature, with a basic Fortaleza save. This happens regardless of where El objetivo queda located at the time, even if it travels to another plane. The GM should roll to determine when the damage occurs secretly y determine the form of the accident as well as the type of damage it deals; generally, the accident should be one that deals physical damage of some type (for instance, a tree branch might fall on the foe y deal contundente damage, or a window might break y fling sharp cortante glass at them), though other damage types might be appropriate in more unusual environments.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 10.

Inexhaustible Cynicism.name: Inexhaustible Cynicism
Inexhaustible Cynicism.description:
You inflict your targets with a crushing doubt about everyone y everything around them. For the duration, each target is unwilling to receive any effects that require a willing target (in case the effect was secretly an attack), refuse to ingest anything (in case the substances have been replaced with venenos y cursed duplicates), doesn't treat anyone as an ally (in case its friends were replaced by an impostor), y doesn't believe anything it's told (in case of lies, though this doesn't mean the creature automatically believes the opposite either). It doesn't even fully trust its own ability to Recall Knowledge, as it becomes convinced it most likely remembered false information, as from a critical failure on a check to Recall Knowledge.

Finally, the creature takes 6d6 mental damage at the end of each of its turns (with no save) unless it spent at least 1 action that turn Seeking or otherwise interacting with its surroundings in an attempt to disbelieve the illusions that it feels are obviously surrounding it.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda afectado durante 1 asalto.

Fallo La criatura queda afectado durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda afectado for 1 hora.

Infectious Comedy.name: Infectious Comedy
Infectious Comedy.description:
You tell a magical joke y infect a target with laughter that spreads to those nearby. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can target another creature you can see that is within 30 feet of an afectado target. The new target need not be able to see or hear the afectado target, as the humor spreads magically. You can't target the same creature more than once with this spell.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target begins giggling y can't use reactions.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} y can't use reactions.

Fallo crítico The target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} y can't use actions or reactions durante 1 asalto. It then suffers the failure effect.

Infectious Ennui.name: Infectious Ennui
Infectious Ennui.description:
With a wave of your hy y a short invocation, you cause feelings of ennui y impending doom to well up in the mind of the targeted creature, who must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda momentarily overwhelmed with ennui. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} as it grapples mentally with the pointlessness of existence, but at the end of the target's next turn, the spell effect ends.

Fallo El objetivo queda slowed 1 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1} from the sense of ennui, y remains slowed y can't reduce the Asustado condition below 1 as long as the spell is sustained. At the start of the target's turn, choose one creature within 30 feet of the target to attempt a Will save as well; on a failure, that creature is slowed 1 durante 1 asalto; either way, they are then temporarily immune to this casting of infectious ennui. (Ennui does not continue to spread from this secondary target.)

Fallo crítico As failure, but the primary target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}.

Potenciado (5º) When a secondary target becomes slowed, it remains slowed as long as the spell is sustained.

Infectious Enthusiasm.name: Infectious Enthusiasm
Infectious Enthusiasm.description:
With enchanted gusto, you encourage yourself to get things done y share your motivation with your allies. obtienes +1 status bonus to your choice of attack rolls, Will saves, or Charisma-based skill checks. During the spell's duration, an ally who observed you Casting this Spell y was within 30 feet when you did so can take a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to gain the same bonus you chose until the start of its next turn.

Using this spell to influence someone in a social situation is typically considered a faux pas, negating the benefit on Charisma-based skills if the subject of the check observed you casting the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.nU4SxAk6XreHUi5h]{Efecto de conjuro: Infectious Enthusiasm}

Infectious Melody.name: Infectious Melody
Infectious Melody.description:
You call forth the chords of a tune so catchy that foes hearing it can't help but sing along, making it harder for them to communicate. Each target must attempt a Will save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.i9YITDcrq1nKjV5l]{Efecto de conjuro: Infectious Melody}

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito durante 1 asalto, the creature can communicate only by singing along to the melody. It can speak only on its turn, y it must take the Perform action when it does. The result of the Performance check determines how well it sang, but it stills communicate the information regardless of the result, which has no further mechanical impact than the time spent to take the action. A single Perform check is sufficient for any amount of speaking on the creature's turn. This effect might interfere with verbal components of spells or other linguistic abilities that rely on precise speech; in order to use such an ability successfully, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5].

In addition, the creature takes a -2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks, as singing its threats saps away some of the menace. The creature's constant humming of the tune also makes it nearly impossible for the creature to remain undetected.

Fallo As success, but La duración es de 3 asaltos.

Fallo crítico As success, but La duración es de 1 hora.

Infernal Pact.name: Infernal Pact
Infernal Pact.description:
You make an appeal to a powerful devil, asking it to bind some of its subordinates to your service. If you succeed, the devil sends you its choice of one devil whose Nivel is no more than double infernal pact's Nivel, two devils whose Nivels are each at least 2 less than double the spell Nivel, or three devils whose Nivels are each at least 3 less than double the spell Nivel.

Éxito crítico The devils are sent to you y serve you for [[/r 1d4 #weeks]]{1d4 weeks}.

Éxito The devils are sent to you y serve you for [[/r 1d4 #días]]{1d4 días}.

Fallo Your request is denied.

Fallo crítico Not only is your request denied, but the powerful devil sends word of its displeasure to your master.

Inkshot.name: Inkshot
Inkshot.description:
A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 2d6 veneno damage, más you blast the target's eyes, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} durante 1 asalto as the stinging ink blurs y distorts the creature's vision. On a critical hit, double the veneno damage, y El objetivo queda dazzled durante 1 minuto by the foul ink.

The ink stain remains for 1 hora before fading, although vigorous cleansing (or magic such as a prestidigitation cantrip) can remove the ink before then.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the base veneno damage by 2d6.

Inner Radiance Torrent.name: Inner Radiance Torrent
Inner Radiance Torrent.description:
You gradually manifest your spiritual energy into your cupped hys before firing off a storm of bolts y beams that deal 4d4 force damage to all creatures in a línea de 60 pies (18 m) (18 m). Creatures in the area must attempt a basic Reflejos save. con un fallo crítico, they're also Cegado durante 1 asalto. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the area. If the line passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature afectado by magical darkness, inner radiance torrent attempts to counteract the darkness.

2 (somático, verbal) The line is 60 feet long.

3 (material, somático, verbal) The line is @Template[type:line|distance:120]{120 feet} long.

Two Rounds The line is 120 feet long. If you spend 3 actions casting the spell, you can avoid finishing the spell y spend another 3 actions on your next turn to empower the spell even further. If you choose to do so, the damage dealt by this spell se incrementa en 4d4, y you enter a shining state durante 1 minuto, causing you to glow with light y deal [[/r 1[force]]] damage to creatures that end their turn adjacent to you.

Potenciado (+1) The initial damage, as well as the additional damage for the 2-round casting time, each increase by 4d4, y the damage to adjacent creatures dealt while in your shining state se incrementa en 1.

Inscrutable Mask.name: Inscrutable Mask
Inscrutable Mask.description:
You shroud your form y features in an impenetrable mask of shadow. The mask grants you a +1 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Feint, Intimidation checks to Demoralize, y Stealth checks to Hide in areas of dim light or darkness.

Potenciado (6º) The status bonus increases to +2.

Potenciado(9º) The status bonus increases to +3.

Inside Ropes.name: Inside Ropes
Inside Ropes.description:
You pull a large hyful of guts from your midsection. Removing these guts doesn't harm you. You can use the guts as 50 feet of rope to help you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, y they help attach you to a wall. You move half as quickly as usual while climbing with your guts (minimum 5 pies), but you can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check whenever you critically fail to prevent a fall. Other creatures can use your guts to climb like a squishy rope, but the guts don't help anyone but you attach to a wall. If you let go of your guts or your guts are damaged, the spell ends.

Potenciado (3º) obtienes +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using your guts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T3t9776ataHzrmTs]{Efecto de conjuro: Inside Ropes (3er Nivel)}

Inspire Competence.name: Inspirar gran aptitud
Inspire Competence.description:
Tus ánimos inspiran a tu aliado a tener éxito en una tarea. Esto cuenta como haber llevado a cabo suficientes acciones preparatorias para Prestar ayuda a tu aliado con una prueba de habilidad de tu elección, sean cuales sean las circunstancias. Cuando más tarde utilizas acción de Prestar ayuda, puedes tirar Interpretación en lugar de la prueba de habilidad habitual, y si sacas un fallo, en su lugar obtienes un éxito. Si tu nivel en Interpretación es legendario, obtienes automáticamente un éxito crítico.

El DJ podría establecer que no puedes utilizar esta aptitud si la acción de animar a tu aliado interfiere con la prueba de habilidad (por ejemplo, una prueba de Movimiento furtivo silenciosa o mantener un disfraz).

Inspire Courage.name: Inspirar valor
Inspire Courage.description:
Inspiras a tus aliados con palabras o canciones de ánimo. Tú y tus aliados en el área obtenéis un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de ataque, tiradas de daño y salvaciones contra los efectos de miedo

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Efecto de conjuro: Inspirar valor}

Inspire Defense.name: Inspirar defensa
Inspire Defense.description:
Inspiras a tus aliados para que se protejan de forma más efectiva. Tú y todos tus en el área obtenéis un bonificador +1 por estatus a la CA y a las tiradas de salvación, así como tanta resistencia al daño físico como la mitad del nivel del conjuro.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.DLwTvjjnqs2sNGuG]{Efecto de conjuro: Inspirar defensa}

Inspire Heroics.name: Inspirar heroísmo
Inspire Heroics.description:
Invocas a tu musa para que incremente grandemente los beneficios que proporciona a tus aliados y a ti con tu composición de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Inspirar valor} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspirar defensa}. Si tu siguiente acción es lanzar inspirar valor o inspirar defensa, haz una prueba de Interpretación La CD suele ser una CD muy difícil de un nivel igual al del objetivo de mayor nivel de tu composición, pero el DJ puede asignar una CD diferente basada en las circunstancias. El efecto de tu composición de inspirar valor o inspirar defensa depende del resultado de la prueba.

Éxito crítico El bonificador por estatus de inspirar valor o inspirar defensa se incrementa a +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.VFereWC1agrwgzPL]{Éxito crítico en Inspirar valor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.BKam63zT98iWMJH7]{Éxito crítico en Inspirar defensa}

Éxito El bonificador por estatus de inspirar valor o inspirar defensa se incrementa a +2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.kZ39XWJA3RBDTnqG]{Éxito en Inspirar valor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Chol7ExtoN2T36mP]{éxito en Inspirar defensa}

Fallo Tu inspirar valor o inspirar defensa tan solo proporcionan su bonificador normal de +1, pero no gastas el Punto de Foco al lanzar este conjuro.

Instant Armor.name: Instant Armor
Instant Armor.description:
Upon casting this spell, the armor you're wearing is whisked away into an extradimensional space that's linked to you. If the armor is magical y invested by you, it remains invested while in this space, though you don't gain its benefits. You then gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.8b63qGzqSUENQgOT]{Armor Up!} action; once you use the action, the spell ends. If the action hasn't been used by the time the spell's duration ends, the extradimensional space collapses, ejecting the armor's pieces on the ground under you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.jj0P4eGVpmdwZjlA]{Efecto de conjuro: Instant Armor}

Internal Insurrection.name: Internal Insurrection
Internal Insurrection.description:
You afflict the target with the supernatural disease known as internal insurrection, causing portions of their body to rebel against the whole, leading to painful agonies y, in time, death. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe} durante 1 asalto as pain wracks their body.

Fallo El objetivo queda afflicted with internal insurrection at stage 1.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda afflicted with internal insurrection at stage 2.

Internal Insurrection (disease); Nivel 7.

The target can't recover from the Torpe condition from internal insurrection until the disease is cured

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} (1 día)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} (1 día)

Etapa 3 Torpe 2 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} (1 día)

Etapa 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 3} y flat-footed (1 día)

Etapa 5 death, y the target's body splits apart into a mass of fragments that crawls outward in a 10-foot-emanation before perishing, leaving a bare skeleton surrounded by gore.

Interstellar Void.name: Interstellar Void
Interstellar Void.description:
You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy. El objetivo queda cloaked in the freezing void, which deals 3d6 cold damage immediately y the first time each round you Sustain the Spell on future turns, with a basic Fortaleza save.

El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for as long as the effect persists.

Potenciado (+1) The cold damage se incrementa en 1d6.

Inveigle.name: Embaucamiento
Inveigle.description:
Te ganas la mente del objetivo, haciendo que te vea como un amigo cercano y de confianza y que cualquiera de tus sugerencias le parezca razonable. El objetivo es solícito hacia ti, por lo que se tomará molestias para ayudarte. Como con cualquier otra criatura solícita, hay límites a lo que puedes pedirle. Si alguna vez pides al objetivo que haga algo completamente contrario a su naturaleza o que sea innecesariamente dañino para él o para sus intereses, no tan sólo rehusará, sino que además podrá hacer una salvación de Voluntad para acabar prematuramente con el efecto. Debido al tiempo de lanzamiento y el alcance, suele ser difícil lanzar este ritual si el objetivo no es voluntario (aunque se le puede convencer de que el ritual tendrá algún otro efecto) o está neutralizado. Si la criatura se niega a aceptar el ritual, tiene derecho a una salvación de Voluntad para negar sus efectos.

Éxito crítico El ritual tiene éxito y el objetivo sufre un penalizador -4 por estatus a las salvaciones de Voluntad para acabar con el efecto.

Éxito El ritual tiene éxito..

Fallo El ritual falla.

Fallo crítico El ritual falla y el objetivo en su lugar te odia, volviéndose hostil hacia ti hasta el final de la duración del mismo.

Potenciado (6º) Puedes utilizar embaucamiento Puedes utilizar embaucamiento sobre una criatura que está hasta a una milla (1,6 km) de distancia a lo largo del lanzamiento, si tienes un mechón de cabello, una gota de sangre o alguna otra parte corporal de la criatura, que mezclas con los aceites utilizados en el coste. El coste base se incrementa a 100 po. La duración es más corta de lo normal, basándose en lo grande que es la parte corporal que utilizas de la criatura. Sangre, cabello, escamas y cosas parecidas hacen que el ritual dure 1 semana, mientras que una mano o alguna otra parte corporal sustancial hace que el ritual dure 1 mes.

Invisibility.name: Invisibilidad
Invisibility.description:
Enmascarado en una ilusión, el objetivo se vuelve @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Esto le convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No detectado} para todas las criaturas, aunque éstas pueden intentar encontrarle, haciendo que en su lugar quede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} (pág. 466). Si el objetivo utiliza una acción hostil, el conjuro acaba una vez ésta se ha completado.

Potenciado (4º) El conjuro dura 1 minuto, pero no acaba si el objetivo utiliza una acción hostil.

Invisibility Cloak.name: Capa de invisibilidad
Invisibility Cloak.description:
Te vuelves @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, con las mismas restricciones que el conjuro de 2º nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}.

Potenciado (6º) La duración se incrementa a 10 minutos.

Potenciado (8º) La duración se incrementa a 1 hora.

Invisibility Curtain.name: Invisibility Curtain
Invisibility Curtain.description:
You create a transparent invisible wall that makes any creatures on one side of the wall invisible to those on the other side. You choose which side of the wall provides invisibility to the creatures on that side when you cast the spell. You create either a 1-inch-thick wall in a straight line up to 60 feet long y 10 feet high or a 1-inch‑thick, 10-foot-radius ring with the same height. The wall is intangible y stys vertically in either of the two forms. If you wish to do so, you can create the wall with a shorter length or height, or with a smaller radius. Any creature that crosses the wall becomes visible or invisible as appropriate, y it's visible if any portion of it is on the visible side of the wall. If a creature rendered invisible by the wall takes a hostile action, the spell ends after the hostile action is completed.

Potenciado(7º) The spell doesn't end if an invisible creature takes a hostile action.

Invisible Item.name: Invisible Item
Invisible Item.description:
You make the object @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No detectado} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} to them instead if they succeed. If the item is used as part of a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed. Making a weapon invisible typically doesn't give any advantage to the attack, except that an invisible thrown weapon or piece of ammunition can be used for an attack without necessarily giving information about the attacker's hiding place unless the weapon returns to the attacker.

Potenciado (3º) La duración es de until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Potenciado(7º) La duración es de unlimited.

Invoke Spirits.name: Invoke Spirits
Invoke Spirits.description:
Ragged apparitions of the dead rise to stalk the living. They deal 2d4 mental damage y 2d4 negative damage to each living creature in the area, with a basic Will save. Additionally, creatures that critically fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2} y are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Huyendo} durante 1 asalto.

On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the area up to 30 feet within the range of the spell. Living creatures in the new area must attempt saves with the same effects as above, except that critically failing doesn't make them flee.

Potenciado(+2) The mental damage y negative damage each increase by 1d4.

Invoke the Crimson Oath.name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
Invoke the Crimson Oath.description:
Bryishing your weapon y shouting the final line of the Crimson Oath, you unleash a blast of destructive ruby energy. You must be wielding a melee weapon, y you perform this spell's somático component by swinging the weapon in a downward arc. You deal normal melee damage for your weapon, including all appropriate bonuses, penalties, modifiers, y properties, to each creature in the spell's area; they must each attempt a basic Fortaleza save. A creature that critically fails this save also suffers any additional effect you would normally inflict with your weapon on a critical hit; if the creature that critically fails its save is also immune to critical hits, it merely fails the save instead.

You can convert all the physical damage from this spell into positive damage against all undead creatures in the area.

Invoke True Name.name: Invoke True Name
Invoke True Name.description: You speak the true name of a creature to more surely affect it with your magic. Until the end of the current turn, El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} against your spells y takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against your spells. In addition, the first time this turn the target takes damage from one of your spells, it has weakness to that damage equal to double the Nivel of invoke true name.

Iron Gut.name: Iron Gut
Iron Gut.description:
Your mouth, esophagus, y stomach become incredibly elastic y tougher than metal. For the duration of the spell, you can alcance down your throat to store or retrieve a single object of light or negligible Bulk in your stomach, as though your stomach were a backpack or other container. Storing y retrieving an item in this way requires an Interact action. The object must be small enough to reasonably fit within your stomach. It is very difficult for other creatures to notice that you are hiding an object in this way; passive observers can't possibly notice y obtienes +4 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmspoKFGk9hV]{Conceal an Object} unless the searcher specifically searches your mouth y stomach. If at the end of the spell's duration you still have an object stored in your stomach, it is violently expelled, dealing 1d6 damage to you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.hXtK08bTnDBSzGTJ]{Efecto de conjuro: Iron Gut}

Potenciado (3º) The duration increases to 8 horas.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.XTgxkQkhlap66e54]{Efecto de conjuro: Iron Gut (3er Nivel)}

Isolation.name: Isolation
Isolation.description:
You summon a tangible manifestation of loneliness to cloak the target from view as surely as if it were wreathed in darkness. The target attempts a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, but only to its allies. Any creature not allied with the target can see it normally. Effects such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} enable an ally to see the target. The target's allies still know El objetivo queda present y can still see all the effects of the target's actions.

Fallo As success, except the target also becomes inaudible to its allies y imperceptible to them through any other senses.

Jealous Hex.name: Maleficio celoso
Jealous Hex.description:
Extraes los celos innatos de una saga para negar a un objetivo el mayor de sus atributos. El objetivo sufre un estado adverso que depende del mayor de sus modificadores por característica: Fuerza (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}); Destreza (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe}); Constitución (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado}); o Inteligencia, Sabiduría, o Carisma (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado}). Con un empate, la criatura es quien decide cuál de los estados asociados con el modificador a la habilidad empatada va a sufrir. Cada objetivo debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El valor del estado es 1.

Fallo crítico El valor del estado es 2.

Al inicio de cada uno de tus turnos, el objetivo puede hacer otra salvación de Voluntad, acabando con el efecto si tiene éxito.

Join Pasts.name: Join Pasts
Join Pasts.description:
With touches to the targets' foreheads, you bring them into mental communion. The targets can share thoughts y experiences, but not words. When one target attempts to Recall Knowledge, the other can Aid the first target's skill check, using any Lore skill (even if that Lore wouldn't normally apply) without having made any preparations to Aid.

Potenciado (+1) You can touch one additional target t include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.

Jump.name: Saltar
Jump.description:
Tus piernas se llenan de fuerza, listas para saltar alto y lejos. Saltas 30 pies (9 m) en cualquier dirección sin tocar el suelo. Debes aterrizar en un espacio de terreno sólido a 30 pies (9 m) o menos de ti, o bien te caes después de utilizar tu siguiente acción.

Potenciado (3º) El alcance se convierte en toque, el objetivo cambia a una criatura tocada y la duración se convierte en 1 minuto, permitiendo al objetivo saltar tal y como se ha descrito siempre que lleva a cabo la acción Saltar.

Juvenile Companion.name: Juvenile Companion
Juvenile Companion.description:
You transform your companion into its juvenile form, such as a cub, foal, kitten, puppy, or piglet, making the target appear harmless. It becomes Tiny (if it was larger), y its alcance is reduced to 0 pies. All of its Speeds are halved (to a minimum Speed of 5 pies), y it gains weakness 5 al daño físico. In all other ways, its abilities y statistics are unchanged.

If your companion uses a hostile action, juvenile companion ends. This spell has no effect on a companion that doesn't have a juvenile form.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.0bfqYkNaWsdTmtrc]{Efecto de conjuro: Juvenile Companion}

Potenciado(2º) The duration increases to 1 hora.

Ki Blast.name: Explosión de Ki
Ki Blast.description:
Desatas tú ki como una poderosa explosión de fuerza que inflige 2d6 daño por fuerza.

Si utilizas 2 acciones para lanzar explosión de ki, incrementa el tamaño del cono a 30 pies (9 m) y el daño a 3d6.

Si utilizas 3 acciones para lanzar explosión de ki, incrementa el tamaño del cono a 60 pies (18 m) y el daño a 4d6.

Cada criatura del área debe hacer una salvación de Fortaleza.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y es empujada 5 pies (1,5 m).

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y es empujada 10 pies (3 m).

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6, o en 2d6 si utilizas 2 o 3 acciones.

Ki Form.name: Ki Form
Ki Form.description:
Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special ki form. In your ki form, your hair, feathers, skin, or scales change color y begin to glow.

In this form obtienes Fly Speed equal to your ly Speed.

Choose force, lawful (only if you are lawful), negative, or positive damage. All your Strikes deal [[/r 1d6]] additional damage of the chosen type.

Your entire body is also surrounded by a glowing corona of the same color as your inner ki; this is a light effect. Your corona is a 5-foot emanation that deals [[/r 2d6]] damage of the chosen type to creatures who start their turn within the emanation. If the emanation overlaps with a darkness effect, the corona's glow attempts to counteract the darkness effect. Regardless of the outcome, the corona can't attempt to counteract that effect again for 1 día. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can flare your corona out to become a 30-foot emanation.

In your ki form, your emotions surge to the forefront y it's difficult to moderate your attacks. Your weapons y unarmed attacks lose the nonlethal trait. You take a -2 status penalty to saves against emotion effects but gain a +2 status bonus to saves against all other mental effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.rQaltMIEi2bn1Z4k]{Efecto de conjuro: Ki Form}

Ki Rush.name: Embestida Ki
Ki Rush.description:
Acelerado por tu ki, te mueves con tal velocidad que te vuelves borroso. Puedes mover dos veces: dos Zancadas, o dos Pasos, o una Zancada y un Paso (en cualquier orden).

Obtienes el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} durante este movimiento y hasta el inicio de tu siguiente turno.

Ki Strike.name: Golpe de Ki
Ki Strike.description:
Concentras tu ki para llevar a cabo ataques mágicos. Da un Golpe sin armas o haz una Ráfaga de golpes (esto no cambia el límite de utilizar tan sólo una floritura por turno).

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a tus tiradas de ataque con los Golpes y estos infligen 1d6 daño adicional. Este daño puede ser de uno cualquiera de los siguientes tipos a tu elección, a elegir cada vez que das un Golpe: fuerza, legal (sólo si eres legal), negativo o positivo.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8olfnTmWh0GpoDqX]{Efecto de conjuro: Golpe de Ki}

Potenciado (+4) El daño adicional se incrementa en 1d6.

Kinetic Ram.name: Kinetic Ram
Kinetic Ram.description:
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it in a straight line or disperse it as an encircling ripple. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortaleza saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you (or 20 feet con un fallo crítico). The spell's area or range y how many creatures it affects is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

1 The spell targets one creature within 15 pies (4,5 m).

2 The spell targets one creature within 30 pies (9 m). The distance El objetivo queda pushed if it fails is doubled, y con un fallo crítico, El objetivo queda also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} y takes [[/r 1d6[contundente]]] damage.

3 The spell targets all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5].

Know the Enemy.name: Conocer al enemigo
Know the Enemy.description:
Desencadenante Tiras iniciativa y puedes ver a una criatura, tienes éxito en una tirada de ataque contra una criatura o una criatura falla una tirada de salvación contra uno de tus conjuros.

Utiliza una acción de Recordar conocimiento, haciendo la prueba de habilidad apropiada para identificar las aptitudes de la criatura desencadenante. Puedes hacer dos veces la prueba y utilizar el mejor de los resultados.

Lament.name: Lament
Lament.description:
You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies' hearts y deals 1d8 mental damage (basic Will save). Si tienes any harmful conditions imposed by emotion effects, lament deals additional mental damage equal to the counteract Nivel of the highest-Nivel effect.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d8.

Lay on Hands.name: Imposición de manos
Lay on Hands.description:
Tus manos se infunden de energía positiva, curando con un toque a una criatura viva o dañando a una criatura muerta viviente.

Si utilizas imposición de manos sobre un objetivo voluntario, le restableces 6 Puntos de Golpe; si se trata de uno de tus aliados, además obtiene un bonificador +2 por estatus a la CA durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.lyLMiauxIVUM3oF1]{Efecto de conjuro: Imposición de manos}

Contra un objetivo muerto viviente, infliges 1d6 daño y debe hacer una salvación básica de Fortaleza; si falla, sufre también un penalizador -2 por estatus a la CA durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IxyD7YdRbSSucxZp]{Imposición de manos (Contra no muertos)}

Potenciado (+1) La cantidad de curación se incrementa en 6 y el daño a un objetivo muerto viviente se incrementa en 1d6.

Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).name: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead)
Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).description:
Your hands become infused with positive energy, healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch.

If you use lay on hands on a willing living target, you restore 6 Hit Points; if the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round. Against an undead target, you deal 1d6 damage and it must attempt a basic Fortaleza save; if it fails, it also takes a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Potenciado (+1) The amount of healing increases by 6, and the damage to an undead target increases by 1d6.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.JhihziXQuoteftdd]{Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead)}

Legend Lore.name: Conocimiento de leyendas
Legend Lore.description:
Intentas averiguar leyendas útiles acerca de un asunto en particular, que debe ser una persona, un lugar o un objeto importante. Si el asunto está presente, incrementa en un paso el grado de éxito de tu prueba de habilidad principal. Si tan sólo dispones de informaciones vagas acerca del asunto antes de intentar el ritual, disminuye en un paso el grado de éxito de tu prueba de habilidad principal. Estos modificadores se anulan entre sí si se trata de a un asunto con poca o ninguna información de base.

Éxito crítico Eres capaz de recitar leyendas, relatos e informaciones acerca del asunto a lo largo de una hora una vez acaba el ritual. La información es en su mayor parte coherente, enfatizando las leyendas más exactas o útiles por encima de las que han sido exageradas a lo largo del tiempo.

Éxito Eres capaz de recitar leyendas misteriosas, relatos e informaciones acerca del asunto a lo largo de una hora una vez acaba el ritual. Proporcionan información útil para investigaciones posteriores, pero que suele ser incompleta o enigmática. Dada la naturaleza de las leyendas, es probable que recojas múltiples versiones contradictorias.

Fallo No consigues averiguar ninguna leyenda útil.

Fallo crítico Tu mente se pierde en el pasado. No eres capaz de sentir ni de responder a nada en el presente durante 1 semana excepto para llevar a cabo necesidades básicas como respirar y dormir. Sin embargo, cuando vuelves, puedes reconvertir una de tus habilidades en un Saber basado en el conocimiento del pasado que estabas visualizando de forma incontrolable, como si hubieras pasado 1 semana reconvirtiendo.

Leng Sting.name: Leng Sting
Leng Sting.description:
You use the power of nightmares to magically replicate the venomous attack of the aberrant y cunning Leng spiders. You deal [[/r 2d6[perforante]]] damage to the touched creature y afflict it with Leng spider venom. If the target takes perforante damage, they must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes [[/r 2d6[veneno]]] damage.

Fallo El objetivo queda afflicted with Leng Spider Venom at stage 1.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda afflicted with Leng spider venom at stage 2.

Leng Spider Venom (incapacitation, veneno) Nivel 13

Duración máxima 6 rounds

Etapa 1 [[/r 2d6[veneno]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} (1 asalto)

Etapa 2 [[/r 3d6[veneno]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} (1 asalto)

Etapa 3 [[/r 4d6[veneno]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido} (1 asalto)

Levitate.name: Levitar
Levitate.description:
Desafías a la gravedad y haces levitar al objetivo 5 pies (1,5 m) por encima del suelo. Mientras dura el conjuro, puedes hacer subir o bajar al objetivo 10 pies (3 m) con una sola acción que tiene el rasgo concentrar. Una criatura flotando en el aire debido a levitar sufre un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a las tiradas de ataque. Una criatura flotante puede gastar una acción de Interactuar para estabilizarse y negar el penalizador durante el resto de su turno. Si el objetivo está adyacente a un objeto fijo o un terreno de estabilidad adecuada, puede atravesar su superficie trepando (si la superficie es vertical, como una pared) o gateando (si la superficie es horizontal, como por ejemplo un techo). El DJ determina por qué superficies se puede trepar o gatear.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{Efecto de conjuro: Levitar

Liberating Command.name: Liberating Command
Liberating Command.description: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Agarrado}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar}.

Life Boost.name: Life Boost
Life Boost.description:
You temporarily bolster the target's vitality. The target gains fast healing equal to double the spell's Nivel.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.NQZ88IoKeMBsfjp7]{Efecto de conjuro: Life Boost}

Life Connection.name: Life Connection
Life Connection.description:
When you cast this spell, you place a failsafe deep within the life force of the target. You can sense when the target takes damage, provided you're within 1 mile of one another. A creature can be part of no more than one life connection simultaneously. When the spell is complete, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.5V49l0K460CcvBOO]{Defend Life} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.j9l4LDnAwg9xzYsy]{Efecto de conjuro: Life Connection}

Life Link.name: Life Link
Life Link.description:
You forge a connection of life energy between you y your target, distributing harm between both of you. When you first Cast the Spell, the target recovers [[/r 1d4[healing]]]{1d4 Hit Points}.

The first time each round that the target takes damage, reduce the damage it takes by 3 (to a minimum of 0 damage). You lose 3 Hit Points each time, or the total damage dealt, if less than 3; this damage ignores any immunities or resistances you have y can't otherwise be mitigated in any way.

The spell ends immediately if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente}. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Potenciado (3º) You can target 2 creatures other than you. Increase the initial healing to [[/r 3d4[healing]]]{3d4 Hit Points} y the maximum damage reduced y Hit Points lost to 5.

Potenciado (6º) You can target 3 creatures other than you. Increase the initial healing to [[/r 6d4[healing]]]{6d4 Hit Points} y the maximum damage reduced y Hit Points lost to 10.

Potenciado(9º) You can target 4 creatures other than you. Increase the initial healing to [[/r 9d4[healing]]]{9d4 Hit Points} y the maximum damage reduced y Hit Points lost to 15.

Life Pact.name: Life Pact
Life Pact.description:
Using your life force or spirit as a conduit, you bind the targets in a mystical pact. If one of the targets is about to take damage that would reduce it to 0 Hit Points, all other targets immediately lose 3 Hit Points y the triggering target regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Hit Points lost this way, just before taking the damage. If this healing is enough that the triggering target is no longer reduced to 0 Hit Points, they remain conscious. Once the triggering target has regained Hit Points from the other targets, the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the number of Hit Points lost by 1 for each target other than the one reduced to 0 Hit Points. The target reduced to 0 Hit Points regains that many additional Hit Points.

Life Siphon.name: Vaciado de vida
Life Siphon.description:
Desencadenante Gastas uno de tus espacios de conjuro de mago para lanzar un conjuro de mago de la escuela de nigromancia

Utilizas parte de la magia del conjuro para curarte, recuperando 1d8 Puntos de Golpe por nivel del conjuro.

Life-Giving Form.name: Life-Giving Form
Life-Giving Form.description:
You transcend your physical form, becoming a beacon of healing energy. Your body exudes bright light like a torch. You gain resistance 5 to precision damage y weakness 5 to negative damage, y your unarmed Strikes deal an extra [[/r 1d4[positive]]] damage.

You can touch a living creature with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to restore [[/r 6d8[healing]]]{6d8 Hit Points} to it, y when a creature touches you with an Interact action you can allow it to gain the same healing; either way, the creature becomes temporarily immune to life-giving form's healing durante 1 minuto. This is a positive healing effect. You can't heal yourself with life-giving form. A creature harmed by positive damage (such as an undead) that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-alcance melee weapon instead takes [[/r 3d4[positive]]] damage, y it doesn't become temporarily immune.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this spell.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the Hit Points restored with an Interact action by [[/r 1d8]], the positive damage by 1, y La resistencia y weakness by 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.lIl0yYdS9zojOZhe]{Efecto de conjuro: Life-Giving Form}

Lifelink Surge.name: Lifelink Surge
Lifelink Surge.description:
You make a quick gesture, tracing the link between yourself y your eidolon y drawing on your connection to slowly strengthen your shared life force. Your eidolon gains Fast Healing 4 for 4 asaltos.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.h2JzNunzO8hXiNV3]{Efecto de conjuro: Lifelink Surge}

Potenciado (+1) The fast healing se incrementa en 2.

Lift Nature's Caul.name: Lift Nature's Caul
Lift Nature's Caul.description:
With a wave of the hy, you cause the targets to see the world around them as if a gauzy film had been lifted away to expose the truth that lies below their perceived reality. Natural features they can see grow twisted y horrendous, structures appear distorted y ruined, y objects seem warped y alien. This alternate vision fades quickly, but the glimpse beyond the natural world lingers for the spell's duration. Aberrations or worshippers of Outer Gods or Great Old Ones are bolstered by this vision of warped reality y gain a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws y attack rolls durante 1 minuto, while all other creatures must attempt a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada y queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 hora.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} durante 1 minuto y Asustado 1.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda Anonadado 1 durante 1 minuto y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}. It can't reduce the value of its Asustado condition below 1 as long as it remains Anonadado by this spell.

Potenciado(+2) You increase the area by 5 feet y the duration of the Anonadado condition by 1 minute.

Light.name: Luz
Light.description:
El objeto brilla, emitiendo una luz brillante en un radio de 20 pies (6 m), y luz tenue en los siguientes 20 pies (6 m) como si fuera una antorcha. Si lanzas este conjuro de nuevo sobre un segundo objeto, el conjuro de luz sobre el primer objeto se acaba.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Efecto de conjuro: Luz}

Potenciado (4º) El objeto emite una luz brillante en un radio de 60 pies (18 m), y luz tenue en los siguientes 60 pies (18 m)..

Light of Revelation.name: Light of Revelation
Light of Revelation.description: You shed a luminous aura, illuminating a 30-foot radius with bright light. You y all allies in this area gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks to detect @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No detectado} creatures, as well as Hidden objects, doors, y other features.

Lightning Bolt.name: Relámpago
Lightning Bolt.description:
De tu mano surge un relámpago, que inflige 4d12 daño por electricidad.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d12.

Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.description:
You create a black, rumbling storm cloud y call down one lightning bolt within the spell's area. The bolt is a vertical line from the top of the storm cloud to the ground below, dealing 4d12 daño por electricidad to creatures in the line (basic Reflejos save). On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can call another lightning bolt within the area. If you Cast this Spell outdoors, you can create two non-overlapping clouds instead of one, though you can still call down only one bolt per turn.

Potenciado(+2) The damage of each bolt se incrementa en [[/r 1d12[electricity]]] damage.

Lingering Composition.name: Composición persistente
Lingering Composition.description:
Añades una floritura a tu composición para extender sus beneficios. Si tu siguiente acción es lanzar una composición de truco con una duración de 1 asalto, haz una prueba de Interpretación. La CD suele ser una CD de dificultad normal de un nivel igual al del objetivo de mayor nivel de tu composición, pero el DJ puede asignar una CD diferente basada en las circunstancias. El efecto depende del resultado de la prueba.

Éxito crítico La composición dura 4 asaltos.

Éxito La composición dura 3 asaltos.

Fallo La composición dura 1 asalto, pero no gastas el Punto de Foco a lanzar este conjuro.

Linnorm Sting.name: Linnorm Sting
Linnorm Sting.description:
You replicate the fiery venom of the tor linnorm y inflict an enemy with the dread dragon's debilitating bite. You deal [[/r 2d12[perforante]]] damage to the targeted creature y afflict it with tor linnorm venom. If the target takes perforante damage, they must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes [[/r 8d6[fire]]] damage.

Fallo El objetivo queda afflicted with Tor Linnorm Venom at stage 1.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda afflicted with tor linnorm venom at stage 2.

Tor Linnorm Venom (fire, injury, veneno) Nivel 17

Duración máxima 10 rounds

Etapa 1 [[/r 8d6[fire]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} (1 asalto)

Etapa 2 [[/r 12d6[fire]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} (1 asalto)

Litany against Sloth.name: Letanía contra la pereza
Litany against Sloth.description:
Tu letanía fustiga el pecado de la pereza, interfiriendo con la capacidad del objetivo para reaccionar. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad. Una criatura particularmente perezosa, como por ejemplo un demonio de la pereza, utiliza un resultado un grado de éxito inferior al de su tirada de salvación. El objetivo queda temporalmente inmune a todas tus letanías durante 1 minuto.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo no puede utilizar reacciones.

Fallo El objetivo no puede utilizar reacciones y queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo no puede utilizar reacciones y queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2}.

Litany against Wrath.name: Letanía contra la ira
Litany against Wrath.description:
Tu letanía fustiga el pecado de la ira, castigando al objetivo por atacar a las criaturas buenas. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad. Una criatura particularmente iracunda, como por ejemplo un demonio de la ira, utiliza un resultado un grado de éxito inferior al de su tirada de salvación. El objetivo queda temporalmente inmune a todas tus letanías durante 1 minuto.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La primera vez que el objetivo utiliza una acción que inflige daño por lo menos a una criatura buena, el objetivo sufre 3d6 daño bueno.

Fallo Cada vez que el objetivo utiliza una acción que inflige daño por lo menos a una criatura buena, el objetivo sufre 3d6 daño bueno.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2}. Cada vez que el objetivo utiliza una acción que inflige daño por lo menos a una criatura buena, el objetivo sufre 3d6 daño bueno.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

Litany of Depravity.name: Litany of Depravity
Litany of Depravity.description:
Your litany calls into question the morals your foe claims to hold dear. The target gains weakness 7 to evil, then becomes temporarily immune to all your litanies durante 1 minuto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.CTdEsMIwVYqqkH50]{Efecto de conjuro: Litany of Depravity}

Potenciado (+1) The weakness se incrementa en 1.

Litany of Righteousness.name: Letanía de rectitud
Litany of Righteousness.description:
Tu letanía denuncia a un malvado, volviéndole susceptible a los poderes del bien. El objetivo sufre debilidad 7 al bien. El objetivo queda temporalmente inmune a todas tus letanías durante 1 minuto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.46vCC77mBNBWtmx3]{Efecto de conjuro: Letanía de rectitud}

Potenciado (+1) La debilidad se incrementa en 1.

Litany of Self-Interest.name: Litany of Self-Interest
Litany of Self-Interest.description:
You give a speech that fills your target with a drive to improve themself to the exclusion of assisting others. A creature that wants to gain the benefit of this spell y doesn't care about its limitations can voluntarily fail the save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to all your litanies durante 1 minuto.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo The target gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, y skill checks. The target can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} other creatures, consider any creature an ally, or use spells or abilities that directly benefit another creature (as determined by the GM), even if they also benefit the target. Other creatures allied with the spell's target can still consider the target an ally y affect it accordingly.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ceEA7nBGNmoR8Sjj]{Efecto de conjuro: Litany of Self-Interest}

Potenciado (8º) The status bonus increases to +3.

Localized Quake.name: Temblor localizado
Localized Quake.description:
Haces temblar la tierra, derribando a las criaturas cercanas. Elige el área del conjuro entre una emanación de 15 pies (4,5 m) y un cono de 15 pies (4,5 m) al lanzarlo. Cada criatura en el área que está de pie sobre el terreno sólido puede sufrir 4d6 daño contundente y debe hacer una salvación de Reflejos.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y cae @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre daño completo y y cae tumbada.

Potenciado (+1) Incrementa el daño en 2d6.

Locate.name: Localizar
Locate.description:
Averiguas la ubicación del objetivo (si has elegido un objeto específico, como por ejemplo "la espada de mi madre") o el objeto más cercano (si has elegido un tipo de objeto, como por ejemplo "espadas"). Si el objetivo es un objeto específico, tienes que haberlo observado directamente con tus propios sentidos. Si es un tipo de objeto, aun así necesitas tener una imagen mental precisa del tipo de objeto. Si hay plomo o agua corriente entre el objetivo y tú, este conjuro no puede localizarlo. Esto significa que podrías encontrar un tipo de objeto más lejos, si el más cercano estuviera detrás de cierta cantidad de plomo o de agua corriente.

Potenciado (5º) Puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura específica o ascendencia en lugar del objeto, pero tienes que haberte encontrado con la criatura o ascendencia a la que quieres designar como objetivo o haberla visto de cerca.

Lock Item.name: Lock Item
Lock Item.description:
One object held by a creature becomes fused to that creature's hy y can't be put down. To @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} the item, the result of the skill check must exceed the spell's DC or the normal DC, whichever is higher. To voluntarily drop the weapon, the target must spend an Interact action rather than a free action, y then succeed at a Reflejos save. On a failed save, the action is wasted, but on a success, they drop the item y the spell ends. An unwilling creature must attempt an initial Reflejos save against lock item. A willing creature can choose to critically fail the saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda afectado durante 1 asalto.

Fallo La criatura queda afectado for 4 asaltos.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda afectado durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado(+2) You can target either 1 additional object held by the same creature or 1 additional object held by 1 additional creature.

Longstrider.name: Zancada prodigiosa
Longstrider.description:
Alargas tu zancada más allá de lo que debería ser posible. Obtienes un bonificador de +10 pies (+3 m) por estatus a tu Velocidad.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.PQHP7Oph3BQX1GhF]{Efecto de conjuro: Zancada prodigiosa}

Potenciado (2º) La duración se incrementa a 8 horas.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.7vIUF5zbvHzVcJA0]{Efecto de conjuro: Zancada prodigiosa (8 horas)}

Loose Time's Arrow.name: Loose Time's Arrow
Loose Time's Arrow.description: You pluck the time stream like a bow-pull one string back, release, y watch a creature fly. All afectado targets are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. They can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.

Loremaster's Etude.name: Estudio del maestro del saber
Loremaster's Etude.description:
Desencadenante Tú o un aliado tuyo dentro del alcance intentáis una prueba de habilidad para Recordar conocimiento.

Efecto Puedes apelar a los misterios profundos de tu musa, concediendo al objetivo una mayor capacidad para pensar y recordar información. Haz dos veces la prueba de habilidad desencadenante de Recordar conocimiento y utiliza el mejor de los resultados

Lose the Path.name: Lose the Path
Lose the Path.description:
Desencadenante A creature in range Strides

You surround a moving creature with lifelike illusions, shifting their perception of the terrain to subtly lead them off course. The target must attempt a Will save. Regardless of the result, La criatura queda immune to lose the path for 1 hora.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo The creature treats all squares as difficult terrain for its Stride.

Fallo crítico As failure, except that you determine where the target moves during the Stride, though you can't move it into hazardous terrain or to a place it can't sty.

Lucky Break.name: Buena racha
Lucky Break.description:
Desencadenante Fallas (pero no críticamente) una tirada de salvación.

Repite la tirada de salvación y utiliza el mejor de ambos resultados. A continuación, quedas temporalmente inmune durante 10 minutos.

Lucky Month.name: Lucky Month
Lucky Month.description:
You imbue the provided token with luck. You choose a single creature within range during the ritual's performance to become the recipient of the token's luck. That creature has access to the token's luck as long as they're wearing the token. If the token is stolen or lost, they lose access to its luck until the token is recovered. The token loses its luck if it's destroyed or after the duration noted in the ritual's effects has elapsed.

Éxito crítico You can call upon the token's luck. Once per week, when rolling a saving throw or skill check, you can use the token's power y roll twice, taking the higher result. This is a fortune effect. The token keeps its luck for 1 month.

Éxito As a critical success, except you can only call upon the token's power once during the lucky month.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico Magical backlash creates ill luck. Once per week, the ritual's recipient must roll twice y take the worse result for their first significant saving throw or skill check of the week, as determined by the GM. This is a misfortune effect. This ill luck remains for 1 month y applies to the recipient whether or not they're wearing the token.

Lucky Number.name: Lucky Number
Lucky Number.description:
When you Cast this Spell, roll [[/r 1d20]] y make a note of the result. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kUME7DMhhHH6eIiH]{That's My Number} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends, y you become temporarily immune to lucky number until the next time you make your daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.fvIlSZPwojixVvyZ]{Efecto de conjuro: Lucky Number}

Lure Dream.name: Lure Dream
Lure Dream.description: You alcance out to the dream realm, beckoning an animate dream to your side. This works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Convocar animal}, except you summon an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Y9SDbANT1DWI1DKU]{Animate Dream}.

Mad Monkeys.name: Mad Monkeys
Mad Monkeys.description:
Magical monkey spirits fill the area as they pile y climb on top of one another. Because the monkeys are magical spirits, they can't be attacked or hurt. Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} or a similar effect over the monkeys makes them docile, causing them to cease making mischief for the duration of mad monkeys.

Choose the kind of mischief your monkeys make when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}. They produce the effect listed for that mischief when you Cast the Spell y the first time each round when you Sustain the Spell. The first time each round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the area of the monkeys by 5 pies.

Flagrant Burglary The monkeys try to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} any one item from one creature in the area. Use your spell DC - 10 as the monkeys' Thievery modifier. Their attempt relies more on distraction than subtlety, so the victim knows what item the monkeys were trying to take y whether it was taken. Getting a stolen item from the monkeys-even for the caster-requires Stealing it from them or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarming} them, using your spell DC. When the spell ends, any stolen items fall to the ground in any square of the spell's area you choose.

Raucous Din The monkeys screech loudly, potentially deafening creatures in the spell's area. Each creature in the spell's area must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada y is queda temporalmente inmune durante 10 minutos.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecida} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda ensordecido durante 1 minuto.

Tumultuous Gymnastics The monkeys jump y climb all over creatures in the spell's area, interfering with complex movements. Each creature in the spell's area must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada y is queda temporalmente inmune durante 10 minutos.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo durante 1 asalto, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] whenever it attempts a manipulate action. If it fails this check, the creature loses that action.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the monkeys cling to the creature tenaciously, y the effect lasts until the spell ends, even if the creature leaves the spell's area.

Mage Hand.name: Mano del mago
Mage Hand.description:
Creas una sola mano mágica, o bien invisible o bien fantasmal, que aferra el objeto objetivo y lo mueve lentamente hasta 20 pies (6 m). Como quiera que estás haciendo levitar el objeto, puedes moverlo en cualquier dirección. Cuando Mantienes el conjuro, puedes mover el objeto 20 pies (6 m) adicionales. Si el objeto está en el aire cuando el conjuro se acaba, se cae.

Potenciado (3º) Puedes designar como objetivo un objeto no atendido con una Impedimenta de 1 o menos.

Potenciado (5º) El alcance se incrementa a 60 pies (18 m) y puedes designar como objetivo un objeto no atendido con una Impedimenta de 1 o menos.

Potenciado (7º) El alcance se incrementa a 60 pies (18 m) y puedes designar como objetivo un objeto no atendido con una Impedimenta de 2 o menos.

Magic Hide.name: Magic Hide
Magic Hide.description:
Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.qhNUfwpkD8BRw4zj]{Efecto de conjuro: Magic Hide}

Magic Mailbox.name: Magic Mailbox
Magic Mailbox.description:
Creas un interdimensional link between two containers, both of which must be capable of being closed in such a way that their contents aren't visible. If both containers are left closed for 10 consecutive minutos, the contents of each one, totaling no more than 3 Bulk of nonliving, non-magical material per container, transport to the other's location.

If a container's contents total more than 3 Bulk, the transport fails. If either container is opened before the full 10 minutos have elapsed, the contents appear as they did when the containers were closed, y the process starts anew as soon as both containers have been closed. After the contents of the containers successfully swap, they can't swap again until after both containers have been opened at least once. Both containers must be located on the same plane for the process to function; if this ceases to be the case or if something else disrupts the effect during an active transposition, the process halts as if one of the containers had been opened.

Magic Missile.name: Proyectil mágico
Magic Missile.description:
Envías un dardo de fuerza hacia una criatura a la que puedes ver. Impacta automáticamente e inflige 1d4+1 daño por fuerza. Por cada acción adicional que utilizas cuando Lanzas el conjuro, incrementa en 1 el número de proyectiles que disparas, hasta un máximo de 3 si inviertes 3 acciones. Tú eliges individualmente el objetivo de cada proyectil. Si disparas más de un proyectil al mismo objetivo, combina el daño antes de aplicar bonificadores o penalizadores al daño, resistencias, debilidades y así sucesivamente.

Potenciado (+2) Disparas un proyectil adicional con cada acción que gastas.

Magic Stone.name: Magic Stone
Magic Stone.description: You pour positive energy into ordinary stones, granting them temporary magical properties. You can target 1 non-magical stone or sling bullet for every action you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casting this Spell}. The stones must be unattended or carried by you or a willing ally. The stones become +1 striking disrupting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.MKSeXwUm56c15MZa]{Sling Bullets}. Each stone can be used only once, after which it crumbles to dust.

Magic Warrior Aspect.name: Magic Warrior Aspect
Magic Warrior Aspect.description: You call upon the aspect of the animal from your mask, gaining physical features reminiscent of that animal. You morph slightly into that creature, gaining the Speeds y senses you would gain from using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} to turn into the type of animal your mask represents; these special Speeds can't be increased by status bonuses or item bonuses.

Magic Warrior Transformation.name: Magic Warrior Transformation
Magic Warrior Transformation.description: You transform into the animal from your mask. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, Potenciadoto magic warrior transformation's Nivel, y you can transform into only the type of animal your mask represents.

Magic's Vessel.name: Receptáculo de la magia
Magic's Vessel.description:
Una criatura se convierte en receptáculo de la energía mágica pura enviada por tu dios.

El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de salvación.

Cada vez que Lanzas un conjuro a partir de tus espacios de conjuro, automáticamente lo Mantienes y concedes a su objetivo resistencia al daño procedente de los conjuros hasta el inicio de tu siguiente turno. Esta resistencia es igual al nivel del conjuro que lanzas.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.zpxIwEjnLUSO1B4z]{Efecto de conjuro: Receptáculo de la magia}

Magical Fetters.name: Magical Fetters
Magical Fetters.description:
Ghostly manacles launch from your outstretched hy y clasp around the target's limbs, impeding its movements. The target must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} y takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed durante 1 asalto.

Fallo El objetivo queda Torpe 3 y takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico As failure, but El objetivo queda also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} for the duration.

Magnetic Acceleration.name: Magnetic Acceleration
Magnetic Acceleration.description:
You magnetize a small metal object, such as a nail or coin, y launch it away from you at massive speed. Make a ranged spell attack roll; if El objetivo queda wearing metal armor or is made of metal, obtienes +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll with magnetic acceleration. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 contundente damage y 3d6 perforante damage, or double damage on a critical hit.

Potenciado (+1) The contundente y perforante damage each increase by 1d6.

Magnetic Attraction.name: Magnetic Attraction
Magnetic Attraction.description:
You adjust your magnetic polarity, plucking daggers from hys y coins from belts. The targeted objects fly to your location, letting you catch them easily in your hys, or dropping to the ground at your position, at your discretion. Unattended objects fly to you automatically. If you target secured objects or those in another creature's possession (such as sheathed weapons), you must attempt to Disarm the creature of the metal objects, making a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check to do so.
