Instead of drawing the objects to yourself, you can polarize a single metal object within range, designating it as a lodestone y causing the metal objects to fly to it instead. The lodestone must be at least three times the total Bulk of the targeted metal objects. Objects will stick to the lodestone durante 1 minuto, though they can be wrenched away with an Interact action.

Magnetic Repulsion.name: Magnetic Repulsion
Magnetic Repulsion.description:
You adjust your magnetic polarity, causing metal objects to jump y shudder away from you. Attacks made with metal objects against you take a -1 status penalty, y the squares adjacent to you are difficult terrain for creatures wearing metal armor. For creatures made entirely of metal, the penalty to their attack rolls is -2 y the squares adjacent to you are greater difficult terrain.

While this spell is active, you require an additional Interact action before using a metal object (including to Strike with a metal weapon), y if you're wearing metal armor, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}.

Potenciado(+3) The status penalty to attack rolls se incrementa en 1.

Magnificent Mansion.name: Mansión magnífica
Magnificent Mansion.description:
Conjuras un semiplano extradimensional que consiste en una espaciosa vivienda con una sola entrada. La entrada conecta con el Plano en el que has Lanzado el hechizo, apareciendo en cualquier parte de dentro del alcance del mismo como un rectángulo vertical, débil y brillante de 5 pies (1,5 m) de anchura y 10 pies (3 m) de altura. Tú designas quién puede entrar cuando lanzas el conjuro. Una vez dentro, puedes cerrar la entrada, haciéndola @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Tú y toda criatura designada por ti podéis reabrir la puerta a voluntad, como si abrierais una puerta física.

En el interior, el semiplano aparenta ser una mansión con un magnífico recibidor y numerosas y opulentas cámaras. La mansión podrá tener cualquier distribución que te imagines cuando Lances el conjuro, mientras quepa en un espacio de 40 pies (12 m) de largo, 40 pies (12 m) de ancho y 30 pies (9 m) de alto. Cuando la entrada de la mansión está cerrada, los efectos del exterior de la misma no consiguen entrar en ella, y viceversa, excepto cambio de Plano que se puede utilizar para entrar en la mansión. Sólo puedes utilizar magia de escudriñamiento y efectos similares para observar el exterior si dichos efectos son capaces de cruzar los Planos.

El personal se compone de veinticuatro sirvientes que atienden a todos los que están en el interior de la mansión. Son como los creados por el conjuro sirviente invisible, aunque estos son visibles, y su apariencia la determinas tú durante el lanzamiento. La mansión está provista de comida suficiente como para servir un banquete de nueve platos a ciento cincuenta personas.

Malicious Shadow.name: Malicious Shadow
Malicious Shadow.description:
You reshape the target's shadow into a deadly form, such as strangling hys, a dangerous weapon, harrying runes, or the like, y commy it to attack the target. When you Cast the Spell, y each time you Sustain the Spell, the shadow makes a Strike against the target. The shadow moves along with the foe, always remaining within alcance. If you Sustain the Spell multiple times in a round, you gain this effect each time. The shadow uses y contributes to your multiple attack penalty.

The shadow's Strikes are melee spell attacks. Regardless of its shape, the shadow's Strikes deal damage equal to 1d10 más your spellcasting ability modifier. You choose the type of damage when you Cast the Spell, choosing from contundente, perforante, or cortante damage. The shadow doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The shadow can't make any attacks other than its Strike.

The shadow vanishes if the target moves into an area of complete darkness or enters an area with light from all directions such that the target doesn't cast a shadow. If another effect is controlling the target's shadow when you cast malicious shadow, you can attempt to counteract that effect to temporarily take control of the shadow, but the original effect resumes when malicious shadow ends.

Potenciado(+2) The Strike damage se incrementa en 1d10.

Malignant Sustenance.name: Sustento maligno
Malignant Sustenance.description:
Incrustas una semilla de energía negativa en una criatura muerta viviente, restableciendo su vigor antinatural. El objetivo obtiene curación rápida 7. Está curación procede de la energía negativa, por lo que cura al muerto viviente en lugar de dañarle.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.tjC6JeZgLDPIMHjG]{Efecto de conjuro: Sustento maligno}

Potenciado (+1) La curación rápida se incrementa en 2.

Manifold Lives.name: Manifold Lives
Manifold Lives.description:
You cast a creature's mind back through time, forcing them to take other paths y make other choices, experiencing countless alternate lives in an instant. The creature becomes overwhelmed with regret over paths untraveled, lives unlived, y times unrealized. The creature takes [[/r 6d6[mental]]] damage y must attempt a Will save. After the effect is resolved, El objetivo queda then queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 día.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The creature takes half damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is Anonadado 2 durante 1 minuto. While afectado, the creature must attempt another save at the start of its turn; on a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y durante 1 minuto, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 4} y slowed 1 as it sobs uncontrollably.

Potenciado (+1) The mental damage se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Mantis Form.name: Mantis Form
Mantis Form.description: You become a mantis. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}, Potenciadoto mantis form's Nivel, y you can only transform into a mantis.

Mantle of Heaven's Slopes.name: Mantle of Heaven's Slopes
Mantle of Heaven's Slopes.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of heavenly power, invoking the power of the layers of the celestial mountain above. Your body warps y morphs into an angelic form, made of Heaven's light. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two different options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can lose one of the options you chose y select a different one (you don't benefit from having the same option selected twice at the same time).

  • Threshold's Walls Glimmering barriers form around you. You gain cover from the barriers.
  • Proelera's Arsenal Shimmering silver pikes surround you, imposing your might on those who would oppose you. obtienesn arsenal unarmed attack, which has the alcance y shove traits, in the polearm group. Your arsenal attack deals 1d10 perforante damage as its base damage, más an additional 1d8 good damage, y counts as silver.
  • Clarion's Sanctity Your eyes glow with golden light, seeing that which others prefer remain unseen. obtienes +2 status bonus on checks to Recall Knowledge y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}, y when you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, you can attempt to Sense its Motive as a free action.
  • Requius's Rest Your hys glow with soft white energy that spreads to your wounds. You gain fast healing 2.
  • Illumis's Parlance Your voice echoes like a trumpet. You can be heard clearly up to 200 feet away when you speak, if you choose to project your voice.
  • Iuidica's Verdict Your body pulses with scarlet light, pushing away those judged to be against you. As a free action triggered by succeeding at a Strike, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the creature you hit.

Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Mantle of the Frozen Heart
Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, y your skin y armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close y leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Chilling Ice The ice around your body thickens, melting off to protect you from heat while inuring you from the cold. You gain resistance 10 to cold.
  • Heart of Ice Your body temperature plummets to blistering cold. Any creature that touches you, or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non‑alcance melee weapon attack, takes [[/r 2d6[cold]]] damage.
  • Ice Glide Ice trails from your feet for an instant as you move, allowing you to skate rapidly along the ice. You don't need to Balance on ice, y you ignore difficult terrain caused by ice or snow. While moving along a smooth surface, obtienes +20-foot status bonus to your ly Speed. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.YCno88Te0nfwFgVo]{Efecto de conjuro: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Ice Glide)}
  • Icy Claws Your hys morph into vicious, perforante claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hys free, obtienes trepar equal to your ly Speed. obtienes claw unarmed attack with the ágil y finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1d6 perforante damage as its base damage, más an additional 2d6 cold damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.wqh8D9kHGItZBvtQ]{Efecto de conjuro: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Icy Claws)}

Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Mantle of the Magma Heart
Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, y your skin y anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, y tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. Upon casting this spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You erupt in lava, which clings to you y hardens, causing your body to swell y burst until you grow to size Large. You're Torpe 1. Your alcance se incrementa en 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), y obtienes +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.qRyynMOflGajgAR3]{Efecto de conjuro: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Enlarging Eruption)}
  • Fiery Grasp Your hys swell y grow with lava. obtienes lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1d8 contundente damage as their base damage, más an additional 2d6 daño por fuego y 1d6 persistent daño por fuego. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.6SG8wVmppv4oXZtx]{Efecto de conjuro: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Fiery Grasp)}
  • Heart of Fire Your body's temperature becomes so hot that any creature that touches you, or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-alcance melee weapon attack, takes [[/r 2d6[fire]]] damage.
  • Warming Flames Flames flicker around you, warming away the cold while protecting you from the heat. You gain resistance 5 to cold y fire.

Mariner's Curse.name: Maldición del marinero
Mariner's Curse.description:
Afliges al objetivo con la maldición del mar agitado e implacable. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}. Reducir a 0 su estado de indispuesto acaba con la maldición.

Fallo El objetivo queda expuesto 1 y no puede reducir por debajo de 1 su estado mientras la maldición está activa. La maldición se puede eliminar mediante quitar maldición o magia similar. Si el objetivo esta indispuesto y en el mar, a por lo menos una milla marina (1,8 km) de la Costea, queda también @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}.

Fallo crítico Como en un fallo, pero el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2}.

Martyr's Intervention.name: Martyr's Intervention
Martyr's Intervention.description:
Desencadenante A creature within range would take damage that reduces it to 0 Hit Points

Requirements You don't have the wounded condition.

You shield a creature in dire need with your own life force, taking the harm upon yourself to save their life. El objetivo queda reduced to 1 Hit Point instead of 0 Hit Points. All remaining damage that was prevented from harming the target creature is instead dealt to you. Both you y the target become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}; targets who are already wounded increased their wounded value by 1.

Mask of Terror.name: Máscara del terror
Mask of Terror.description:
El objetivo aparece como una criatura macabra y terrorífica. El efecto es único para cada observador, por lo que un humano que viera al objetivo podría ver a un demonio de colmillos sangrientos, pero un demonio que viera al objetivo podría ver un rostro angelical brillante. Cuando cualquier criatura intenta una acción hostil contra el objetivo, la criatura debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. A continuación, queda temporalmente inmune hasta el final de su siguiente turno.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustada 2} antes de utilizar su acción.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustada 2}, y su acción falla y se desperdicia.

Potenciado (8º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta 5 criaturas. Si una criatura utiliza una acción o una reacción hostil que afecta simultáneamente a múltiples objetivos, tan sólo hace falta hacer una salvación contra máscara del terror.

Massacre.name: Masacre
Massacre.description:
Desatas una oleada de energía nigromántica para apagar la fuerza vital de quienes se encuentran en su camino. Cada criatura de 17º nivel o inferior en la línea debe hacer una salvación de Fortaleza. Si el daño debido a masacre reduce a una criatura a 0 Puntos de Golpe, dicha criatura muere instantáneamente. Si masacre no mata a ninguna criatura, la energía negativa explota violentamente de vuelta hacia ti, infligiendo 30 daño negativo adicional a todas las criaturas de la línea (incluso los que están por encima de 17º nivel) y 30 de daño negativo a ti.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre 9d6 daño negativo..

Fallo La criatura sufre 100 daño negativo.

Fallo crítico La criatura muere.

Potenciado (10º) El conjuro puede afectar a criaturas de hasta 19º nivel. Incrementa el daño a 10d6 con un éxito y a 115 con un fallo.

Maze.name: Laberinto
Maze.description:
Transportas al objetivo a un laberinto extradimensional de origen sobrenatural y lo atrapas allí. Una vez por turno, el objetivo puede invertir 1 acción en hacer una prueba de Supervivencia o de Percepción contra tu CD de conjuro para huir del laberinto. Los posibles desenlaces son los siguientes.

Éxito crítico El objetivo huye y el conjuro se acaba.

Éxito El objetivo está en el camino correcto hacia la salida. Si el objetivo ya estaba en el camino correcto, huye del laberinto y el conjuro se acaba.

Fallo El objetivo no logra avance alguno para huir.

Fallo crítico El objetivo no logra avance alguno para huir y si estaba en el camino correcto, deja de estarlo.

La magia de teletransporte no ayudará a huir a la criatura a menos que dicha magia pueda transportar a través de los Planos, como por ejemplo cambio de Plano. Cuando el conjuro se acaba, o bien porque el objetivo ha huido o porque la duración se ha acabado, el objetivo vuelve al espacio que ocupaba cuando fue desterrado, o al espacio más próximo si el original está ahora ocupado.

Maze of Locked Doors.name: Maze of Locked Doors
Maze of Locked Doors.description:
The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway blocked at 30-foot intervals with high-grade darkwood doors (Hardness 20, HP 80, BT 40, @Check[type:athletics|dc:30|name:Force Open Darkwood Door|traits:action:force-open] to Force Open) secured with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{Lock (Average)} (@Check[type:thievery|dc:25|name:Pick Maze Lock|traits:action:pick-a-lock], 4 successful checks required). A creature trapped within this hallway can escape only when the spell expires, or when they successfully pass through the number of doors determined by their save, either by breaking through the doors or picking the locks (or any combination of these, if the target must pass through multiple doors to escape). Teleportation effects of 6º Nivel o menor are automatically suppressed within the extradimensional hallway; higher-Nivel teleportation effects require the caster to succeed at a counteract check against your spell DC or they fail.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda trapped durante 1 asalto, or until it bypasses 1 door.

Fallo El objetivo queda trapped durante 1 minuto, or until it bypasses 2 doors.

Fallo crítico The target it trapped for 10 minutos, or until it bypasses 3 doors.

Medusa's Wrath.name: Medusa's Wrath
Medusa's Wrath.description:
You make an attack filled with a medusa's petrifying power. Make an unarmed Strike with the following additional effects.

Éxito crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} y must attempt a Fortaleza save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait.

On a failed save, the Slowed condition se incrementa en 1 (2 con un fallo crítico). A successful save reduces the Slowed condition by 1. When a creature is unable to act due to the Slowed condition from medusa's wrath, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrificada} permanente. The spell ends if La criatura queda Petrificada or the Slowed condition is removed.

Éxito As critical success, but El objetivo queda initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}.

Mending.name: Remendar
Mending.description:
Reparas el objeto objetivo. Restableces 5 Puntos de Golpe por nivel de conjuro al objetivo, eliminando potencialmente el estado de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Roto} si la reparación lo coloca por debajo de su Umbral de rotura. No puedes reemplazar piezas perdidas ni reparar un objeto que ha sido completamente destruido.

Potenciado (2º) Puedes designar como objetivo a un objeto no mágico de Impedimenta 1 o menos.

Potenciado (3º) Puedes designar como objetivo a un objeto no mágico de Impedimenta 2 o menos, o a un objeto mágico de Impedimenta 1 o menos.

Message.name: Mensaje
Message.description:
Pronuncias unas palabras en voz baja, pero en lugar de salir de tu boca son transferidas directamente a los oídos del objetivo. Mientras que los demás no pueden entender tus palabras al no haberlas pronunciado en voz alta, el objetivo puede oírlas como si estuviera junto a ti.

El objetivo puede dar una respuesta breve como reacción, o como acción gratuita en su siguiente turno si lo deseas, pero debe ser capaz de verte y estar dentro del alcance para hacerlo. Y si responde, su respuesta se entrega directamente a tus oídos, igual que el mensaje original.

Potenciado (3º) El alcance del conjuro se incrementa a 500 pies (150 m).

Message Rune.name: Message Rune
Message Rune.description: You record a message up to 5 minutos long y inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within alcance. The nature of the rune's appearance is up to you, but it is visible to everyone y it must be no smaller than 2 inches in diameter. You also specify a trigger that creatures must meet to activate the rune. For the duration of the spell, creatures who meet the criteria of the trigger can touch the rune to hear the recorded message in their head as though you were speaking to them telepathically. You know when someone is listening to the message, but you do not know who is listening to it. You can Dismiss the spell.

Meteor Swarm.name: Tromba de meteoritos
Meteor Swarm.description:
Llamas a cuatro meteoritos que detonan en una explosión flamígera. Cada uno inflige 6d10 daño contundente a cualquier criatura en una explosión de 10 pies (3 m) del centro de su área de efecto antes de explotar, infligiendo 14d6 daño por fuego a cualquier criatura en su explosión de 40 pies (12 m). Las explosiones centrales de 10 pies (3 m) de los meteoritos no se pueden solapar, y una criatura sufre la misma cantidad de daño por fuego sin importar en cuantas explosiones solapadas se ve sumergida. La tirada de salvación se aplica tanto al daño contundente como al daño por fuego.

Potenciado (+1) El daño contundente se incrementa en 1d10 y el daño por fuego en 2d6.

Mimic Undead.name: Mimic Undead
Mimic Undead.description:
You take death y wrap it about you like a cloak-your colors wash out y your skin grows cold to the touch. Your heartbeat, breathing, y similar life functions become very difficult to detect. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC, y on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures must succeed at a counteract check against mimic undead to detect you. obtienes +4 status bonus to Impersonate an undead but physically intact version of yourself y can add your Nivel as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. You don't gain these benefits to Impersonate any other sort of undead. Mindless undead usually don't have a reason to even attempt the Perception check to notice your Impersonation unless you interact with them in some way.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.xPVOvWNJORvm8EwP]{Efecto de conjuro: Mimic Undead}

Mind Blank.name: Mente en blanco
Mind Blank.description:
Poderosas custodias esconden a una criatura de la magia de adivinación. El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +4 por estatus a las salvaciones contra los efectos mentales. Mente en blanco intenta contrarrestar cualquier efecto de detección, revelación y escudriñamiento como si su nivel de conjuro fuera 1 superior a su nivel real. Con un éxito, el efecto de adivinación funciona normalmente excepto que no detecta nada acerca del objetivo y sus posesiones. Por ejemplo, detectar magia detectaría cualquier otra magia que hubiera en la zona, pero ninguna sobre el objetivo.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.DBaMtFHRPEg1JeLs]{Efecto de conjuro: Mente en blanco}

Mind Games.name: Mind Games
Mind Games.description:
You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them. The target must attempt a Will save. Each time you Sustain this Spell, the target attempts another Will save.

Éxito crítico You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1} y the spell ends.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda Aturdido 1.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 2}.

Mind of Menace.name: Mind of Menace
Mind of Menace.description:
This spell wards against those who attempt to subvert your mind y turns mental magic back on them. When the spell is complete, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hi56uHG1aAb84Zzu]{Fight with Fear} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

@Check[type:will|name:Fight with Fear|traits:enchantment]

Mind Probe.name: Sonda mental
Mind Probe.description:
Proyectas tus pensamientos a través de la mente de una criatura, en busca de información. Accedes a los recuerdos y el conocimiento del objetivo, si éste no es capaz de evitarlo mediante una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo Cada asalto de la duración del conjuro, puedes Mantener el conjuro para hacer una pregunta diferente e intentar descubrir la respuesta. Para cada pregunta, el objetivo puede hacer una prueba de Engaño contra tu CD de conjuro; si el objetivo tiene éxito, no averiguas la respuesta y con un éxito crítico, el objetivo de da una respuesta falsa que tú crees que es verdadera. Una vez le has formulado al objetivo una pregunta determinada, hacerla de nuevo, incluso con un lanzamiento diferente de sonda mental, arroja el mismo resultado.

Fallo crítico Igual que fallo, y el objetivo sufre un penalizador -4 por circunstancia a las pruebas de Engaño contra tus preguntas.

Mind Reading.name: Leer la mente
Mind Reading.description:
Con un leve toque mental, intentas leer la mente del objetivo, que debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. A continuación, el objetivo queda temporalmente inmune a tu lectura mental durante 1 hora.

Éxito crítico El objetivo percibe vagos pensamientos superficiales de tu parte cuando Lanzas el conjuro.

Éxito Averiguas si el modificador por Inteligencia del objetivo es superior, igual o inferior al tuyo.

Fallo Percibes vagos pensamientos superficiales del objetivo cuando Lanzas el conjuro y averiguas si su modificador por Inteligencia es superior, igual o inferior al tuyo.

Fallo crítico Igual que fallo, y mientras dura el conjuro puedes Mantenerlo para detectar de nuevo los pensamientos superficiales del objetivo. El objetivo no tiene derecho a ninguna salvación adicional.

Mind Swap.name: Mind Swap
Mind Swap.description:
This ritual allows two subjects to exchange minds, fully inhabiting one another's bodies. The two targets can be chosen from you, the secondary caster, or unrelated third parties present throughout the ritual. Normally, both targets must be of the same ancestry for the minds to be fully compatible, but at the GM's discretion, for a much higher Coste, the targets can be from different ancestries; this requires much more adjudication of ancestry feats y abilities. When both targets are of the same ancestry, muscle memory y the influence of their soul allow them to carry over all their mechanical abilities into each new body, except they use the other body's heritage (y lineage, if any). The GM might rule that similar physiological changes can't be overridden with a mind swap.

If a body dies, the mind y spirit controlling it dies instantly. When the spell ends, the minds y souls snap back to their original bodies. At this time, if the original body is dead, the mind y soul attempting to return to that body die as well.

Éxito crítico Each target's mind y spirit possess the other's body y can control it normally. The mind swap is unusually smooth, y the targets gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate each other. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.4FD4vJqVpuuJjk9Q]{Efecto de conjuro: Mind Swap (Critical Success)}

Éxito Each target's mind y spirit possess the other's body y can control it normally.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico The ritual is scrambled, sending a welter of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido} memories into the target's minds. You y the secondary casters are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} for the next week.

Potenciado(9º) You can cast the ritual without a duration, leaving no magic to counteract. The effects are reversible only by another mind swap ritual or powerful magic like wish. This increases the Coste of the ritual to 10,000 po y is an evil act unless both targets are willing.

Mindscape Door.name: Mindscape Door
Mindscape Door.description:
You project the targets into an immersive mindscape or cause them to exit one. You must be aware the mindscape exists, though you don't need to know specifics. The casters must be in physical contact with one another in a circle for the duration of the casting y all targets must be selected from these casters. Your bodies typically remain behind in stasis when you enter a mindscape, though some mindscapes pull you entirely into them upon entrance. If you enter a mindscape, you can leave only by using another mindscape door ritual, finding an exit within the nature of the mindscape, or when the mindscape ceases to exist. When exiting a mindscape, you typically return to your bodies or to the location where you entered the mindscape. If the mindscape's creator wants to prevent anyone from entering or exiting, the DC of the primary check is the creator's Will DC if that would be higher than the ritual's normal DC.

Éxito crítico You transport the creatures as you intended y can leave a portal that lasts con una duración ilimitada. It typically looks like an ordinary door or passage appropriate to the mindscape. Any target of the spell can enter or exit through this portal as they would an ordinary door. If you wish, you can make the door passable by anyone.

Éxito You transport the creatures as you intended.

Fallo You fail to enter or exit the mindscape.

Fallo crítico Something goes horribly wrong. The GM decides whether mental feedback deals [[/r 9d6[mental]]] damage to all ritual casters (@Check[type:will|dc:26|basic:true]) or 1d4 casters are unwillingly pulled into the mindscape (or ejected from it).

Potenciado (8º) The ritual targets up to 100 willing creatures, the critical failure damage increases to 20d6, y the critical failure save DC increases to 40.

Miracle.name: Milagro
Miracle.description:
Pides ayuda directamente a tu fuente divina. Tu fuente divina siempre rehúsa una petición no alineada con su naturaleza y te podría conceder una diferente (potencialmente más poderosa o que encajara mejor con su naturaleza) que la que pediste. Un lanzamiento de milagro puede hacer cualquiera de las siguientes cosas.

  • Duplicar cualquier conjuro divino de 9º nivel o inferior.
  • Duplicar cualquier conjuro no divino de 7º nivel o inferior.
  • Crear cualquier efecto cuyo nivel de poder está en línea con los efectos de más arriba.
  • Invertir ciertos efectos que tienen que ver con el conjuro @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Deseo}.

El DJ puede permitirte que intentes usar milagro para crear efectos mayores que estos, pero hacerlo puede ser peligroso, o el conjuro puede tener tan sólo un efecto parcial.

Mirecloak.name: Mirecloak
Mirecloak.description:
You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC y a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while El objetivo queda in dim light or darkness.

If a creature deals damage in melee to or touches a cloaked creature, the cloak wraps around the attacker, temporarily connecting the psyches of the cloaked creature y the attacker y violently prying a ryom piece of interesting information from the attacker's mind. The attacker takes 2d8 mental damage y must attempt a Will save.

Afterward, the spell ends for the cloaked creature, y the attacker is temporarily immune to mirecloak for 24 horas.

Éxito crítico El atacante no resulta afectado.

Éxito The attacker takes half damage.

Fallo The attacker takes full damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}. In addition, the cloaked creature gleans a piece of information from the attacker's mind. The details y extent of this information are at the GM's discretion.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the attacker takes double damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.mzDgsuuo5wCgqyxR]{Efecto de conjuro: Mirecloak}

Mirror Image.name: Imagen múltiple
Mirror Image.description:
Tres imágenes ilusorias de ti giran alrededor de tu espacio, causando potencialmente que quienes te atacan impacten en su lugar a una de las imágenes. Cualquier ataque que te pueda impactar tendrá una probabilidad aleatoria de impactar en una de tus imágenes en lugar de en ti. Si quedan las tres imágenes hay una probabilidad de 1 en 4 de que te acierten (1 en 1d4). Si quedan dos imágenes, hay una probabilidad de 1 en 3 de que te acierten (1-2 en 1d6). Con sólo una imagen, la probabilidad es de 1 en 2 (1-3 en 1d6).

Una vez una imagen resulta impactada, queda destruida. Si una tirada de ataque falla en impactar a tu CA, pero no falla críticamente, destruye una imagen, pero no tiene efecto adicional alguno (incluso si el ataque habría tenido normalmente efecto con un fallo). Si una tirada de ataque es un éxito crítico e impactaría a una de las imágenes, una de ellas queda destruida y la tirada de ataque se convierte en un éxito contra ti. Una vez todas las imágenes han sido destruidas, el conjuro se acaba.

Mirror Malefactors.name: Mirror Malefactors
Mirror Malefactors.description:
You completely surround a Large or smaller creature in a shimmering ring of illusory mirrors that follows it as it moves, even when the creature moves outside the range of the spell. These mirrors reflect the target, though if the target has no reflection, like a vampire, it's no afectado by mirror malefactors. As long as El objetivo queda surrounded by mirrors, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}, y it can't reduce its Asustado value.

When you Cast the Spell, the reflections leap from the mirrors y attack the target, dealing 7d8 mental damage with a basic Will save. On subsequent turns, this effect repeats the first time you Sustain the spell that turn. If the target succeeds at any Will save it attempts against mirror malefactors, the illusory mirrors shatter y the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) The damage for both the initial effect y on subsequent turns se incrementa en 1d8.

Mirror's Misfortune.name: Mirror's Misfortune
Mirror's Misfortune.description:
You split into your real self y a mirrored version of yourself that curses would-be attackers with misfortune on their next attacks. When you cast this spell, you seem to split in two. As you do, you can Step to any adjacent square. In either your initial square, or another square adjacent to your initial square, an exact illusory duplicate of you appears. You decide a simple course of action for the duplicate to follow, such as to walk to a specific point or wave its hys in the air, but more complex routines are beyond its abilities. A creature can distinguish between you y the duplicate only if it spends an action to Seek y succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC.

If a creature takes a hostile action against the duplicate, the illusion shatters into mirrorlike shards, inflicting bad luck on the attacker's next few attacks as misfortune's toll for shattering the mirror. The attacker must attempt a Will save with the following effects; this is a curse y misfortune effect. When the duplicate shatters, the spell ends.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo Within the next hora, the creature must roll its next two attack rolls twice y take the lower result.

Fallo crítico Within the next hora, the creature must roll its next four attack rolls twice y take the lower result.

Modify Memory.name: Modificar recuerdo
Modify Memory.description:
Alteras los recuerdos del objetivo, o bien borrando, potenciando su claridad, alterando o añadiendo un recuerdo falso. El objetivo puede hacer una salvación de Voluntad para resistirse al conjuro.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado y y se da cuenta de que has intentado alterar sus recuerdos.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado, pero cree que es un conjuro inofensivo en lugar de modificar recuerdo, si no lo identifica.

Fallo Durante los primeros 5 minutos de la duración del conjuro, puedes Mantenerlo para modificar un recuerdo una vez por asalto. Cuando lo haces, te imaginas hasta 6 segundos de recuerdo a modificar, hasta un máximo de 5 minutos continuos de recuerdos.

Cualquier recuerdo alterado permanece así mientras el conjuro está activo. Si el objetivo sale del alcance antes de que se acaben los 5 minutos, ya no puedes alterar ningún recuerdo más.

Potenciado (6º) Puedes lanzar el conjuro sobre un objetivo voluntario para eliminar todo recuerdo de un tema en particular, detallado en 50 palabras o menos. El efecto es permanente, y parchea dichas omisiones con una neblina indistinta.

Moment of Renewal.name: Momento de renovación
Moment of Renewal.description: Los objetivos experimentan un día completo de recuperación en un instante. Cualquier efecto negativo que hubiera desaparecido al cabo de 24 horas se acaba, aunque ello no acorta la duración que afecta a los objetivos, que recuperan Puntos de Golpe y se recuperan de estados como si se hubieran tomado 24 horas de descanso, pero no pueden llevar a cabo de nuevo sus preparativos diarios ni obtener ningún otro beneficio del descanso aparte de la curación. A continuación, los objetivos quedan temporalmente inmunes durante 1 día

Momentary Recovery.name: Momentary Recovery
Momentary Recovery.description: You instantly teleport yourself y any items you're wearing or holding from your current space to a clear space within range that you can see. If this teleportation would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost. After you vanish but before you arrive, you can take up to 2 actions (or the number of actions you spent to cast momentary recovery, if it was fewer than 2 actions). You can't target any other creatures or objects with anything during these actions y any effect with a duration that you create during these actions ends immediately when you arrive. After you arrive, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Moonbeam.name: Rayo lunar
Moonbeam.description:
Haces brillar un rayo de luz de luna. Haz una tirada de ataque de conjuro. El rayo de luz inflige 1d6 daño por fuego. El rayo lunar inflige daño por plata a efectos de las debilidades, resistencias y cosas similares.

Éxito crítico El rayo inflige doble daño y el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbrado} durante 1 minuto. durante 1 minuto.

Éxito El rayo inflige el daño completo y el objetivo queda deslumbrado durante 1 asalto.

Potenciado (+1) El daño del rayo se incrementa en 1d6.

Moonburst.name: Moonburst
Moonburst.description:
A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures y objects in the area, más [[/r 8d10[positive]]] damage to undead creatures.

Moonburst's cold damage is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, y the like. Each creature y object in the area must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico The creature or object is no afectado.

Éxito The creature or object takes half damage.

Fallo The creature or object takes full damage.

Fallo crítico The creature or object takes full damage. If it's a creature, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} con una duración ilimitada. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, moonburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect.

Potenciado (+1) The cold damage se incrementa en 1d10, y the positive damage against undead se incrementa en [[/r 1d10[positive]]]{1d10 positive damage}.

Moonlight Bridge.name: Moonlight Bridge
Moonlight Bridge.description:
You summon a bridge of radiant, shimmering moonlight.

The 10-foot-wide span must start at the ground on a point within range, y it extends as a horizontal plane, either in a straight line or at any angle up to 45 degrees upward or downward, for up to 120 pies (6 m).

This bridge has AC 10, Hardness 30, y 60 Hit Points, y it's immune to critical hits y precision damage. You y your allies can cross the bridge normally, but other creatures simply pass through it if they try to do so. The bridge blocks physical, ethereal, y incorporeal attacks from crossing, whether from above or below.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Potenciado (+1) The length of the bridge se incrementa en 20 pies (6 m), y its Hit Points increase by 20.

Moonlight Ray.name: Moonlight Ray
Moonlight Ray.description:
You unleash a holy beam of freezing moonlight. Make a ranged spell attack. The ray deals 5d6 cold damage; if El objetivo queda a fiend or undead, you deal an extra [[/r 5d6[good]]] damage.

Moonlight ray's cold damage is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, y the like.

Éxito crítico The target takes double cold damage, as well as double good damage if a fiend or undead.

Éxito The target takes full damage.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature afectado by magical darkness, moonlight ray attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself y the spell's target.

Potenciado (+1) The cold damage se incrementa en 2d6, y the good damage against fiends y undead se incrementa en [[/r 2d6[good]]]{2d6 good damage}.

Morass of Ages.name: Morass of Ages
Morass of Ages.description:
You surround yourself in temporal eddies that draw out time for those around you, making every step feel like an eternity endured. A creature in the emanation, or that later enters the emanation, must attempt a Fortaleza save. The creature makes this save only once y uses the same effect for the duration of the spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose to increase the emanation's radius by 5 pies, to a maximum of 60 pies (18 m).

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito Squares in the emanation are difficult terrain for the creature.

Fallo Squares in the emanation are difficult terrain for the creature, y La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} when it starts its turn in the emanation.

Fallo crítico As failure, más the creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}. The creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar} against your spell DC to remove the restrained condition.

Mosquito Blight.name: Mosquito Blight
Mosquito Blight.description:
You infest the area with tenacious, biting insects that disease y drain life from creatures in the area. Arthropods (insects, spiders, y similar invertebrates) are no afectado y instead gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, y Perception checks while within the area. All other creatures are harassed by insects y exposed to the disease witch's hunger when they enter the area y once per día thereafter that they remain in the area. As part of casting this ritual, you create a Tiny ritual insect hive (Hardness 5, 10 HP) that must remain in the ritual's area. If the hive is removed or destroyed, the ritual's effect ends 1 hora later.

Witch's Hunger (disease)

Saving Throw Fortaleza

Onset [[/r 1d6 #horas]]{1d6 horas}

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} (1 día)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} (1 día)

Etapa 3 enfeebled 2 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} (1 día)

Etapa 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente}

Etapa 5 death

Éxito crítico As success, y the disease is especially deadly, with Stage 3 instead causing unconsciousness y Stage 4 instead causing death.

Éxito You create the ritual hive y cast the ritual.

Fallo You fail to cast the ritual.

Fallo crítico You fail to cast the ritual y instead cause ravenous insects to torment you, immediately exposing you to the witch's hunger disease.

Moth's Supper.name: Moth's Supper
Moth's Supper.description:
You sigh, y your breath transforms into delicate, black‑winged butterflies y huge death's-head hawkmoths. They flutter about you briefly, y then range forth in search of sustenance- fresh-spilled blood, by preference, but rotting corpses, flowering plants, or even left-behind food will do in a pinch. They then return, perching on your hair or shoulders y whispering their secrets into your ears. This has three effects.

  • You heal 2d4 Hit Points every 10 minutos.
  • The first time during the duration when someone successfully Treats your Wounds, you regain an additional 4d4 Hit Points.
  • obtienesn imprecise sense out to 30 feet that senses only freshly spilled blood y rotten flesh.

Potenciado (+1) The amount of Hit Points healed every 10 minutos se incrementa en 1d4 y the amount of Hit Points regained from the first @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} se incrementa en [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}.

Mother's Blessing.name: Mother's Blessing
Mother's Blessing.description:
You attempt to purify y stabilize the life inside of Ulgrem-Axaan's last remaining clutch of eggs. With its blessing, you wash the eggs clean from the filth of undeath y bury them in warm sy by the banks of a river in Garund.

Éxito crítico The ritual is successful y the eggs hatch, giving life to an ancient species brought to the brink of extinction by the destruction of their home.

Éxito As critical success, but only half of the eggs hatch (rounded up). You can try again with the remaining eggs.

Fallo No effect, y you must wait a week to try again.

Fallo crítico 90% of the eggs shatter (rounded up). You must wait a month to try again.

Movanic Glimmer.name: Movanic Glimmer
Movanic Glimmer.description:
You give the target animal a glimmer of awareness, not truly awakening it but allowing it to better understy its surroundings. The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks y Will saves, y any Nature checks to Commy the target Animal gain a +1 status bonus from its increased understying. Additionally, if the target animal has the minion trait, it can take one action each turn even if its master doesn't use an action to Commy it, which it can use to perform any basic action it knows. This doesn't prevent a target that was summoned from disappearing if its summoner doesn't Sustain the Spell, but does allow the target to perform one action before disappearing.

Potenciado (8º) You can target up to 5 animals.

Mud Pit.name: Mud Pit
Mud Pit.description: Thick, clinging mud covers the ground, 1 foot deep. The mud is difficult terrain.

Murderous Vine.name: Murderous Vine
Murderous Vine.description:
You summon a slithering, thorny vine that attempts to constrict y crush a foe against a wall or other surface. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortaleza DC. On a success, La criatura queda grabbed y takes 3d6 contundente damage y 2d8 perforante damage. At the end of that creature's turn, if it's still grabbed by the vine, it takes [[/r 2d6[contundente]]] damage.

The vine's Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack the vine in an attempt to break its grip. The vine's AC is equal to your spell DC, y the vine is destroyed if it takes 20 or more damage. Destroying or escaping from the vines ends the spell. You can Dismiss the spell.

Potenciado(+2) The initial contundente damage se incrementa en 1d6, the initial perforante damage se incrementa en 1d8, y the damage a creature takes for ending its turn grabbed by the vine se incrementa en [[/r 1d6[contundente]]].

Mystic Beacon.name: Faro místico
Mystic Beacon.description: El siguiente conjuro de daño o de curación que lanza el objetivo antes del inicio de tu siguiente turno inflige daño o restablece Puntos de Golpe como si estuviera potenciado 1 nivel superior a su nivel actual. Por lo demás, el conjuro funciona como a su nivel real. Una vez el objetivo lanza el conjuro, faro místico se acaba.

Mystic Carriage.name: Mystic Carriage
Mystic Carriage.description:
This ritual allows you y the other casters to conjure a magical carriage that transports you to a destination of your choice. To summon the mystic carriage, you must be within 250 miles of your destination y spend 1 hora burning incense y feathers while chanting the name of the location you wish the carriage to take you to. When it arrives, the carriage is a Large vehicle that can fit 4 Medium or smaller passengers, as well as 100 Bulk. It has a Speed of 60 pies (18 m), AC of 14, Fortaleza saving throw modifier of +8, Hardness 5, 100 Hit Points (BT 50), object immunities, y immunities to critical hits y precision damage.

Once loaded y boarded, the mystic carriage sets out at a Speed of 60 pies (18 m), heading unerringly towards its destination using whatever roads y trails are available. If it's attacked, it continues going as long as nothing blocks its passage. If something blocks its way, living or otherwise, it will stop until the way is cleared, waiting to continue until all of its passengers are aboard once more.

Éxito crítico You create a mystic carriage that lasts for 2 weeks, instead of 1 week. It can take you to up to two destinations, the first of which must be within 250 miles y the second of which must be within 250 miles of the first destination.

Éxito You create a mystic carriage as described above.

Fallo You don't create a mystic carriage.

Fallo crítico You don't create a mystic carriage, y you're attacked by a herd of four riding horses.

Potenciado (+1) The carriage's AC, Fortaleza save, y Hardness increase by 2, its Hit Points increase by 20, y its Broken Threshold se incrementa en 10.

Nature Incarnate.name: Naturaleza encarnada
Nature Incarnate.description:
El poder primigenio del mundo fluye a través de ti. Te transformas en una encarnación de la Naturaleza, o bien un hombre verde o bien un kaiju. Tu forma de batalla es Mediana para un hombre verde o Gargantuesca (un espacio de 30 pies x 30 pies [9 m x 9 m]) para un kaiju. Debes tener suficiente espacio para expandirte a dicho tamaño o el conjuro se pierde. Mientras estás en esta forma, obtienes el rasgo planta (para un hombre verde) o el rasgo bestia (para un kaiju). Puedes Disipar el conjuro.

Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y aptitudes, sin importar qué forma de batalla eliges:

  • CA = 25 + tu nivel. Ignora el penalizador a las pruebas de armadura y la reducción de la Velocidad.
  • 30 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
  • Visión en la oscuridad.
  • Uno o más ataques específicos de la forma de batalla elegida, que son los únicos ataques que puedes utilizar. Estás entrenado en ellos. Tu modificador al ataque es +34 y utilizas el daño indicado. Dichos ataques están basados en la Fuerza (por ejemplo, a efectos del estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}). Si tu modificador por ataque sin armas es mayor, puedes utilizarlo en lugar de este.
  • Modificador al Atletismo +36, si tu propio modificador no es mejor.

También obtienes aptitudes específicas basadas en el tipo de encarnación elegida:

  • Hombre verde
    • Velocidad 40 pies (12 m), trepar 40 pies (12 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 lianas (alcance 30 pies (9 m), versátil P), Daño 6d8+12 contundente;
    • A distancia 1 espinas (alcance 100 pies [30 m]), Daño 6d6+6 perforante;
    • Caricia verde (aura, primigenia, transmutación) 60 pies (18 m). Los enemigos que no son plantas deben tener éxito en una salvación de Fortaleza contra tu CD de conjuros o sufrir @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} durante 1 asalto (Torpe 2 con un fallo crítico)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.lywUJljQy2SxRZQt]{Efecto de conjuro: Naturaleza encarnada (Hombre verde)}

  • Kaiju Velocidad 50 pies (15 m); resistencia 5 al daño físico;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 mandíbulas (alcance 30 pies (9 m)), Daño 6d10+10 perforante;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 zarpas (ágil, alcance 30 pies (9 m)), Daño 6d8+8 cortante;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 pata (ágil, alcance 15 pies [4,5 m]), Daño 6d6+10 contundente;
    • Imparable Eres unmune a ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} e ignoras el terreno difícil y el terreno difícil mayor;
    • Pisotear 3 Te mueves hasta el doble de tu Velocidad y atraviesas los espacios de las criaturas Enormes o menores, pisoteando a cada criatura en cuyo espacio entras. Una criatura pisoteada sufre daño debido a la pata, teniendo derecho a con una salvación básica de Reflejos contra tu CD de conjuros..

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.EUxTav62IXTz5CxW]{Efecto de conjuro: Naturaleza encarnada (Kaiju)}

Nature's Bounty.name: Botín de la naturaleza
Nature's Bounty.description:
Una fruta o verdura cruda del tamaño de una mano aparece en tu mano abierta. Tú eliges el tipo de comida específico. Una criatura puede consumir la comida mediante una acción de Interactuar para recuperar 3d10+12 Puntos de Golpe y quedar nutrida como si hubiera consumido una comida. Si no se consume, la comida se pudre y se convierte en polvo al cabo de 1 minuto.

Potenciado (+1) Los Puntos de Golpe restablecidos se incrementan en 6.

Nature's Reprisal.name: Nature's Reprisal
Nature's Reprisal.description:
The plant life within the area begins to writhe y lash out against your enemies as you call upon nature to impede your foes. To your enemies, the area becomes difficult terrain, y areas that were naturally difficult terrain due to plants become greater difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain, dealing [[/r 6 #veneno]]{6 veneno damage} to an enemy each time it enters an afectado square.

Potenciado (+1) The veneno damage of the hazardous terrain se incrementa en [[/r 1 #veneno]].

Necromancer's Generosity.name: Necromancer's Generosity
Necromancer's Generosity.description:
You channel negative energy through your magical connection to your undead minion to strengthen the creature. The target regains 1d8+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell, y it gains a +2 status bonus to saves against positive effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.cwetyC5o4dRyFWJZ]{Efecto de conjuro: Necromancer's Generosity}

Potenciado (+1) The amount of healing se incrementa en 1d8+4.

Necrotic Radiation.name: Necrotic Radiation
Necrotic Radiation.description:
You imbue the touched object or space with slow-acting necrotic radiation. If you cast the spell on an object, any creature ending its turn holding or carrying the object takes 2d6 negative damage. If you cast the spell on an area, any creature ending its turn in the area takes 2d6 negative damage. You can attempt to use this spell on an attended object by touching the object. If you do, the creature attempts a Reflejos save to reduce the effect.

Éxito crítico The object is no afectado.

Éxito The creature pulls the object away quickly. The spell only lasts 1 minute.

Fallo The creature manages to slightly protect the object. The spell lasts 10 minutos.

Fallo crítico The spell lasts the full 24 horas.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the radiation's negative damage by 1d6

Necrotize.name: Necrotize
Necrotize.description:
You necrotize part of a creature's body, harming it y debilitating it as its body putrefies, mimicking the natural process of decay. The target takes 12d6 negative damage y one of the following debilitations; roll [[/r 1d4]] to ryomly determine which. The effects depend on its Fortaleza save.

  1. Bones The target's bones necrotize y become spongy y weak, giving it weakness 3 to contundente damage.
  2. Joints The target's joints necrotize, making its movements ungainly y clumsy. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1}.
  3. Legs The target's legs necrotize, as well as any other limbs associated with forms of movement, making it harder for the creature to move. The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ndj0TpLxyzbyzcm4]{Efecto de conjuro: Necrotize (Legs)}
  4. Muscles The target's muscles necrotize, rotting away. El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1}.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage y the debilitation lasts hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Fallo The target takes full damage y the debilitation lasts durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño, y you can pick a second debilitation to apply, in addition to the one you rolled ryomly. Both debilitations last durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Needle of Vengeance.name: Needle of Vengeance
Needle of Vengeance.description:
A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a specifically forbidden creature. Name yourself or one of your allies. The target takes [[/r 2[mental]]] damage any time it uses a hostile action against the named creature.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by [[/r 2[mental]]]{2 mental}.

Negate Aroma.name: Negar aroma
Negate Aroma.description:
El objetivo pierde su olor corporal, evitando que las criaturas se den cuenta pasivamente de su presencia sólo mediante el olfato, incluso si tienen olfato preciso o impreciso. Una criatura que hace una prueba de Percepción para Buscar con el olfato y otros sentidos puede notar la falta de olor natural. Si el objetivo tiene una aptitud que deriva de su olfato, por ejemplo hedor abrumador, dicha aptitud es negada.

Potenciado (5º) El alcance se incrementa a 30 pies (9 m) y puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Nettleskin.name: Nettleskin
Nettleskin.description:
Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through y don't damage any clothing or armor you wear.

Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee or unarmed attack take 1d4 perforante damage as the nettles jab them y break off. Each time a creature takes damage in this way, nettleskin's duration decreases by 1 round.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

Neutralize Poison.name: Neutralizar veneno
Neutralize Poison.description: Viertes curación mágica sobre el objetivo en un intento de curar un veneno que le aflige. Haz una prueba de contrarrestar contra el veneno.

Nightmare.name: Pesadilla
Nightmare.description:
Envías a tu objetivo unas inquietantes pesadillas. La siguiente vez en que el objetivo se queda dormido, debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. Si conoces al objetivo sólo de nombre y nunca te has encontrado con él, obtiene un bonificador +4 por circunstancia a la salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no sufre efecto adverso alguno y queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 semana.

ÉxitoEl objetivo experimenta las pesadillas, pero no sufre otros efectos adversos que unos recuerdos poco placenteros.

FalloEl objetivo experimenta las pesadillas y se despierta @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigado}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo experimenta las pesadillas, se despierta fatigado y queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} hasta que deja de estar fatigada.

Nondetection.name: Indetectabilidad
Nondetection.description: Eriges unas custodias protectoras que hacen que el objetivo sea difícil de detectar mediante la magia. Indetectabilidad intenta contrarrestar todas las adivinaciones de detección, revelación y escudriñamiento llevadas a cabo contra el objetivo o su equipo a lo largo de la duración del conjuro, contando los trucos como conjuros de 1er nivel a estos efectos. Contrarrestar con éxito una adivinación que tiene como objetivo un área o unos objetivos múltiples niega los efectos sólo para el objetivo de indetectabilidad.

Noxious Vapors.name: Noxious Vapors
Noxious Vapors.description:
You emit a cloud of toxic smoke that temporarily obscures you from sight. Each creature except you in the area when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell} takes [[/r 1d6[veneno]]] damage (basic Fortaleza save). A creature that critically fails the saving throw also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}. All creatures in the area become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}, y all creatures outside the smoke become Concealed to creatures within it. This smoke can be dispersed by a strong wind.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en [[/r 1d6[veneno]]].

Nudge Fate.name: Nudge Fate
Nudge Fate.description:
You read slightly into the future y give fate a tiny push to achieve the result you desire.

Once during the duration, when the target fails an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw y a +1 status bonus would turn a critical failure into a failure, or failure into a success, you grant the target a +1 status bonus to the check retroactively, changing the outcome appropriately. The spell then ends, y El objetivo queda temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

If you cast nudge fate while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends.

Nudge the Odds.name: Nudge the Odds
Nudge the Odds.description:
You bestow yourself supernaturally good luck at cards, dice, y other games of chance. obtienes +1 status bonus to Games Lore checks to gamble, y if you roll a critical failure on such a check, you get a failure instead; however, the spell is too short-lived to use for Earn Income checks from gambling.

When you're under the effect of nudge the odds, one facial feature, such as a lock of hair or the iris of an eye, transforms to a distinctive golden color; the GM chooses which feature when you cast the spell. This change resists all magical efforts to conceal it, though it can be hidden or covered by mundane means. A creature noticing the feature can identify the spell using Recall Knowledge. Because it prevents losing big, gamblers consider nudge the odds a repugnant form of cheating. If you're caught using the spell, you are likely to suffer serious consequences, depending on the nature of the gamblers you cheated.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.lTL5VwNrZ5xiitGV]{Efecto de conjuro: Nudge the Odds}

Potenciado (5º) The status bonus increases to +2, y the duration increases to last until the next time you make your daily preparations. If you continue spending your spell slot to keep the duration active, this allows you to apply the effect to a downtime check to Earn Income.

Nullify.name: Nullify
Nullify.description:
Desencadenante A foe within range casts a 9º-Nivel o menor spell.

You instantly destroy the incoming spell, though at the Coste of sending magical feedback through your body. You automatically counteract the spell, but the feedback brings you unavoidable harm. You lose 1d8 Hit Points per Nivel of the triggering spell.

Nymph's Token.name: Nymph's Token
Nymph's Token.description:
You grant an ally a token of favor. You create a token, such as a lock of your hair or a flower, that persists for the spell's duration; as part of Casting the Spell, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pass the token to an ally within your alcance.

As long as the ally has the token on their person, they gain a +1 status bonus to Performance checks y Will saves.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell as a free action.

Potenciado (4º) As long as the ally has the token on their person, you can cast spells that have a range of touch on them at a range of 30 pies (9 m).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.zjFN1cJEl3AMKiVs]{Efecto de conjuro: Nymph's Token}

Oathkeeper's Insignia.name: Oathkeeper's Insignia
Oathkeeper's Insignia.description:
Desencadenante You make a promise or deal.

A magical indicator assures a creature that you've upheld your end of a bargain. When you Cast the Spell, you create a bracelet, flower, or other such trinket. If, while the spell persists, you complete the terms of the promise or deal you made, the trinket fades away with a pleasant chime; if you violate the terms instead, the trinket breaks with a dissonant crash.

Potenciado (3º) The duration becomes 1 día.

Potenciado (5º) The duration becomes 1 week.

Potenciado(7º) The duration becomes 1 month.

Potenciado(9º) The duration becomes 1 year.

Object Memory.name: Object Memory
Object Memory.description:
By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created y used it.

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher).

If you touch a tool, your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a Crafting check with a blacksmith's hammer) within the spell's duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete.

Potenciado (6º) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.uDOxq24S7IT2EcXv]{Efecto de conjuro: Object Memory (Weapon)}

Object Reading.name: Object Reading
Object Reading.description:
You place a hy on an object to learn a piece of information about an emotional event that occurred involving the object within the past week, determined by the GM. If you cast object reading on the same item multiple times, you can either concentrate on a single event to gain additional pieces of information about that event, or you can gain a piece of information about another emotional event in the applicable time frame.

Potenciado(2º) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last month.

Potenciado (4º) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last year.

Potenciado (6º) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last decade.

Potenciado (8º) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last century.

Potenciado(9º) You can learn about an event that occurred within the entirety of the object's history.

Oblivious Expulsion.name: Oblivious Expulsion
Oblivious Expulsion.description:
Severing ties with a member of a cult courts danger y threatens to undermine the secrecy of the group, whether that secrecy protects its worshippers or enables them to operate in the shadows. Many cults end their association with a wayward member on the edge of a blade, but there are options that preserve both secrecy y the life of the expelled member. An oblivious expulsion removes knowledge of the cult but is time-consuming enough that a cult usually reserves it for only the most well-regarded members who nevertheless need to be removed-or for sleeper agents the cult wishes to place among society y activate later.

It's difficult to cast this ritual unless El objetivo queda willing or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}. If La criatura queda unwilling to accept the ritual, it can attempt a Will save to negate the effect. The effects of the ritual depend on the results of your Occultism check.

Éxito crítico The ritual removes all memories of the cult's activity, practices, y secrets from the target's memory. The target remembers only what an average citizen of the larger society would know, which is typically nothing or a few rumors with very little detail. The spell is hard to detect: a detect magic spell or similar effect must be a higher Nivel than oblivious expulsion to detect it. You can Dismiss the spell. While casting the spell, you can choose to give the secondary casters the ability to Dismiss it. You can also choose to set a key phrase or event that causes the spell to be Dismissed. When the target witnesses this phrase or event, the spell immediately ends.

Éxito As critical success, except the spell isn't harder to detect with detect magic.

Fallo The ritual fails.

Fallo crítico The ritual fails, y El objetivo queda queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 month.

Obscuring Mist.name: Niebla de oscurecimiento
Obscuring Mist.description: Requieres la presencia de un banco de niebla. Todas las criaturas en el interior de la niebla quedan @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Ocultas}, y todas las criaturas del exterior quedan ocultas a las criaturas del interior. Puedes Disipar la niebla.

Ocular Overload.name: Ocular Overload
Ocular Overload.description:
Just as a creature is about to attack you, you assault them with jarring illusions, completely surrounding their eyes with blinding flashes of motion y color. When the spell is complete, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ZJcc7KGOEsYvN6SE]{Overload Vision} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

@Check[type:Fortaleza|name:Overload Vision|traits:illusion]

Ode to Ouroboros.name: Ode to Ouroboros
Ode to Ouroboros.description:
Desencadenante A creature's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Moribundo} condition would alcance the value at which they would die.

Your ode temporarily staves off death. The target's dying condition remains 1 below the value at which it dies. This doesn't help prevent death from effects that kill the target without increasing its dying condition, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} y death effects.

Omnidirectional Scan.name: Omnidirectional Scan
Omnidirectional Scan.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]

You quickly view your surroundings from a variety of angles, your senses constructing an overall mental picture. You can choose to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} the entire emanation of the spell.

Regardless of whether you Seek, target one ally y one enemy in the area; if a target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} from you, you automatically succeed at the flat check to target it with this spell. You prepare to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} the target ally on an attack roll against the target enemy. If you take this Aid reaction, you use your spell attack modifier y proficiency rank on your check to Aid. If you critically fail the roll to Aid, you get a failure instead.

Amp Your scans are so minute that you can project your foe's likely strengths y weaknesses. You learn which of the target enemy's saving throws is highest y which is lowest, y you y all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks y damage against the creature.

If you take the Aid reaction you prepared for y succeed at your roll, these bonuses increase to +2 on the attack you're Aiding. On a critical success, they increase to +3, or to +4 Si tienes legendary proficiency in spell attack rolls.

One With the Land.name: One With the Land
One With the Land.description:
You merge with an adjacent natural feature with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions, such as the ground or a large tree. Your merged form is visible within the feature, and creatures can target and attack you normally, though you have cover and can use it to Hide or Take Cover within the feature. You can cast spells while in the feature as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the feature. You can Dismiss the spell. While merged, you gain the following additional benefits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Mp7252yAsSA8lCEA]{Spell Effect: One With the Land}

  • You immediately become aware of the surrounding terrain features, and you gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 200 feet.
  • You can make terrain vengeance Strikes by commanding plants, rocks, and other natural features to attack your foes. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack roll, can target any creature within 60 feet of you, and deal [[/r 5d12]] bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make a terrain vengeance Strike.
  • By spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can increase or decrease the environmental temperature changing it to either one step warmer than normal, one step colder than normal, or the normal temperature.
  • As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate trait, you can create or remove difficult terrain caused by natural terrain in a 20-foot burst within 200 feet. All of your alterations to the land end when the spell ends. Significant physical damage to the natural feature while you are inside it expels you and deals [[/r {10d6}]]{10d6 damage} to you.

Oneiric Mire.name: Oneiric Mire
Oneiric Mire.description:
You shroud an area in illusory dreamstuff, making the ground look y feel like a deep mire or quicksy. Ground in the area is difficult terrain.

Each creature in the area when the spell is cast, or that enters the area, must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it believes it's being pulled down by the earth, taking a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. con un fallo crítico, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}. In addition to the normal actions to Escape, at the end of an afectado creature's turn, it can attempt a Will save, removing the effects on a success. On a critical success at any Will save made against oneiric mire, the creature fully disbelieves the illusion y no longer needs to make Will saves to risk a Speed penalty or being immobilized, though the area is still difficult terrain.

Ooze Form.name: Ooze Form
Ooze Form.description:
You invoke all things that seep y ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry y then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics y abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 7 + your Nivel. Ignore your armor's check penalty y Speed reduction.
  • 20 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, y visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, perforante, y cortante damage.
  • No vision y motion sense 30 pies (9 m). You can sense nearby motion through vibration y air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, y you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.EKdqKCuyWSkpXpyJ]{Black Pudding} Speed 15 pies (4,5 m), climb 15 pies (4,5 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 pseudopod, Daño [[/r (2d6+5)[contundente]]] y [[/r 1d8[acid]]].
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.3zdBGENpmaze1bpq]{Gelatinous Cube} Speed 15 pies (4,5 m);
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 cube face, Daño [[/r (1d6+5)[acid]]];
    • a creature hit by your cube face Strike must succeed at a Fortaleza save against your spell DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizada} durante 1 asalto con un fallo crítico); this save has the incapacitation trait.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.7tfF8ifVvOKNud8t]{Gray Ooze} Speed 15 pies (4,5 m), climb 15 pies (4,5 m), swim 15 feet

    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 pseudopod, Daño [[/r (1d6+5)[contundente]]] y [[/r 1d6[acid]]], y you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.PpkOZVoHkBZUmddx]{Ochre Jelly} Speed 15 pies (4,5 m), climb 10 pies [3 m]; resistance 5 to electricity;
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 pseudopod, Daño [[/r (1d8+5)[contundente]]] y [[/r 1d8[acid]]], y you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Potenciado (4º) Your battle form is Large, y your attacks have 10-foot alcance. You must have enough space to expy into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, perforante, y cortante; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; y Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 pies (12 m).

Potenciado (5º) Your battle form is Huge, y your attacks have 15-foot alcance. You must have enough space to expy into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, perforante, y cortante; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 y double damage dice; y Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 pies (18 m).

Potenciado (8º) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), y your attacks have 20-foot alcance. You must have enough space to expy into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, perforante, y cortante; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 y double damage dice; y Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 pies (18 m).

Ordained Purpose.name: Ordained Purpose
Ordained Purpose.description:
You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse y agony for acting outside of their station y purpose.

Enemies in the area take 4d6 mental damage y must attempt a Will save. A creature that has lost abilities as a result of performing acts anathema to its deity or beliefs (such as a champion who violated their tenets y hasn't atoned) uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw.

At the GM's discretion, a creature currently filling its appointed station y purpose (such as a farmer working in a field or a criminal in the act of committing a crime) uses the outcome one degree of success better than the result of its saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn, y can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Sty} during its next turn.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Organsight.name: Organsight
Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected y arrayed before you. For the duration, obtienes +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a -2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot y discern a vital organ. Si tienes a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal perforante or cortante damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4d6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Uj9VFXoVMH0mTTdt]{Efecto de conjuro: Organsight}

Potenciado (+1) The precision damage se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Outcast's Curse.name: Maldición del paria
Outcast's Curse.description:
Infliges al objetivo una maldición que convierte su presencia en abrasiva y poco atractiva. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.
