Potenciado (+1) Increase the maximum target Nivel by 2 y the base Coste by 10 po.

Purifying Icicle.name: Purifying Icicle
Purifying Icicle.description:
You evoke life essence into the form of water y freeze it, then launch the icicle at a foe. Make a spell attack roll. On a success, the icicle deals 2d6 perforante damage y 1d6 cold damage, y if El objetivo queda undead, the icicle deals an additional 1d4 positive damage. On a critical success, El objetivo sufre doble daño y takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds durante 1 asalto as the icicle lodges inside them before melting away.

Potenciado (+1) The perforante damage y cold damage each increase by 1d6. The positive damage se incrementa en 1d4.

Purifying Veil.name: Purifying Veil
Purifying Veil.description:
Drawing on the purifying powers of water, you call forth a veil of fine water droplets suffused with holy energy. The veil surrounds the target. Everything on each side of the veil is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} from creatures on the opposite side, but the water doesn't impede attacks or movement across the veil. If the target moves through the veil, it takes 4d6 good damage with a basic Will save. If the target leaves the veil, the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) The good damage se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Pushing Gust.name: Ráfaga impelente
Pushing Gust.description:
Propinando un empujón al aire, golpeas al objetivo con una potente racha de viento; debe hacer una salvación de Fortaleza.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo es separado de ti 5 pies (1,5 m) de un empujón.

Fallo El objetivo es separado de ti 10 pies (3 m) de un empujón.

Fallo crítico La criatura es separada de ti 10 pies (3 m) de un empujón y queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Putrefy Food and Drink.name: Putrefy Food and Drink
Putrefy Food and Drink.description:
You cause otherwise edible food to rot and spoil instantly, and water and other liquids to become brackish and undrinkable. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.EGhUorZhB7nV73Ev]{Unholy Water}, and similar food and drink of significance are spoiled by this spell, unless they are associated with a deity of decay or putrefaction, but it has no effect on creatures of any type, potions, or alchemical elixirs. One cubic foot of liquid is roughly 8 gallons.

Potenciado (2nd) You can target an alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a counteract check against it. If you succeed, the elixir spoils and becomes a mundane item.

Potenciado (3er) You can target a potion or alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a counteract check against it. If you succeed, the elixir or potion spoils and becomes a mundane item.

Pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
Pyrotechnics.description:
You turn a fire into either a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke, chosen when you Cast the Spell. The spell targets one fire source, which is immediately extinguished if it is a non-magical fire the size of a campfire or smaller. If the fire source is a creature, the creature takes 1d6 points of cold damage y is not extinguished.

  • Fireworks The targeted fire explodes into a colorful array of flashy, fiery, glowing aerial fireworks in a 20-foot-radius burst. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can cause the area of fireworks to ascend up to 20 pies (6 m), but you cannot move the area laterally. Creatures that start their turn within the area of the fireworks must attempt a Fortaleza save, y are then temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

    Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada

    Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} until the end of its next turn.

    Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} until the end of its next turn.

    Fallo crítico La criatura queda Cegado durante 1 minuto.

  • Smoke Cloud Thick smoke billows out from the fire y coalesces into a cloud that spreads to fill a 20-foot-radius burst centered on the targeted fire. Creatures within the smoke cloud take a -4 circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks, y creatures outside the smoke cloud take a -4 circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks to detect creatures or objects within it. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can cause the smoke cloud to descend up to 20 pies (6 m), but you cannot move the area laterally. Creatures that start their turn within the smoke cloud must attempt a Fortaleza save, y are then temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

    Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

    Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}.

    Fallo crítico La criatura queda Sickened 1 y cannot recover from the sickened condition while in the area of the smoke cloud.

Quench.name: Quench
Quench.description:
You cause the air in the area to become supersaturated with water vapor. Non-magical fires within the area are automatically extinguished. Fire creatures within the area take [[/r 4d8]] damage (basic Fortaleza save). Choose one magical fire, fire spell, or fire item in the area y attempt to counteract it. If you succeed against an item, the item loses its fire properties for 10 minutos (for instance, a +1 Flaming Longsword would become a +1 Longsword). If El objetivo queda an artifact or similarly powerful item, you automatically fail to counteract it.

The first time each round you Sustain this spell, you can move the area of vapor anywhere within range, but the only effect when you do so is to automatically extinguish non-magical fires.

Si tienes the Counterspell reaction, you can use quench to counter any spell with the fire trait instead of needing to have the triggering fire spell prepared or in your repertoire.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage to fire creatures by [[/r 2d8]].

Quick Sort.name: Quick Sort
Quick Sort.description:
You magically sort a group of objects into neat stacks or piles. You can sort the objects in two different ways. The first option is to separate them into different piles depending on an easily observed factor, such as color or shape. Alternatively, you can sort the objects into ordered stacks depending on a clearly indicated notation, such as a page number, title, or date. The objects sort themselves throughout the duration, though it takes less time per object to sort a smaller number of objects, down to a single round for 30 or fewer objects.

Potenciado (3º) The spell can sort up to 400 objects in a minute, or 60 objects in a round.

Potenciado (5º) The spell can sort up to 800 objects in a minute, or 120 objects in a round.

Quicken Time.name: Quicken Time
Quicken Time.description: You speed up the time stream in an area, stretching y pulling it until time flows swift y wild. Any creature that begins its turn in the area is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} y can use the extra action each round to Stride or Strike. Unfortunately, speeding up time is much more difficult than slowing it down, y the effect is uneven y jittery, making accuracy between times painfully difficult; creatures inside the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to those outside it, y vice versa.

Quivering Palm.name: Palma temblorosa
Quivering Palm.description:
Da un Golpe sin armas en cuerpo a cuerpo. Si impactas y el objetivo está vivo, en cualquier momento de la duración puedes invertir una sola acción, que tiene los rasgos auditivo y concentrar, en pronunciar una palabra mortal que podría matarlo instantáneamente. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Fortaleza.

Éxito crítico El objetivo sobrevive, el conjuro se acaba y objetivo queda después temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1} y sufre 40 daño, el conjuro se acaba y el objetivo queda then queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 3} y sufre 80 daño. La duración del conjuro continúa, pero el objetivo queda después temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas contra morir debido a palma temblorosa.

Fallo crítico El objetivo muere.

Si lanzas de nuevo palma temblorosa, los efectos de cualquier lanzamiento anterior se acaban de inmediato.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 10 con un fallo o en 5 con un éxito.

Radiant Beam.name: Radiant Beam
Radiant Beam.description:
You fire a beam of blinding light from your outstretched hys. The beam deals 5d10 good damage. On a failed saving throw, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} durante 1 asalto, or dazzled for 4 rounds con un fallo crítico.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature afectado by magical darkness, radiant beam attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself y the target.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d10.

Radiant Field.name: Radiant Field
Radiant Field.description:
Creas un area of bright light. Creatures with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{Light Blindness} that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} by radiant field y remain in the area must attempt a Fortaleza save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains Cegado durante 1 asalto; this is an incapacitation effect.

This spell also suppresses magical darkness of your radiant field spell's Nivel o menor.

Potenciado (4º) Creatures seen through the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to creatures with light blindness, even those that are outside the area.

Radiant Heart of Devotion.name: Radiant Heart of Devotion
Radiant Heart of Devotion.description:
You speak a fervent prayer for the heavens to assist you y your righteous allies. Your heart begins to glow with a radiance that fills the area with bright light. The spell has the following effects on creatures in the area, based on the creature's alignment on the good-evil axis.

  • Good Creatures Good creatures in the emanation gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls y their Strikes deal an additional 1d6 good damage.
  • Neutral Creatures Neutral creatures that begin their turn in the emanation must succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} durante 1 asalto.
  • Evil Creatures Evil creatures that begin their turn in the emanation must succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} durante 1 asalto.

Potenciado(+2) The additional good damage se incrementa en 1d6.

Raga of Remembrance.name: Raga of Remembrance
Raga of Remembrance.description:
You scribe occult symbols on unblighted Vudran ground, laying the ceramics within them to create a ritual space. To perform the ritual, light incense in the ceramics y sit at the center of the ritual space. You then play the disharmonic instrument, drawing on musical skill, occult harmonics, or religious tradition. This establishes an underlying drone atop which the secondary casters layer their own performances. The song calls to the millions who died defending Vudra from Kothogaz, investing their power in Vanitapati, the legendary psychic.

Éxito crítico A towering, ethereal avatar of Vanitapati manifests around you, surrounded by swirling spirits. The avatar weakens Kothogaz's spirit. While Kothogaz is within 1 mile of you, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2} y is permanente destroyed if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Éxito As critical success, but Kothogaz is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.

Fallo The dead come to your aid, but their presence is unnerving. As success, but Kothogaz isn't Asustado, y the primary y secondary casters take a -1 status penalty to saving throws against emotion effects.

Fallo crítico Rather than the dead, Kothogaz hears the ritual's call y immediately teleports to the primary caster with its Disharmonic Door ability. Primary y secondary casters are afflicted with many-eyed blight.

Raise Dead.name: Revivir a los muertos
Raise Dead.description:
Intentas recuperar el alma de la criatura muerta, lo que requiere que su cuerpo esté presente y relativamente intacto. La criatura tiene que haber muerto hace menos de 3 días. Si Farasma ha decidido que a la criatura le ha llegado su hora (a discreción del DJ), o si ésta no desea volver a la vida, este conjuro falla automáticamente, pero los diamantes no se consumen en el lanzamiento.

Si el conjuro tiene éxito, la criatura vuelve a la vida con 1 Punto de Golpe, sin conjuros preparados ni espacios de conjuro disponibles, sin punto alguno en ninguna reserva o ningún otro recurso diario y todavía sujeta a cualquier debilitación a largo plazo del cuerpo. El tiempo pasado en el Osario deja al objetivo temporalmente debilitado, haciendo que esté @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante una semana; dichos estados no se pueden eliminar o reducir por medio alguno hasta que ha pasado la semana. La criatura también ha cambiado permanentemente por el tiempo transcurrido en la otra vida, como por ejemplo un ligero cambio de personalidad, un mechón blanco con el cabello o una nueva y extraña marca de nacimiento.

Potenciado (7º) El nivel máximo del objetivo se incrementa a 15. El Costee se incrementa al nivel del objetivo (mínimo 1) x 400 po

Potenciado (8º) El nivel máximo del objetivo se incrementa a 17. El Costee se incrementa al nivel del objetivo (mínimo 1) × 800 po.

Potenciado (9º) El nivel máximo del objetivo se incrementa a 19. El Costee se incrementa al nivel del objetivo (mínimo 1) × 1.600 po.

Potenciado (10º) El nivel máximo del objetivo se incrementa a 21. El Costee se incrementa al nivel del objetivo (mínimo 1) × 3.200 po.

Rally Point.name: Rally Point
Rally Point.description:
You mark the area touched as a rally point. During the spell's duration, you can take a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to teleport to the rally point along with items you are wearing or holding. This teleportation fails if the area is occupied, if the rally point is more than 120 feet away, or if you try to bring along any other creature, even if it's in an extradimensional container. Once you teleport to the rally point, the spell's duration ends.

Potenciado(7º) You can target up to four other creatures within 30 pies (9 m), in addition to yourself. Each of you can teleport to the rally point once during the spell's duration, by taking a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The duration no longer ends once you teleport to the rally point, though you still can't teleport to the rally point again.

Ranger's Bramble.name: Ranger's Bramble
Ranger's Bramble.description:
You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle}.

A creature that critically fails the save takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d4.success] in addition to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage.

Potenciado (+1) The bleed damage con un fallo crítico se incrementa en @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success].

Rapid Adaptation.name: Rapid Adaptation
Rapid Adaptation.description:
You flood the target with energy from the terrain around it, compressing centuries of evolution into a single moment. The target gains one of the following natural adaptations based on the surrounding environment.

  • Aquatic The target gains a Velocidad de nado equal to its ly Speed. If it already had a Velocidad de nado, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Velocidad de nado. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.fGK6zJ7mWz9D5QYo]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Base Velocidad de nado)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.itmiGioGNuVvt4QE]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Speed Bonus)}
  • Arctic The target isn't afectado by severe or extreme cold, y when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on ice y snow, it gets a critical success instead. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.iiV80Kexj6vPmzqU]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic)}
  • Desert The target isn't afectado by severe or extreme heat, y when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sy, it gets a critical success instead. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.qo7DoF11Xl9gqmFc]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Desert)}
  • Forest The target gains scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 pies (9 m). @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.jtMo6qS47hPx6EbR]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Forest)}
  • Mountain The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} when Climbing, y when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, it gets a critical success instead. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.sDN9b4bjCGH2nQnG]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain)}
  • Plains The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to its ly Speed. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.AM49w68oKykc2fHI]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Plains)}
  • Underground The target gains Visión en la oscuridad. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.0q2716S34XL1y9Hh]{Efecto de conjuro: Rapid Adaptation (Undergasalto)}

Ravening Maw.name: Ravening Maw
Ravening Maw.description:
You evoke Zevgavizeb's unceasing hunger y inflict it upon your target. El objetivo queda overwhelmed with cannibalistic hunger y can restore its vitality by feasting on the flesh of the fallen. On its turn, the target can use 2 actions (these actions have the manipulate trait) to cannibalize an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Moribundo} or dead creature. If the cannibalized creature is Dying, it dies. If the cannibalized creature is an ally of the target, the target regains 5d8 HP; otherwise, the target regains 5d4 HP. Certain monsters (such as those whose blood is acidic or magical) might inflict additional effects on those who cannibalize them at the GM's discretion. Once cannibalized, a particular creature's body doesn't have enough meat to cannibalize again. During any round that there's a Dying or dead creature within 30 feet of the target, if the target can't or doesn't cannibalize a creature, the target takes 5d4 mental damage.

Potenciado (+1) The amount of HP restored by cannibalizing a creature se incrementa en 1d8 for eating an ally y 1d4 otherwise, y the mental damage se incrementa en 1d4.

Ravenous Darkness.name: Ravenous Darkness
Ravenous Darkness.description: You create a shroud of magical darkness that feeds on those inside it. This globe of pure darkness is identical to that created by a 4º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness} spell. Blunt, gnashing teeth made of shadows gnaw at the creatures within. Make a spell attack roll against the Fortaleza DC of each creature in the area. Any creature that fails takes 4d6 contundente damage as teeth attach to it. While the teeth are attached, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds y can't Step. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the teeth attempt to attach to that creature if they haven't already, y they deal 1d6 contundente damage to any creature they're already attached to. The shadowy teeth become unattached from any creature that leaves the area but can't otherwise be detached from a creature while that creature remains in the area. You can Dismiss the spell.

Ravenous Portal.name: Ravenous Portal
Ravenous Portal.description:
You place a ward upon the door that triggers when a creature attempts to open, unlock, or destroy the door. When that happens, the door transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Br1AtKUHe3nbzjnY]{Mimic} that can't move y is hostile to all creatures. When Casting the Spell, you designate yourself y up to 10 other creatures of your choice; these creatures don't trigger the ward, y the mimic is helpful to them instead of hostile. No effect can move the mimic unless it's also capable of moving the entire door. Once the door transforms into a mimic, it attacks creatures in its alcance for up to 1 minute, y then the spell ends. If the mimic is killed before that time, the spell ends y the door returns to its normal form.

While turned into a mimic, the door can't be opened, unlocked, or bypassed-not even by the designated creatures. It's a creature, not a door, during that time. When the spell ends, the door returns to the state it was in before the ward was triggered.

Ravenous Reanimation.name: Ravenous Reanimation
Ravenous Reanimation.description:
You destroy the gathered treasures with your arma de aliento or other powerful magic, then invoke necromantic energies before you feed upon the charred y melted remains. As you do so, negative energy courses through your flesh, automatically killing you. Each individual ravener's ravenous reanimation requires three to five unique additional components. Whether or not you return as a ravener depends on the success of the ritual.

Éxito crítico You immediately transform into a ravener upon finishing the ritual; your soul ward starts at full Hit Points (equal to 5 × your Nivel).

Éxito You rise as a ravener 24 horas after completing the ritual, as long as your body remains relatively intact. When you rise as a ravener, your soul ward starts at 1 Hit Point.

Fallo You rise as a ravener husk 24 horas after completing the ritual.

Fallo crítico You die.

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: Rayo de debilitamiento
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
Un rayo con el poder de extraer la fuerza de un enemigo relampaguea desde tu mano. Haz un ataque de conjuro a distancia contra el objetivo. Si tienes éxito, la criatura hace una salvación de Fortaleza para determinar el efecto del conjuro. Si has tenido un éxito crítico en tu tirada de ataque, usa el desenlace de un grado de éxito peor que el resultado de la salvación.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1}.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 3}.

Ray of Frost.name: rayo de escarcha
Ray of Frost.description:
Disparas un rayo gélido. Haz una tirada de ataque de conjuros. El rayo inflige tanto daño por frío como 1d4 + tu modificador por característica de lanzamiento de conjuros.

Éxito crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y además un penalizador -10 pies (-3 m) por estatus a sus Velocidades durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Efecto de conjuro: Rayo de escarcha}

Éxito Infliges daño completo..

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

Read Aura.name: Leer aura
Read Aura.description:
Te centras en el objeto objetivo, abriendo tu mente para percibir auras mágicas. Cuando el lanzamiento se completa, sabes si el objeto es mágico o no y, si lo es, averiguas la escuela de magia (págs. 297 a 298).

Si el objeto es ilusorio, sólo lo detectas si el nivel del efecto es menor que el nivel del conjuro de leer el aura.

Potenciado (3º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Potenciado (6º) Puedes designar como objetivo a cualquier número de criaturas.

Read Fate.name: Leer el destino
Read Fate.description:
Intentas averiguar más acerca del destino a corto plazo del objetivo, por lo general en un día para las criaturas más prosaicas, o la siguiente hora o menos para alguien que es probable que tenga múltiples experiencias rápidas, como por ejemplo alguien que se aventure de forma activa.

Averiguas una sola palabra enigmática conectada con el destino de la criatura en ese espacio de tiempo. El destino es notoriamente inescrutable y no necesariamente hay que tomarse la palabra al pie de la letra, por lo que su significado a menudo sólo queda claro en retrospectiva. El DJ hace una prueba plana CD 6 en secreto @Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]. Si el destino de la criatura es demasiado incierto, o con una prueba fallida, el conjuro devuelve el término "no conluyente." De una u otra forma, a continuación el objetivo queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Read Omens.name: Leer augurios
Read Omens.description: Atisbas en el futuro. Elige un objetivo o actividad en particular que planeas acometer en 1 semana o un suceso que esperas que tenga lugar en 1 semana.. Averiguas un fragmento críptico de información o un consejo que podría ayudarte en el acontecimiento elegido, a menudo en forma de una rima o presagio.

Read the Air.name: Read the Air
Read the Air.description:
You take a deep breath as you survey a social situation, showing courtesy to all around you as your intuition swiftly picks up clues about social contexts y unspoken assumptions of behavior. Your body language subconsciously changes to take advantage of this information y use it in your own interactions with those creatures.

As part of Casting this Spell, you Recall Knowledge using Society to gain information about the immediate social situation. You also gain a +1 status bonus on your next Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on those creatures present when you cast this spell, as long as the check occurs during the duration of the spell. You can read the air only once in a given social situation; casting it again has no effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.a3uZckqOY9zQWzZ2]{Efecto de conjuro: Read the Air}

Reaper's Lantern.name: Reaper's Lantern
Reaper's Lantern.description:
You call forth a ghostly lantern that guides the living toward death y the undead toward true death. It sheds bright light in the spell's area, y dim light to twice that area. Though the lantern is insubstantial, you must keep a hy free to hold it or the spell ends (though using the hy for somático spell components doesn't end the spell). Living creatures y undead in the area when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}, or that enter the area later, must attempt Fortaleza saves. Living creatures that fail their Fortaleza saves gain only half the normal benefit from healing effects while within the area. Undead targets that fail their Fortaleza saves become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} while within the area. Once a creature attempts a save against reaper's lantern, it uses the same outcome if it leaves the area y enters it again.

Once per turn, starting on the turn after you cast reaper's lantern, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 pies. When you do so, you force creatures in the area that haven't yet attempted a save against reaper's lantern to attempt one.

Rebounding Barrier.name: Rebounding Barrier
Rebounding Barrier.description:
Desencadenante You are hit by a physical Strike.

You swiftly raise a reflective barrier, reducing physical damage y rebounding it onto your attacker. You gain resistance 10 against one physical damage type the triggering attack deals. Your attacker takes 5 damage of the same type.

Potenciado (+1) La resistencia se incrementa en 2. Damage dealt to your attacker se incrementa en 1.

Rebuke Death.name: Rechazar la muerte
Rebuke Death.description:
Arrebatas criaturas de las fauces de la muerte. Puedes invertir entre 1 y 3 acciones Lanzando este conjuro, y puedes designar como objetivo a tantas criaturas como las acciones invertidas. Cada objetivo recupera 3d6 Puntos de Golpe. Si el objetivo tenía el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Moribundo} ecuperarse del mismo debido a esta curación no incrementa su estado de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Herido}.

Potenciado (+1) Incrementa la curación en 1d6.

Recall Past Life.name: Recall Past Life
Recall Past Life.description:
You y the secondary casters spend 2 días drawing sigils on one another. At the end of the second día, the secondary caster responsible for the Crafting check carefully mixes the wine with the herbs y a small amount of saliva or blood from the target. The target then drinks the concoction, entering a state of metaphorical death y rebirth, their body becoming comatose for the final día of the ritual. During this time, you y the other secondary caster bathe the body in dirt, symbolizing a grave, y sprinkle the remainder of the wine around the body. If done properly, swaddled baby orchids grow around the area, enveloping the body in a bed of flowers.

On the final hora, the target returns to life, waking up temporarily possessed by an incarnation from one of their past lives. Though they retain the memories from their current life, their demeanor y personality are different for the remaining duration of the ritual, y they also remember vivid details from their past life. Unfortunately, it's impossible to choose a particular past self or to know whether a given former incarnation has good or bad intentions.

Éxito crítico The target's personality reverts to a previous incarnation, determined by the GM. Normally they keep their abilities, but in rare cases, the GM might determine that the past incarnation has a different set of abilities based on their previous life. The lingering knowledge of the past incarnation is powerful y sticks with the target, allowing them to retrain one of their skills increases into a skill in which the past incarnation was particularly talented; the list of possible skills depends on the nature of the past incarnation y is determined by the GM.

Éxito As critical success, except there's no lingering knowledge, y the target isn't able to retrain a skill increase.

Fallo Nothing happens, though the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} state is disturbing, y they wake up @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} as well as likely hungry y thirsty.

Fallo crítico The sigils are drawn improperly, or the wine was tainted. The swaddled baby orchids that grow around the body scream at the moment when the target would've awakened. El objetivo muere y immediately animates as a malevolent zombie that carries the rot with them y seeks to destroy their former allies. Use the statistics for a husk zombie (Book of the Dead 170), or another zombie as appropriate for the target's ancestry.

Redact.name: Redact
Redact.description:
You strike mention of a specific name from one or more documents. When you cast the spell, give one proper name, be it a creature, location, or object. Any mention of that name within the document becomes blurred, smudged, or otherwise completely illegible. Epithets y unambiguous references to the name are redacted as well; for instance, redacting the name of the goddess @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae} from a book would also remove references to her title "the Dawnflower."

Potenciado (3º) Instead of striking out a given name, you can replace it with a different name you choose. Epithets y references are substituted with similar ones relating to the replacement name. Anyone reading the text can attempt a Perception or Society check against your spell DC to notice the altered text, though that doesn't tell them what the original said.

Potenciado (4º) At your choice, La duración es de unlimited.

Redistribute Potential.name: Redistribute Potential
Redistribute Potential.description:
Area two adjacent 5-foot squares

Energy attempts to balance out, but with your magic, you can shunt all the energy in one area to another. Creatures in either area take [[/r 4d4]]{4d4} damage with a @Check[type:Fortaleza|basic:true]{basic Fortaleza save}. Choose one of the squares to steal heat, dealing cold damage, y the other to concentrate the stolen heat, dealing daño por fuego. A creature that fails its save also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} from numbness if it's in the area of stolen heat or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} from heat stroke if it's in the area of concentrated heat; these conditions last until the start of your next turn. If a creature is large enough to be in both squares, you choose only one of the areas for it to attempt its save against; it's no afectado by the other area.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en [[/r 1d4]]{1d4}.

Amp You can affect the flow of energy on a much gryer scale. Instead of two 5-foot squares, you create two @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10 foot bursts}. They still must be adjacent to one another y can overlap. A creature in both areas can still be afectado by only one of your choice. The spell's damage increases to [[/r 6d6]]{6d6}. The conditions last durante 1 minuto.

Amp Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by [[/r 2d6]]{2d6} instead of 1d4.

Reflective Scales.name: Reflective Scales
Reflective Scales.description:
You grow a set of colored glowing scales or scaled armor that stores energy before releasing it in a final burst. When you cast this spell, choose acid, cold, fire, electricity, or veneno damage. You gain resistance 5 against that type of damage. The scales' color depends on the damage type you chose y is usually the color of a type of dragon or other creature associated with that damage type, such as red or gold for daño por fuego.

The scales store up energy as they protect you. Keep track of how much damage the scales have prevented. As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate y manipulate traits, you can explode your scales outward in a 20-foot radius around you, dealing 1d6 damage of the chosen type to all creatures in the area for every 10 damage the scales have prevented, to a maximum of 10d6 damage (after preventing 100 damage). Once you do so, the spell ends.

Potenciado(+2) La resistencia se incrementa en 5 y the maximum damage from the scale explosion se incrementa en 5d6.

Regenerate.name: Regenerar
Regenerate.description:
Una infusión de energía positiva concede a una criatura la curación continua. El objetivo obtiene temporalmente regeneración 15, que le restablece 15 Puntos de Golpe al inicio de cada uno de sus turnos. Mientras disponga de regeneración, el objetivo no podrá morir debido al daño y su valor de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Moribundo} no podrá superar 3, aunque si su valor de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Herido} se convierte en 4 o mayor, permanecerá @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} hasta que sus heridas sean tratadas. Si el objetivo sufre daño por ácido o por fuego, su regeneración se desactiva hasta después del final de su siguiente turno. Cada vez que la criatura recupera Puntos de Golpe debido a la regeneración, también hace crecer de nuevo un órgano dañado o destruido (si es el caso). Mientras dura el conjuro, la criatura puede también reensamblar partes de su cuerpo cercenadas invirtiendo una acción de Interactuar para juntar la parte corporal con el área de la que fue cercenada.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.dXq7z633ve4E0nlX]{Efecto de conjuro: Regenerar}

Potenciado(9º) The regeneration increases to 20.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.description:
You call forth the target's soul y attempt to incarnate it into a bry-new body. As the soul won't be returning to the original body, only a small portion of the creature's remains are required.

These remains must have been part of the original body at the time of death, y the target must have died within the past week. If Pharasma has decided that the target's time has come or the target's soul is trapped or doesn't wish to return, this ritual automatically fails, but you discover this after you succeed at the Religion check y can end the ritual without paying the Coste.

If the ritual is successful, the target's new body has a ryom ancestry. First roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a result of 1 through 14, the new body is one of a common ancestry, while on a 15 through 20 they become a member of an uncommon or rare ancestry. The GM chooses possible ancestries based on those found in the region y then rolls ryomly between them. For instance, the GM could roll [[/r 1d6]] to choose a common ancestry from the Core Rulebook. The target replaces their ancestry Hit Points, size, Speeds, ability boosts, ability flaws, traits, y special abilities with those of their new ancestry. The target loses their heritage y ancestry feats, selecting replacements from their new ancestry. The target's background, class features, y known languages remain unaltered.

Éxito crítico You reincarnate the target into a new adult body. This new body has full HP y has the same spells prepared y points in their pools as the original did when it died.

Éxito As critical success, except the new body has 1 HP y no spells prepared or points in any pools. The soul takes some time to adjust to their new body, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Fallo You fail to reincarnate the target.

Fallo crítico The target's soul becomes trapped in an unintelligent animal creature of the GM's choosing, with a Nivel no greater than half the target's Nivel. While trapped, the target has an Intelligence score of 1 (-5 modifier) y can't use any of their own abilities.

Potenciado (4º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 10. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 40 po.

Potenciado (5º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 12. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 75 po.

Potenciado (6º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 14. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 125 po. The target must have died within the past month.

Potenciado(7º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 16. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 200 po. The target must have died within the past month.

Potenciado (8º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 18. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 300 po. The target must have died within the past year.

Potenciado(9º) The maximum Nivel of the target increases to 20. The Coste is the target's Nivel (minimum 1) × 600 po. The target must have died within the past decade.

Reinforce Eidolon.name: Reinforce Eidolon
Reinforce Eidolon.description:
You focus deeply on the link between you y your eidolon y reinforce your eidolon's defenses. Your eidolon gains a +1 status bonus to AC y saving throws, más resistance to all damage equal to half the spell's Nivel. Your eidolon can benefit from either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HStu2Yhw3iQER9tY]{Boost Eidolon} or Reinforce Eidolon, but not both; if you cast one of these spells during the other's duration, the newer spell replaces the older one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.UVrEe0nukiSmiwfF]{Efecto de conjuro: Reinforce Eidolon}

Rejuvenating Flames.name: Rejuvenating Flames
Rejuvenating Flames.description:
You create a gout of flame that both heals y burns. You restore [[/r 1d4[healing]]]{1d4 Hit Points} to all allies in the area, y those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortaleza saves durante 1 minuto. Enemies in the area take [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.06zdFoxzuTpPPGyJ]{Efecto de conjuro: Rejuvenating Flames}

Potenciado (+1) You restore an additional [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage to enemies.

Remake.name: Rehacer
Remake.description:
Recreas de nuevo un objeto desde la nada, incluso si el objeto ha sido destruido. Para hacerlo, debes ser capaz de imaginarte el objeto. Además, el componente material debe ser un resto del mismo, no importa lo pequeño o insignificante que sea (incluso una pizca del polvo que queda después de desintegrar es suficiente). El conjuro falla si tu imaginación se basaba demasiado en suposiciones; si el objeto es demasiado grande para caber en un cubo de 5 pies (1,5 m) de lado; si el objeto sigue existiendo y tú no eres consciente de ello; o si el objeto es un artefacto, tiene un nivel superior a 20 o tiene un poder mágico igual de vasto.

El objeto se rehace en perfecto estado. Incluso si tu imagen mental era la de un objeto dañado o desgastado, el nuevo está en su forma original. Si el objeto era mágico, este conjuro típicamente le restablece sus propiedades mágicas constantes, pero no las temporales, como por ejemplo las cargas o los usos de una sola vez. Un objeto con cargas o usos diarios tiene todos sus usos gastados cuando se rehace, pero a continuación los recarga de la forma habitual.

Remember the Lost.name: Remember the Lost
Remember the Lost.description:
You call upon the lost y forgotten, assailing your foes' minds with the memories of those who died with a grievance toward them. Enemies in the area take 6d6 mental damage (basic Will save) y are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1} con un fallo crítico. If you know the names of anyone murdered or grievously wronged by an enemy in the area, you can chant those victims' names when you cast the spell to improve the clarity of the visions, increasing the damage to the corresponding enemy from 6d6 to 6d10; you can do so for multiple enemies if you know victims of each enemy. The visions are personal to each foe in the area, y you can't use this spell to discern a murderer by guessing a name. A creature that truly knows no one who died with any sort of grievance to that creature is immune to this effect.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6 (or 2d10 to an enemy when you name a specific victim).

Remove Curse.name: Quitar maldición
Remove Curse.description: Tu toque concede alivio a una criatura maldita. Intentas contrarrestar una maldición que aflige al objetivo. Si procede de un objeto maldito u otra fuente externa, un éxito indica que la criatura objetivo se puede librar del objeto maldito, pero no elimina la maldición del objeto.

Remove Disease.name: Quitar enfermedad
Remove Disease.description: La magia curativa elimina la enfermedad del cuerpo de una criatura. Intentas contrarrestar una enfermedad que aflige al objetivo.

Remove Fear.name: Quitar miedo
Remove Fear.description:
Con un toque, amansas el miedo de una criatura. Puedes intentar contrarrestar un solo efecto de miedo sufrido por la criatura. Esto sólo libera al objetivo, no a ninguna otra criatura bajo los efectos de dicho miedo.

Potenciado (6º) El alcance se incrementa a 30 pies (9 m) y puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Remove Paralysis.name: Quitar parálisis
Remove Paralysis.description:
Una oleada de energía libera a una criatura @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizada}. Puedes intentar contrarrestar un solo efecto que impone al objetivo el estado paralizado. Esto no curará a alguien que esté paralizado debido a algún estado o efecto natural, como por ejemplo la parálisis causada por heridas o toxinas no mágicas.

Potenciado (6º) El alcance se incrementa a 30 pies (9 m) y puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Repelling Pulse.name: Repelling Pulse
Repelling Pulse.description:
You unleash a powerful pulse of telekinetic power, y the pulse violently hurls creatures away from you. Each creature in the area takes 7d10 force damage depending on its Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is pushed 10 feet away from you.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño. La criatura queda pushed 20 feet away from you y is then knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Potenciado(+2) The force damage se incrementa en 2d10, y the distance El objetivo queda moved on a failure y critical failure se incrementa en 5 pies.

Replicate.name: Replicate
Replicate.description:
Creas un illusory magical double that physically looks y behaves very similarly to the target. This double is limited to moving, Interacting, speaking short sentences, y other similar basic tasks. It is unable to cast spells, attack, or use any complex skills.

The illusory duplicate is your minion. You can issue new commys to the double as part of Sustaining the Spell. You can commy the duplicate telepathically as long as the spell lasts, provided it's within 1 mile of you. You can switch between using your own senses y the duplicate's senses with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The illusory duplicate has the same statistics as the original creature, except it doesn't have any of the original's item bonuses, y it has one quarter of the original's Hit Points. If the double's Hit Points are reduced to 0, the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) The maximum Nivel of the target se incrementa en 2.

Repulsion.name: Repulsión
Repulsion.description:
Manifiestas un aura que evita que las criaturas se te acerquen. Al lanzar el conjuro, puedes hacer que el área sea de cualquier radio que te interese, hasta 40 pies (12 m). Una criatura debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad si está en el interior del área cuando lanzas el conjuro, o en cuanto entra en la misma mientras el conjuro está activo. Una vez una criatura ha intentado salvar, utiliza el mismo resultado para dicho lanzamiento de repulsión. Cualquier restricción al movimiento de una criatura solo se aplica si se mueve voluntariamente hacia ti. Por ejemplo, si tú te acercas a una criatura, ésta no tiene por qué apartarse..

Éxito crítico El movimiento de la criatura no se ve restringido..

Éxit La criatura trata cada casilla en el área como terreno difícil cuando se acerca a ti.

Fallo La criatura no se puede acercar a ti dentro del área.

Resist Energy.name: Resistir energía
Resist Energy.description:
Un escudo de energía elemental protege a una criatura contra un tipo de daño por energía. Elige entre daño por ácido, electricidad, frío, fuego y sónico. El objetivo y su equipo obtienen resistencia 5 contra el tipo de daño elegido.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.con2Hzt47JjpuUej]{Efecto de conjuro: Resistir energía}

Potenciado (4º) La resistencia se incrementa a 10 y puedes designar como objetivos hasta dos criaturas.

Potenciado (7º) La resistencia se incrementa a 15 y puedes designar como objetivos hasta cinco criaturas.

Resplendent Mansion.name: Mansión resplandeciente
Resplendent Mansion.description:
Conjuras una imponente mansión de hasta planta baja y tres pisos, con una anchura de hasta 300 pies (90 m). Mientras Lanzas el conjuro, mantienes en tu mente una imagen de la mansión y de la apariencia que quieres que tenga. La mansión podrá contener tantas habitaciones como desees, y estará decorada a tu gusto. Puedes imaginar un propósito para cada habitación de la mansión, y el mobiliario apropiado aparece en su interior. Los muebles u otros accesorios mundanos funcionan normalmente para quien está en el interior de la mansión, pero dejan de existir si se sacan al exterior. Ningún accesorio creado mediante este conjuro puede generar efectos mágicos, pero los artilugios mágicos llevados a la mansión funcionan con normalidad.

La mansión contiene el mismo tipo y cantidad de comida y de sirvientes que los creados por el conjuro @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Mansión magnífica}.

Cada una de las puertas y ventanas que dan al exterior están protegidas mediante conjuros de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarma}. Tú eliges si las alarmas son audibles o mentales al Lanzar el conjuro, y cada una tiene un sonido (para las audibles) o sensación (para las mentales) diferente, lo que te permite determinar instantáneamente qué portal ha sido utilizado.

Rest Eternal.name: Rest Eternal
Rest Eternal.description:
You call upon gods, spirits, y stranger beings to bar a creature's spirit from ever returning. A spirit that doesn't wish to be so constrained can attempt a Will save to resist this ritual; on a critical success, it fools you into believing the ritual succeeded. This ritual has no effect on a target who is undead or whose soul is otherwise not in the afterlife.

Éxito crítico You sequester the subject's spirit to the afterlife. Attempts to communicate with the dead creature, return it to life, turn it into an undead, or otherwise disturb its afterlife fail unless the effect's counteract Nivel is at least 2 higher than that of rest eternal or originates from an artifact or a deity. Successfully returning the creature to life ends the restrictions placed by rest eternal.

Éxito As critical success, but effects to interact with the spirit fail unless the effect's counteract Nivel is higher than that of rest eternal or originates from an artifact or a deity.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico The ritual fails, y the spirits you appealed to are angered by your meddling. All casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for 1 week.

Restoration.name: Restablecimiento
Restoration.description:
La magia de restablecimiento contrarresta el efecto de las toxinas o de los estados que evitan que una criatura funcione a pleno rendimiento. Cuando lanzas restablecimiento, elige entre reducir un estado y disminuir el efecto de una toxina. Una criatura sólo se puede beneficiar de un conjuro de restablecimiento al día, y no puede hacerlo más de una vez para reducir el estado de la misma exposición a una toxina determinada.

  • Disminuir una toxina Reduces en 2 el valor de torpe, debilitado o anonadado de un objetivo. En su lugar puedes reducir dos de las condiciones indicadas en 1 cada una.
  • Reducir un estado Reduces en 2 el valor de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}, o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado}. En su lugar puedes reducir dos de las condiciones indicadas en 1 cada una.

Potenciado (4º) Añade @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado} a la lista de estados que puedes reducir. Cuando disminuyes una toxina, reduce en dos la etapa. También obtienes una tercera opción, que te permite reducir en 1 el valor de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Condenado} de un objetivo. No puedes utilizarla para reducir un estado permanente de condenado.

Potenciado (6º) Como el restablecimiento de 4º nivel, pero puedes reducir un estado permanente de condenado si añades una acción de lanzamiento de conjuros y un componente material al Lanzar el conjuro, proporcionando 100 po de polvo de diamante como Costee.

Restorative Moment.name: Restorative Moment
Restorative Moment.description: You manipulate the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a día's passage. The target decreases the values of any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado} conditions it has by 1 y can immediately attempt one saving throw against each affliction it has with a stage length of 1 día or less. El objetivo queda then queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 día.

Restore Senses.name: Restablecer los sentidos
Restore Senses.description:
Intentas contrarrestar un solo efecto que ha impuesto los estados de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecido} sobre el objetivo, restableciendo su vista o su oído. Esto puede contrarrestar tanto la magia temporal como las consecuencias permanentes de la magia, pero no cura a alguien que carece de sentido debido a algún estado o efecto natural, como por ejemplo de nacimiento o debido a una herida o toxina no mágica.

Potenciado (6º) El alcance se incrementa a 30 pies (9 m) y puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas. Puedes elegir el efecto a contrarrestar de forma separada para cada criatura seleccionada.

Restyle.name: Restyle
Restyle.description: You permanente change the appearance of one piece of clothing currently worn by you or an ally to better fit your aesthetic sensibilities. You can change its color, texture, pattern, y other minor parts of its design, but the changes can't alter the clothing's overall shape, size, or purpose. The changes can't increase the quality of the craftsmanship or artistry of the piece of clothing, but particularly gauche choices for the new color y pattern might decrease its aesthetic appeal. This spell transforms existing materials into the desired appearance y never alters the material or creates more material than what's originally part of the object. The object's statistics also remain unchanged.

Resurrect.name: Resucitar
Resurrect.description:
Intentas llamar al alma del objetivo y devolverla a su cuerpo. Esto requiere que el cuerpo esté presente y relativamente intacto. El objeto tiene que haber muerto hace menos de un año. Si @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Farasma} ha decidido que el tiempo del objetivo ha llegado o éste no quiere volver, el ritual falla automáticamente, pero lo descubres después de la prueba con éxito de Religión y puedes acabar el ritual sin pagar el coste.

Éxito crítico Resucitas al objetivo. Vuelve a la vida con sus Puntos de Golpe completos y los mismos conjuros preparados y puntos en sus reservas que tenía cuando murió, sufriendo todavía de cualquier debilidad a largo plazo de su cuerpo. El objetivo se encuentra con un agente de su dios durante la resurrección, quien le inspira concediéndole un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de ataque, pruebas de Percepción, tiradas de salvación y pruebas de habilidad durante 1 semana. El objetivo también queda cambiado permanentemente de alguna forma por el tiempo pasado en la otra vida, como por ejemplo obteniendo un ligero cambio de personalidad, un mechón blanco en el cabello o una marca de nacimiento nueva y extraña.

Éxito Igual que éxito crítico, excepto que el objetivo vuelve a la vida con sólo 1 Punto de Golpe, ningún conjuro preparado ni punto alguno en ninguna reserva, sufriendo todavía de cualquier debilidad a largo plazo de su cuerpo. En lugar de inspirarle, el tiempo pasado por el personaje en el Osario le ha dejado temporalmente debilitado. El objetivo está @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 1 semana; estos estados no pueden verse eliminados o reducidos en modo alguno hasta que la semana transcurre.

Fallo Tu intento no tiene éxito.

Fallo crítico Algo va terriblemente mal: un espíritu maligno posee el cuerpo, el cadáver se transforma en un tipo especial de muerto viviente o el objetivo sufre algún destino peor.

Potenciado (6º) Puedes resucitar a un objetivo de hasta 12º nivel, y el coste base es de 125 po.

Potenciado (7º) Puedes utilizar resucitar incluso con tan sólo una pequeña parte del cuerpo; el ritual crea un nuevo cuerpo con un éxito o un éxito crítico. El objeto tiene que haber muerto hace menos de diez años. El ritual requiere cuatro lanzadores secundarios, cada uno de los cuales debe ser por lo menos de la mitad del nivel del objetivo. El objetivo puede ser de hasta 14º nivel, y el coste base es de 200 po.

Potenciado (8º) Igual que en 7º nivel, pero el objetivo puede ser de hasta 16º nivel y el coste base es de 300 po.

Potenciado (9º) Puedes utilizar resucitar incluso sin el cadáver si conoces el nombre del objetivo y has tocado una parte de su cuerpo en algún momento. El objetivo tiene que haber muerto hace menos de cien años, y no sufre los estados negativos con un éxito. El ritual requiere ocho lanzadores secundarios, cada uno de los cuales debe ser por lo menos de la mitad del nivel del objetivo. El objetivo puede ser de hasta 18º nivel, y el coste base es de 600 po.

Potenciado (10º) Igual que en 9º nivel, excepto que no importa el tiempo transcurrido desde el fallecimiento. El ritual requiere dieciséis lanzadores secundarios, cada uno de los cuales debe ser por lo menos de la mitad del nivel del objetivo. El objetivo puede ser de hasta 20º nivel, y el coste base es de 1.000 po.

Retributive Pain.name: Dolor retributivo
Retributive Pain.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura dentro del alcance te daña.

Reflejas vengativamente tu dolor sobre quien te atormenta. El objetivo sufre tanto daño mental como la mitad del daño que inflige a ti al desencadenar el conjuro.

Retrocognition.name: Retrocognición
Retrocognition.description:
Abriendo tu mente a los ecos ocultos, obtienes impresiones de acontecimientos pasados que tuvieron lugar en tu ubicación actual. La retrocognición revela impresiones psíquicas de acontecimientos que tuvieron lugar a lo largo del día anterior durante el primer minuto de la duración, seguido por impresiones del siguiente día anterior el siguiente minuto, y así sucesivamente. Estos ecos no funcionan como una visión, sino que en su lugar revelan impresiones de emociones y metáforas que proporcionan pistas y detalles crípticos del pasado Si eres testigo de un acontecimiento traumático o turbulento gracias a una impresión, el conjuro acaba si no consigues una salvación de Voluntad con una CD de por lo menos 30 y posiblemente hasta 50, dependiendo de la gravedad del acontecimiento. El DJ es quien determina si un acontecimiento es traumático y quien elige la CD.

Potenciado (8º) Obtienes impresiones de acontecimientos que tuvieron lugar el año anterior por cada minuto que te concentras, en lugar del día anterior, aunque los detalles disminuyen haciendo más difícil distinguir impresiones de los acontecimientos, excepto de los más relevantes.

Potenciado (9º) Obtienes impresiones de acontecimientos que tuvieron lugar el siglo anterior por cada minuto que te concentras, en lugar del día anterior, aunque los detalles disminuyen haciendo más difícil distinguir impresiones de los acontecimientos, excepto de los más relevantes.

Return Beacon.name: Return Beacon
Return Beacon.description:
You create a unique planar beacon somewhere within the spell's range that remains in place. The beacon is invisible except when detected by detect magic, in which case it looks like a 10-foot-wide tower of bright light stretching into the sky. At any time during the duration of the beacon, you can complete a 1-minute activity, which has the concentrate y manipulate traits, to focus on the beacon y transport yourself y any items you're wearing y holding from your current space to the location of the beacon. Transporting yourself in this way ends the spell. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the beacon collapses, ending the spell, y the transportation attempt fails.

Casting return beacon while a beacon is active causes the previous return beacon spell to end. If you are not within 1 mile of the beacon, your attempt to transport yourself to the beacon fails. If a solid object is in the same space as the beacon when you transport yourself, you arrive in the nearest open space to the beacon. If there is not an open space within 30 feet of the beacon, your attempt to transport yourself fails, but the beacon remains intact.

Potenciado(7º) La duración es de 8 horas y you can transport yourself to the beacon from up to 100 miles away.

Potenciado (8º) La duración es de 24 horas y you can transport yourself to the beacon from up to 1,000 miles away. In addition, you can bring 1 willing ally you touch with you when you transport to the beacon.

Potenciado(9º) La duración es de 1 week y you can transport yourself to the beacon from anywhere on the same plane. In addition, you can bring up to 4 willing allies you touch with you when you transport to the beacon.

Potenciado (10º) La duración es de unlimited y you can transport yourself to the beacon from any distance, even across other planes. In addition, you can bring up to 8 willing allies you touch when you transport to the beacon.

Return the Favor.name: Return the Favor
Return the Favor.description:
Desencadenante An ally uses a reaction to grant you a beneficial effect during a combat encounter.

You're unable to leave any debts unpaid. When an ally supports you in a fight, you offer assistance in turn for the favor. The triggering ally gains 12 Puntos de Golpe temporales durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (+1) The Puntos de Golpe temporales increase by 4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.cSoL5aMy3PCzM4Yv]{Efecto de conjuro: Return the Favor}

Return To Essence.name: Return To Essence
Return To Essence.description:
You unravel the magic of a spell that affects a container, door, or lock, converting it into energy you can repurpose to power your own spells.

Attempt a counteract check against the target spell or magical effect that wards or seals a doorway or chest, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Azoh0BSoCASrA1lr]{Lock}, or against a spell or effect that deals damage or delivers secondary effects when it's opened, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Glyph of Warding}. If you succeed, you recover its energy, restoring one of your expended spell slots of 3er Nivel o menor.

Potenciado (8º) You can restore an expended spell slot of 4º Nivel o menor.

Potenciado(9º) You can restore an expended spell slot of 5º Nivel o menor.

Potenciado (10º) You can restore an expended spell slot of 6º Nivel o menor.

Reverse Gravity.name: Invertir la gravedad
Reverse Gravity.description: Inviertes la gravedad en el área. Las criaturas y los objetos que no están fijados al suelo caen hacia arriba inmediatamente hasta la parte superior del área. Una criatura podría Agarrarse a un saliente para detener su caída si en la misma pasa cerca de una superficie apropiada. Si una criatura cae contra un objeto sólido (como por ejemplo un techo), sufre la cantidad apropiada de daño por caída y aterriza sobre dicha superficie. Una vez un objeto o criatura llega a lo alto del área, flota atrapado entre las gravedades normal e invertida. La criatura se puede mover a lo largo del plano en el que se juntan las dos formas de gravedad. Las criaturas que pueden levitar o volar pueden utilizar dichas aptitudes para mitigar los efectos de invertir la gravedad. Cuando el conjuro se acaba, todas las criaturas y objetos atrapados en el área vuelven a caer hacia abajo. Igualmente, cualquier cosa que se mueve más allá del área del conjuro se ve sujeta de nuevo a la gravedad normal.

Revival.name: Reanimación
Revival.description:
Una explosión de energía curativa alivia a las criaturas vivas y revive temporalmente a las que han muerto recientemente. Todos los objetivos vivos recuperan 10d8+40 Puntos de Golpe.

Además, devuelves a la vida temporalmente a cualquier número de objetivos muertos, con los mismos efectos y limitaciones que @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Revivir a los muertos} (pág. 375). Las criaturas revividas tienen tantos Puntos de Golpe temporales como los que has otorgado a las criaturas vivas, pero ningún Punto de Golpe normal. Las criaturas revividas no pueden recuperar Puntos de Golpe u obtener puntos de golpe temporales de ninguna otra forma y, una vez acaba la duración de la revivificación, pierden todos sus Puntos de Golpe temporales y mueren.

Este conjuro no puede devolver a la vida a ninguna criatura muerta por desintegrar o un efecto de muerte. No tiene efecto alguno sobre los muertos vivientes.

Rewinding Step.name: Rewinding Step
Rewinding Step.description:
You anchor your location in time so that you can swiftly retrace your steps later with complex chronomancy. The space you're in when you cast the spell becomes your temporal anchor space. While you're within 500 feet of your temporal anchor space, you can spend a single action that has the concentrate trait to instantaneously return to that space (you don't need to have line of effect to the space). The spell then ends. You bring any items that are in your possession with you when you take the action to return.

If the anchor space is occupied when you attempt to return to it or if this spell would bring another creature with you, the spell fails to transport you, then ends.

Potenciado(7º) You can return if you're within 1,000 feet of your anchor space.

Potenciado(9º) You can return if you're within 1 mile of your anchor space.

Righteous Might.name: Poder de la justicia
Righteous Might.description:
Centras toda tu energía divina y te transformas en una forma de batalla Mediana, similar a tu forma normal pero equipada con poderosos armamentos divinos concedidos por tu dios. En esta forma, obtienes las estadísticas y aptitudes indicados a continuación. En esta forma de batalla tienes manos, y puedes llevar a cabo acciones de manipular. Puedes Disipar el conjuro.

Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y aptitudes:

  • CA = 20 + tu nivel. Ignora el penalizador a las pruebas de armadura y la reducción de la Velocidad.
  • 10 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
  • Velocidad 40 pies (12 m).
  • Resistencia 3 al daño físico
  • Visión en la oscuridad.
  • Un ataque especial con una versión de armamento justo de tu arma predilecta, que es el único ataque que puedes emplear. Tu modificador al ataque con el arma especial es +21 y tu bonificador al daño es +8 (o +6 para un ataque a distancia). Si tu modificador al ataque con el arma predilecta de tu dios es mayor, puedes utilizarlo en lugar de éste. Infliges tres de los dados normales de daño de tu arma, o tres dados de daño de un tamaño mayor si tu arma es sencilla y tiene un dado de daño de d4 o d6. El arma tiene una de las siguientes propiedades que encaja con el alineamiento de tu dios: anárquica, axiomática, ímpia o sagrada. Si tu dios es neutral auténtico, en su lugar infliges 1d6 adicional de daño de precisión.
  • Modificador al Atletismo +23, si tu propio modificador no es mejor.

Potenciado (8º) Tu forma de batalla es Grande y tus ataques tienen un alcance de 10 pies (3 m), o 15 pies (4,5 m) si el arma predilecta de tu dios tiene alcance. Debes tener suficiente espacio para expandirte a dicho tamaño o el conjuro se pierde. En su lugar obtienes CA = 21 + tu nivel, 15 PG temporales, resistencia 4 contra el daño físico, modificador al ataque +28, bonificador al daño +15 (+12 para un ataque a distancia) y Atletismo +29.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.W4lb3417rNDd9tCq]{Efecto de conjuro: Poder de la justicia}

Rime Slick.name: Rime Slick
Rime Slick.description:
You call down a chill wind. When you Cast this Spell, you deal 2d4 cold damage to each creature in the area (basic Reflejos save). If a creature in the area critically fails its Reflejos save y was stying, it also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

You also create a layer of ice on all surfaces in the area, which become difficult terrain. Unattended objects in the area become slick with ice, y picking them up requires a successful Reflejos save or Acrobatics check against your spell DC. The ice melts on any object that takes daño por fuego as well as in any square included in the area of a higher-Nivel spell or effect with the fire trait.

Potenciado (5º) The damage increases to 8d4 cold damage y the area is a 30-foot burst.

Potenciado (8º) The damage increases to 14d4 cold damage y the area is a 60-foot burst.

Rip the Spirit.name: Rip the Spirit
Rip the Spirit.description:
You supernaturally rip the spirit from a living creature's body, dooming the target to pain y death. The target takes 5d6 negative damage, depending on its basic Fortaleza save, y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} if it fails its save. The spell's effect is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

1 (somático) The spell targets one living creature in range.

2 (somático, verbal) The spell targets one living creature in range y the damage is [[/r 10d6[negative]]] damage instead of 5d6.

3 (material, somático, verbal) The spell targets all living creatures in a 30-foot emanation.

Potenciado (+1) The amount of damage se incrementa en 1d6, or by [[/r 2d6]] for the 2-action version.

Rising Surf.name: Rising Surf
Rising Surf.description:
You create a wave of water that you ride, banking around obstacles y surfing to higher ground. You move up to 35 pies, raising yourself up to 5 feet above the ground. (You can avoid many types of difficult terrain in this way.) You must end your movement on an unoccupied space where you have solid footing. This movement isn't a Stride, but you measure the distance in a similar way, y it still triggers reactions caused by movement. You can't transport anyone else with you.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the distance you move by 5 feet y the maximum height traveled above the ground by 5 pies.

Rite of the Red Star.name: Rite of the Red Star
Rite of the Red Star.description:
You invoke the latent power within the Doorway to the Red Star through repetitive chanting y ritual movements in an attempt to open a portal to the planet Akiton.

Éxito crítico The plaza hums with magical energy that vibrates bones, causes hair to rise as if in a static field, y graces the tongue with flavors both unbearably sweet y terribly foul. The crimson pillars of the Doorway itself begin to smoke, then shimmer with red light, while the air within the ring shifts y ripples as if in the throes of intense heat. A moment later, a portal to Akiton opens at the center of the stying stones. This portal is vertical y semi-circular, with a radius of 30 pies (9 m), y is filled with shimmering red energy-it doesn't provide a view of the other side. Any caster who steps through this portal is instantly transported to area B1 of the Hall of Reason on Akiton.

Éxito As critical success, but the portal's magic is distressed y unstable. When a caster steps through the portal, they must attempt a @Check[type:Fortaleza|dc:36|traits:conjuration] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} from the stress of the magical journey.

Fallo The portal fails to open, y all casters must attempt a @Check[type:Fortaleza|dc:36|traits:conjuration] save to avoid becoming drained 1 from the backlash of magical energy.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the misfire attracts the attention of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.qjAtPDIi7OyUGsNy]{Bythos} aeon which appears in the area at once y attempts to destroy the stones of the Doorway. After one round of attacks, it realizes the portal is beyond its ability to damage, y attempts to slay those who attempted to activate the portal in the first place.

Ritual Obstruction.name: Ritual Obstruction
Ritual Obstruction.description: You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's Nivel o menor in the area. Ritual obstruction ignores all cover, including walls y ceilings, to the extent of its area. Anyone attempting to cast a ritual within the area knows, when they begin to cast the ritual, the area is cursed to impede rituals. Any ritual cast in the area can't have a final result better than failure.

Roar of the Wyrm.name: Roar of the Wyrm
Roar of the Wyrm.description:
You channel the might of dragons into your voice, letting out a roar that engenders respect in dragonkind but that instills fear in most other creatures.

The impressive roar grants you a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.0s6YaL3IjqECmjab]{+2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks} for 10 minutos against dragons that were in the area at the time of casting. All enemies within the area other than dragons must attempt a Will save; to these enemies, roar of the wyrm is a fear effect.

Roar of the wyrm affects non-dragon creatures with deep ties to dragonkind (such as a barbarian with the draconic instinct, a sorcerer with the draconic bloodline, or a member of a culture that reveres dragons) as if they had the dragon trait. The GM decides if a creature is aligned enough with dragonkind to be afectado in this way.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 3} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Huyendo} durante 1 asalto.

Roaring Applause.name: Roaring Applause
Roaring Applause.description:
Your flamboyant flourish invokes such powerful feelings in your audience that you incite cheers y applause. Targets of this spell must be able to see, hear, or otherwise understy you. The targets must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda mildly distracted by your display y applauds while it isn't fully occupied. It can't use reactions.

Fallo The target applauds you so vigorously that it can't use reactions y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}. The applause is so involved that it has the manipulate trait. This triggers reactions based on the manipulate trait at the start of the target's turn.

Fallo crítico As failure, más El objetivo queda so distracted by its vigorous applauding of you that it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinado} with you.

Potenciado (6º) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Rope Trick.name: Truco de la cuerda
Rope Trick.description:
Haces que la cuerda objetivo se eleve por los aires verticalmente. Donde acaba, se abre un espacio extradimensional, conectado con el extremo superior. Sólo se puede acceder a dicho espacio trepando por la cuerda.

La entrada a dicho espacio no se puede ver, y sólo se entrevé debido a la presencia de la cuerda. Ésta no se puede mover ni ocultar, aunque se la puede soltar del espacio extradimensional aplicando 16.000 libras (7.200 kg) de fuerza, teniendo un éxito crítico en una prueba de Atletismo contra la CD del conjuro o destruyéndola. El espacio puede albergar hasta a ocho criaturas Medianas y su equipo. Una criatura Grande cuenta como dos Medianas, una Enorme como cuatro Medianas y una Gargantuesca llena el espacio ella sola.

Si la cuerda se suelta o es destruida, o si una criatura intenta entrar en el espacio superando su capacidad, éste empieza a destejerse. Desaparece en [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 asaltos}, depositando a las criaturas de su interior de forma segura en el suelo que hay por debajo

Rouse Skeletons.name: Rouse Skeletons
Rouse Skeletons.description:
Misshapen skeletal forms erupt from a solid surface, such as a stone floor, y fill the burst. The area they fill is difficult terrain. Their grasping claws deal 2d6 cortante damage to creatures on the ground in the area when the skeletons first appear (basic Reflejos save).

On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the area of skeletons up to 20 feet within the range of the spell y deal 2d6 cortante damage (basic Reflejos save) to each creature in their new area.

Damaging or destroying the skeletons is irrelevant, as new bones pull forth from the ground to repair y replace any that are obliterated.

Potenciado(+2) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

Runic Impression.name: Runic Impression
Runic Impression.description:
Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell: corrosive, flaming, frost, ghost touch, returning, shock, or thundering. If you cast runic impression on a weapon, this spell ends if you cease holding the weapon. If this spell would give a weapon more property runes than its normal maximum, one of the existing property runes (you choose) is suppressed until the spell ends. For unarmed attacks, if this spell would give you more property runes than you could have from hywraps of mighty blows, one of the existing property runes is similarly suppressed.

Potenciado (8º) Add keen to the list of runes you can choose as well as the greater types of corrosive, flaming, frost, shock, y thundering.

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Rusting Grasp.name: Rusting Grasp
Rusting Grasp.description:
You cause the target to rapidly rust. This magical rust can affect nonferrous materials, but the target must be all or mostly metal. Skymetals such as adamantine y orichalcum are immune to this rust, y the GM might determine other precious materials are similarly resilient. Ultimately, the GM decides if an object or creature can be targeted with this spell.

All damage from this spell ignores Hardness. If the spell causes persistent damage from rust, a creature can attempt to scrape off the rust to assist the target in recovering from the persistent damage (reducing the DC of the flat check to end persistent damage to 10 y granting an immediate flat check). The effect of the spell depends on its target.

  • Creature or Hazard A creature or hazard must be made of all or mostly metal to be afectado (this includes many mechanical traps). The grasp deals 8d6 damage (basic Fortaleza save), más [[/r 2d6[persistent]]] on a failed save. Touching a hazard to affect it with this spell might trigger the hazard, as determined by the GM.

  • Item The rust deals [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6 damage}, subject to a basic Reflejos save by the creature wearing or holding the item; if the item is unattended, it automatically gets a critical failure. On a failed save, the item also takes [[/r 1d6[persistent]]]. For an attended item, this persistent damage occurs at the end of the attending creature's turns; if the item was unattended when you Cast the Spell, the damage happens at the end of your turns.

    When targeting armor someone is wearing, its Bulk is 1 higher than the listed value, since carrying armor is more cumbersome than wearing it. Thin iron or steel items, such as weapons, have 20 HP y a Broken Threshold of 10, y thicker iron or steel items, such as most suits of armor, have 36 HP y a Broken Threshold of 18.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the initial damage to creatures or hazards by 2d6, y increase the maximum Bulk of an item you can target by 1.

Safe Passage.name: Safe Passage
Safe Passage.description:
You repel dangers from all around you, making passage through the chosen area safe for a brief amount of time. Anyone passing through the area gains the following benefits against harmful effects of the terrain y environment, including environmental damage, hazardous terrain, y hazards in the area. The spell grants a +2 status bonus to AC y saves against such effects, y resistance 5 to all damage from such effects. Furthermore, the spell prevents anything in the area that's prone to collapse, such as a rickety bridge or an unstable ceiling, from collapsing, except under extreme strain that would collapse a normal structure of its type.
