Safe passage protects only against harm, not inconvenience, y it doesn't reduce difficult terrain, remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} condition caused by precipitation, or the like, nor does it protect against creatures within the spell's area.

Potenciado (5º) The granted resistance increases to 10, y the area can be 120 feet long.

Potenciado (8º) The granted resistance increases to 15, y the area can be 500 feet long.

Safeguard Secret.name: Salvaguardar secreto
Safeguard Secret.description:
Te aseguras de que un secreto está a buen recaudo de espías inquisitivos. Elige un fragmento de información que conoce por lo menos uno de los objetivos; sólo puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura si permanece dentro del alcance el minuto completo en el que Lanzas el conjuro.

El conjuro concede a quienes conocen el fragmento de información que has elegido un bonificador +4 por estatus a las pruebas de habilidad (típicamente pruebas de Engaño) para ocultar este conocimiento y a las tiradas de salvación contra conjuros que intentan específicamente obtener de ellos dicho conocimiento, así como los efectos que les obligarían a revelarlo.

Si Lanzas este conjuro de nuevo, cualquier lanzamiento anterior de Salvaguardar secreto se acaba de inmediato.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.3HEiYVhqypfc4IsP]{Efecto de conjuro: Salvaguardar secreto}

Sanctified Ground.name: Terreno santificado
Sanctified Ground.description: Santificas el área, rociándola con agua bendita y custodiándola contra tus enemigos. Elige entre aberraciones, celestiales, dragones, infernales, monitores o muertos vivientes. Todas las criaturas en el área obtienen un bonificador +1 por estatus a la CA, tiradas de ataque, tiradas de daño y tiradas de salvación contra las criaturas elegidas.

Sanctuary.name: Santuario
Sanctuary.description:
Custodias a una criatura con energía protectora, que impide los ataques enemigos. Las criaturas que intentan atacar al objetivo deben hacer cada vez una salvación de Voluntad. Si el objetivo lleva a cabo acciones hostiles, el conjuro se acaba.

Éxito crítico Santuario se acaba.

Éxito La criatura puede hacer ese ataque y cualesquiera otros contra la criatura ese turno.

Fallo La criatura no puede atacar al objetivo y malgasta la acción. No puede intentar más ataques contra el objetivo ese turno.

Fallo crítico La criatura malgasta la acción y no puede atacar al objetivo durante el resto de la duración de santuario.

Sanguine Mist.name: Sanguine Mist
Sanguine Mist.description:
You unleash a cloud of foul, blood-sucking fog that drains the vitality from the living to bolster your own. Each living creature in the area when you Cast the Spell, aside from you, takes 6d6 negative damage with a basic Fortaleza save. Creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}, y all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.

The first time each round you Sustain this Spell on subsequent turns, living creatures in the area take an additional [[/r 2d6[negative]]] damage with another basic Fortaleza save. You also gain Puntos de Golpe temporales equal to half the damage a single creature took when you Sustained the spell this turn; calculate these Puntos de Golpe temporales using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining Puntos de Golpe temporales after 1 minute.

Potenciado (+1) The initial damage se incrementa en 2d6 y the secondary damage se incrementa en [[/r 1d6]].

Savant's Curse.name: Savant's Curse
Savant's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that fills its mind with distracting y hyperspecialized minutiae, causing it to second-guess even simple facts. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito For 10 minutos, the target must roll twice y use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check. If the target succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge, it gains one piece of true knowledge y one piece of erroneous knowledge, but it has no way of knowing which is which (this has no effect if the target critically succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge).

Fallo As success, but the effect is permanent.

Fallo crítico As failure, y the target treats the outcomes of all checks to Recall Knowledge as one degree of success worse than the result the target rolled (a critical success becomes a success, a success becomes a failure, y a failure becomes a critical failure).

Savor the Sting.name: Saborear el aguijón
Savor the Sting.description:
Infliges dolor al objetivo y te regocijas en su angustia. En concreto, infliges 1d4 daño mental 1d4 daño mental persistente @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Mental1d4.success]; el objetivo debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. Mientras el objetivo sufre @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Daño persistente} debido a este conjuro, obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de ataque y a las pruebas de habilidad contra el mismo.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo sufre mitad de daño y ningún daño persistente.

Fallo El objetivo sufre el daño inicial y el persistente completos.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño inicial y persistente.

Potenciado (+1) El daño inicial se incrementa en 1d4 y el daño persistente se incrementa en 1d4.

Scatter Scree.name: Scatter Scree
Scatter Scree.description:
You evoke a jumble of rocks in the area. The scattering rocks deal contundente damage equal to 1d4 más your spellcasting ability modifier to creatures in the area, with a basic Reflejos save. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature can Interact to clear a square of this scree. If you cast this spell again, any previous scatter scree you have cast ends.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

Schadenfreude.name: Schadenfreude
Schadenfreude.description:
Desencadenante You critically fail a saving throw against a foe's effect.

You distract your enemy with their feeling of smug pleasure when you fail catastrophically. They must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda distracted by its amusement y takes a -1 status penalty on Perception checks y Will saves durante 1 asalto. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.TjGHxli0edXI6rAg]{Efecto de conjuro: Schadenfreude (Success)}

Fallo La criatura queda overcome by its amusement y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda lost in its amusement y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 asalto y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}.

Scholarly Recollection.name: Memoria eurita
Scholarly Recollection.description:
Desencadenante Haces una prueba de Percepción para Buscar, o haces una prueba de habilidad para Recordar conocimiento con una habilidad en la que estás entrenado.

Recitando una breve plegaria mientras compones tus pensamientos, eres bendecido al ver que tu dios te ha proporcionado la información correcta para tu situación. Haz dos veces la tirada desencadenante y utiliza el mejor de ambos resultados.

Scintillating Pattern.name: Pauta centelleante
Scintillating Pattern.description:
Un campo de colores en cascada, en cambio continuo, se manifiesta en el aire. Las criaturas que están en el interior de la pauta quedan @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} igual que las que están a 20 pies (6 m) o menos del área de la misma. Además, una criatura debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad si está en el interior de la pauta cuando la lanzas, cuando entra en ella, cuando acaba su turno en su interior o cuando utiliza una acción de Buscar o de Interactuar con la misma. Una criatura afectada por la pauta no intenta nuevas salvaciones.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundida} durante [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 asaltos}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdida} durante [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 asaltos}. Una vez acaba el estado de aturdido, la criatura queda confusa durante el resto de la duración del conjuro.

Scintillating Safeguard.name: Scintillating Safeguard
Scintillating Safeguard.description:
Desencadenante An effect would deal physical or energy damage to you or a creature in range.

A sparkling magical barrier envelops each target, shielding them against the triggering effect. Choose one type of physical or energy damage the triggering effect deals. Each target gains resistance 10 against that damage type for the triggering effect. La resistencia applies only against the initial damage, not against any persistent damage or other lingering effects of the effect.

Potenciado (+1) La resistencia se incrementa en 1.

Scorching Blast.name: Scorching Blast
Scorching Blast.description:
You evoke a mass of fire into the air around your outstretched fist. For the remainder of your turn, you can blast targets within 30 feet with this fire by spending a single action which has the attack y concentrate traits. When you do so, attempt a ranged spell attack roll. If you hit, you inflict 2d8 daño por fuego. On a critical hit, the target takes 1d6 persistent daño por fuego.

Potenciado (+1) The base damage se incrementa en 1d8 y the persistent daño por fuego on a critical hit se incrementa en 2.

Scorching Ray.name: Scorching Ray
Scorching Ray.description:
You fire a ray of heat y flame. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 daño por fuego, y on a critical hit, El objetivo sufre doble daño.

For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional ray at a different target, to a maximum of three rays targeting three different targets for 3 actions. These attacks each increase your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after you make all the spell attack rolls for scorching ray. If you spend 2 or more actions Casting the Spell, the damage increases to 4d6 daño por fuego on a hit, y it still deals double damage on a critical hit.

Potenciado (+1) The damage to each target se incrementa en 1d6 for the 1-action version, or by 2d6 for the 2-action y 3-action versions.

Scouring Pulse.name: Scouring Pulse
Scouring Pulse.description:
Area 10-foot radius, 60-foot-tall cylinder

You inundate the area with concentrated positive energy, which scours away the stain of undeath. Each creature in the area takes 6d8 positive damage y must attempt a basic Reflejos save. Creatures that fail the save also take [[/r 1d8[persistent,positive]]] damage. Creatures that take persistent positive damage from scouring pulse are wreathed in a heatless halo of light. They emit bright light in a 5-foot radius preventing them from being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}; if La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they're concealed while afectado by scouring pulse, rather than being undetected.

Potenciado (8º) The positive damage increases to 9d8 damage, y the persistent positive damage increases to [[/r 2d8[persistent,positive]]] damage. Creatures remain suffused in light for [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]]{1d4 additional rounds} after removing the persistent positive damage.

Scouring Sand.name: Scouring Sand
Scouring Sand.description:
You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures' eyes. For the duration of the spell, any plant-based difficult terrain smaller than a tree becomes loose, allowing each 5-foot square of it to be cleared with a single Interact action. In addition, scouring sand attempts to counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle} and other effects that create or manipulate plant-based terrain in its area. Successfully counteracting an effect removes only the portion of its area that overlaps with scouring sand's area. After one such attempt, the effect is temporarily immune to scouring sand's counteract for 24 horas. Each creature in the area when you Cast this Spell or that ends its turn in the area must attempt a Reflejos save.

Success La criatura no resulta afectada.

Failure La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to get the sand out of its eyes.

Critical Failure As failure, but La criatura queda also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for its next action.

Potenciado (3er) Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the center of the burst to a spot within range.

Potenciado (6º) As the 3er-level version, except the range is 120 feet and the area is a 20-foot burst.

Sculpt Sound.name: Sculpt Sound
Sculpt Sound.description:
You change the sounds made by a creature or object. Choose how you're altering the sounds when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}; you can't alter it later. You can cause something that didn't create a sound to make sound, alter the voice of a creature, amplify or deaden a sound, or transform one sound into another. A creature who succeeds at a Perception check against your spell DC can determine that the sound was altered by an illusion, including hearing faint sounds if you deadened the sound, but they can't determine the true sound unless they critically succeed at the Perception check. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Because this spell obscures sound instead of preventing it, using the spell to quiet a creature doesn't prevent that creature from using verbal spell components, though it does prevent most auditory effects that rely on another creature hearing them accurately. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save.

Éxito The afectado sound from La criatura quedan't altered.

Fallo The afectado sound from La criatura queda altered in the way you determine.

Fallo crítico The afectado sound from La criatura queda altered y El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 minuto as it struggles with the disorienting effects of its altered sound.

Potenciado (5º) You can target up to 6 creatures or 6 objects, altering the sounds of all afectado creatures or objects in the same way.

Sea of Thought.name: Sea of Thought
Sea of Thought.description:
You cover the area in a sloshing torrent of semi-solidified thought, roughly ankle high. The area becomes difficult terrain, similarly to a shallow bog. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Fortaleza save against the shifting waves of thought. On a failure, it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, y con un fallo crítico, it is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Potenciado (+1) The radius of the spell's area se incrementa en 5 pies.

Sea Surge.name: Sea Surge
Sea Surge.description:
You slap or stomp on a nearby solid or liquid surface, sending a surge of water rushing away from you. The water forms a flat, 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-high wall of water between 5 y 15 feet wide (you decide). It moves 60 feet in a direction of your choice along the struck surface, extinguishing all non-magical fires, carrying along unattended objects of 1 Bulk or less, y pushing larger objects. The wave moves another 60 feet in the same direction at the start of your next turn, then vanishes. Large or smaller creatures in the area or that enter the area the wave moves through must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}. If the creature was Swimming, it gets a critical failure instead.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda pushed 20 feet in the wave's direction, is knocked Prone, y takes 3d6 contundente damage.

Seal Fate.name: Seal Fate
Seal Fate.description:
You utter a curse that a creature will meet a certain end-a death by freezing, stabbing, or another means you devise. Choose one type of damage from the following list: acid, contundente, cold, electricity, fire, negative, perforante, cortante, or sonic. The effect is based on the target's Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target gains weakness 2 to the chosen damage type hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Fallo As success, but La duración es de 1 minute. If La criatura queda reduced to 0 HP by the chosen damage y its Nivel is 7 or less, it dies.

Fallo crítico As failure, but La duración es de unlimited.

Potenciado(+2) The weakness se incrementa en 1, y the maximum Nivel of creature that can be automatically killed se incrementa en 4.

Searing Light.name: Luz abrasadora
Searing Light.description:
Disparas un rayo cegador de luz, teñido de energía sagrada. Haz una tirada de ataque a distancia. El rayo inflige 5d6 daño por fuego Si el objetivo es un infernal o un muerto viviente, infliges 5d6 daño bueno adicional [[/r 5d6[good]]].

Si la luz atraviesa un área de oscuridad mágica o tiene como objetivo a una criatura afectada por oscuridad mágica, luz abrasadora intenta contrarrestar la oscuridad. Si necesitas determinar si el rayo pasa a través de un área de oscuridad, traza una línea entre tu posición y la del objetivo del conjuro.

Éxito crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño por fuego y doble daño bueno si es un infernal o un muerto viviente.

Éxito El objetivo sufre daño completo.

Potenciado (+1) El daño por fuego se incrementa en 2d6 y el daño bueno contra los infernales y los muertos vivientes se incrementa también en 2d6.

Seashell of Stolen Sound.name: Seashell of Stolen Sound
Seashell of Stolen Sound.description:
Desencadenante A creature within range begins to make a sound.

You store a sound in a seashell to use as you will: the last words of a loved one, a dragon's mighty roar, the compromising conversation between two powerful diplomats, or even more strange y secret. As part of Casting this Spell, you must present an unbroken seashell. When you Cast the Spell, magic swirls around the triggering creature, copying the sounds they make, as well as any background noise, for the next minute y storing them in the seashell.

You or another creature can then play the sound back from the seashell during the spell's duration by Interacting with the seashell, but once the sounds have been played back, the seashell shatters y the spell ends.

As normal for spells with a duration until your next daily preparations, you can choose to continue expending the spell slot to prolong the duration of an existing seashell of stolen sound for another día. While the spell faithfully copies the sounds around the target, it doesn't reproduce any special auditory or sonic effects of the sound.

Secret Chest.name: Secret Chest
Secret Chest.description:
You banish a container y its contents to the Ethereal Plane, where you can retrieve it from later. The container's physical properties-the material from which it is made, any locks, or other features-are irrelevant to the casting of this spell, but the container can't contain any creatures. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast this Spell}, the container y all its contents are transported to a ryom location deep in the Ethereal Plane. Time passes normally for the container y its contents, y the environmental effects of the Ethereal Plane apply to it. Though very unlikely, it's possible for a creature on the Ethereal Plane to stumble upon the chest.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell to return the chest to your current location. If the spell ends by any other means, the container is lost on the Ethereal Plane y you can no longer recall it with this spell, though you could search for it in other ways.

Secret Page.name: Página secreta
Secret Page.description: Cambias el texto del objetivo por otro enteramente diferente. Si el texto es un libro de conjuros o un pergamino, puedes cambiarlo para mostrar un conjuro que conoces del nivel de página secreta o menor. El conjuro sustituto no puede ser lanzado ni utilizado para preparar un conjuro. También puedes transformar el texto en algún otro texto que has escrito o al que tienes acceso. Puedes especificar una contraseña que permite a una criatura tocar la página para intercambiar los textos. Debes elegir el texto de reemplazo y la contraseña (si decides ponerla) cuando Lanzas el conjuro.

See Invisibility.name: Ver lo invisible
See Invisibility.description:
Puedes ver criaturas y objetos @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisibles}. Puedes ver criaturas y los objetos invisibles. Aparecen ante ti como formas translúcidas y tienen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Ocultamiento} de ti.

Potenciado (5º) El conjuro tiene una duración de 8 horas

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{Efecto de conjuro: Ver lo invisible}

Sending.name: Recado
Sending.description: Envías a la criatura un mensaje mental de 25 palabras o menos y ésta te puede responder inmediatamente con su propio mensaje de 25 palabras o menos.

Sepulchral Mask.name: Sepulchral Mask
Sepulchral Mask.description:
You manifest a supernatural funerary mask, granting you a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws against emotion effects durante 1 minuto. Its somber countenance forces your foes to confront their regrets y sins. Each enemy in the area when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell} or that starts its turn in the area takes [[/r 1d4[mental]]] damage y must attempt a Will save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves against emotion effects durante 1 asalto.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y a -1 status penalty to Will saves against emotion effects durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the mental damage by [[/r 2d4[mental]]] y the emanation's radius by 5 pies.

Shadow Army.name: Shadow Army
Shadow Army.description:
You create dozens of semi-real copies of yourself that swarm across the battlefield y fight your enemies. You are virtually indistinguishable from your clones, allowing you to Hide y Sneak among them. An enemy that's in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area takes 3d10 mental damage y 3d10 contundente damage, y is possibly inflicted with a condition, depending on the result of its Will save. When you Cast the Spell, you choose a condition your shadows impose on a failed save: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1}.

Éxito crítico The creature takes no damage. For the duration of the spell, the creature gets a result one step better than it rolled on further saves against the spell, y can distinguish you from your clones without difficulty.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo, y gains the chosen condition.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, y gains the chosen condition.

Shadow Illusion.name: Shadow Illusion
Shadow Illusion.description:
You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness. The spell ends if the illusion is ever out of an area of dim light or darkness. If the illusion is an object, it must fit within a 20-foot burst, y the creature can be of any size up to Gargantuan, filling a 20-foot-by-20-foot space.

The object or creature appears to animate naturally; it even generates the appropriate sounds y smells, y feels believable to the touch, though its coloring is always muted.

If the illusion is a creature, shadow illusion has the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Criatura ilusoria} spell of the same Nivel, except it deals [[/r 2d8]] damage más your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of the amount listed in illusory creature.

Potenciado(+2) The area that an illusory object can fit in se incrementa en 10 pies [3 m].

The damage of the illusory creature's Strike se incrementa en [[/r 1d8]].

Shadow Jump.name: Shadow Jump
Shadow Jump.description:
You instantly transport yourself from one shadow to another. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleport} yourself y any items you're wearing y holding from your current space to a clear space you can see that's in dim light or darkness y within range. You can transport your familiar with this spell, but if shadow jump would bring any other creature with you-even if you're carrying the creature in an extradimensional container-the spell is disrupted.

Potenciado (8º) When you arrive at your destination, you can become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno or until you are no longer in an area of dim light or darkness, whichever comes first. The invisibility is an illusion effect.

Shadow Projectile.name: Shadow Projectile
Shadow Projectile.description:
Desencadenante An ally within 20 feet of you makes a ranged attack roll.

Creas un illusory duplicate of your ally's ranged attack to confuse your opponents. You launch an illusory double of your ally's projectile or spell at the same target, leaving the enemy unsure which attack to avoid. The target takes 3d8 mental damage, depending on its Will save. Regardless of the result of its save, it's temporarily immune to shadow projectile spells for 1 hora.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} against the triggering attack.

Fallo La criatura queda flat-footed against the triggering attack y takes full damage from your illusory projectile.

Fallo crítico As failure, but double damage.

Potenciado(+2) El daño se incrementa en 1d8.

Shadow Raid.name: Shadow Raid
Shadow Raid.description:
You spin illusions of flying shadows throughout the area. The shadows strike y cavort, harming your foes y blocking their vision with twisting shadow. Enemies in the area when you Cast the Spell take 6d8 contundente, perforante, or cortante damage, with a @Check[type:Reflejos|basic:true|traits:illusion] or @Check[type:will|basic:true|traits:illusion] save, as shadows explode into being. You choose the damage type when you Cast the Spell, y each creature chooses the type of save it attempts before it rolls the save. The shadows then persist in the area durante 1 minuto, dealing [[/r 3d8]] damage of the type you chose to any enemy that ends its turn in the area. All creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to enemies in the area, as the illusory shadows swarm over them y block light.

A creature that spends an action to Seek or otherwise interact with the shadow raid can attempt a Perception check to disbelieve it. On a success, the creature halves the damage it takes from the shadows, y the shadows no longer impede its vision. These benefits last until the spell ends.

Potenciado(9º) The initial damage se incrementa en 2d8, y the damage to a creature that ends its turn in the area se incrementa en 1d8 ([[/r 4d8]]).

Shadow Siphon.name: Sifón de sombra
Shadow Siphon.description:
Desencadenante Un conjuro o efecto mágico inflige daño.

Intercambiando energía material con la del Plano de la Sombra, transformas el conjuro desencadenante en una versión de sí mismo parcialmente ilusoria. Intenta contrarrestar el conjuro objetivo. Si el intento tiene éxito, cualquier criatura que sería dañada por el conjuro en su lugar sólo sufre mitad de daño, pero por lo demás el conjuro funciona de la forma normal. Trata como 2 mayor el nivel de sifón de sombra para contrarrestar para este intento.

Shadow Spy.name: Shadow Spy
Shadow Spy.description: You mix blood, soil, y shadow together to form a half-real homunculus in the shape of a crow, sparrow, or other bird. You then commy the bird to fly to a location within range y observe all around it. The bird has the statistics of a homunculus, save that it has all of your senses y shares your Perception modifier. Once the spell's duration elapses or upon a trigger you set (which must be fairly simple-"at dusk" or "when the judge leaves"), the bird flies to your location. If you wring its neck y drink its blood, you learn all that it saw since its creation.

Shadow Zombie.name: Shadow Zombie
Shadow Zombie.description:
You cast a shadow over the target zombie, briefly turning it into shadowy vapor y controlling its movement. While in this vaporous state, the zombie is a minion under your control, gains resistance 8 al daño físico, y is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate traits. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet y can slip through tiny cracks. If El objetivo queda already your minion when you cast the spell, it doesn't get a saving throw y becomes vaporous for 10 minutos. If El objetivo queda not your minion, it can attempt a Will save to resist the spell. If it's already under someone else's commy, the controlling creature also rolls a Will save, y the zombie uses the better result.

Éxito crítico El objetivo queda no afectado y is queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda your shadowy minion durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico As failure, but for 10 minutos.

Potenciado (4º) You can target a zombie of Nivel 5 o menor.

Shadow's Web.name: Shadow's Web
Shadow's Web.description:
Grasping darkness surges from you, dealing [[/r 14d4[negative]]] damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The creature takes half damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante 1 asalto, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} durante 1 asalto or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.

Potenciado (+1) The negative damage se incrementa en [[/r 2d4[negative]]].

Shaken Confidence.name: Shaken Confidence
Shaken Confidence.description:
Desencadenante An enemy within 30 feet of you critically fails an attack roll, Perception check, or skill check.

You mock the target for all its failings, twisting its self-confidence into doubt. The enemy attempts a Will saving throw.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda briefly shaken y unsure of its abilities. It must roll twice y take the worse result on the next roll of the same type as the critical failure that triggered the spell (such as the target's next Acrobatics check if the spell's trigger was a critical failure on an Acrobatics check). If the target doesn't attempt any qualifying checks, the spell ends at the end of the target's next turn.

Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.name: Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout
Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.description: Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon y deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice shall not falter, shall not rout's Nivel. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.

Shambling Horror.name: Shambling Horror
Shambling Horror.description:
You reanimate the corpse of a fallen creature as an undead minion under your control. The reanimated creature is an undead skeleton or zombie. Choose a skeleton or zombie stat block of the same size as the original creature y of a Nivel no higher than the creature's original Nivel. The shambling horror keeps Speeds it had in life, as well as melee Strikes that deal only physical damage. These attacks use the highest attack modifier from the skeleton or zombie you choose. Some of the skeleton's or zombie's abilities might not make sense for the shambling horror, y some abilities the creature had in life might not persist in undeath; the GM makes the final choice of what abilities the horror has.

A shambling horror has the minion trait. You can't control more than one shambling horror at the same time-if you create a new one while one is already under your control, you must choose one to release, causing it to lose the minion trait. Shambling horrors that have been released expire when the spell duration does. After the duration expires, you can cast shambling horror again on the same corpse to animate it once more. However, after the next sunrise, you can no longer animate the corpse as a shambling horror.

Undead Skeletons

Nivel Size Creature Name
-1 Medium @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.5H8ZX7y5IkUBhvhF]{Skeleton Guard}

11 Huge Zombie Mammoth

Shape Stone.name: Transformar piedra
Shape Stone.description:
Moldeas la piedra a tu elección, dándole una forma tosca. El proceso de moldeado es demasiado tosco como para poder dar lugar a partes intrincadas, detalles finos, piezas en movimiento o cosas similares. Cualquier criatura que hay encima de la piedra cuando la moldeas debe hacer una salvación de Reflejos o una prueba de Acrobacias. Éxito La criatura no resulta afectada.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} encima de la piedra.

Fallo crítico La criatura se cae de la piedra (si es posible) y queda tumbada en el suelo..

Shape Wood.name: Moldear la madera
Shape Wood.description: Moldeas la madera a tu elección, dándole una forma tosca. El proceso de moldeado es demasiado tosco como para poder dar lugar a partes intrincadas, detalles finos, piezas en movimiento o cosas similares. No puedes utilizar este conjuro para aumentar el valor del objeto de madera que estás moldeando.

Share Burden.name: Share Burden
Share Burden.description:
Desencadenante An ally within 30 feet is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful emotion effect, y you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.

You shoulder some of your ally's pain. Both you y your ally use the outcome one degree of success better than the result of your ally's saving throw, even if the triggering effect usually affects only one target.

Share Lore.name: Share Lore
Share Lore.description:
You share your knowledge with the touched creatures. Choose one Lore skill in which you are trained. The targets become trained in that Lore skill for the duration of the spell.

Potenciado (3º) The duration of the spell is 1 hora y you can target up to five creatures.

Potenciado (5º) The duration of the spell is 8 horas, you can target up to five creatures, y you can share up to two Lore skills in which you are trained.

Shared Nightmare.name: Pesadilla compartida
Shared Nightmare.description:
Fundiendo tu mente con la del objetivo, intercambiáis visiones desorientadoras de las pesadillas de cada uno. Uno de los dos quedará @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido}, y quién será depende de la salvación de Voluntad del objetivo.

Éxito crítico Quedas confundido durante 1 asalto.

Éxito Al inicio de tu siguiente turno, inviertes tu primera acción en el estado confundido, y después actúas con normalidad.

Fallo Igual que éxito, pero el objetivo es quien se ve afectado en lugar de ti, invirtiendo su primera acción cada turno en el estado confundido. La duración es de 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda confundido durante 1 minuto.

Shatter Mind.name: Shatter Mind
Shatter Mind.description:
@Template[type:cone|distance:15]

You telepathically assail the minds of your foes. You deal mental damage equal to 2d4 más your spellcasting ability modifier to all enemies in the area, with a basic Will save.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en [[/r 1d4]]{1d4}.

Amp You increase the area of the spell to your choice of a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] or @Template[type:cone|distance:60], y the damage dice for the spell change to d10s. Creatures that fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} until the start of your next turn (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} con un fallo crítico).

Shattering Gem.name: Shattering Gem
Shattering Gem.description:
A large gem floats around the target in an erratic pattern. The gem has 5 Hit Points. Each time a creature Strikes the target, the target attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:11]. On a success, the gem blocks the attack, so the attack first damages the gem y then applies any remaining damage to the target. If the gem is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it shatters, immediately dealing the creature that destroyed it 1d8 cortante damage (basic Reflejos save), as long as that creature is within 10 feet of the target.

Potenciado (+1) The gem has 5 additional HP, y the damage dealt by its detonation se incrementa en 1d8.

Shepherd of Souls.name: Shepherd of Souls
Shepherd of Souls.description:
You stay the hy of fate for one not yet destined to die, sacrificing some of your own vitality to heal them.

You lose up to 15 Hit Points as a sacrifice, y the target reduces the damage by twice the number of Hit Points sacrificed. If this reduction exceeds the amount of damage, the target recovers Hit Points equal to the excess amount.

Potenciado(+2) The maximum number of Hit Points you can sacrifice se incrementa en 5.

Shielding Strike.name: Shielding Strike
Shielding Strike.description:
As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action y lifts your shield. Make a melee Strike. You can then either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Escudo} if you're wielding one or cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Escudo} Si tienes the spell.

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Shift Blame.name: Shift Blame
Shift Blame.description:
Desencadenante You or another creature attacks a creature or fails at a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check.

You alter the target's memories of the triggering event as they form. You choose another creature (which can be you) with the capacity to make the triggering attack or skill check, y you alter the target's memories to recall the creature you chose as responsible for the triggering attack or skill check. The target must attempt a Will save y is then queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Éxito crítico The target knows you attempted to alter its memories.

Éxito The target doesn't realize you attempted to alter its memories, though it knows you cast a spell.

Fallo You successfully alter the target's memory. It isn't forced to react to the new memories in a particular way, y it's likely to question them if they contradict other information it knows or are implausible for the situation.

Shifting Form.name: Forma cambiante
Shifting Form.description:
Obtienes una de las siguientes aptitudes a tu elección. Puedes Disipar este conjuro.

  • Obtienes un bonificador de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.j6po934p4jcUVC6l]{20 pies (6 m) por estatus a tu Velocidad}.
  • Obtienes una Velocidad de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.nbW4udOUTrCGL3Gf]{Trepar} o de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Um25D1qLtZWOSBny]{Nadar} igual a la mitad de tu Velocidad terrestre.
  • Obtienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.A48jNUOAmCljx8Ru]{Visión en la oscuridad}.
  • obtienes un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.14AFzcwkN019dzcl]{par de zarpas}. Las zarpas te proporcionan ataques sin armas ágiles y sutiles que infligen 1d8 daño cortante.
  • Obtienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.byXkHIKFwuKrZ55M]{Olfato 60 feet (impreciso)}.

Shifting Sand.name: Shifting Sand
Shifting Sand.description:
You cause the surface to heave. The area becomes difficult terrain and any tracks in the area are destroyed by the churning ground. Creatures standing in the area take a -1 status penalty to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} and Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can move the churning area up to 10 feet in any direction. Creatures immobilized by the spell are carried along with the shifting sand in the same direction, if possible; this movement is forced movement. Creatures that enter or begin their turn standing in the shifting sand must attempt a Reflejos save.

Critical Success La criatura no resulta afectada and ignores the area's difficult terrain and penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Success The creature ignores the area's penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Failure La criatura queda afectado normally by the spell this turn.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} within the spell's area until it Escapes. If the creature was already immobilized by shifting sands, it also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Potenciado (5º) The status penalty increases to -2 and the spell's range increases to 60 feet.

Potenciado (7º) The status penalty increases to -3, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 30-foot burst.

Potenciado (9º) The status penalty increases to -4, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 40-foot burst.

Shockwave.name: Shockwave
Shockwave.description:
You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth. Terrestrial creatures in the afectado area must attempt a Reflejos save to avoid stumbling as the shockwave shakes the ground.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} until the start of its next turn.

Fallo The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo crítico As failure, más the creature takes 1d6 damage.

Potenciado (+1) The area se incrementa en 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd Nivel, y so on).

Shooting Star.name: Shooting Star
Shooting Star.description:
You let loose a projectile that flies true y leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it. Make a ranged Strike, ignoring the target's concealment y reducing the target's cover by one degree for this Strike only (greater to styard, styard to lesser, y lesser to none). If the Strike hits, the meteor trail hangs in the air. This gives the benefits of concealment negation y cover reduction to any attacks made against the creature (by anyone) until the start of your next turn.

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Show the Way.name: Show the Way
Show the Way.description:
You y afectado allies gain preternatural knowledge of the path ahead, allowing you to intuit the best way forward y avoid potential obstacles such as difficult or confusing terrain. For the purpose of long-distance overly travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain reduces you to only three-quarters your travel Speed instead of half, y traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only half your travel Speed instead of one-third. Show the way does not prevent you from falling into traps or encountering other artificial obstacles y hazards.

Potenciado(+6) For the purpose of long-distance overly travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain doesn't reduce your travel Speed at all, y traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only three-quarters of its normal value instead of one-third.

Shroud of Flame.name: Shroud of Flame
Shroud of Flame.description:
You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames. Each creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, Grapples you, or otherwise touches you takes [[/r 3[fire]]] damage. When you Cast the Spell y the first time you sustain it each round, each creature in the area takes [[/r 3d6[fire]]] damage (basic Reflejos save).

Potenciado (+1) The damage caused by touching you se incrementa en 1, y the daño por fuego when you Cast the Spell or sustain it se incrementa en 1d6.

Shroud of Night.name: Shroud of Night
Shroud of Night.description:
Drawing your hy in a sweeping gesture, you shroud the target in a veil of night. The target's eyes are blanketed in darkness. If you cast this hex on a willing ally (for instance, one with light blindness), the ally can choose which result it gets without rolling. Regardless of the outcome, El objetivo queda then temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda shrouded in murky darkness. Unless the target has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}, other creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to it.

Sigil.name: Sello
Sigil.description:
Colocas sin causar daño alguno tu sello mágico (que es único) y de más o menos 1 pulgada cuadrada (6,45 cm2) de tamaño sobre la criatura u objeto designado. La marca puede ser visible o invisible, y puedes cambiarla de un estado a otro mediante una acción de Interactuar para tocar al objetivo. La marca puede ser limpiada o raspada con 5 minutos de trabajo. Si está sobre una criatura, se desvanece de forma natural al cabo de una semana. El tiempo que dura la marca aumenta con el nivel de potenciación.

Potenciado (3º) El sello se desvanece al cabo de 1 mes.

Potenciado (5º El sello se desvanece al cabo de 1 año.

Potenciado (7º) El sello nunca se desvanece.

Sign of Conviction.name: Sign of Conviction
Sign of Conviction.description:
You conjure the religious symbol of your deity into the air above you in the same space you sty in, wielding the power of your faith to smite your foes. This religious symbol is immobile, made of pure magical force, y can't be damaged. As long as you Sustain sign of conviction, obtienes +1 status bonus to AC y saving throws y are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}. The DC for any effect to force you to move out of your space (such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} action) is equal to your spell DC or the normal DC, whichever is higher. If you stop being immobilized or are moved out of your space, sign of conviction immediately ends.

When you Cast the Spell y each time you Sustain the Spell, the religious symbol emits a blast of energy at a target within 100 pies. Make a spell attack roll that deals 2d10 damage on a success (see below for determining damage type) y double damage on a critical success. You can Sustain the Spell multiple times in the same round to emit an array of blasts.

If you worship a good deity, the spell gains the good y light traits, deals your choice of either fire or good damage, y emits bright light in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20]. If you worship an evil deity, the spell gains the evil y darkness traits, deals your choice of cold or evil damage, y reduces the light Nivel in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] to dim light if it would be brighter. If you worship a neutral deity, the spell gains the force trait y deals force damage.

Potenciado(+2) El daño se incrementa en 1d10.

Silence.name: Silencio
Silence.description:
El objetivo no emite sonido alguno, evitando que las criaturas lo detecten utilizando sólo el oído u otros sentidos. El objetivo no puede utilizar ataques sónicos, ni acciones con el rasgo auditivo. Esto evita que pueda lanzar conjuros que incluyen componentes verbales.

Potenciado (4º) El efecto de conjuro emana de la criatura tocada, silenciando todo sonido que entra o que pasa a través de un radio de 10 pies (3 m) y evitando cualquier efecto auditivo y sónico en el área afectada. Dentro del radio, las criaturas están sujetas a los mismos efectos que el objetivo. Dependiendo de la posición del efecto, una criatura podría notar la falta de sonido (que, por ejemplo, bloquea el ruido procedente de una fiesta).

Silver's Refrain.name: Silver's Refrain
Silver's Refrain.description:
The "Song of Silver" was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song's benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

Weapon y unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using dimension door. If a devil attempts to enter the area using dimension door y the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

Simulacrum.name: Simulacrum
Simulacrum.description:
Creas un illusory duplicate of the target creature by animating ice or snow sculpted in its shape. The simulacrum is a 4º-Nivel creature with no special abilities. If it needs to attempt a roll or use a DC, use the moderate number for a monster, except as noted below. It doesn't have any specific memories from the target, but it can use information about the creature gained from any of the casters to Impersonate the target. It looks exactly like the target y has a Deception modifier to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Disfrazarse} that creature equal to the modifier of the secondary spellcaster who rolled the Deception check, with a +4 status bonus.

While it doesn't have any of the original's special abilities, like a dragon's arma de aliento, the illusions that make up the simulacrum allow it to appear to use those abilities; they just never seem to have an effect. For instance, against a simulacrum dragon's arma de aliento, all creatures in the area seem to critically succeed at their saving throws y take no damage. Creatures can attempt to disbelieve the illusion by attempting a Perception check against the Deception DC of the secondary spellcaster who rolled the Deception check.

Éxito crítico You bring the simulacrum to life. It has the minion trait y is under your absolute control. obtienes direct mental link with the simulacrum y can spend an action to commy the simulacrum via this link, even at a distance.

Éxito As a critical success, but there is no special link between you y the simulacrum. You must spend an action to commy it verbally or by some other means.

Fallo The ritual fails y has no effect.

Fallo crítico The simulacrum awakens, but it isn't your minion y is hostile to all the casters. It does everything it can to destroy them, but if it can't immediately slay them, the simulacrum tries to escape y plots their demise.

Slough Skin.name: Slough Skin
Slough Skin.description:
You continually y harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately, quickly moving damaging substances away from your body. The flat check to remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Daño persistente} from effects that coat your skin (such as most persistent daño por ácido) is reduced to 5, y obtienes +2 status bonus to your initial save against contact veneno (but not to further saves, since by that point, the toxin has already entered your system). If you're suffering from an effect other than Persistent Damage that depends on continuous contact with your skin, if that effect allows a saving throw, you receive a new saving throw against that effect at the end of each turn when you attempt your flat checks against Persistent Damage, y you also receive a +2 status bonus to those saving throws.

While afectado by this spell, your continually shedding skin makes you much easier to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}. Anyone Tracking you gains a +2 circumstance bonus to do so, y you cannot Hide Your Tracks.

Slow.name: Lentificar
Slow.description:
Dilatas el fluir del tiempo alrededor del objetivo, lentificando sus acciones.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (6º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Snare Hopping.name: Snare Hopping
Snare Hopping.description:
You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there. You teleport the target snare to another unoccupied location in range.

Potenciado (+1) The range of the spell se incrementa en 10 pies [3 m].

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.description:
You throw a magically propelled y chilled ball of dense snow. The target takes 2d4 cold damage y potentially other effects, depending on the result of your spell attack roll.

Éxito crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds durante 1 asalto.

Éxito The target takes full damage y a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds durante 1 asalto.

Fallo No effect.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d4.

Soft Landing.name: Soft Landing
Soft Landing.description: You create a magical field that buoys any creature or object falling into the area, providing a harmless landing from any height. As you generally fall 1,500 feet per round, you can cast this spell while you are falling to ensure a safe landing, provided you can see your landing point and it's within range.

Solid Fog.name: Niebla sólida
Solid Fog.description: Conjuras un banco de niebla tan espesa que impide tanto el movimiento como la visión. Funciona como @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Niebla de oscurecimiento} (pág. 363), excepto que el área es también terreno difícil. Puedes Disipar el conjuro.

Sonata Span.name: Sonata Span
Sonata Span.description: By playing a brief tune on an instrument or in song, you cause the notes of the melody to physically manifest into a shimmering, translucent path. This path doesn't need to be over solid ground y can tilt up or down diagonally up to 45 degrees, but it must be a straight, 5-foot-wide line. It can support as many creatures as can physically fit on the bridge.

Song of Marching.name: Song of Marching
Song of Marching.description:
You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move. You y your allies in the area can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle} for the spell's duration, even though you are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustaining the Spell}. You y your allies then become queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 día.

Potenciado (6º) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 2 horas.

Potenciado(9º) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 4 horas.

Song of Strength.name: Song of Strength
Song of Strength.description:
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You y your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks y to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8adLKKzJy49USYJt]{Efecto de conjuro: Song of Strength}

Special Si tienes the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Inspire Heroics} composition spell, you can use that composition to improve the bonus granted by song of strength in the same way as Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Fjnm1l59KH5YJ7G9]{Success on Inspire Heroics}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8XaSpienzVXLmcfp]{Critical success on Inspire Heroics}

Song of the Fallen.name: Song of the Fallen
Song of the Fallen.description:
You chant a dirge or an elegy that either rouses the dead to action or reminds undead that they should lay to rest.

If you target dead creatures, the bodies animate y can continue acting as if they were alive. A creature animated in this way has 60 Puntos de Golpe temporales. The animated creatures are slowed 1 but can otherwise act normally. Creatures animated with this spell die again once the spell ends.

If you target undead creatures, each undead must attempt a basic Will save.

Éxito crítico The undead takes 5d6 positive damage.

Éxito The undead takes 10d6 positive damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo The undead takes 100 positive damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico The undead is destroyed.

Soothing Ballad.name: Balada tranquilizadora
Soothing Ballad.description:
Recurres a tu musa para tranquilizar a tus aliados. Elige entre uno de los tres siguientes efectos:

  • El conjuro intenta contrarrestar los efectos de miedo sobre los objetivos.
  • El conjuro intenta contrarrestar los efectos que imponen parálisis sobre los objetivos.
  • El conjuro restablece 7d8 Puntos de Golpe a los objetivos.

Potenciado (+1) Cuando se usa para curar, balada tranquilizadora restablece 1d8 Puntos de Golpe adicionales.

Soothing Blossoms.name: Soothing Blossoms
Soothing Blossoms.description:
Blossoms grow from the ground in a small area, soothing away afflictions y persistent pains y harm. When any creature in that area rolls a successful save against a veneno or disease effect, it gets a critical success instead. The blossoms grant assisted recovery to everyone in the area to end their persistent damage, both when the spell is cast y at the start of each of your turns. Once the duration ends, the flowers lose their magical effect, but a few of them might survive in the area as long as they can naturally. This spell doesn't give a benefit on a save against an affliction unless the stage lasts 10 minutos or less.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.nIryhRgeiacQw1Em]{Efecto de conjuro: Soothing Blossoms}

Soothing Mist.name: Soothing Mist
Soothing Mist.description:
You call forth a magical mist of positive energy that envelops a creature.

The mist restores [[/r 2d8[healing]]]{2d8 Hit Points} to a target living creature y ends one source of persistent acid, bleed, fire, negative, or veneno damage affecting it. If La criatura queda taking persistent damage from multiple sources, you select which one is removed.

Against an undead target, you deal [[/r 2d8[positive]]] damage (basic Fortaleza save); if it fails the save, it also takes [[/r 2[persistent,positive]]] damage.

Potenciado (+1) The amount of healing (or damage to an undead target) se incrementa en [[/r 1d8]], y the persistent positive damage to an undead creature se incrementa en 1.

Soothing Spring.name: Soothing Spring
Soothing Spring.description:
Steam wisps into the air as a stone-lined pool appears in the ground y fills with hot water that bubbles up from the earth. The water is comfortably hot y smells mildly sulfurous in a not-unpleasant way. You are able to draw out the full energizing potential of the mineral-rich water. Any creature that spends the full hora soaking in the hot spring or basking in the mud from the bottom of the pit regains 10d8 Hit Points y feels refreshed, losing the fatigued condition. As normal for effects that remove fatigue, this doesn't remove any underlying source of fatigue, such as lack of sleep, causing the condition to return if the underlying source isn't addressed.

The pool is 20 feet on each side, y it's 5 feet deep. It can contain 16 Medium or smaller creatures at a time. A Large creature counts as eight Medium creatures y a Huge creature fills the entire pool. This pool has the structure trait y the same restrictions as magic items that create structures.

Potenciado (+1) The healing se incrementa en 2d8.

Soothing Words.name: Palabras de calma
Soothing Words.description:
Intentas calmar al objetivo pronunciando palabras calmantes en un tono tranquilo y sosegado. El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de salvación de Voluntad. Este bonificador se incrementa a +2 contra los efectos de emoción.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.an4yZ6dyIDOFa1wa]{Efecto de conjuro: Palabras de calma}

Además, cuando Lanzas este conjuro puedes intentar contrarrestar un efecto de emoción sobre el objetivo.

Potenciado (5º) El bonificador a las salvaciones se incrementa a +2, o a +3 contra los efectos de emoción.

Soul Siphon.name: Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description:
You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your own vitality. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save or take 1d4 negative damage. You gain Puntos de Golpe temporales equal to the total amount of HP the target loses, including the HP lost from becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado}.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1}.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4.

Soulshelter Vessel.name: Soulshelter Vessel
Soulshelter Vessel.description:
You connect the spirit of the target creature with the target object, giving their spirit a durable vessel that protects y empowers their body. You create a pool of healing within the object, which starts out with 40 HP worth of healing per Bulk of the object. (These HP can only be used by the creature, y don't increase the object's HP.) When you Cast the Spell, the targeted creature regains 10 HP, which come out of the object's pool. You can also spend a single action-which has the concentrate, good, healing, necromancy, y positive traits-to repeat this transfer. When the pool is empty, the object becomes broken. The spell ends if the object becomes broken or the targets are no longer within 500 feet of each other.

If the target creature would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, the creature regains either 20 HP or the amount left in the object's pool, whichever is lower. The object immediately becomes broken, ending the spell.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the maximum Bulk of the item by 1 (potentially increasing the size of the healing pool), the amount of HP exchanged each time the stone is used by 5, y the amount of HP exchanged when the creature would be reduced to 0 HP by 10 (or by the amount left in the pool, if it's lower).

Speak with Animals.name: Hablar con los animales
Speak with Animals.description: Puedes hacer preguntas a los animales, recibir respuestas de ellos o utilizar con ellos la habilidad Diplomacia. El conjuro no los hace más amistosos de lo normal. Es probable que los animales astutos sean escuetos y evasivos, mientras que los menos inteligentes a menudo hacen comentarios inútiles.

Speak with Plants.name: Hablar con las plantas
Speak with Plants.description: Puedes hacer preguntas a las plantas o recibir respuestas de ellas, pero el conjuro no las hace más amistosas o inteligentes de lo normal. La mayoría de las plantas tienen un punto de vista muy característico del mundo que las rodea, por lo que no reconocen detalles acerca de las criaturas o saben algo acerca del mundo más allá de su vecindad inmediata. Los monstruos que son plantas inteligentes suelen ser escuetos y evasivos, mientras que los menos inteligentes a menudo hacen comentarios inútiles.

Speaking Sky.name: Speaking Sky
Speaking Sky.description:
The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration y air movement.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.mhklZ6wjfty0bF44]{Efecto de conjuro: Speaking Sky}

Spectral Hand.name: Mano espectral
Spectral Hand.description: Creas una mano semicorporal a partir de tu esencia, que puede llevar a cabo conjuros de toque por cuenta tuya. Siempre que Lanzas un conjuro con un alcance de toque, puedes hacer que la mano gatee hasta un objetivo dentro del alcance, a ras de suelo, lo toque y luego vuelva a ti también gateando. Cuando llevas a cabo un ataque de conjuro cuerpo a cuerpo con la mano, utilizas tus bonificadores normales. La mano se puede mover todo lo necesario dentro del alcance. La mano dispone de tu CA y de tus salvaciones, pero cualquier daño a la misma la destruye y te causa 1d6 daño.

Spell Immunity.name: Inmunidad a los conjuros
Spell Immunity.description: Proteges a una criatura contra los efectos de un solo conjuro. Elige un conjuro y pronuncia su nombre en voz alta como parte del componente verbal. Inmunidad a los conjuros intenta contrarrestar dicho conjuro siempre que su objetivo es designado a su vez objetivo del conjuro cuyo nombre se ha pronunciado o está en el área del mismo. Contrarrestar con éxito un conjuro que tiene como objetivo un área o unos objetivos múltiples niega los efectos sólo para el objetivo de inmunidad a los conjuros.

Spell Turning.name: Retorno de conjuros
Spell Turning.description: Esta abjuración retorna hacia su lanzador los conjuros dirigidos contra ti. Cuando un conjuro te designa como objetivo, puedes invertir una acción en intentar retornarlo. Esto utiliza las reglas de contrarrestar conjuros, y si el conjuro es contrarrestado con éxito, sus efectos se aplican a su lanzador. Tanto si el intento de contrarrestar tiene éxito como si no, retorno de conjuros se acaba a continuación. Retorno de conjuros no puede afectar a conjuros que no tienen objetivo designado (como por ejemplo, los de área). Si retornas un conjuro a un lanzador que está a su vez bajo los efectos de retorno de conjuros, el suyo puede intentar devolvértelo; si lo hace, su intento de contrarrestar tiene éxito de forma automática.

Spellmaster's Ward.name: Spellmaster's Ward
Spellmaster's Ward.description:
Duration sustained up to 1 minute

You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of runes you create by one, to a maximum of three runes for 3 actions.

When you next take damage from a spell, a rune is expended to prevent [[/r 2d6[damage]]] damage. If damage from the triggering spell remains, additional runes are expended until the damage is completely negated, or until all runes have been spent, whichever comes first.

Potenciado (+1) Each rune prevents an additional [[/r 1[damage]]] damage.

Spike Stones.name: Spike Stones
Spike Stones.description:
Long, sharp spikes of solid rock thrust up from the ground in the area. The area becomes difficult terrain y hazardous terrain. A creature that moves on the ground through the area takes 3 perforante damage for every square of that area it moves into.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by 1.

Spinning Staff.name: Spinning Staff
Spinning Staff.description:
You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes y transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Spellstrike}. Make a melee Strike with your staff against one foe y then a second melee Strike with your staff against a different foe. Your multiple attack penalty applies to both of these attacks as normal.

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Spirit Link.name: Vínculo espiritual
Spirit Link.description:
Formas un vínculo espiritual con otra criatura, lo que te permite compartir su dolor. Cuando Lanzas este conjuro y al inicio de cada turno, si el objetivo está por debajo de su máximo de Puntos de Golpe, recupera 2 Puntos de Golpe (o la diferencia entre los actuales y el máximo, si es menor). Tú pierdes tantos puntos de Golpe como los que recupera el objetivo..

Se trata de una transferencia espiritual, por lo que no se aplicará efecto alguno que incremente los Puntos de Golpe que el objetivo recupera o que disminuya los que tú pierdes. Esta transferencia también ignorará cualesquiera Puntos de Golpe temporales que tengáis el objetivo o tú. Como quiera que este efecto no implica energía positiva ni negativa, vínculo espiritual funciona aunque el objetivo o tú seáis muertos vivientes. Mientras persiste la duración, no obtienes beneficio alguno de la regeneración o de la curación rápida. Puedes Disipar este conjuro y si en algún momento llegas a 0 Puntos de Golpe, se acaba automáticamente.

Potenciado (+1) El número de Puntos de Golpe transferidos cada vez se incrementa en 2.

Spirit Object.name: Spirit Object
Spirit Object.description:
Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring an object to life. The object gains a means of locomotion, such as sprouting chicken legs, y Strides up to 25 feet to a space you decide within range. If you spent 2 actions Casting the Spell, the object then attacks one creature of your choice adjacent to its new space. Make a melee spell attack roll against the creature. On a success, the creature takes contundente, perforante, or cortante damage (as appropriate for the object) equal to 1d4 más your spellcasting ability modifier, y on a critical success, it takes double damage.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the maximum Bulk of the target by 1 y the damage by 1d4.

Spirit Sense.name: Spirit Sense
Spirit Sense.description:
You open your mind to the metaphysical, enabling you to sense nearby spirits. Even if you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, you get a check to find haunts y spirits in the area. obtienes +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, y skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC y saving throws against haunts y spirits.

Potenciado (6º) The spell's duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Spirit Veil.name: Spirit Veil
Spirit Veil.description:
You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to all creatures, y you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) You can target one additional willing creature within 30 pies (9 m). The spell ends if any target physically Interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action.

Spiritual Anamnesis.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
Spiritual Anamnesis.description:
Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (y may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead y creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, y many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, y if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 minuto y babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.

Fallo crítico As failure, but El objetivo queda also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 3}.

Spiritual Attunement.name: Spiritual Attunement
Spiritual Attunement.description:
You attune yourself to a spiritual plane of the Outer Sphere, connecting your spirit without fully transporting to it. Your Strikes y spells gain the alignment traits of the plane you chose, which deals additional damage to creatures with a weakness to either of those alignment traits. Furthermore, the plane protects you from energy of the alignments that oppose the plane. You gain resistance 5 to damage of the alignments that oppose those of your chosen plane. For example, if you chose Heaven, your Strikes would gain the good y lawful traits, y you would gain resistance to chaotic y evil. If you choose the Boneyard, La resistencia is to negative y positive damage instead.

Potenciado(+2) La resistencia se incrementa en 5.

The nine main planes of the Outer Sphere are the homes of many deities, celestials, monitors, y fiends. Their names, along with their alignments, are: Heaven (LG), Nirvana (NG), Elysium (CG), Axis (LN), the Boneyard (N), the Maelstrom (CN), Hell (LE), Abaddon (NE), y the Abyss (CE).

Spiritual Torrent.name: Spiritual Torrent
Spiritual Torrent.description:
You release your spiritual essence in a torrential blast of energy, dealing 10d6 damage. If you're a living creature, this spell deals positive damage y gains the positive trait. If you're an undead creature, this spell deals negative damage y gains the negative trait. The spell's effect is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

2 (somático, verbal) The spell targets all creatures in a línea de 60 pies (18 m) (18 m).

3 (material, somático, verbal) The spell targets all creatures in a 60-foot cone.

Potenciado (+1) The spell's damage se incrementa en 2d6.

Splash of Art.name: Salpicadura de arte
Splash of Art.description:
Un diluvio de pinturas ilusorias y coloridas, herramientas u otros símbolos del arte y del artesanado flotan por el área. Tira 1d4 para determinar el color de la ilusión. Cada criatura del área debe hacer una salvación de Fortaleza. Con un éxito, una criatura no queda afectada. Con un fallo o un fallo crítico, la criatura sufre los resultados indicados en la tabla según el color.

Salpicadura de arte

1d4ColorFalloFallo crítico
1Blanco@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbrado} 1 asaltoDeslumbrado 1 minuto
2Rojo@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 1 asalto@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante 1 asalto
3Amarillo@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}
4Azul@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} durante 1 asalto@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} durante 1 asalto

Split Shadow.name: Split Shadow
Split Shadow.description:
You create a shadow double of the target by drawing energy directly from the Shadow Plane into a mirror y shaping it into an exact, quasi-real duplicate. When the mirror is shattered at the end of the ritual, the double steps out y comes into existence. The duplicate is a creature 3 Nivels lower than the target, with the same abilities as the target but reduced to the appropriate Nivel. The shadow double looks identical to the target y has the same general mannerisms y personality. However, it only has a vague sense of the target's memories. It has a Deception modifier to Impersonate the target equal to the modifier of the secondary spellcaster who rolled the Deception or Performance check, with a +4 status bonus.

Éxito crítico You bring the shadow double to life. It is under your absolute control. obtienes direct mental link with the shadow double y can spend an action to commy it via this link, even at a distance.

Éxito As a critical success, but there is no special link between you y the shadow double. You must spend an action to commy it verbally or by some other means.

Fallo The ritual fails y has no effect.

Fallo crítico When the mirror is broken at the end of the ritual, the double appears but has the statistics of an elite greater shadow with all the knowledge of the target y the same Deception modifier a shadow double would have had if the ritual had succeeded.

Split the Tongue.name: Split the Tongue
Split the Tongue.description:
The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue. The creature takes 1d8 cortante damage y must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4 rounds}.

Fallo crítico As failure, but La criatura sufre doble daño y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4 rounds}.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d8.

Spout.name: Spout
Spout.description:
Area 5-foot cube or 5-foot burst

Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take contundente damage equal to 1d4 más your spellcasting ability modifier, with a basic Reflejos saving throw.

You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

Spray of Stars.name: Spray of Stars
Spray of Stars.description:
You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing 1d4 daño por fuego. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The creature takes half damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is Dazzled for 3 asaltos.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y is Dazzled durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4.

Stagnate Time.name: Stagnate Time
Stagnate Time.description:
You examine the time stream in a particular area, then proceed to stick a few metaphorical pins into it, thickening y slowing down the flow of time until it rumbles along like a river of molasses. Any creature that begins its turn in the area must attempt a Will save.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} this turn.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} this turn.

Stasis.name: Stasis
Stasis.description:
The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place. The target must attempt a Will save (an unattended object automatically critically fails its save).

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.
