Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1} as time thickens around it.

Fallo Time ceases to pass for the target durante 1 asalto. It is invulnerable to all damage, it cannot be targeted or afectado by anything, y no rounds elapse for any timed durations, conditions, afflictions, y other effects it has. While in stasis, the target can't be moved, y it remains fixed in place, defying gravity if need be.

Fallo crítico As failure, but El objetivo queda held in stasis for 3 asaltos. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round or end it entirely on a critical success.

Statuette.name: Statuette
Statuette.description:
This ritual is a variant of the shrink item spell that allows for the transformation of significantly larger items. You transform the object into a tiny statuette of itself that is Light Bulk. The ritual does not shrink any creatures inside or on top of the item when it is transformed. The item remains in statuette form until the ritual's duration expires or until a creature places it on a stable surface y uses a 10-minute activity to Interact with the item to enlarge it. When restored to its normal size, the object simply pushes other creatures y objects aside or harmlessly contains them, as a magic item with the structure trait.

Your Arcana check determines how long the object remains in statuette form.

Éxito crítico The object remains a statuette for 1 week.

Éxito The object remains a statuette for 1 día.

Fallo You fail to shrink the object.

Fallo crítico You fail to shrink the object, y the highest-Nivel item you carry of light Bulk or more shrinks to a tiny, unusable figurine of itself, weighing negligible bulk, for 1 week.

Status.name: Sitación
Status.description:
En tanto en cuanto el objetivo y tú estéis en el mismo plano de existencia y ambos estéis vivos, serás consciente de su estado. Conoces la distancia hasta él, la dirección y cualquier estado que le afecta.

Potenciado (4º) El alcance del conjuro se incrementa a 30 pies (9 m) y puedes designar como objetivo hasta a 10 criaturas.

Steal Shadow.name: Steal Shadow
Steal Shadow.description:
You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened y vulnerable. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 1 asalto.

Fallo The target takes [[/r 3d4[negative]]] damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} for the spell's duration as you tear its shadow away, collecting it in your hy. On subsequent rounds, the first time each round you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, you can throttle the shadow to deal [[/r 3d4[negative]]] damage to the target (basic Fortaleza save). Until the spell ends, the target doesn't cast a shadow.

Fallo crítico As failure, but El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2}.

Potenciado (+1) The damage when the spell is cast y when it is sustained se incrementa en [[/r 1d4[negative]]].

Steal the Sky.name: Steal the Sky
Steal the Sky.description:
Desencadenante You make a successful unarmed Strike against a flying creature.

You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target descends 60 pies (18 m). If it hits a surface, it takes contundente damage as if it had fallen.

Fallo As success; if the target hits a surface, it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} y can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico As failure, y La criatura sufre doble daño from hitting a surface.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the distance the creature must descend by 20 pies (6 m).

Steal Voice.name: Steal Voice
Steal Voice.description:
You steal a creature's voice, rendering them mute. The effect is determined by the target's Fortaleza save. The target then becomes temporarily immune durante 1 minuto. A creature that has no voice or can't speak is immune to this spell.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda voiceless until the end of its next turn. A voiceless creature can't speak, create vocal sounds, or take auditory actions (including supplying verbal or commy components). As long as El objetivo queda voiceless, whenever you speak, you can choose to have your voice sound like either your voice or the target's voice.

Fallo As success, but La duración es de 1 minute.

Fallo crítico As success, but La duración es de permanent.

Stinking Cloud.name: Nube apestosa
Stinking Cloud.description:
Creas una nube de niebla pútrida en el área. La nube funciona como@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Niebla de oscurecimiento} (pág. 363), excepto que provoca náuseas a las criaturas que acaban su turno en el interior (el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} no es un efecto de veneno))

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificada 1} mientras permanece en el interior de la nube.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesta 2} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificada 1} hasta que abandona la nube.

Stoke the Heart.name: Stoke the Heart
Stoke the Heart.description:
Intense fervor fills the target creature, empowering their blows. The target gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. Once this spell ends, El objetivo queda temporarily immune durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado(+2) The status bonus to damage se incrementa en 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.TpVkVALUBrBQjULn]{Efecto de conjuro: Stoke the Heart}

Stone Lance.name: Stone Lance
Stone Lance.description:
You conjure a jagged lance of stone y then launch it at a foe. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 6d6 perforante damage y the lance impales the creature, giving it a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds hasta que Huye. On a critical hit, if La criatura queda on the ground, the lance also embeds into the ground y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizes} the creature until it Escapes. A creature that Escapes after being impaled takes [[/r 3[persistent,bleed]]] damage. When the spell ends, the lance crumbles into dirt, freeing the target if it hasn't Escaped.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6 y the persistent bleed damage for Escapes by 1.

Stone Tell.name: Piedra parlante
Stone Tell.description: Puedes plantear preguntas a la piedra natural o trabajada y obtener respuestas de ella. Si bien la piedra no es inteligente, con quien tú hablas es con los espíritus naturales de la piedra, que tienen una personalidad coloreada por el tipo de piedra, así como por el tipo de estructura de la que forma parte en el caso de la piedra trabajada. La perspectiva, la percepción y el conocimiento de una piedra le dan una visión del mundo lo bastante diferente a la de un humano como para no considerar importantes los mismos detalles. En general, las piedras pueden responder preguntas acerca de las criaturas que las tocaron en el pasado y sobre lo que hay oculto tras ellas o en su interior.

Stoneskin.name: Piel pétrea
Stoneskin.description:
La piel del objetivo se endurece como si fuera piedra. Obtiene resistencia 5 al daño físico, excepto al adamantino. Cada vez que el objetivo sufre un impacto debido a un arma contundente, perforante o cortante, la duración de piel pétrea disminuye en 1 minuto

Potenciado (6º) La resistencia se incrementa a 10.

Potenciado (8º) La resistencia se incrementa a 15.

Potenciado (10º) La resistencia se incrementa a 20.

Storm Lord.name: Señor de la tormenta
Storm Lord.description:
El cielo por encima de ti se oscurece en cuestión de segundos, girando con nubes ominosas salpicadas de fogonazos de relámpago. Cada asalto en que Mantienes el conjuro, puedes seleccionar uno de los siguientes efectos para que tengan lugar en el área.

  • Calma Sin efectos adicionales.
  • Niebla Cae una densa niebla, ocultando el área con los efectos de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Niebla de oscurecimiento}.
  • Lluvia Una lluvia torrencial cae del cielo, apagando las llamas normales. Las criaturas en el área sufren un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a las pruebas de Acrobacias y de Percepción.
  • Aire Potentes vientos sacuden el área en todas direcciones. Los ataques a distancia sufren un penalizador -4 por circunstancia, y todo vuelo se lleva a cabo contra el viento y cuenta como atravesar terreno difícil.

Además, una vez por asalto puedes utilizar una sola acción, que tiene los rasgos concentrar y manipular, para llamar a un relámpago, que impacta en cualquier objetivo dentro del alcance al que puedes ver. Infliges 10d6 daño por electricidad al objetivo; éste debe hacer una salvación básica de Reflejos. Con un fallo, también queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecida} durante 1 asalto.

Storm of Vengeance.name: Tormenta de venganza
Storm of Vengeance.description:
Una enorme nube de tormenta se forma en el aire en una explosión de 360 pies (108 m). Por debajo, la lluvia empieza a caer y los vientos huracanados imponen un modificador -4 por circunstancia a los ataques físicos a distancia ya los ataques con armas a distancia, mientra que el aire en el área se vuelve terreno difícil mayor para las criaturas voladoras. Cuando Lanzas este conjuro y la primera vez que lo Mantienes, elige uno de los siguientes efectos de tormenta. No puedes elegir el mismo efecto dos veces seguidas

  • Lluvia ácida Todas las criaturas en el interior de la tormenta sufren 4d8 daño por ácido sin tirada de salvación.
  • Granizo La tormenta inflige 4d10 daño contundente a las criaturas que hay por debajo (salvación básica de Fortaleza).
  • Rayos Caen hasta 10 rayos, designando como objetivos a criaturas elegidas por ti en el interior de la tormenta. A una criatura sólo le puede caer un rayo. Cada rayo inflige 7d6 daño eléctrico (salvación básica de Reflejos).
  • Lluvia y viento Una fuerte lluvia y un viento huracanado reducen la visibilidad y la movilidad, haciendo que el área bajo la tormenta sea terreno difícil y que todo lo que está en el interior o es divisado a través de ella quede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}.
  • Truen Todas las criaturas en el interior de la tormenta deben tener éxito en una salvación de fortaleza o quedar @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecida} durante 10 minutos. Una criatura que tiene éxito queda temporalmente inmune a los truenos de la tormenta de venganza durante 1 hora..

Potenciado (10º) El alcance se incrementa a 2.200 pies (660 m) y la nube es una explosión de 1.000 pies (300 m).

Stormburst.name: Stormburst
Stormburst.description:
Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning y wind that deals 6d6 daño por electricidad. Each creature must attempt a Reflejos saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, is knocked prone, y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}.

Potenciado(7º) The damage increases to 8d6, y targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 2}.

Potenciado(9º) The damage increases to 10d6, y targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 3}.

Stormwind Flight.name: Vuelo del viento de la tormenta
Stormwind Flight.description:
Poderosos vientos te llevan suavemente por los aires, concediéndote una Velocidad de volar igual a la terrestre. Cuando acaba la duración de este conjuro, si aún estás volando, flotas hasta el suelo como por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Caída de pluma}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8GUkKvCeI0xljCOk]{Efecto de conjuro: Vuelo del viento de la tormenta}

Potenciado (6º) Cuando vuelas utilizando este conjuro, ir contra el viento no te supone atravesar terreno difícil.

Strange Geometry.name: Strange Geometry
Strange Geometry.description:
You cause the areas to appear to swell, bend, y break, twisting together in a bizarre spatial geometry. The cubes of the spell's area can't be adjacent to one another. A creature must attempt a Will save if it's in one of the cubes when you Cast the Spell, or if it later enters one of the areas, with the following effects. A creature interacting with the illusion can also attempt a Will save to disbelieve the illusion, as normal.

Éxito The creature disbelieves the illusion.

Fallo All terrain in the cubes is difficult terrain for the creature, including the air if La criatura queda flying, walls if it's climbing, y so on. When the creature would exit one of the cubes, it exits from one ryomly determined by the GM. This is a teleportation effect. It can exit from any edge of that cube it chooses. When selecting a ryom cube, the GM excludes any that don't match the creature's terrain; for instance, if the creature were exiting along the ground, the GM would exclude any cube that didn't have an exit on the ground.

String of Fate.name: String of Fate
String of Fate.description: You bond yourself to a cherished friend, vowing to share their fate for good or for ill. Whenever an effect would require both you y the target to attempt a saving throw, if one of you succeeds at your saving throw y the other critically fails, you can choose to both fail instead. You y the ally must agree to fail; otherwise, use your normal save results instead.

Stumbling Curse.name: Stumbling Curse
Stumbling Curse.description:
With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory. The target must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes a -2 status penalty to Athletics y Acrobatics checks.

Fallo As success, y each time the target Strides, it uses the first 5 feet of movement of the Stride to move 5 feet in a ryom direction (this is forced movement). This has no effect on a creature with only 5 feet of movement.

Fallo crítico As failure, except you control the direction of the target's first 5 feet of movement of the Stride.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ViBlOrd6hno3DiPP]{Efecto de conjuro: Stumbling Curse}

Subconscious Suggestion.name: Sugestión subconsciente
Subconscious Suggestion.description:
Implantas una sugestión subconsciente a gran profundidad en la mente del objetivo, que éste tendrá que seguir cuando el desencadenante que indiques tenga lugar (tal y como se describe en la pág. 305). Sugieres al objetivo un curso de acción. Tu directiva tendrá que estar construida de forma que le parezca algo lógico y no puede ser autodestructiva u obviamente contraria a sus intereses. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado y sabe que has intentado controlarle.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado y cree que estabas hablando con él normalmente, no lanzándole un conjuro.

Fallo La sugestión permanece en el subconsciente del objetivo hasta la siguiente vez que haces tus preparativos diarios. Si el desencadenante tiene lugar antes, el objetivo sigue de inmediato tu sugestión. El efecto tiene una duración de 1 minuto o hasta que el objetivo ha cumplido una sugestión finita o ésta se vuelve autodestructiva o tiene efectos negativos obvios.

Fallo crítico Como con un fallo, pero la duración es de 1 hora.

Potenciado (9º) Puedes designar como objetivos hasta 10 criaturas.

Subjugate Undead.name: Subjugate Undead
Subjugate Undead.description:
You attempt to seize control of the target. It can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If El objetivo queda already being controlled by another creature, the controlling creature also rolls a saving throw y the undead uses the better result. Casting subjugate undead again ends any previous subjugate undead you cast.

Éxito crítico El objetivo queda no afectado y is queda temporalmente inmune durante 24 horas.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo The undead creature becomes a minion under your control durante 1 minuto. The spell is dismissed if you or an ally takes a hostile action against the minion undead.

Fallo crítico As failure, except La duración es de 10 minutos.

Sudden Blight.name: Sudden Blight
Sudden Blight.description:
You accelerate the processes of decay in the area. Each living creature in the area takes [[/r 2d10[negative]]] damage (basic Fortaleza save). A creature afflicted by a disease takes a -2 circumstance penalty to this save.You can also direct the blight to rot all Small y Tiny non-creature plants in the area, eliminating non-magical undergrowth y any resulting difficult terrain, cover, y concealment. Sudden blight attempts to counteract any magical effect on the plants before withering them.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d10.

Sudden Bolt.name: Sudden Bolt
Sudden Bolt.description:
You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target, dealing 4d12 daño por electricidad.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d12.

Sudden Recollection.name: Sudden Recollection
Sudden Recollection.description:
You place a bit of knowledge deep in a creature's subconscious or make a willing creature forget some information until a specific trigger occurs. The target gets a Will saving throw to resist the effect. A willing creature can choose to fail its save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo queda no afectado y realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Éxito El objetivo queda no afectado but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of sudden recollection, unless it identifies the spell.

Fallo You choose a piece of information the target didn't already know y create a trigger, such as seeing an object, hearing a key phrase, or witnessing an event. As soon as the target experiences the trigger, it receives the information y the spell ends. If the target was willing, you can instead choose a piece of information the target already knew y suppress its memory of that information until it experiences the trigger, after which it recovers the information y the spell ends.

Sudden Shift.name: Sudden Shift
Sudden Shift.description:
Desencadenante Un enemigo te falla en ataque cuerpo a cuerpo.

Te apartas rápidamente de un lugar peligroso y te cubres. Das un Paso y quedas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}.

Suffocate.name: Suffocate
Suffocate.description:
You forcefully y cruelly draw the living breath from a creature's lungs, dealing 4d8 contundente damage. The creature must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo El objetivo sufre daño completo. For the duration, the creature must hold its breath or suffocate.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, y all the air is pulled from the creature's lungs. The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} y starts suffocating for the duration.

Potenciado(9º) You can target up to 5 creatures.

Suggestion.name: Sugestión
Suggestion.description:
Tus almibaradas palabras hacen difícil que las criaturas se resistan. Sugieres al objetivo un curso de acción, que debe estar formulado de una forma en que parezca algo lógico, no pudiendo ser autodestructivo u obviamente contrario a su propio interés. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado y se da cuenta de que has intentado hechizarlo.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado y cree que estabas hablando con él normalmente, no lanzándole un conjuro.

Fallo El objetivo sigue de inmediato tu sugestión. El efecto tiene una duración de 1 minuto o hasta que el objetivo ha cumplido una sugestión finita o ésta se vuelve autodestructiva o tiene efectos negativos obvios.

Fallo crítico Como en fallo, pero la duración básica es 1 hora.

Potenciado (8º) Puedes designar como objetivos hasta 10 criaturas.

Summerland Spell.name: Summerland Spell
Summerland Spell.description:
The Summerland Spell is an extension of a unique ritual developed by Brogan the Grasswalker. The ritual dramatically dampens harsh weather around Hillcross, causing the temperature of the area to move up to two categories closer to normal. As a result, autumns and winters are far less brutal around Hillcross, while spring and summer months are practically mild and pleasant.

The ritual as presented is lower level, easier to cast, and much less dangerous to the casters than the original version cast by Brogan the Grasswalker because it simply extends the original ritual's effects over Hillcross. A character who wishes to duplicate the effects somewhere else would need to develop a unique 10º-level ritual with a 5º-level ritual to extend the duration, as Brogan did, and then find someone willing to cast the deadlier initial ritual.

Critical Success The ritual takes effect normally, continuing the duration for 1 more year.

Success The ritual takes effect normally, continuing the duration for 1 more year, but the primary caster is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1}. If the primary caster was already drained, increase the value of the drained condition by 1. This drained condition is a curse effect and is permanent until counteracted with remove curse or similar magic.

Failure The ritual fails.

Critical Failure The ritual fails. The primary caster is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}, and the secondary casters are drained 1 (increasing the value of any drained condition they already have). This drained condition is a curse effect and is permanent until counteracted with remove curse or similar magic.

Summon Anarch.name: Summon Anarch
Summon Anarch.description:
You conjure a chaotic celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common chaotic creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait y whose Nivel is 5 o menor. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum Nivel of creature you can summon.

Potenciado (6º) Nivel 7.

Potenciado(7º) Nivel 9.

Potenciado (8º) Nivel 11.

Potenciado(9º) Nivel 13.

Potenciado (10º) Nivel 15.

Summon Ancient Fleshforged.name: Summon Ancient Fleshforged
Summon Ancient Fleshforged.description:
You summon an ancient Fleshforged, one of Nex's personal weaponized monstrosities unleashed in the first wars against Geb. It squeezes itself into its war form from time long forgotten, unleashing its wrath upon your foes. The Fleshforged occupies the space noted in the spell description. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the Fleshforged below to summon.

  • Bone Breaker Size Gargantuan, Speed 40 pies (12 m), climb 100 feet

    Arrive Skull Breaking Hum (evocación, sonic) The Bone Breaker appears in a shower of bone fragments. Its form is that of an immense titan of flesh y metal with long, muscular, twisted arms. The Bone Breaker releases a hum at a harmonic frequency that weakens bones in creatures' bodies. Each foe within an 80‑foot emanation must attempt a Fortaleza save. On a critical success, they're no afectado; on a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante 1 asalto; on a failure they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 3} durante 1 minuto; y con un fallo crítico, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 4} for 10 minutos. A skeleton or other undead foe made almost entirely of bones treats their result as one degree of success worse than they rolled.

    Depart Bruising Departure The Bone Breaker pounds its long arms into the ground, creating a long shockwave. Each foe within a @Template[type:line|distance:100|width:10]{100‑foot‑long, 10‑foot‑wide line} takes [[/r 8d12[contundente]]] damage, with a basic Fortaleza save.

  • Thorn Caller Size Gargantuan, Speed 100 feet

    Arrive (evocación, light) Thorn's Guidance The Thorn Caller appears in a burst of light. The Thorn Caller's body is an ornate armored sphere with black panther masks surrounding a glowing light. The ball floats in the air due to six glowing, thornlike wings. Two clusters of bird heads emerge from both sides of the body with long necks that twirl together like tentacles. The Thorn Caller's burst of light illuminates all foes within 200 pies. The foes become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbradas} y flat‑footed, y if they were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} instead. These effects last until the Thorn Caller departs.

    Depart Thorn-Burst The Thorn Caller launches its thorned wings at various targets. Attempt spell attack rolls against up to 6 different targets within 300 pies. On a hit, the target takes [[/r 10d8[perforante]]] damage, double on a critical hit, half on a failure, y none con un fallo crítico.

  • The Thousy Size Medium (see below), Speed 30 feet

    Arrive (emotion, enchantment, fear, mental) Disconcerting Arrival Select five spaces in range y summon a Medium‑sized polyp of The Thousy in each of these spaces. The Thousy is an entity whose full scope is 1,000 polyps of oozing flesh, each physically separate but mentally part of a single creature. Not all 1,000 polyps have survived, y the spell summons five of them. Each creature within 10 feet of any of the polyps must attempt a Will Save. On a critical success, they're no afectado; on a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}; on a failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 3}; y con un fallo crítico, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 4} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Huyendo} durante 1 asalto

    Depart (illusion, mental) Violent Omen Each Asustado foe within a 60‑foot emanation of any of the five polyps takes [[/r 10d8[mental]]] damage, with a basic Will save.

  • Scion of Desiccation Size Gargantuan, Speed 100 pies, fly 100 feet

    Arrive (necromancy, negative) Ashes to Ashes The Scion of Desiccation appears in a swirl of screaming wind, a gargantuan form of twisted flesh that's constantly flensed by gritty ash y dust, y just as constantly regenerating itself. Each foe within a 40‑foot emanation takes 10d10 negative energy damage, with a basic Fortaleza save

    Depart (necromancy, negative) Dust to Dust Each foe within a 60‑foot emanation must attempt a Fortaleza save; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} on a failure or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 4} con un fallo crítico.

Summon Animal.name: Summon Animal
Summon Animal.description:
You conjure an animal to fight for you. You summon a common creature that has the animal trait y whose Nivel is -1, such as those found in Pathfinder Bestiary volumes. Heightening the spell increases the maximum Nivel of creature you can summon.

Potenciado(2º) Nivel 1

Potenciado (3º) Nivel 2

Potenciado (4º) Nivel 3

Potenciado (5º) Nivel 5

Potenciado (6º) Nivel 7

Potenciado(7º) Nivel 9

Potenciado (8º) Nivel 11

Potenciado(9º) Nivel 13

Potenciado (10º) Nivel 15

Summon Archmage.name: Summon Archmage
Summon Archmage.description:
You briefly call forth the spirit of a legendary wizard from ages long past, which manifests as an immense humanoid figure (typically an elf or a human). The archmage occupies the space of a Large creature y has a Speed of 60 pies (18 m).

Arrive (evocación, force) Archmage's Amplification The archmage arrives in a fierce burst of magical force, automatically dealing 3d4+3 force damage to up to 5 creatures it chooses within 100 feet of it. Like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missiles}, this can be blocked by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Escudo} spell. The archmage also feeds magical power into some spells. Beneficial spells last longer due to the archmage's influence. When the remaining duration of a beneficial spell affecting you or one of your allies would decrease (usually at the start of the caster's turn), it doesn't decrease if the subject of the spell is within 100 feet of the archmage. This applies only if the spell's Duración máxima was 3 rounds or longer.

Depart (abjuration) Archmage's Rebuke The archmage drains the magic from your foes. Each of your enemies within 100 feet of the archmage must attempt a Will save. On a failure, La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 asalto, y if it's currently benefiting from any spells of a lower Nivel than summon archmage, the archmage can choose any one of them y end the spell.

Summon Axiom.name: Summon Axiom
Summon Axiom.description:
You conjure a lawful celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common lawful creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait y whose Nivel is 5 o menor. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum Nivel of creature you can summon.

Potenciado (6º) Nivel 7.

Potenciado(7º) Nivel 9.

Potenciado (8º) Nivel 11.

Potenciado(9º) Nivel 13.

Potenciado (10º) Nivel 15.

Summon Deific Herald.name: Summon Deific Herald
Summon Deific Herald.description:
Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature y has a Speed of 60 pies (18 m). The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.

  • Lawful Good Arrive (enchantment, good, lawful) Aura of Retribution While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{Retributive Strike} reaction; Depart Holy Smite The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Ira divina} (choosing good) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Good Arrive (enchantment, good) Aura of Redemption While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption} reaction; Depart Merciful Healing The herald casts the 3-action version of 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} with a radius of 100 pies. This spell targets only you y your allies.
  • Chaotic Good Arrive (chaotic, enchantment, good) Aura of Liberation While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{Liberating Step} reaction; Depart Radiating Freedom The herald affects you y all your allies within 100 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}. La duración es de reduced to 3 asaltos.
  • Lawful Neutral Arrive (abjuration, lawful) Defy Chaos You y each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against chaotic damage while the herald is present; Depart Order's Wrath The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Ira divina} (choosing lawful) in a 100-foot emanation
  • Neutral Arrive (transmutation) Quickening Ripple You y each ally within 100 feet of the herald are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} while the herald is present, y can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; Depart Sapping Beam The herald casts 6º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.eexkxcqnkXazsGfK]{Enervation} in a 100‑foot line.
  • Chaotic Neutral Arrive (abjuration, chaotic) Defy Law You y each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against lawful damage while the herald is present; Depart Chaos Hammer The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Ira divina} (choosing chaotic) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Lawful Evil Arrive Aura of Iron While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{Iron Commy} reaction; Depart Unholy Blight The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Ira divina} (choosing evil) in a 100‑foot emanation.
  • Neutral Evil Arrive Aura of Selfishness While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Escudo} reaction; Depart Infinite Despair The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair} in a 100-foot cone.
  • Chaotic Evil Arrive Aura of Vengeance While within 100 feet of the herald, you y your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{Destructive Vengeance} reaction; Depart Weapon Hurricane The herald casts 5º-Nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{Weapon Storm} in a 100-foot cone, using d12 for the die size.

Summon Draconic Legion.name: Summon Draconic Legion
Summon Draconic Legion.description:
You momentarily summon an army of powerful dragons that unleash annihilating blasts as they descend upon your location. These dragons act as one y collectively occupy the space of a Gargantuan creature. They have a fly Speed of 100 pies. When you Cast this Spell, choose whether it summons chromatic or metallic dragons.

Arrive (evocación) Energy Annihilation The draconic legion breathes out two blasts of energy: a @Template[type:line|distance:120] y a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] that can't overlap. Each creature in either of the areas takes 10d8 damage (basic Reflejos save). The dragons choose the damage type of each arma de aliento, depending on the category of dragons summoned. Chromatic dragons can choose cold, fire, or veneno for the cone y acid or electricity for the line; metallic dragons can choose cold or fire for the cone y acid, electricity, or fire for the line.

Depart Draconic Whirlwind The draconic legion strikes with fury, dealing [[/r 9d8[cortante]]] damage (basic Reflejos save) to all enemy creatures in its location or within 20 pies (6 m).

Summon Healing Servitor.name: Summon Healing Servitor
Summon Healing Servitor.description:
You call forth a servitor forged from raw positive energy to heal y bolster your allies. The servitor occupies the space of a Huge creature y has a speed of 60 pies (18 m).

Arrive (healing, necromancy, positive) Servitor's Protection The servitor appears in a flash of light, moving from ally to ally y granting them a temporary reprieve. All allies within 20 feet of the Servitor gain 20 Puntos de Golpe temporales until the servitor departs.

Depart (healing, necromancy, positive) Servitor's Blessing The servitor disappears in a 30‑foot emanation of positive energy. All willing living creatures within heal 3d8 Hit Points. All undead within take that much damage, with a basic Fortaleza save.

Potenciado(+2) The Arrive effect's Puntos de Golpe temporales increase by 8, y the Depart effect's healing y damage to undead increase by 1d8.

Summon Instrument.name: Summon Instrument
Summon Instrument.description:
You materialize a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.MPv5Yx4w7scZGj2Y]{Musical Instrument (Hyheld)} in your grasp. The instrument is typical for its type, but it plays only for you. The instrument vanishes when the spell ends. If you cast summon instrument again, any instrument you previously summoned disappears.

Potenciado (5º) The instrument is instead a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.3ld14dsn2RLu9owg]{Musical Instrument (Virtuoso hyheld)}

Summon Irii.name: Summon Irii
Summon Irii.description:
You cast your spell, whisper your words of power, y find that an irii is already here-indeed, they have always been here, y always were, y always will be. The temporal being occupies the space of a Medium creature y has a Speed of 60 feet y a fly Speed of 60 pies (18 m). When you Cast this Spell, choose whether it summons a fate irii or a fortune irii.

  • Fate The fate stys before you with its stained-glass wings y animal-headed gaze, floating eyes circling about it
    Arrive (divination, fortune, lawful, prediction)
    Decree the Immutability of Time While within 30 feet of the fate, you y your allies who roll below 10 on a d20 for an attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check get a 10 instead
    Depart (divination, misfortune, prediction)
    Observe the Inevitability of Destiny Each enemy within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a Will save. If a creature fails its save, until the end of its next turn, any time it rolls above 10 on a d20 for an attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check, it gets a 10 instead.
  • Fortune The fortune stys before you with its golden horns y moth-scale wings, a sly smirk on its elfin face
    Arrive (chaotic, divination, fortune, prediction) Decree the Chaos of Infinity While within 30 feet of the fortune, you y your allies roll twice y take the higher roll on all damage rolls, Perception checks, y saving throws
    Depart (divination, misfortune, prediction) Sunder Eternity's Authority Each enemy within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a Will save. A creature that fails its save must roll twice y take the lower result on all damage rolls, Perception checks, y saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Summon Kaiju.name: Summon Kaiju
Summon Kaiju.description:
You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name y legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the kaiju below to summon.

  • Agmazar the Star Titan Speed 100 pies, climb 50 pies; Arrive (necromancy, negative) Channel Void Each foe in a 100-foot emanation takes [[/r 16d8[negative]]] damage with a basic Fortaleza save; Depart (transmutation) Gravitic Repulsion Each foe in a 50-foot emanation is pushed 100 feet away unless it succeeds at a Fortaleza save.
  • Agyra, the Forever Storm Speed 80 pies (24 m), fly 200 pies; Arrive (electricity, evocación) Breath of a Thousy Storms Agyra shoots two 1,200-foot lines of electricity, one from each of her heads. The lines can't overlap. Each creature along one of the lines takes [[/r 6d12[electricity]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save. On a failure, La criatura queda also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} durante 1 asalto (or durante 1 minuto con un fallo crítico); Depart (evocación, sonic) Thunderous Blast Each creature within a 100-foot emanation takes [[/r 6d10[sonic]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save, y is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} on a failed save.
  • Bezravnis, the Inferno Below Speed 100 pies, burrow 100 pies; Arrive (earth, evocación) Burrow from the Earth's Heart Bezravnis explodes from the ground where it was summoned, causing all creatures in a 50-foot emanation to take [[/r 8d12[contundente]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save. This potentially collapses structures with the collapse effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake} spell, except there is no chance of falling into a fissure; Depart Web Hurricane Bezravnis departs with a hurricane of webbing. All creatures within a 50-foot emanation must succeed at a Reflejos save or take a -20-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes (or is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} until it escapes con un fallo crítico). The Escape DC is your spell DC.
  • Mogaru, the Final King Speed 100 pies, swim 100 pies; Arrive (auditory, enchantment, mental) Trance of the King's Melody Mogaru manifests with a burst of the song that summoned him, requiring all foes within 60 feet who can hear him to attempt a Will save, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 3} on a failure; Depart (evocación, fire) Volcanic Breath Mogaru unleashes his scorching breath in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes [[/r 10d6[fire]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save. On a failure, it also takes [[/r 4d6[persistent,fire]]] damage.
  • Vorgozen, the Shapeless Feeder Speed 50 pies, climb 50 pies, swim 100 pies; Arrive (necromancy) Pollute Magic Vorgozen's foul presence pollutes magic around her. Each of your enemies within a 60-foot emanation that are under the effects of a spell must attempt a Fortaleza save. On a failure, La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2}. Any of your enemies that Casts a Spell within 60 feet of Vorgozen must attempt a Fortaleza save with the same effects unless it's already sickened; Depart (acid, evocación) Beam of Purest Vitriol Each creature in a 1,200-foot line takes [[/r 10d6[acid]]] damage y [[/r 10d6[contundente]]] damage with a basic Fortaleza save.
  • Yarthoon, the Moon Grub Speed 60 pies (18 m), burrow 100 pies, fly 100 pies, swim 100 pies; Arrive (cold, evocación) Algid Beam Barrage Yarthoon fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within 200 feet of it. The beams deal [[/r 10d6[cold]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save; Depart (cold, conjuration, water) Frostbite Mist Chilling mist surges out in a 100‑foot burst centered on Yarthoon y remains durante 1 minuto. This mist has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}, más any creature within the area at the end of its turn take [[/r 5d6[cold]]] damage with a basic Fortaleza save.
  • Ebeshra, the Winged Razor Speed 75 pies, fly 100 pies; Arrive (conjuration, teleportation) Planar Draw Each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] is pulled 50 feet towards the center, unless it succeeds at a Fortaleza save. Creatures that fail y alcance the center take [[/r 10d6[contundente]]] damage; Depart (electricity, evocación) Storm Discharge Each foe in a @Template[type:line|distance:240] takes [[/r 12d8[electricity]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save.

Summon Lesser Servitor.name: Summon Lesser Servitor
Summon Lesser Servitor.description:
While deities jealously guard their most powerful servants from the summoning spells of those who aren't steeped in the faith, this spell allows you to conjure an inhabitant of the Outer Sphere with or without the deity's permission.

You summon a celestial, monitor, or fiend whose Nivel is -1 to fight on your behalf. Alternatively, you can choose a magical animal from the Outer Sphere as your lesser servitor. This animal is your choice of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.8r8Ar08ojdJuPeiH]{Eagle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.QRRX82FIjBKd8pzs]{Guard Dog}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.hFbfXmjMkGEzMkQ1]{Raven}. It gains the alignment matching your deity (or you, if you don't have a deity) y has the following trait depending on the alignment it gained: celestial for lawful, monitor for neutral, or fiend for evil. You can't summon a creature if it is opposed to your deity's alignment on either axis (or opposed to your alignment if you don't follow a deity). For example, if you deity is lawful good, you can't summon a chaotic or evil creature. The GM might determine that deities restrict specific types of creatures even if their alignments aren't diametrically opposed. For example, Pharasma would restrict the summoning of sahkils.

Heightening the spell increases the maximum Nivel of creature you can summon y might add additional animal servitors, which otherwise work like the eagle, guard dog, y raven.

Potenciado(2º) Nivel 1.

Potenciado (3º) Nivel 2. You can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.xxP5FJotshmUQNtY]{Black Bear}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.C9s5tBxVValC2HTE]{Giant Bat}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.wqPYzMNgYvrO6oEP]{Leopard}.

Potenciado (4º) Nivel 3. You can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.WNiNj0Brn2LCYmwd]{Great White Shark} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{Tiger}.

Summoner's Precaution.name: Summoner's Precaution
Summoner's Precaution.description: You create a buffer in the link between yourself y your eidolon in order to prevent you from falling alongside your bonded ally. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VCUz5EnBUJF07j1a]{Sever Conduit} reaction; after using it, the spell ends.

Summoner's Visage.name: Summoner's Visage
Summoner's Visage.description:
You transform your eidolon into your identical twin. Assuming you are a humanoid, the eidolon gains the humanoid trait in addition to its other traits while it's in this form, as well as any other trait related to your form (such as elf or gnome). Your eidolon gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate you y can add its Nivel to such checks even if it's untrained.

Although your eidolon looks like you, it doesn't gain any new abilities, y its statistics don't change in any way-the transformation is purely cosmetic. If this transformation reduces your eidolon's size, the eidolon loses any other effects of its larger size, such as any increase to alcance. Your eidolon can still use gear only if it has the eidolon trait, which allows eidolons to use it. Any such eidolon items the eidolon was wearing change size y shape, if necessary, y its effects remain active.

You can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.0OC945wcZ4H4akLz]{Efecto de conjuro: Summoner's Visage}

Potenciado (4º) The duration increases to 1 hora.

Sun Blade.name: Sun Blade
Sun Blade.description:
You fire a ray of burning sunlight from your weapon. You must be wielding a sword or spear to cast sun blade, y you perform this spell's somático component with the weapon. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4 daño por fuego. If El objetivo queda evil, the ray deals an additional 1d4 good damage, y if El objetivo queda undead, the ray deals an additional 1d4 positive damage (both effects apply against creatures that are both evil y undead). If you are in an area of bright natural sunlight, increase the die size of each damage die by one step (from d4 to d6).

Éxito crítico The ray deals double damage.

Éxito El rayo inflige daño completo.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4 fire, 1d4 good, y 1d4 positive (or 1d6 of each type of damage in bright natural sunlight).

Sun's Fury.name: Sun's Fury
Sun's Fury.description: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage y [[/r 1[good]]] damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Supreme Connection.name: Supreme Connection
Supreme Connection.description:
In a show of power, you call forth a powerful entity in front of a crowd of onlookers, forcing the entity to manifest y answer your questions. The being appears as a twisted ball of vines y branches that springs forth from a nearby patch of dirt or up from between cobblestones or bricks. The ball of vines is relatively formless, giving no indication of the being that controls it. However, when you make a request, it twists into a rough face to answer your request.

You can ask up to seven questions that could be answered with "yes" or "no," although the entity can give you any one working answer it wants, including vague answers like "likely" or "unknown." The entity is likely to know answers related to its nature y priorities. Depending on the entity you call, it might attempt to deceive you y likely has its own agenda. The entity can only respond when surrounded by the energy of a crowd.

Once it has answered your questions, the vines freeze in place, contorted in pain, a reminder of where the powerful creature touched this world.

Éxito crítico The entity is in a good mood or is more honest than most. It won't attempt to deceive you, though it still might not know the answers. When it's important to provide clarity, the entity will answer your questions with up to five words, such as "if you leave immediately" or "that was true once." The words of the entity ring with truth, y the crowd takes the statements as gospel. obtienes +4 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks made to influence the crowd y to any Deception checks to Lie to the crowd by directly incorporating the entity's answers.

Éxito You can ask y receive your seven answers normally. The crowd is excited by the entity's words y believes them to be true. obtienes +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks made to influence the crowd y to any Deception checks to Lie to the crowd by directly incorporating the entity's answers.

Fallo The vines alcance out in a weighted gasp before dying. The crowd is likely disappointed, especially if you made them wait, but they don't necessarily change their attitude toward you.

Fallo crítico The vines wrap around you in desperation, trying to squeeze out your life force to survive. You take [[/r 10d6[contundente]]] damage y become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 3}, y you can't reduce the drained condition for 1 week. The attitude of the most members of the crowd toward you become one step worse, though individual members of the crowd might have different reactions.

Suspended Retribution.name: Suspended Retribution
Suspended Retribution.description:
All life dances one step from the precipice, one heartbeat from disaster. You open your eyes wide y see doom waiting in the wings, then invite it to step forward. A spectral omen of disaster appears above the target's head- traditionally, this is a downward-pointing sword, but some spellcasters report seeing a hangman's noose or a grinning skull instead. When you Cast this Spell, pick one of the following triggers.

  • The target moves more than its Speed in a single round.
  • The target makes more than one Strike in a single round.
  • The target Casts a Spell.
  • The target uses a specific skill you name.
  • The target uses a specific ability you name.

If the target takes the triggering action, the portent of doom activates-the sword strikes down, the noose loops around the target's neck, the skull bares its fangs-y the target takes [[/r 70[mental]]] damage with a basic Reflejos save. The target instinctively knows which action will trigger the omen y can ward off the omen by spending a total of 3 actions, which have the concentrate trait, to pray, make signs against doom, or similar apotropaic actions. These actions need not be consecutive. After the creature spends the actions, the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 10.

Aberrant Whispers.name: Susurros Aberrantes
Aberrant Whispers.description:
Pronuncias frases en una lengua desconocida, asaltando la mente de quienes están cerca. Cada objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad. Sea cual sea el resultado de dicha salvación, a continuación cada objetivo queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 minutos. Puedes incrementar el número de acciones necesarias para Lanzar el conjuro (hasta un máximo de 3 en total) Por cada acción adicional, incrementa en 5 pies (1,5 m) el radio de la emanación, hasta un máximo de 10 pies (3 m) adicionales para 3 acciones.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda anonadado 2.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda confundido.

Potenciado (+3) El radio inicial se incrementa en 5 pies (1,5 m).

Swallow Light.name: Swallow Light
Swallow Light.description:
You draw magical light into your open mouth, consuming it y turning its essence into fuel for a gout of life-draining shadows. Attempt a counteract check against the light effect. If you successfully counteract it, obtienes arma de aliento of chilling shadows you can use until the spell ends. Exhaling the breath is a two-action activity. The arma de aliento is a 15-foot cone y deals 1d6 cold damage más 1d6 negative damage. Creatures in the area can attempt a basic Reflejos save against your spell DC. Once activated, you can't use the arma de aliento again for [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]] asaltos.

Potenciado(+2) Increase the damage of the arma de aliento by 1d6 cold damage y 1d6 negative damage.

Swamp of Sloth.name: Pantano de pereza
Swamp of Sloth.description:
El terreno del área se vuelve pantanoso y fétido. El área se convierte en terreno difícil. El limo del fondo de la ciénaga se anima en forma de diminutas bestias de cieno de apariencia demoníaca. No funcionan como criaturas normales, pero se lanzan en forma de plaga para cubrir a las criaturas que hay en el pantano y exudan un hedor tóxico. La plaga inflige 1d6 daño por veneno; las criaturas que acaban su turno en el área deben hacer una salvación básica de Fortaleza. Puedes incrementar el número de acciones que cuesta Lanzar el conjuro. Por cada acción adicional, incrementa en 5 pies (1,5 m) el radio de la explosión.

Potenciado (+2) El daño se incrementa en 1d6 y el radio inicial se incrementa en 5 pies (1,5 m).

Swampcall.name: Swampcall
Swampcall.description:
You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist y churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflejos saving throw.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its Velocidad de nado, if any) y becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the penalty to Speeds (except Velocidad de nado) is -15 pies (4,5 m).

Potenciado (3º) The range increases to 60 pies (18 m), y the area increases to a 20-foot burst.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ROuGwXEvFznzGE9k]{Efecto de conjuro: Swampcall (Failure)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.otK6eG3b3FV7n2xP]{Efecto de conjuro: Swampcall (Critical Failure)}

Swarm Form.name: Swarm Form
Swarm Form.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait y you gain resistance 5 to cortante y perforante damage y weakness 5 to area y splash damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap. You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still afectado normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hys, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body. You can Dismiss the Spell.

Potenciado(+2) Increase your resistances y weaknesses each by 5.

Swarming Wasp Stings.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
Swarming Wasp Stings.description:
You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp aguijóns that stab creatures in the area, possibly venenoing them. Creatures in the afectado area take [[/r 1d6[perforante]]] damage. Each creature that takes perforante damage must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes [[/r 2d6[veneno]]] damage.

Fallo El objetivo queda afflicted with Swarming Wasp Venom at stage 1.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2.

Swarming Wasp Venom (veneno)

Nivel 7

Duración máxima 6 rounds

Etapa 1 [[/r 2d6[veneno]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} (1 asalto)

Etapa 2 [[/r 3d6[veneno]]] damage y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} (1 asalto)

Swarmsense.name: Swarmsense
Swarmsense.description:
You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling y flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 y a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it y ends the spell.

Potenciado (3º) The swarm has the benefits of spider climb.

Potenciado (5º) The swarm has a fly Speed of 10 pies [3 m]. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

Potenciado(7º) The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

Sweet Dream.name: Dulce sueño
Sweet Dream.description:
Con una canción o un relato tranquilizador, arrullas al objetivo a un sueño encantado. Cuando lanzas un conjuro, el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} si no lo estaba ya. Mientras está inconsciente, experimenta un sueño a tu elección.

Si duerme por lo menos 1 minuto, obtiene el beneficio del sueño para el resto de la duración del conjuro.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.v051JKN0Dj3ve5cF]{Sueño de perspicacia} bonificador +1 por estatus a las pruebas de habilidad basadas en la Inteligencia.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.MJSoRFfEdM4j5mNG]{Sueño de encanto} bonificador +1 por estatus a las pruebas de habilidad basadas en el Carisma.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.sE2txm68yZSFMV3v]{Sueño de viaje} bonificador de +5 pies (+1,5 m) por estatus a la Velocidad.

Si Lanzas este conjuro de nuevo, se acaban los efectos de cualquier dulce sueño anterior lanzado por ti.

Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.description:
Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns. Attempt a Performance check to counteract one of the following conditions affecting the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Agarrado}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizada}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido}. If you fail, you can't target that effect on the target for 1 día. Use the condition's source to determine the counteract DC (for example, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar}DC for grabbed).

Potenciado(9º) You can target up to four creatures.

Synaptic Pulse.name: Pulso sináptico
Synaptic Pulse.description:
Emites una explosión mental pulsante que perfora la mente de todos los enemigos en el área. Cada criatura en el área debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdida 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdida 2}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda Aturdida durante 1 asalto.

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magic sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on your targets. When you Cast the Spell, you set the duration by choosing a time at which point the sigil flashes dimly three times. After that point, the spell ends. Even though spell durations aren't normally exact, the effects of synchronize are precise to the second. The timer is based on the place where the spell was cast, so entering a plane or area where time flows differently changes how the time elapses.

Potenciado(2º) The spell can target up to 20 willing creatures.

Synchronize Steps.name: Synchronize Steps
Synchronize Steps.description:
You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tyem. When one of the targets Steps, the other target can use a reaction to Step. When one of the targets Strides, the other target can use a reaction to Stride.

Potenciado (5º) The range increases to 60 pies (18 m), y you can target up to 10 willing creatures.

Synesthesia.name: Sinestesia
Synesthesia.description:
Los sentidos del objetivo son repentinamente renovados de formas inesperadas, haciendo que procesen los ruidos como explosiones de color, los olores como sonidos y así sucesivamente. Esto tiene tres efectos y el objetivo debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. Debido a la distracción, el objetivo debe tener éxito en una prueba plana CD 5 @Check[type:flat|dc:5] cada vez que lleva a cabo una acción de concentrar, o falla y la acción se pierde. La dificultad del objetivo en procesar los impulsos visuales hace que todas las criaturas y objetos queden @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Ocultos} de él. La criatura tiene problemas en moverse, haciendo que esté @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 3} e infligiéndole un penalizador de -10 pies (-3 m) por estatus a sus Velocidades.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda afectado durante 1 asalto.

Fallo El objetivo queda afectado durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico Como en fallo, y el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 2} mientras intenta procesar los cambios sensoriales.

Potenciado (9º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta 5 criaturas.

Take its Course.name: Seguir su curso
Take its Course.description:
Cuando alguien se ha atiborrado puedes, o bien hacer que pase lo peor de su aflicción, o bien intensificar su sufrimiento. Este conjuro intenta hacer progresar la aflicción debido a una enfermedad, a un veneno o al daño por veneno persistente que afecta al objetivo. Si el objetivo está afectado por más de una de estas cosas, puedes elegir entre aquellas de las que es consciente; de lo contrario, el DJ elige al azar. Un objetivo involuntario puede hacer una salvación de Voluntad para negar este conjuro.

El efecto del conjuro depende de si intentas acabar con una aflicción o daño persistente por veneno, y de si intentas ayudar u obstaculizar la recuperación del objetivo.

  • Aflicción El objetivo hace de inmediato su siguiente tirada de salvación contra la aflicción. Puedes conceder a la criatura, o bien un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.nHXKK4pRXAzrLdEP]{Bonificador +2} o bien un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.R27azQfzeFuFc48G]{Penalizador -2} a su tirada de salvación contra ella.
  • Veneno persistente Puedes hacer que el objetivo sufra el daño persistente por veneno inmediatamente cuando Lanzas este conjuro (además de sufrirlo al final de su siguiente turno). Tanto si lo haces como si no, el objetivo hace una prueba plana adicional contra el daño persistente por veneno. Puedes fijar la CD de dicha prueba plana en 5 o en 20, en lugar de la CD normal.

Potenciado (7º) Puedes hacer progresar cualquier cantidad de las aflicciones elegibles del objetivo y su daño persistente por veneno.

Tame.name: Tame
Tame.description:
As you make comforting sounds y gestures, you approach the target in a friendly manner combining caution y confidence. You improve the target's attitude to you by one step (unfriendly to neutral, neutral to friendly, friendly to helpful) for the duration of the spell si no consigue una salvación de Voluntad. Afterward, El objetivo queda queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 día.

This spell works on only domesticated animals; for example, you could use it on guard dogs or stray dogs, but not feral dogs or wolves. If the socialization of the animal is in question, the decision is up to the GM.

Potenciado (3º) The duration becomes 10 minutos.

Potenciado (6º) The duration becomes 1 hora.

Tanglefoot.name: Maraña
Tanglefoot.description:
Una liana cubierta de una savia pegajosa aparece de la nada, surgiendo de tu mano y adhiriéndose al objetivo. Haz un ataque de conjuro contra el objetivo.

Éxito crítico El objetivo sufre el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} y además un penalizador -10 pies (-3 m) por circunstancia a sus Velocidades durante 1 asalto. Puede intentar Huir contra tu CD de conjuros para eliminar el penalizador y el estado de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado}.

Éxito El objetivo sufre un penalizador -10 pies (-3 m) por circunstancia a sus Velocidades durante 1 asalto. Puede intentar Huir contra tu CD de conjuros para eliminar el penalizador.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Efecto de conjuro: Maraña}

Fall El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Potenciado (2º) El efecto dura 2 asaltos.

Potenciado (4º) El efecto dura 1 minuto.

Tangling Creepers.name: Zarcillos enredadores
Tangling Creepers.description: Unos zarcillos densos y ondulantes brotan de todas las superficies y llenan todas las masas de agua del área. Toda criatura que se mueve por tierra, trepa o nada en el interior de los zarcillos sufre un penalizador de -10 pies (-3 m) por circunstancia a sus Velocidades en el área. Una vez por asalto, puedes hacer que uno de los zarcillos fustigue desde cualquier casilla de la extensión de brotes utilizando una sola acción, que tiene el rasgo concentrar. Este zarcillo tiene un alcance de 15 pies (4,5 m) y lleva a cabo un ataque sin armas utilizando tu modificador al ataque de conjuros. Si el ataque tiene éxito, el zarcillo arrastra al objetivo hacia la masa de brotes y lo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} durante 1 asalto o hasta que la criatura Huye (contra tu CD de conjuro), lo que sucede primero.

Tattoo Whispers.name: Tattoo Whispers
Tattoo Whispers.description:
You carefully tattoo the same design upon each secondary caster. The tattoo can be of any shape or symbol, but it must include a mouth. The tattoo fades naturally over the course of 1 month.

Éxito crítico The tattoos on the secondary casters are all magically linked for 1 week, providing a semi-telepathic bond. Each secondary caster can communicate secretly with any other secondary casters at any time by mouthing words but making no sound. The person receiving a message must be within 120 feet of the sender, must be within the sender's line of sight, y must have their tattoo uncovered. The mouth of the tattoo moves to match the words, which the tattoo whispers, but only the tattoo's bearer can hear it.

Éxito As critical success, but the effect lasts for 1 día.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico The ritual has no effect y creates a backlash of persistent mental static. All casters are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} for 1 día.

Teeth to Terror.name: Teeth to Terror
Teeth to Terror.description:
The target believes its teeth are falling out, crawling along its face, stabbing into its body, y cramming themselves down its throat. The target takes 2d4 mental damage y @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Mental1d4.success], depending on its Will save. The target takes a -1 circumstance penalty to Strikes with its mandíbulas or teeth while it is taking persistent mental damage.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage y no persistent mental damage.

Fallo The target takes full damage y persistent mental damage y is@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.

Fallo crítico The target takes full damage y persistent mental damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 3}.

Potenciado(+2) You can target two additional creatures, the mental damage se incrementa en 2d4, y the persistent mental damage se incrementa en 1d4.

Telekinetic Bombardment.name: Telekinetic Bombardment
Telekinetic Bombardment.description:
You grasp a piece of the lyscape-such as a tree, carriage, or piece of masonry-y lob it in your foe's direction. Your missile crashes down in either a 10-foot burst (for most missiles) or a 30-foot line (for something long y tall, like a tree or a ship's mast), dealing 14d6 contundente damage y turning its area into difficult terrain as it breaks into rubble. All creatures in the area must attempt a Reflejos save. If the area is a line, it doesn't have to start from your square but can instead start anywhere in range, as long as the entire area remains within range.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, is knocked prone, y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Telekinetic Maneuver.name: Maniobra telecinética
Telekinetic Maneuver.description: Con una oleada de poder telecinético, mueves a un enemigo o a algo que éste lleva. Puedes intentar Desarmar, Empujar o derribar al objetivo utilizando una tirada de ataque de conjuro en lugar de una prueba de Atletismo.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Proyector telecinético
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
Lanzas contra el objetivo un objeto suelto y no atendido dentro del alcance y con una Impedimenta de 1 o menos. Haz un ataque de ataque de conjuro contra el objetivo. Si impactas, infliges tanto daño contundente, perforante o cortante (según el objeto lanzado) como 1d6 más tu modificador por característica de lanzamiento de conjuros. Ningún rasgo específico ni propiedad mágica del objeto arrojado afecta ni el ataque ni el daño.

Éxito crítico Infliges doble daño.

Éxito Infliges daño completo.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

Telekinetic Rend.name: Telekinetic Rend
Telekinetic Rend.description:
Two non-overlapping @Template[type:burst|distance:5]

Your mind creates a violent axis of motion in a nearby space. You deal your choice of [[/r 1d6[contundente]]] or [[/r 1d6[cortante]]] damage to all creatures in the area, with a basic Fortaleza save. A creature large enough to be in more than one of the bursts takes damage only once.

Amp Your thoughts expy in scope y power. The bursts deal [[/r 1d6[contundente]]] damage y [[/r 1d6[cortante]]] damage, instead of the usual damage. A creature that critically fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}.

Amp Potenciado(+2) Both types of damage increase by 1d6 instead of just one. Add a third non-overlapping @Template[type:burst|distance:5] to the area.

Telepathic Bond.name: Vínculo telepático
Telepathic Bond.description: Los objetivos se pueden comunicar telepáticamente con cualquiera o con todos los demás objetivos desde cualquier punto del mismo planeta.

Telepathic Demand.name: Telepathic Demand
Telepathic Demand.description: You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion}, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 month. You can target a creature only Si tienes previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the telepathy spell.

Telepathy.name: Telepatía
Telepathy.description:
Te puedes comunicar telepáticamente con criaturas que están a 30 pies (9 m) o menos. Una vez estableces una conexión comunicándote con una criatura, la comunicación es bidireccional. Sólo te puedes comunicar con criaturas que comparten un idioma contigo.

Potenciado (6º) Telepatía pierde el rasgo lingüístico. Te puedes comunicar telepáticamente con las criaturas utilizando imágenes mentales compartidas incluso si no compartís idioma.

Teleport.name: Teletransporte
Teleport.description:
Los objetivos y tú os veis transportados instantáneamente a cualquier ubicación dentro del alcance, si puedes identificarla de forma precisa tanto por su posición relativa para con la inicial como por su apariencia (u otros rasgos identificativos). El conocimiento incorrecto de la apariencia de la ubicación hace por lo general que el conjuro falle, pero puede en su lugar hacer que os teletransporteis a un lugar no deseado o alguna otra desgracia poco usual determinada por el DJ. El teletransporte no es preciso a largas distancias. Los objetos aparecen a una distancia del destino previsto igual a aproximadamente un 1% de la distancia total viajada, en una dirección a determinar por el DJ. Para viajes cortos, esta falta de precisión es irrelevante, pero para distancias largas podría ser hasta una milla (1,6 km).

Potenciado (7º) Los otros objetivos y tú podéis viajar a cualquier ubicación que este a 1.000 millas (1.600 km) o menos.

Potenciado (8º) Los otros objetivos y tú podéis viajar a cualquier ubicación en el mismo planeta. Si viajas más de 1.000 millas (1.600 km) sólo llegas a 10 millas (16 km) de distancia del objetivo.

Potenciado (9º) Los otros objetivos y tu podéis viajar a cualquier ubicación en cualquier planeta del mismo sistema solar. Suponiendo que tengas un conocimiento exacto de la ubicación y de su apariencia, llegas al nuevo planeta a una distancia de 100 millas (160 km) del objetivo.

Potenciado (10º) Como la versión de 9º nivel, pero los demás objetivos y tú podéis viajar a cualquier planeta de la misma galaxia.

Teleportation Circle.name: Teleportation Circle
Teleportation Circle.description:
You create a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground, which acts as a portal to a destination determined at the time of the ritual. You designate the destination of the teleportation as part of the ritual. This destination can't be changed. The destination must be a location within 1,000 miles y be on the same plane as the teleportation circle. You must be able to identify the location precisely both by its position relative to the location where you create the teleportation circle y by the destination's appearance (or other identifying features). The destination must also be a 10-foot-diameter circle that doesn't overlap with any solid structures, but it can be a place that is harmful or dangerous.

A secondary caster attempting a Survival check for this ritual can be located at the exact site of the destination, instead of with you at the point of origin. If the secondary succeeds at their check at the destination y you roll a success, the ritual is a critical success instead.

While the circle is active, any creature that moves to be fully within the circle is instantly teleported to the destination. A creature that is unwilling to be teleported can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If it remains in the circle, the creature must attempt this save again at the end of each of its turns.

The teleportation circle normally goes only in one direction, though you can double the Coste to make the teleportation work in both directions.

Éxito crítico You create the teleportation circle, y it's extremely precise, regardless of the distance traveled. Travelers arrive exactly at the designated point.

Éxito As a critical success, but the destination of the teleportation circle is slightly inaccurate, y is off target by roughly 1 percent of the distance traveled, to a maximum of 10 miles off target.

Fallo The teleportation circle doesn't function.

Fallo crítico The teleportation circle is wildly inaccurate. It leads to a ryom destination roughly the same distance from the origin point, y the chances of some other unusual mishap are much greater.

Potenciado(9º) The Coste increases to 2,000 po, the duration increases to 1 month, y the destination can be anywhere on the same planet.

Potenciado (10º) The Coste increases to 10,000 po, La duración es de unlimited, y the destination can be anywhere on the same planet.

Tempest Form.name: Tempest Form
Tempest Form.description:
Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, y the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC y use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 al daño físico y become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks y don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait, except those granted by this spell. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.b5OyBdc0bolgWZZT]{Air}
    • obtienes Fly Speed of 20 feet y become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the air.
    • You can create the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} from your space as a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.HDKJAUXMbtxnBdgR]{Mist}
    • obtienes Fly Speed of 20 pies (6 m), y it becomes hard to see through you.
    • Any creature on one side of your space who is targeted by a creature on the opposite side is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to the targeting creature.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.C3erbEQTvawqKAhw]{Water}
    • obtienes Velocidad de nado of 20 feet y become Invisible while you are in the water.
    • You can electrically charge yourself by taking a single action, which has the manipulate trait. If you do, you are no longer Invisible in the water due to electricity indicating your location, but any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes [[/r 1d6[electricity]]] damage; this is cumulative with the damage from your major curse in situations where both apply.

Potenciado(+2) Increase La resistencia by 5 y the daño por electricidad from the charged water form by 1.

Tempest of Shades.name: Tempest of Shades
Tempest of Shades.description:
You channel the forces of undeath to briefly call forth an amalgam of the vengeful dead slain by your enemies y allies alike. This amalgam manifests as a large tornado of insubstantial, howling faces. It occupies the space of a Huge creature y has a Speed of 60 pies (18 m).

Arrive (negative) Vortex of Death Each enemy creature within a 60-foot emanation must attempt a Fortaleza save with the following effects.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 3}.
