Depart (emotion, fear, mental) Howl of Eternity The vengeful dead lets out an anguished scream. All your enemies within a 100-foot emanation must attempt @Check[type:will|name:Tempest of Shades Depart|traits:necromancy,emotion,fear,mental] saves with the following effects.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.

Fallo La criatura queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 3}.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda Asustado 3. It's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Huyendo} durante 1 asalto or until it's no longer Asustado, whichever comes first.

Tempest Surge.name: Oleada de tempestad
Tempest Surge.description:
Rodeas a un enemigo con una tormenta giratoria de vientos violentos, nubes agitadas y rayos restallantes. La tormenta inflige 1d12 daño por electricidad. El objetivo debe hacer una salvación básica de Reflejos. Con un fallo, el objetivo también queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} durante 1 asalto y sufre un daño persistente por electricidad [[/r 1[persistent,electricity]]], con un fallo se incrementa en 1

Potenciado (+1) El daño inicial se incrementa en 1d12 y el daño persistente por electricidad con un fallo se incrementa en 1.

Tempest Touch.name: Tempest Touch
Tempest Touch.description:
Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing 1d4 contundente damage y 1d4 cold damage. The target must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage y a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Fallo The target takes full damage y a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Fallo crítico As failure, but El objetivo sufre doble daño.

Potenciado (+1) The contundente y cold damage each increase by 1d4.

Temporal Distortion.name: Temporal Distortion
Temporal Distortion.description:
You share some of your own temporal distortions with a foe, altering their mind y body unpredictably as they're thrown backward or forward in time. Roll [[/r 1d4]]{1d4}. On a 1, the foe becomes clumsy; on a 2, it becomes enfeebled; on a 3, it becomes Anonadado; y on a 4, you choose which condition applies.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} for 4 rounds, depending on the result of the d4.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the time warp is stronger, increasing the condition's effects but making it run its course faster. The condition's value is 3, y the condition lasts for 2 asaltos.

Temporal Twin.name: Temporal Twin
Temporal Twin.description:
You pull a fleeting duplicate of your ally from the recent past. The duplicate appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within 30 feet of you y repeats a basic single action the target took since the end of your last turn, such as making a Strike or Interacting to pull a lever. Because the other basic single actions don't produce much of a result on their own, this is typically used for Strike y Interact, though occasionally it could be useful to have a temporal twin Stride through a potentially dangerous area to expose a hazard. The target ally spends a reaction to create the duplicate, makes any decisions, y rolls for the repeated action, such as choosing a target for a Strike y making the attack roll. If the ally doesn't have a reaction to spend, temporal twin fails. Use the duplicate's location for determining flanking, cover, y the like. Using this spell requires remembering what your ally did, y if you don't remember the details, the GM might not allow you to cast temporal twin.

This action can't be used for anything but a basic single action, nor can it use limited resources. The action can have a different target than the original action but must be very similar in form. For example, if the original action were to Interact to pull a lever, the time duplicate could pull a different lever, but couldn't turn a doorknob or pick up an item from a table.

Being pulled through time to create a twin destabilizes the target's timeline. Once an ally has been the target of temporal twin, they're queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 día.

Temporal Ward.name: Temporal Ward
Temporal Ward.description:
You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it. A creature attempting to open a warded doorway or container must attempt a Will save with the below results.

You can set a password for the ward. Any creature that attempts to open the target container, or to open or pass through the target doorway without speaking the password must attempt a save as normal.

The ward vanishes automatically once the spell's duration ends, but can be removed before then as if it were a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it y Thievery check to disable it. Both checks require the creature attempting them to have expert proficiency in order to succeed.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} temporal ward. The maximum number of temporal wards you can have active at a time is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

CriticalÉxito La criatura no resulta afectada y opens the doorway or the container as normal.

Éxito The creature experiences a brief moment of déjà-vu in which they're convinced they already opened the door. They must use an additional action to open the door. If they can't or don't want to do so, the action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted, y the door or container remains closed.

Fallo La criatura queda thrown briefly backwards in time. The action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted y they're returned to the position they were located at during the start of their turn. Their turn then ends.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the temporal displacement also causes the creature to lose their bearings, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confundido} durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (10º) The temporal ward has an unlimited duration, until it is counteracted, Dismissed, or Disarmed.

Temporary Glyph.name: Temporary Glyph
Temporary Glyph.description:
Area 5-foot square

You temporarily bind a hostile spell into a symbol. While Casting this Spell, you also Cast a Spell of a lower spell Nivel to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 2 actions or fewer to Cast, have a hostile effect, y target one creature or have an area. Any creature that enters temporary glyph's area activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within. You can set a password for the glyph. Speaking it when entering the spell's area prevents the glyph from triggering. You can also set a more specific trigger to limit which types of creatures set off the glyph.

Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell can target one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Temporary glyph's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph is a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it y the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporary glyph.

Temporary Tool.name: Temporary Tool
Temporary Tool.description: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hys. It lasts until it is used for a single activity or durante 1 minuto, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured, y thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

Tempt Fate.name: Tentar al destino
Tempt Fate.description:
Desencadenante Tú o un aliado dentro del alcance hacéis una tirada de salvación.

Retuerces las fuerzas del destino para hacer que un momento sea, o bien terrible, o bien intrascendente, sin término medio.

El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus a la tirada de salvación desencadenante. Si el resultado de la tirada es un éxito, se convierte en un éxito crítico. Si es un fallo, se convierte en un fallo crítico que no puede verse reducido por ninguna aptitud de las que suelen reducir los fallos críticos, como por ejemplo evasión mejorada.

Si la aptitud desencadenante no tiene tanto un resultado de éxito crítico como uno de fallo crítico, el conjuro falla pero no gastas el Punto de Foco por Lanzarlo.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.AJkRUIdYLnt4QOOg]{Efecto de conjuro: Tentar al destino}

Potenciado (8º El bonificador a la tirada de salvación es +2.

Tentacular Limbs.name: Miembros tentaculares
Tentacular Limbs.description:
Tus brazos se convierten en tentáculos largos y flexibles, incrementando a 10 pies (3 m) tu alcance cuando haces conjuros de alcance toque y cuando llevas a cabo Golpes sin armas con los brazos (como por ejemplo Golpes de puño y de zarpa). Esto no cambia el alcance de tus ataques con armas cuerpo a cuerpo. Mientras dura el conjuro, siempre que Lanzas un conjuro puedes añadir una acción adicional a dicho lanzamiento para prolongar temporalmente su alcance a 20 pies (6 m) a fin de entregar dicho conjuro.

Potenciado (+2) Cuando añades una acción adicional a un conjuro para prolongar temporalmente tu alcance, éste se incrementa en 10 pies (3 m) adicionales a fin de entregar dicho conjuro.

Terminate Bloodline.name: Terminate Bloodline
Terminate Bloodline.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped y has their memory wiped. If El objetivo queda conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortaleza save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, El objetivo queda automatically afectado by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortaleza save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse y then counteracting the disease

Nivel equal to twice the ritual's Nivel

Etapa 1 carrier with no effect (1 month)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 week)

Etapa 3 fatigued y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} (1 día)

Etapa 4 fatigued y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 3} (1 día)

Etapa 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortaleza save or contract the disease.

Éxito crítico The creature does not contract the disease y does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (La criatura queda not immune to the disease, however, y must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

Éxito La criatura queda not afectado but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

Fallo The creature contracts the disease y can spread it in the same way as the original target.

Terrain Transposition.name: Terrain Transposition
Terrain Transposition.description: You mystically transpose your current location with another. While in a wilderness environment, you transport yourself y items you're holding to a clear space you can see within range. Si tienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain} y both your starting y ending position are in your favored terrain, the range increases to 180 pies (24 m). Si tienes an animal companion y it is adjacent to you, you can transport it along with you to an adjacent open space, but if this spell would bring any other creature with you, even in an extradimensional container, the spell is lost.

Tesseract Tunnel.name: Tesseract Tunnel
Tesseract Tunnel.description:
You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space. You create a portal in your current space y then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride}, creating another portal in the space you end your Stride. Until the beginning of your next turn, any creature that enters the first portal can immediately transport itself to the exit portal as part of its move action, which adds the teleportation trait to its movement.

You can have only one tesseract tunnel open at a time; creating another causes the first to immediately close. You can use tesseract tunnel while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrowing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climbing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Flying}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swimming} instead of Striding Si tienes the corresponding movement type.

Amp Physical movement is no longer necessary to connect two points in space. When you cast tesseract tunnel, you simply create a tunnel that ends in a square within a range equal to your Speed; you can choose to immediately teleport to the space at the far end of the tunnel. Furthermore, the tunnel can be traversed in both directions, instead of only from entrance to exit. Finally, the spell's duration changes to 1 minute. You can Dismiss the spell.

Tether.name: Tether
Tether.description:
You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you. The creature can still try to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar} y it or others can break the tethers by attacking them (the tethers have AC 15 y 10 Hit Points). You must stay within 30 feet of the target while it is tethered; moving more than 30 feet away from your target ends the spell. The target must attempt a Reflejos save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed as long as it is within 30 feet of you.

Fallo The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed y cannot move more than 30 feet away from you until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Potenciado (+1) The tethers' AC se incrementa en 3 y their Hit Points increase by 10.

The World's a Stage.name: The World's a Stage
The World's a Stage.description:
This famous ritual is a sophisticated example of symbolic magic, binding fate y fortune to follow a prepared script. To conduct the ritual, you y the secondary casters must put on a long-form, multi-person, plot-based performance that's usually a play or opera, though more unusual performances have been known. You take the role of the director, while the secondary casters are either actors (Performance) or significant backstage figures, such as set or Costeume designers (Crafting). The casting time of the ritual includes both preparations y rehearsals of various sorts y the actual performance, which must be at least an hora long.

The performance presents current events y offers a particular vision on how they resolve, often in metaphorical or allegorical format (proposing the overthrow of a tyrant by referring to a different, legendary tyrant who was overthrown, or suggesting that a murderous secret might be uncovered by presenting an allegory of truth defeating murder). This performance must be presented to an audience of at least a hundred people, a majority of whom must both be connected, at least peripherally, to the events in question (the people of the tyrant's city, or the residents of the village where the murder occurred) y who must understy what the metaphor or allegory actually refers to. For the magic to spark, the performance must declare its purpose loudly y clearly to the parties most concerned. If a major antagonist featured in the performance is in the audience y the ritual is a success, you get a critical success instead.

Éxito crítico Something sublime sparks between performance y audience, y destiny conspires to push events in the right direction. You y each secondary caster can reroll up to three skill checks at any point during the duration of the ritual after determining the results, as long as the skill check is connected to ensuring the topic of the performance comes true (to sneak past the tyrant's guards or find the murder weapon, for instance).

Éxito As critical success except the sparks of destiny are weaker, so each caster can reroll only a single skill check.

Fallo The ritual has no effect.

Fallo crítico The performance is a dramatic y horrendous botch, y fate strikes out at the casters. You y each secondary caster are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for the next month, y this condition can't be removed by anything less than a wish or similarly powerful magic.

Thermal Stasis.name: Thermal Stasis
Thermal Stasis.description:
The same abilities that let you raise o menor thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium. The target gains resistance 2 against daño por fuego y resistance 2 against cold damage.

Potenciado (+1) Each resistance se incrementa en 2.

Amp The spell's duration becomes 1 minute.

Thicket of Knives.name: Thicket of Knives
Thicket of Knives.description:
You create numerous phantom copies of your weapon arm, hiding your true movements y rendering your attacks unpredictable. obtienes +2 status bonus to Deception checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the Feint action anyway, y add your Nivel as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8ecGfjmxnBY3WWao]{Efecto de conjuro: Thicket of Knives}

Thoughtful Gift.name: Thoughtful Gift
Thoughtful Gift.description:
You teleport one object of light or negligible Bulk held in your hy to the target. The object appears instantly in the target's hy, if they have a free hy, or at their feet if they don't. The target knows what object you are attempting to send them. If El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} or refuses to accept your gift, or if the spell would teleport a creature (even if La criatura queda inside an extradimensional container), the spell fails.

Potenciado (3º) The spell's range increases to 500 pies.

Potenciado (5º) As 3er Nivel, y the object's maximum Bulk increases to 1. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell} with 3 actions instead of 1; doing so increases the range to 1 mile y you don't need line of sight to the target, but you must be extremely familiar with the target.

Threefold Aspect.name: Threefold Aspect
Threefold Aspect.description:
This spell allows you to change between three versions of yourself of different ages: a maiden (young adult), a mother (adult), or a matriarch (elderly). Choose one when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}. While the spell lasts, you can change the age to any of the three or to your natural age with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. Your form always looks like you regardless of the age, y creatures who know you still recognize you y can tell your age is different.

Threefold aspect alters your physical appearance y personality to present an authentic version of yourself at various ages. This grants you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to pass as the chosen age, y you can add your Nivel as a proficiency bonus to these checks even if you're untrained. Furthermore, unless a creature specifically uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action or otherwise carefully examines you, it doesn't get a chance to notice that you aren't at your true age. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this spell.

Thunderburst.name: Thunderburst
Thunderburst.description:
You create a powerful blast of air y a loud peal of thunder, dealing 2d6 contundente damage y 2d6 sonic damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada.

Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecida} durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y is ensordecido for 1 hora.

Potenciado(+2) Increase each type of damage by 2d6 y the area by 5 pies.

Thundering Dominance.name: Thundering Dominance
Thundering Dominance.description:
You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura y amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.6SAdjml3OZw0BZnn]{Thundering Roar} action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.81TfqzTfIqkQA4Dy]{Efecto de conjuro: Thundering Dominance}

Potenciado(+2) The status bonus to Intimidation checks se incrementa en 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8º-Nivel spell), y the damage from the roar se incrementa en 2d8.

Thunderous Strike.name: Thunderous Strike
Thunderous Strike.description:
You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures. Make a melee Strike with your two-hyed weapon. Each creature in a 15-foot cone from you must attempt a basic Fortaleza save against your spell DC or take 2 sonic damage. con un fallo crítico, La criatura queda knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}. The target of your Strike must be within the cone or the effect fails.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1.

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Tidal Surge.name: Oleada
Tidal Surge.description:
Llamas a una tremenda ola para que mueva al objetivo, o bien en una masa de agua, o bien en tierra firme. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Fortaleza.

Fallo Mueves el objetivo 5 pies (1,5 m) en cualquier dirección por tierra firme, o 10 pies (3 m) en cualquier dirección en una masa de agua.

Fallo crítico Mueves el objetivo hasta 10 pies (3 m) en cualquier dirección por tierra firme, o 20 pies (6 m) en cualquier dirección en una masa de agua.

Time Beacon.name: Time Beacon
Time Beacon.description: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong. You can cast time beacon on only your turn. Keep careful track of everything that happens this turn after you cast time beacon. At the end of your turn, you can choose to rewind time back to just after you cast time beacon, removing all effects of your turn since then. Curses, traps, y other harmful effects that happen during your turn might prevent you from returning to the beacon if they are powerful enough. If you suffered any harmful effects during your turn after casting time beacon, to return to your beacon, time beacon attempts a counteract check against each such effect. If it fails at any of these checks, you can't return. After returning to the time beacon, the spell ends.

Time Jump.name: Time Jump
Time Jump.description:
You leap forward a few seconds in time, appearing across the battlefield in the blink of an eye. You gain 2 actions, each of which must be used to Leap, Sty, Step, or Stride. Si tienes an appropriate Speed, you can add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}to this list. While you take these actions, time pauses. All other creatures are completely unaware of your actions, can't speak, y can't use any actions that would be triggered by your movement.

While you're taking these actions, you can't take any other actions, including any that would be triggered by the move actions. Once the actions are complete, time starts again, y to onlookers, you seem to have suddenly teleported across the distance you traveled. Leaping forward through time is disorienting, so if you use time jump again within 1 minute of using the spell, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 4} durante 1 minuto.

Time Pocket.name: Time Pocket
Time Pocket.description:
You fling the target item forward in time y link it to the future of the creature holding it. The item disappears. When the spell ends, the item reappears with the creature that was holding it when you Cast the Spell. If the creature has enough hys free to hold the item, it appears in their hys. Otherwise, it falls to the ground in the creature's space.

You can Dismiss the spell, y it automatically ends if you're reduced to 0 Hit Points or cast time pocket again.

Time Sense.name: Time Sense
Time Sense.description:
When you Cast the Spell, obtienes perfect sense of time. You can learn exactly what time it is, down to the second. You can instead choose to gain a perfect sense of the calendar Si tienes knowledge in that area-if you're trained in Nature, you can learn exactly how long it is until sunrise y how many días until the next solstice. If you're trained in Astronomy Lore, you can learn precisely when any known predictable astronomical conjunction will begin y end, y so on.

You can gain a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you take on the same turn you cast time sense that requires extremely precise timing. If you choose to gain this bonus, you can't gain it again for 1 hora.

Time Skip.name: Time Skip
Time Skip.description:
You manipulate time around your ally, pushing them forward a few moments in time. El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} on its next turn y can use the action only to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Potenciado (+1) You can one additional willing creature other than yourself within range.

Timely Tutor.name: Timely Tutor
Timely Tutor.description:
You serve as an astral connection between your eidolon or familiar y the Akashic Record-a demiplane consisting of a comprehensive psychic library-then turn to the creature for advice. If you cast this spell on your familiar, your familiar adds your spellcasting ability modifier on checks to Recall Knowledge with the Lore skill of your choice, much like it does for Acrobatics y Stealth. Your familiar must have the speech familiar ability in order to share any information it learns with you. If you cast this spell on your eidolon, it instead becomes trained in the Lore skill.

If you lose physical contact with the target, its connection to the Akashic Record is severed y timely tutor immediately ends.

Tireless Worker.name: Tireless Worker
Tireless Worker.description: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Impedido}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

Tortoise and the Hare.name: Tortoise and the Hare
Tortoise and the Hare.description:
You prove that slow and steady doesn't always win the race by turning a foe into a proverbial tortoise and yourself or an ally into a hare, siphoning some of the foe's speed and granting it to the other target. The effects depend on the foe's Fortaleza save.

Critical Success The targets are no afectado.

Success El enemigo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and the other target is no afectado.

Failure El enemigo queda slowed 1 for 3 rounds and the other target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Critical Failure El enemigo queda slowed 1 for 3 minutos and the other target is quickened for 1 minute. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Torturous Trauma.name: Torturous Trauma
Torturous Trauma.description:
With this spell born of Kemnebi's sadistic love of torture, you batter a creature's internal organs, leaving no external signs of the immense pain you delivered. The target takes contundente damage equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting modifier with a basic Fortaleza save. If it critically fails, El objetivo queda also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until the start of your next turn. Creatures that lack internal organs are no afectado by this spell.

Potenciado (+1) The contundente damage se incrementa en 1d4.

Touch of Corruption.name: Touch of Corruption
Touch of Corruption.description:
You infuse the target with negative energy. If El objetivo queda living, this deals 1d6 negative negative damage (basic Fortaleza save); on a failed save, the target also takes a -2 status penalty to AC durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{Efecto de conjuro: Touch of Corruption}

If El objetivo queda a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, y if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ekGHLJSHGgWMUwkY]{Touch of Corruption (Healing)}

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.

Touch of Corruption (Healing).name: Touch of Corruption (Healing)
Touch of Corruption (Healing).description:
You infuse the target with negative energy. If El objetivo queda living, this deals 1d6 negative negative damage (basic Fortaleza save); on a failed save, the target also takes a -2 status penalty to AC durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{Efecto de conjuro: Touch of Corruption}

If El objetivo queda a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, y if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls durante 1 asalto.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.

Touch of Idiocy.name: Toque de idiotez
Touch of Idiocy.description:
Nublas la mente del objetivo, que debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2}.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 4}.

Touch of Obedience.name: Toque de obediencia
Touch of Obedience.description:
Tu imperioso toque erosiona la fuerza de Voluntad del objetivo, haciendo que sea más fácil de controlar. El objetivo hace una tirada de salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} El objetivo queda anonadado 1 hasta el final de tu turno actual.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} durante 1 minuto.

Touch of the Moon.name: Toque de la luna
Touch of the Moon.description:
Cuando tocas al objetivo, un símbolo de la luna aparece en su frente, brillando con una suave luz lunar. El objetivo brilla con luz tenue en un radio de 20 pies (6 m). También obtiene un beneficio basado en la fase de la luna, empezando con la luna nueva y cambiando a la siguiente fase al final de cada uno de sus turnos.

  • Luna nueva El objetivo no obtiene beneficio alguno.
  • Cuarto creciente El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus al ataque y un bonificador +4 por estatus a las tiradas de daño.
  • Luna llena El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de ataque, a la CA y a las tiradas de salvación y un bonificador +4 por estatus a las tiradas de daño.
  • Cuarto menguante El objetivo obtiene un bonificador +1 por estatus a la CA y a las tiradas de salvación. Después de esta fase, vuelve a la luna nueva.

Touch of Undeath.name: Toque de muerte en vida
Touch of Undeath.description:
Atacas la fuerza vital del objetivo con muerte en vida, infligiendo 1d6 daño por energía negativa. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Fortaleza.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo sufre mitad de daño.

Fallo El objetivo sufre daño completo y los efectos positivos sólo le curan la mitad de lo normal durante 1 asalto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre daño completo y los efectos positivos sólo le curan la mitad de lo normal durante 1 minuto.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

Transcribe Conflict.name: Transcribe Conflict
Transcribe Conflict.description:
You cause a sheet of paper to appear in your hy, y a moment later a detailed description of a combat you experienced within the last hora is recorded on that sheet of paper in a language that you know of your choice. The description is detailed enough that anyone who spends 1 minute reading the page can attempt to Recall Knowledge about the event as if they had been there, but the primary purpose of the transcribed conflict is to give you additional insight into the fight by allowing you to study the conflict y learn from errors or tactical blunders participants in the battle may have committed.

When you cast this spell, choose a type of foe in the fight you transcribed y attempt to Recall Knowledge about that foe using your spell DC-10 instead of your skill modifier in an appropriate skill to do so. For this action, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge. If you are successful, you not only learn information about that foe as determined by the GM, but for the remainder of transcribe conflict's duration, obtienes +1 status bonus to Initiative checks in combats where you face that exact kind of foe. For example, if you made the check against a wrath demon, the bonus would apply only to wrath demons, not to other demons. The GM decides if a foe who is disguised grants you this bonus.

Potenciado (5º) The bonus to initiative increases to +2 y the duration increases to 8 horas.

Potenciado (8º) The bonus to initiative increases to +3 y the duration increases until the next time you do your daily preparations, y the status bonus to Initiative checks applies to any allies who took part in the fight you transcribed as long as they are within 30 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Transcribe Moment.name: Transcribe Moment
Transcribe Moment.description: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction. Any creature who spends 1 minute to read the scroll-written in a language of your choice that you know-immediately sees y experiences your surroundings during the moment that you recorded (including whatever events transpired that asalto) exactly as you experienced it. This depiction records only what you can sense yourself. For example, if you can't see invisible creatures, the depiction doesn't reveal them even to a reader who could normally see them; a reader can't use their Perception to notice details you missed, but they can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge based on what they just experienced if they have knowledge that you lack. You can have multiple scrolls from transcribe moment in existence at the same time, up to a number equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you Cast the Spell again while already at the maximum number of scrolls, choose one of the current scrolls to lose its magic, then create the new one.

Transmute Rock And Mud.name: Transmute Rock And Mud
Transmute Rock And Mud.description:
You warp the structure of earthen material, turning rock into mud or mud into rock. Choose one of these two options when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

•Rock to Mud You transform non-magical, unworked, and unattended stone in the area into an equal volume of mud. If you Cast this Spell on a stone floor, it becomes difficult terrain; if the resulting mud is at least 3 feet deep, it is greater difficult terrain, or the creature can try to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} through it (@Check[type:athletics|dc:10|traits:action:swim]). If the mud is deep enough that a creature can't reach the bottom, the creature must Swim to move through it. If you Cast this Spell on a ceiling, the falling mud deals [[/r 8d6[bludgeoning]]] damage (basic Reflejos save) and spreads out, creating difficult terrain in an area 10 feet larger in radius than the original spell's area. Once the rock is transformed into mud, the mud is non-magical and remains until natural conditions cause it to dry out or otherwise disperse.

•Mud to Rock Mud in the area turns into unworked stone. If creatures are in the mud when it is transformed to stone, they must attempt a Reflejos saving throw.

Critical Success The creature escapes the mud and is atop the stone, no afectado.

Success The creature climbs out of the mud as it turns to rock and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} atop the stone.

Failure La criatura queda partially stuck in the mud and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Agarrado} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure La criatura queda entirely stuck. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} for 1 round or until it Escapes, whichever comes first.

Potenciado (+2) Add an additional 10-foot cube to the area, adjacent to at least one of the other cubes.

Traveler's Transit.name: Tránsito del viajero
Traveler's Transit.description:
Añades poder a tus músculos, lo que te permite nadar o trepar muros con facilidad.

Cuando lanzas este conjuro, ganas o bien una Velocidad de trepar o una de nadar, igual a tu Velocidad terrestre.

Potenciado (5º) Puedes elegir una Velocidad de volar.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.N1EM3jRyT8PCG1Py]{Efecto de conjuro: Tránsito del viajero (Trepar)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.0R42NyuEZMVALjQs]{Efecto de conjuro: Tránsito del viajero (Nadar)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.cTBYHfiXDOA09G4b]{Efecto de conjuro: Tránsito del viajero (Volar)}

Tree Stride.name: Zancada arbórea
Tree Stride.description:
Entras en un árbol vivo con un tronco lo suficientemente grande como para que te introduzcas en su interior y te teletransportes instantáneamente a cualquier árbol de la misma especie a 5 millas (8 km) o menos con un tronco lo suficientemente ancho. Una vez entras en el primer árbol, conoces instantáneamente la ubicación aproximada de otros árboles suficientemente grandes de la misma especie dentro del alcance y puedes salir del árbol original, si lo prefieres. No puedes llevar contigo espacios extradimensionales; si lo intentas, el conjuro falla

Potenciado (6º) El árbol del que sales puede estar hasta a 50 millas (80 km) de distancia.

Potenciado (8º) El árbol del que sales puede estar hasta a 500 millas (800 km) de distancia.

Potenciado(9º) El árbol del que sales puede estar en cualquier lugar del mismo planeta.

Trickster's Twin.name: Gemelo del bromista
Trickster's Twin.description:
Raramente te conformas con estar en un solo lugar. Elige una ubicación a 100 pies (30 m) o menos del objetivo, y que éste puede ver. Creas una ilusión de ti mismo que sólo el objetivo puede ver y que imita todas tus acciones. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo cree que estás en la ubicación designada y no puede verte en tu ubicación real. El objetivo automáticamente descree la ilusión cuando utilizas una acción que no tiene sentido donde está la ilusión, o si el objetivo ataca, toca, Busca o interacciona de alguna otra forma con la ilusión. Si utilizas acciones hostiles contra el objetivo, el conjuro se acaba.

Fallo Igual que en éxito, pero el objetivo debe tener éxito en una salvación de Voluntad para descreer la ilusión cuando tiene lugar uno de los acontecimientos indicados.

Fallo críticoIgual que en éxito, pero el objetivo debe tener un éxito crítico en una salvación de Voluntad para descreer la ilusión cuando tiene lugar uno de los acontecimientos indicados.

Triple Time.name: Triplicar la marcha
Triple Time.description:
Bailas con un ritmo vivo, acelerando el movimiento de tus aliados. Tú y tus aliados en el área obtenéis un bonificador +10 pies (+3 m) por estatus a todas las Velocidades durante 1 asalto.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{Efecto de conjuro: Triplicar la marcha}

True Seeing.name: Visión verdadera
True Seeing.description: Ves las cosas que están a 60 pies (18 m) o menos como son en realidad. El DJ hace una prueba secreta de contrarrestar contra cualquier ilusión o transmutación del área, pero sólo a efectos de determinar si ves algo correctamente (por ejemplo, si la prueba tiene éxito contra un conjuro de polimorfismo, puedes ver la auténtica forma de la criatura, pero no acabas con el conjuro).

True Strike.name: Impacto verdadero
True Strike.description:
Un atisbo hacia el futuro se asegura de que tu siguiente impacto resulta certero. La próxima vez que hagas una tirada de ataque antes del final de tu turno, podrás hacer dos veces la tirada de ataque y quedarte con el mejor resultado. El ataque ignora los penalizadores por circunstancia a la tirada de ataque y cualquier prueba plana requerida por estar el objetivo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.fpGDAz2v5PG0zUSl]{Efecto de conjuro: Impacto verdadero}

True Target.name: Objetivo verdadero
True Target.description: Exploras los posibles futuros de los próximos segundos para entender todas las formas en las que tu objetivo podría evitar el daño, y después proyectas una visión de dicho futuro a quienes te rodean. En la primera tirada de ataque hecha contra el objetivo mientras dura el conjuro, el atacante tira dos veces y utiliza el mejor resultado. El atacante también ignora los penalizadores por circunstancia a la tirada de ataque y cualquier prueba plana requerida por estar el objetivo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido}.

Umbral Extraction.name: Umbral Extraction
Umbral Extraction.description:
You prepare to steal spells from your foes, ripping them from the foe's shadow to stow them in an ephemeral pocket in the Shadow Plane. obtienes temporary spell slot, which you can fill only by stealing a spell from an enemy spellcaster. During umbral extraction's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to take one of the foe's prepared spells or unused spontaneous spell slots instead of an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral extraction. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, you deal 1d4 mental damage to the target per Nivel of the spell stolen due to the psychological toll of the spiritual emptiness created by wrenching the spell away, y you place the stolen spell in your temporary spell slot. It gains the shadow trait if cast from this temporary slot.

Determine the stolen spell at ryom from the target's spells that are 1 Nivel lower than umbral extraction, or from spells of the same Nivel if you got a critical success. If the target has no spell slots of that Nivel, use the highest Nivel below that in which the target does have a spell slot. (If the target has no eligible spells, you get nothing, but you can continue to attempt to Steal spells for the remaining duration.) If El objetivo queda a prepared caster, you ryomly steal one of their prepared spells. If El objetivo queda a spontaneous caster, you instead steal an unexpended spell slot of the appropriate Nivel y determine the spell at ryom from all the target's known spells at that Nivel. You can't steal a target's innate spells, focus spells, or cantrips. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it, y your temporary spell slot becomes a spell slot of the same Nivel as the spell you stole.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your alcance. Once you've placed a spell in your temporary spell slot, you can't attempt to Steal more spells. If you succeed at your Thievery check, you must take the spell you stole. Even if you're a spontaneous caster, you can use the temporary spell slot only to cast the stolen spell y you can cast only the stolen spell from your temporary spell slot. When umbral extraction ends, you lose the temporary spell slot y any spell still stored in it. When you cast umbral extraction, any previous casting of umbral extraction currently affecting you ends.

Umbral Graft.name: Umbral Graft
Umbral Graft.description:
You reflect a spell into a shadowy version of itself, in the process depleting the power of the initial spell. During umbral graft's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to abscond with spells affecting a foe instead of stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral graft. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, ryomly determine a spell affecting the foe that has a target entry. That spell ceases to affect the target, y you can either cause the spell to affect you or store it in your shadow. If your attempt to Steal was a critical success, you automatically steal the spell if its Nivel is equal to o menor than umbral graft. If it was a success, you automatically steal it if its Nivel is lower than umbral graft. If you succeeded, but the spell's Nivel was too high to steal automatically, you must attempt a counteract check to see if you steal the spell. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it. If you store it, you can transfer it to a willing creature as a single action that has the manipulate trait. The spell lasts for its remaining duration, to a maximum of 1 minute, y any time you keep it stored subtracts from its duration normally. The spell gains the shadow trait.

You can't steal constant innate spells that are always active on a creature, such as a choral angel's constant tongues, or innate spells that have special restrictions that remove their ability to target other creatures, such as an imp's invisibility. At the GM's discretion, you might not be able to steal innate spells with other unusual modifications to the base spell.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your alcance. Once you've stolen a spell, you can't attempt to Steal more spells, nor can you choose not to take a spell if you succeed at your Thievery check. When you cast umbral graft, any spells you stole with a previous umbral graft end even if their duration hasn't elapsed. If you're afectado by both umbral graft y umbral extraction, you make the choice whether to steal a spell slot, an active spell, or an item each time you Steal.

Umbral Mindtheft.name: Umbral Mindtheft
Umbral Mindtheft.description: You prepare to steal a broad field of knowledge from another creature, siphoning it from their mind y storing it in a pocket of the Shadow Plane connected to your own mind. During the spell's duration, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} action to attempt to take one Lore skill proficiency from a creature instead of Stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting the Spell. If you succeed at your check to Steal a Lore skill, you deal 2d6 mental damage to the target if they were trained in that skill, más [[/r 2d6[mental]]] damage per proficiency rank they have in that skill above trained, as the sudden loss of knowledge leaves an aching absence in the target's mind. Determine the Lore skill at ryom from among those known by the target; on a critical success, you learn what Lore skills La criatura queda proficient in y can select the skill rather than choosing at ryom. If the target isn't trained in any Lore skills, you get nothing, but you can continue to attempt to Steal Lore from other creatures for the remaining duration. The target loses the benefits of its training in that Lore skill, y you gain their proficiency rank in that Lore skill. This effect lasts until your next daily preparations or until you are incapacitated, in which case the Lore siphons back into the target creature's mind from the Shadow Plane, wherever you both may be. As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your alcance. Once you've stolen one Lore skill, you can't attempt to Steal more Lore. If you succeed at your Thievery check, you must take the Lore you stole.

Unblinking Flame Aura.name: Unblinking Flame Aura
Unblinking Flame Aura.description:
You focus your sight inside y call on your inner fire to grant you warmth, steady your vision, y soothe your body. You recover [[/r (3*@item.Nivel)[healing]]]{15 Hit Points}. For the duration, obtienes +2 status bonus on Perception checks y resistance 10 to cold.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.HoCUCi2jL1OLfXWR]{Efecto de conjuro: Unblinking Flame Aura}

Potenciado (+1) You recover an additional 3 Hit Points, y La resistencia to cold se incrementa en 2.

Unblinking Flame Emblem.name: Unblinking Flame Emblem
Unblinking Flame Emblem.description:
Desencadenante Your last action was a successful Strike against an enemy

You emblazon the target with a fiery sigil that projects your sight y your flame onto them, allowing you y your allies to track their movements y making it easier to hit them. Attack rolls against the target gain a +1 status bonus, y successful Strikes against the target deal [[/r 1d6[fire]]] damage, y [[/r 1d10[persistent,fire]]] damage on a critical hit. However, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} against other enemies, as the information from the emblem distracts you. The emblem takes your full attention; if you use unblinking flame emblem again before the original duration expires, the new casting replaces the previous casting.

Potenciado(9º) The daño por fuego increases to [[/r 1d8[fire]]] damage, y the persistent daño por fuego on a critical hit increases to [[/r 1d12[persistent,fire]]].

Unblinking Flame Ignition.name: Unblinking Flame Ignition
Unblinking Flame Ignition.description:
Desencadenante A foe reduces you to half your Hit Points or fewer.

You feel the most alive when pushed into a corner, as the insights y vision granted by the flame stoke into overdrive. Your body begins to emit a blazing aura of flames. You gain greater Visión en la oscuridad low‐light vision, y the ability to see invisible creatures. obtienes fly Speed equal to your ly Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}, y you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly} using your flames. Any creature who starts their turn within 5 feet of you takes [[/r 1d12[fire]]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.hya8NfBB1GJofTXm]{Efecto de conjuro: Unblinking Flame Ignition}

Unblinking Flame Revelation.name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
Unblinking Flame Revelation.description: You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.

Unbreaking Wave Advance.name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
Unbreaking Wave Advance.description:
You unleash a mighty wave from your hy that buffets back your foes. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortaleza saving throw. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave advance would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point y takes 3d6 damage.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda pushed 10 pies [3 m].

Fallo crítico La criatura queda pushed 20 pies (6 m).

Potenciado (+1) The damage for pushing a creature into a solid barrier se incrementa en 1d6.

Unbreaking Wave Barrier.name: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
Unbreaking Wave Barrier.description:
You create a protective circle around yourself that repels your foes. obtienes +1 status bonus to AC. Any creature other than you within the area, or attempting to move into the area, must attempt a Fortaleza saving throw; a creature needs to attempt the Fortaleza saving throw only once each round. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave barrier would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point y takes [[/r 2d6[contundente]]] damage for every additional 5 feet it would've been pushed. On subsequent rounds, the first time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain} this Spell each round, you can increase the radius of the barrier by 5 pies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.v09uwq1eHEAy2bgh]{Efecto de conjuro: Unbreaking Wave Barrier}

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito La criatura quedan't pushed, but the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Fallo La criatura queda pushed 10 pies [3 m], y the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda pushed 20 feet y knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}, y the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Unbreaking Wave Containment.name: Unbreaking Wave Containment
Unbreaking Wave Containment.description: You wrap enemies in four strys of water. When you cast the spell, make a spell attack roll against the targets. On a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} until the spell ends or they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapar}; on a critical success, they're also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} until the spell ends or they Escape. Each target that's immobilized or restrained also takes 10d6 contundente damage from the constricting waves, with a basic Fortaleza save. The first time each subsequent round when you sustain the Spell, if all the targets aren't immobilized or restrained, make a spell attack roll against any targets who are free but remain within range, with the same effects as when you cast the spell, immobilizing or restraining them depending on your spell attack roll. Creatures who are immobilized or restrained take 10d6 contundente damage with a basic Fortaleza save.

Unbreaking Wave Vapor.name: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
Unbreaking Wave Vapor.description:
Desencadenante You're targeted by an attack made by an attacker you can see.

You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} against the triggering attack y gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it. After the triggering attack is complete, you can Step if the triggering attack hit or Step twice if the triggering attack missed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.m6x0IvoeX0a0bZiQ]{Efecto de conjuro: Unbreaking Wave Vapor}

Undeath's Blessing.name: Bendición de la muerte en vida
Undeath's Blessing.description:
Instilas en una criatura el toque de la sepultura. Mientras dura, los conjuros de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Dañar} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Curar} tratan a la criatura como muerta en vida y los conjuros de curar la tratan como si estuviera viva. Además, los conjuros de dañar obtienen un bonificador +2 por estatus a los Puntos de Golpe restablecidos al objetivo.

Si el objetivo quiere evitar el conjuro, puede hacer una salvación de Voluntad para reducir los efectos.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo se cura la mitad de curar sufre mitad de daño de daño durante 1 asalto.

Fallo Los efectos son tal y como se describen en el texto.

Potenciado (+1) El modificador por estatus a los Puntos de Golpe restablecidos se incrementa en 2.

Undermine Reality.name: Undermine Reality
Undermine Reality.description:
You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real. As long as it is quasi-real, its Strikes deal half damage, it can't critically succeed at any skill check, y creatures attempting saving throws against its spells y effects get a result one degree of success better than they rolled. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda quasi-real until the end of its next turn.

Fallo El objetivo queda quasi-real durante 1 minuto. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save, ending the spell on a success.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda quasi-real con una duración ilimitada.

Undertaker.name: Undertaker
Undertaker.description:
You point your finger toward the target y whisper an epitaph that promises to grace their gravestone in the near future. This spell works best when both you y the target are in contact with solid ground. If either is not in contact with the ground, the target gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their saving throw against the spell, y if both you y the target are not in contact with solid ground, the target gains this bonus y treats the result of their save as one degree of success better than the actual result. The target of undertaker can resist with a Fortaleza save.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes [[/r 40[negative]]] damage. If El objetivo queda in contact with solid ground, the ground in the target's space shifts y shakes, y is treated as difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Fallo The target takes [[/r 80[negative]]] damage. If El objetivo queda in contact with solid ground, the ground in the target's space churns y cracks open into an open but shallow grave. El objetivo queda knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}, y that space is treated as difficult terrain until the grave is filled in.

Fallo crítico The target takes [[/r 160[negative]]] damage. If El objetivo queda in contact with solid ground, a grave opens beneath their feet y they fall prone within. The grave then forms a stone sarcophagus‑like shell around the victim. This stone shell cannot be opened y must be broken; it has AC 10, Hardness 14, y 80 Hit Points. At the start of your next turn, the grave fills in with soil. If the victim dies while inside this grave, at the next sundown the victim transforms into an evil ghast as the sarcophagus crumbles, allowing the new undead to dig its way up to the surface.

Unexpected Transposition.name: Unexpected Transposition
Unexpected Transposition.description:
Desencadenante You are targeted with an enemy's Strike.

When attacked, you attempt to quickly swap your own position with that of another creature. A creature that is unwilling to swap places with you must attempt a Will save. Willing creatures automatically fail. If you successfully switch places with the target, the triggering attack is resolved against that creature as if it had been the original target of the attack. After the swap, you y the target are both temporarily immune to unexpected transposition spells durante 1 minuto. You automatically switch places if El objetivo queda willing. If it's unwilling, it can attempt a Will save. Neither of you teleports if the target succeeds at its save.

Unfetter Eidolon.name: Unfetter Eidolon
Unfetter Eidolon.description: You loosen the link between yourself y your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.

Unfettered Mark.name: Unfettered Mark
Unfettered Mark.description:
You tattoo the target with rare inks y create a magical tattoo called an unfettered mark. This particular version of the unfettered mark grants the target special powers to escape from the Black Whale y Stormholt (the demiplane that overlaps with the Black Whale). While Crafting is the easiest method for creating this tattoo, the artistry is less important than maintaining a feeling of freedom in your mind while performing the ritual. Because of this, you can use any skill as long as it holds a special significance to you. A ranger who is at home in the woods, for example, could use a Survival or Nature check while creating the tattoo. If the target already has a successful unfettered mark currently active, the magic fades from the old tattoo y is replaced by the results of the new ritual.

The ritual can be performed alone or with the aid of up to 10 secondary casters. Each secondary caster must tattoo themself with their own tattoo y pay the full ritual Coste to participate. Creatures currently held captive in the prison have a special relationship with the ritual: for each month they spend drawing memories of home on the walls of their cell, they can reduce the total Coste of the ritual by 50 po.

Éxito crítico The target y primary y secondary casters all gain the ability to leave Stormholt. To do so, they must leave the prison by swimming through the water or by riding in a vessel that is in contact with the water (such as a rowboat). When they alcance the great whirlpool, they are pulled under as normal, but instead of being transported to the Flotsam Graveyard in Absalom, they are immediately transported (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleport}) to a location in Absalom of their choice. They also gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]Respiración acuática, y resistance to electricity 10 for the duration of the ritual.

Éxito As critical success, except the afectado creatures don't gain the benefits of water walk y water breathing.

Fallo You create the tattoo but fail to imbue it with magic.

Fallo crítico As failure, but the tattoo also creates an unwholesome bond with the demiplane of Stormholt. For 24 horas, the target y the primary y secondary casters gain a fishlike appearance y are covered in a slimy membrane. They gain the ability to breathe both water y air, but their skin quickly dries out when on ly. After 1 hora on ly they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, conditions that can be removed only if they reenter water. Additionally, the membrane conducts electricity well, causing them to gain weakness 10 to electricity.

Unfettered Pack.name: Jauría indómita
Unfettered Pack.description:
Liberas a quienes viajan junto a ti de los obstáculos del medio ambiente. Los objetivos no sufren penalizadores por circunstancia a su Velocidad debido a la vegetación, los escombros, el viento u otras propiedades del entorno, tanto si es mágico como si no, e ignoran el terreno difícil debido a dichas propiedades medioambientales.

Potenciado (9º) Los objetivos también ignoran el terreno difícil mayor debido a las propiedades medioambientales.

Unfolding Wind Blitz.name: Unfolding Wind Blitz
Unfolding Wind Blitz.description: You blitz forward so quickly that you soar through the air, y nothing can react to you. Fly up to twice your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. At any point along the way, you can make Strikes with an unarmed attack against up to three different targets within your alcance. You increase your multiple attack penalty for these attacks only after completing all of the attacks.

Unfolding Wind Buffet.name: Unfolding Wind Buffet
Unfolding Wind Buffet.description:
You surround your unarmed attacks with the speed y force of air. Make three unarmed Strikes against the same target. If at least one was a successful hit, the target must attempt a Fortaleza save or be pushed back 5 feet for each normal hit from the buffet, más 10 feet for each critical hit.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda pushed back half the normal distance.

Fallo El objetivo queda pushed back the normal distance.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda pushed back double the normal distance y then knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Unfolding Wind Crash.name: Unfolding Wind Crash
Unfolding Wind Crash.description:
You jump up to 120 feet in any direction y then deal 18d6 contundente damage to creatures within a 20‐foot emanation after you ly, with a basic Reflejos save. Creatures who critically fail are also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Potenciado (10º) The damage increases to 20d6.

Unfolding Wind Rush.name: Unfolding Wind Rush
Unfolding Wind Rush.description:
You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride y one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind} appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting durante 1 asalto.

Potenciado (5º) The wall of wind lasts 3 asaltos.

Unimpeded Stride.name: Zancada sin trabas
Unimpeded Stride.description: Nada te puede retener en un lugar. Huyes de inmediato de todo efecto mágico que te tiene @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Agarrado} a menos que el efecto sea de un nivel superior al de tu conjuro zancada sin trabas. A continuación, das una Zancada. Durante este movimiento, ignoras el terreno difícil y cualquier penalizador por circunstancia o por estatus a tu Velocidad.

Unity.name: Unidad
Unity.description:
Desencadenante Tú y 1 o más aliados dentro del alcance sois designados como objetivo por un conjuro o aptitud que permite una tirada de salvación.

Organizas una defensa unida. Cada aliado puede utilizar tu modificador a las tiradas de salvación en lugar del suyo contra el conjuro desencadenante. Cada aliado decide individualmente qué modificador utilizar.

Unrelenting Observation.name: Observación implacable
Unrelenting Observation.description:
Este conjuro concede una visión perfecta basada en el escudriñamiento, lo que permite a diversos objetivos voluntarios seguir los movimientos o fijar la posición exacta de una criatura u objeto. Elige una criatura u objeto objetivo a rastrear en el área. Se convierte en el sensor del conjuro. Hasta cinco criaturas voluntarias a tu elección en el área pueden ver una imagen fantasmal de esta criatura u objeto cuando está fuera de su vista. Pueden percibir perfectamente a la criatura u objeto, lo que les permite ignorar el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, aunque las barreras físicas siguen proporcionando cobertura.

Las criaturas que rastrean pueden ver a la criatura u objeto rastreado a través de todas las barreras distintas al plomo o al agua corriente, que bloquean su visión. La distancia no importa, aunque la criatura u objeto podría alejarse tanto que fuera demasiado pequeña para ser percibida. Las criaturas que rastrean no ven nada del entorno alrededor del objetivo, aunque sí pueden ver cualquier equipo que una criatura lleva o empuña, y pueden decir si quita objetos de su persona.

Si el objetivo a rastrear es voluntario, la duración es de 1 hora. Si intentas rastrear a una criatura involuntaria, el objetivo debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad.

Éxito crítico La criatura u objeto no resulta afectado.

Éxito Tal y como se ha descrito, y la duración es de 1 minuto.

Fallo Tal y como se ha descrito, y la duración es de 1 hora.

Unseasonable Squall.name: Unseasonable Squall
Unseasonable Squall.description:
You issue a blast of sudden wind that ripples outward from the center of the burst. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog y mist, scatters objects of light Bulk or less, y pushes unsecured objects of 1 Bulk or less 5 feet away from the spell's origin point. Each Medium or smaller creature in the area when you Cast the Spell or that moves into spell's area must attempt a Fortaleza saving throw.

Éxito El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Fallo La criatura queda knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}. If the creature was Flying, it gets a critical failure instead.

Fallo crítico La criatura queda pushed 30 feet away from the center of the burst, is knocked Prone, y takes 2d6 contundente damage.

Unseen Custodians.name: Unseen Custodians
Unseen Custodians.description:
You create a site-bound, long-lasting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Unseen Servant} spell effect, forming entities of pure force to carry out basic tasks at a fixed location.

Éxito crítico The ritual creates six unseen servants. You don't need to concentrate on them, y they aren't summoned minions. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to commy one to perform a basic task; it continues to perform the task until commyed again.

Éxito As critical success, but the ritual creates three unseen servants.

Fallo The ritual fails to create any servants.

Fallo crítico The ritual creates six unseen servants, but these creatures are hostile y capable of making fist @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} with an attack bonus equal to your skill modifier for the primary skill check, dealing [[/r 1d6[force]]] damage. They attack you y your allies y attempt to break objects belonging to you y your allies within the area.

Potenciado (6º) If destroyed, the unseen servants reform the next morning. The Coste increases to 30 po.

Unseen Servant.name: Sirviente invisible
Unseen Servant.description:
Convocas a un sirviente invisible (ver barra lateral) al que puedes dar órdenes como parte de Mantener el conjuro. Te sirve hasta que sus Puntos de Golpe quedan reducidos a 0, en cuyo momento el conjuro acaba, o hasta que dejas de Mantenerlo. El sirviente invisible obtiene el rasgo convocado.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.j7NNPfZwD19BwSEZ]{Sirviente invisible}

Unspeakable Shadow.name: Unspeakable Shadow
Unspeakable Shadow.description:
You alter a creature's shadow, transforming it into a terrifying monster out to devour the creature. The creature must attempt a Will save. A creature that has the Asustado condition from unspeakable shadow must spend at least one of its actions each turn to either attack its shadow (making a Strike ineffectually) or flee from its shadow (using one action to move away as though it had the fleeing condition).

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}.

Fallo El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 3}. It can't reduce its Asustado value below 1 durante 1 minuto.

Fallo crítico El objetivo queda so afraid, it might instantly die. It must succeed at a Fortaleza save or die; this saving throw has the incapacitation trait. If it succeeds at its save, El objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 4} y can't reduce its Asustado value below 1 durante 1 minuto.

Untwisting Iron Augmentation.name: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
Untwisting Iron Augmentation.description:
Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron y silver, they gain the earth trait, y they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.4ktNx3cVz5GkcGJa]{Efecto de conjuro: Untwisting Iron Augmentation}

Potenciado(9º) Your unarmed attacks are also treated as adamantine.

Untwisting Iron Buffer.name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
Untwisting Iron Buffer.description:
You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 Puntos de Golpe temporales, which last for up to 3 asaltos.

Potenciado (+1) The Puntos de Golpe temporales increase by 5.

Untwisting Iron Pillar.name: Untwisting Iron Pillar
Untwisting Iron Pillar.description:
You call upon the earth y your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 Puntos de Golpe temporales that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.p8F3MVUkGmpsUDOn]{Efecto de conjuro: Untwisting Iron Pillar}

Untwisting Iron Roots.name: Untwisting Iron Roots
Untwisting Iron Roots.description:
You manipulate the earth beneath your feet to throw your enemies off balance, leaving chunks of rock y rubble behind. Creatures within range take 2d6 contundente damage, with a basic Reflejos save; on a failed save, they also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}. The afectado area becomes difficult terrain, but you can move through the difficult terrain normally.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

Unusual Anatomy.name: Anatomía inusual
Unusual Anatomy.description:
Transformas tu carne y tus órganos en una extraña amalgama de piel brillante, escamas rugosas, mechones de cabello y protuberancias tumorales. Esto tiene tres efectos:

  • Obtienes resistencia 10 al daño de precisión y resistencia 10 al daño adicional debido a los impactos críticos. Si la resistencia es mayor que el daño adicional, lo reduce a 0 pero no el daño normal debido al ataque.
  • Obtienes Visión en la oscuridad.
  • Te rezuma ácido de la piel. Toda criatura que te acierta con un ataque sin armas o con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo sin alcance sufre 2d6 daño por ácido.

Potenciado(+2) La resistencias increase by 5, y the daño por ácido se incrementa en 1d6.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.LMzFBnOEPzDGzHg4]{Efecto de conjuro: Anatomía inusual}

Updraft.name: Updraft
Updraft.description:
A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air y sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2d6 contundente damage with a basic Reflejos save. On a failure, El objetivo queda knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Potenciado (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description:
The ground in the area shudders y crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a river might be blocked y flood the surrounding area.

  • Stone Debris The area becomes difficult terrain.
  • Rising Pillars Pillars of smooth stone rise from your chosen number of 10-foot squares on a surface in the area, ascending up to 60 feet in height. Each pillar stops when it hits a structure or ceiling unless that structure collapses (see below). The DC to Climb or Grab an Edge on a pillar is 30. Each creature on a pillar after it rises must succeed at a Reflejos saving throw or fall off the nearest edge (the creature can choose which edge, if several are equally close). A creature on a pillar that is stopped by a structure falls without attempting a save.
  • Structural Collapse Structures y ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 14 for a sturdy structure, DC 9 for an average structure y most natural formations, all adjusted higher o menor as the GM sees fit). In general, shoddy structures automatically collapse. A collapse deals 11d6 contundente damage to creatures beneath it; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflejos save to avoid it. If La criatura queda forced to attempt a Reflejos save because it was on a rising pillar, it uses the same result.

Éxito crítico The creature takes half collapse damage.

Éxito The creature takes half the collapse damage y falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.

Fallo The creature takes the full collapse damage y falls prone.

Fallo crítico The creature takes the full collapse damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by debris until it successfully Escapes (DC equal to the spell's save DC).

Vampiric Maiden.name: Vampiric Maiden
Vampiric Maiden.description:
A ghostly iron maiden snaps shut on the target y drains its vitality for your gain. This deals [[/r 4d4[perforante]]] damage y [[/r 4d4[negative]]] damage, y the target must attempt a Fortaleza save. You gain temporary HP equal to the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistances, weaknesses, y the like). You lose any remaining temporary HP after 1 minute.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.

Éxito The target takes half damage.

Fallo El objetivo queda briefly trapped within the vampiric maiden. The target takes full damage y is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Inmovilizado} by the iron maiden durante 1 asalto or until it uses an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to extricate itself, whichever comes first.

Fallo crítico El objetivo sufre doble daño y is Immobilized by the vampiric maiden durante 1 asalto or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}(the DC is your spell DC), whichever comes first.

Potenciado (+1) The perforante y negative damage increase by [[/r 1d4]] each.

Vampiric Touch.name: Toque vampírico
Vampiric Touch.description:
Tu toque absorbe la fuerza vital de un objetivo para potenciarte. Infliges 6d6 daño negativo al objetivo. Obtienes tantos Puntos de Golpe temporales como la mitad del daño negativo que sufre el objetivo (después de aplicar resistencias y cosas parecidas). Al cabo de 1 minuto, pierdes todos los Puntos de Golpe temporales que te quedan.

Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d6.

Variable Gravity.name: Variable Gravity
Variable Gravity.description:
You can adjust how strongly gravity grips you, changing between low gravity, normal gravity, y high gravity with ease. Choose one type of gravity when you cast the spell. While the spell lasts, you can change the type of gravity with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The spell doesn't alter your physical appearance, so it's impossible to what type of gravity you're subjected to by casual observation.

  • Low Gravity You can jump double the normal distance when you Long Jump or Leap, though still to a maximum of your Speed. When you High Jump, you can use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't double the distance.
